author: {'steamid': '76561198007375452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 10090, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9453, 'last_played': 1711169702}
review:
This is one of those games that on paper sounds like it should never work.  Turn based sports game?  Madness!  And yet it is somehow very good.  It has enough "RPG Stats" to be interesting but not enough to overwhelm.  It has enough randomness to produce occasional upsets but not so much that matches are wildly unpredictable.  The strategy to how you improve your team can sometimes be a slow process that pays dividends in future seasons.  It's a game I keep coming back to, even if I don't touch it for several months.  It's good for filling a few minutes or a few hours.  It's even great if you don't have a deep knowledge of football (soccer).  It's just a very well made game from a small developer that cares.  And that's always worth supporting.

Base game if fairly priced and a great deal if on sale.  Recommend the Football Stars DLC, too.

Try the demo and see for yourself if you'll like it.  I know it hooked me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295618283', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1472, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1712417554}
review:
短くまとめ

・[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2478710/Football_Tactics__Glory_World/]新作[/url]の日本語翻訳を担当(正確には引き継ぎ)
・今作の日本語翻訳をしたい気持ちがある
・開発の意向で新作の翻訳を優先している
・翻訳の経験は0(全くの素人)

-----

サッカーの経験と知識は多少あり。サカつく(クラブ経営系のゲーム)のプレイ経験あり。今作はデモ版のみプレイ(製品版は日本語でプレイしたかったので未プレイ)(トレーディングカード取得の為、プレイ時間だけはそこそこありますが…)。

元々は今作の日本語翻訳の募集を見て開発にメールを送りましたが「新作の翻訳を担当して欲しい」と返事が来たので、素人に務まるかどうか、悩みながらも担当することになりました。なお日本語翻訳の前任者の方との面識はありません。

正直、このシリーズは日本語に対応すれば国内の売上がもっと伸びるのではないかと思っています。それぐらいのポテンシャルを持っているゲームだと(勝手に)信じています。

翻訳素人ゆえに拙い日本語にしか出来ないのが無力ですが、少しでも多くの日本の皆様にプレイしていただけるように、自分なりに翻訳作業を進めています。

新作の日本語翻訳が一段落しましたら、今作の日本語翻訳についても改めて交渉してみたいと思っています。また何か動きがあったら追記します。

review: It's fun for a while, but then gets repetitive. The gameplay is slow and trying to upgrade anything is like mobile game X ubisoft. If you pay attention you'll find some things are illogical or left unfinished. My biggest gripe is that I just can't get the economy going. Max fans, max stadium, buying players with no skills and training skills, coaches for fast training, nothing helps... at the end of the day if you want good players, you won't find them without skills. Max upgraded youth academy and best coach don't train superb players, only solid ones. Best I ever had was a 3.5* team and when the salaries start to get into many millions you can't keep more than 1 great player for more than a while and the AI crushes you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198826039781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 39387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1984, 'playtime_at_review': 35740, 'last_played': 1712456237}
review:
到超级联赛后赛事增加 ，因为球员体力的问题需要协调好各个位置的球员分配（最好要有各个位置的备选队员），其中前锋的话建议选前腰和全能前锋，前腰最好的技能我个人建议是穿裆过人或是脚跟挑健，全能前锋最好是选择脚跟挑健和炮轰，属性方面选择射门，射门到180后考虑传球（传球仅指前腰前锋无要求）。中锋最主要的位置全能中锋和后腰，全能中锋建议选择的技能是长传和铲球，后腰只能选择铲球，中锋主要考虑传球160后考虑控球，后腰防160后考虑传球。后卫中必须要有个有头球的，其他以铲球为主，全能后卫是铲球加长传或直传，清道夫看门将技能最好配长传或神反，门将的技能主要以门神和神反最佳，没有的话也可以用门神配高空球，后位和门将均是优先防加到160，然后全部点传球。
以上几个位置除了门将外其他的位置均需要有后备人员否则拿到三冠有较高难度（困难+铁血难度下）
除以上主要位置外需要进行补强的其他几个位置是左、右边锋，左、右后卫，视赛前对手情况进行调配。

author: {'steamid': '76561198249345800', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2131, 'last_played': 1708639432}
review: The main thing in a football manager is realism. There is no realism in this game. Almost the entire game is dedicated to improving promising football players (why can’t you immediately buy ready-made ones and not suffer?). The economy is broken and to really develop your club you need to play for many hours. If you don't want to waste your time, don't even start.
developer_response:
The main mode of the game is taking an unknown club and leading it to glory. Certainly, it takes time which is mainly spent on learning how to play and how to manage a club. You can buy whoever you want if you have enough money and glory like in other football management games.

There is Sandbox mode which allows you to start playing directly in the Premier league with any club you want. So you can take, for example, top English club. You will have top footballers and quite big budget. 

However, our game is about tactics in the first place. Therefore, without knowing how to use classes, skills and crosses, without knowing how to effectively manage a team, you will quickly relegate even with the best club (same as if Barcelona hired a football manager without any real experience).

Therefore, it makes sense to try to develop your unknown club, learn the game mechanics, and then try other game modes.

Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197976487549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 988, 'last_played': 1708347773}
review: three turns per round is simply not enough.  Might be an interesting game but you will have to grind for days to build up your team to be competitive..... not recommended
developer_response:
I regret we weren't successful in explaining how you can use the 3 available actions per turn successfully. I see that many players have fun when figure out the game mechanics, and when I see that a player is not happy about the game because we weren't clear in how it works, that makes me sad.

I will make another try right there. 

1) The game is made so that when you understand the game's mechanics, you can win stronger opponents by clever tactics, not because of grinding. Surely, there is a limit to how strong the opponent can be so you can beat them but it's realistic in my opinion.

2) Use action Hold by your footballers with the highest Control attribute in the centre of the pitch so you increase your chances to keep the ball while the opponent tries to tackle. Then, you start a new turn with the ball in the good position to start a new attack.

3) Use skills. They are crucial to win. First, successful using a skill against an opponent gives you +1 action in your turn. Second, they provide you with unique opportunities. Learn how they work, experiment to use them. They are really a game changer.

4) Learn what different classes do. For example, wing forwards can make a free cut in action into the opponent's penalty zone if they stay in the furthest right or left corner tile. It allows to easily get right to the opponent's goal and make a shot. There are many ways to combine classes and skill.

5) From your review, I don't understand if you completed the coach exam lessons. But I urge you to do so. They gradually explain very important tactics and allow to use them in practical situations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049863741', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1706023304}
review: 'Sıra tabanlı' bir oyun ama 'strateji' oyunu değil.  Çünkü iyi statlara sahipseniz takımınızın dizilişine veya taktiğine bakmaksızın kazanıyorsunuz; aynı şekilde tam tersi bir durumda ise kaybediyorsunuz. Dolayısıyla oyun tamamen stat tabanlı. Mesela karakteriniz şut çekiyor: Eğer statları izin veriyorsa gol, izin vermiyorsa gol değil. Bu kadar basit. Halbuki bir strateji oyununu eğlenceli yapan şey dezavantajlı durumda iken kazanabilmenin bir yolunun bulunmasıdır.
developer_response:
Oyunun istatistiklere dayalı olduğu yönünde ilk izlenime sahip olduğunuz için üzgünüm. Ancak oyun ilk bakışta göründüğünden çok daha stratejik.

Oyun stratejik olarak oldukça derin. Oyunun mekaniklerini anladığınızda, zayıf takımınızla çok daha güçlü rakiplerinizi yenebilirsiniz. Buradaki temel taktik unsurlar beceriler ve sınıf yetenekleridir.

Umarım oyuna bir şans daha verirsiniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069678602', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 5818, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5764, 'last_played': 1706673265}
review:
A simpler and more fun-to-play version of Football Manager. Games are turn-based and can be played in 5-10 minutes. When you're building your roster, players at each position only have four skill categories to analyze. Each player can also develop a special "talent". 

The whole process of playing, building rosters, and upgrading team facilities is faster and more streamlined than Football Manager, without being too simplistic. There is strategy involved without getting bogged down in the details. This is one of the most fun sports simulation games I've played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262997519', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1703106558}
review:
Back int’ day, when I were a lad, I loved football. Every Saturday I’d listen to live coverage of my local team on the radio, watch all the scores come in live on Final Score and play the Premier Manager games on my PS1, later moving to the LMA Manager games on my PS2.

Over time I started to lose interest in football but still loved the idea of building and developing a team to see what it could do. I haven’t had the slightest interest in football for over a decade now, but in that time I’ve developed a deep love of turn-based strategy/combat, especially for the modern XCOM games.

So why would I be interested in Football, Tactics & Glory?

“[i]XCOM meets Football Manager[/i]”.

Seeing XCOM in the description immediately piqued my interest, and with a free demo and high discount available at the time I had to try it. After less than an hour with the demo I'd bought the game. I did think the game was quite simple after my brief time with the demo, maybe providing a few hours of entertainment, but having now completed my first season I know I was massively mistaken.

This game is actually quite complex, with a large amount of options and customisation in how you choose to run your team and use them on match day. The gameplay systems are explained with fantastic detail in what is likely the best tutorial system I’ve ever experienced. Interactive tutorials introduce new concepts in different situations as you earn your coaching license through the first season, while the Footballpedia provides full breakdowns of every aspect of the game, often with screenshot examples.

On match days the game really does remind me of the modern XCOM games, especially Enemy Unknown/Within. Player positions, specialisations and skills provide a huge amount of tactical options, while energy levels, weather conditions and the RNG can lead to all sorts of situations that you need to take into consideration and adapt to. 

Between matches the game reminds me of the manager games I used to play. There’s plenty for you to do regarding training, formations, transfers and club upgrades, but the “non-football” systems, like negotiations in extreme detail, press conferences and player tantrums, aren’t there, allowing for the bulk of your attention to be focused on the football matches. Choose your players, set your formation and play the match.

Despite having no interest in football anymore, I highly recommend Football, Tactics & Glory as a huge fan of turn-based gameplay. I’ve really enjoyed my first season; I've been pleasantly surprised by the complexity of the game, already experienced a few "[i]That's XCOM baby![/i]" moments and look forward to leading my squad of nobodies to glory.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174873782', 'num_games_owned': 1210, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3387, 'last_played': 1703195722}

review: Un bel modo per mixare un gioco di calcio con un tattico a turni. Le meccaniche sono semplici e diventano sempre più intuitive, man mano che si sale di lega bisogna sempre capire bene quali mosse devi fare tu e prevedere cosa faranno gli avversari nei turni successivi. Ideale anche per chi non piace il calcio ma chi ama i giochi a turni con una "base a dadi."

author: {'steamid': '76561198314367906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1707981020}
review: Ignore hours, I play mostly offline. I am on Season 104, for my Team The Wimbledon Lions of the English Premier League.I love this game. As an old boy at 55 years, it is not too complicated, it has an older style charm to it. It took me 35 seasons to become a "permanent fixture" of the Premier League, from the Amateur League. You can Play ( sort of like a fluid soccer chess), Watch or Simulate each game. I don't play the Matches as such, but set up the pieces so to speak, and watch most games, substitute and change tactics etc. This I enjoy. Game results are different between simulated and watched. Obviously I find it addictive. But hey, my coach is immortal, and so far I have won the triple (top of League, Euro Cup and National Cup) over 30 times. My team is the Best in the World. Do not expect the complexity of the Football Manager type stuff, this is much more enjoyable to play and far less frustrating.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067054827', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 3344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3344, 'last_played': 1702788120}
review:
Addictif, mais pas un bon jeu pour autant.
Déjà il faut savoir que le jeu relève pour partie de la gestion de ressources, et pour partie d'un petit jeu de foot tactique.
Le petit jeu de foot est très frustrant du fait du game play : chaque équipe a 3 coups alternativement à jouer : en gros, récupération-passe-déplacement, et on se fait reprendre la balle. Pour vraiment réussir, il faut vraiment de la réflexion et du temps, c'est quasi des échecs déclinés en foot (il y a bien une IA mais mal optimisée) ; si ce n'est pas votre délire (c'est mon cas), sachez que la partie "gestion" va en être très affectée.
Pour la gestion des ressources, clairement c'est dur, même en mode facile. Il y a peu de ressources disponibles et elles sont dures à obtenir (même en mode facile). Les bons joueurs font gagner mais ils coûtent cher, faire de la formation c'est aléatoire et ça veut dire ne pas obtenir les résultats qui font gagner de l'argent. C'est un cercle sans fin : sans doute l'enseignement qu'on peut tirer de ce jeu, la folie du sport business !
C'est addictif parce que ça laisse croire que la prochaine saison sera la bonne. Alors que non, ou alors c'est très très long et fastidieux.
Un peu comme dans la vie, en fait : une bonne leçon de philosophie, mais pas un bon jeu !

author: {'steamid': '76561198271022650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 42599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4205, 'last_played': 1710803572}
review:
The PERFECT football manager game, unlike other football management games (you know which one I mean) it actually tells you and shows you the effects and consequences of your tactical management and strategy decisions. No vague descriptions no hidden numbers and no fake features and broken mechanics.

I thoroughly recommend it if you like me was frustrated for years with other similar genres for the reasons I mentioned above. It gives you the ultimate satisfaction when all your tactics and planning finally payoff on match day when you win or score a day. 

I hope to see it develop further and further and become the number 1 football management game.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198026385857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 14154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1136, 'playtime_at_review': 13018, 'last_played': 1712266961}
review:
The game is a little gem. A truly entertaining soccer managerial sim, a tribute to how these games were simply fun when I was much younger. Players have a reasonable number of different values and abilities, and you don't get lost in endless screens with numbers and stats.
When I play, I want to "pretend" I am a football coach, I don't want to spend hours in front of Excell sheets.
And this game gives me exactly what I look for in a managerial football simulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073443689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 13208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2507, 'last_played': 1705410298}
review:
Championship.. I mean Football Manager, used to be fun. Not having touched it since the early Nougties, I installed the latest one and got a headache within 5 minutes. It's too complicated. Then I found this game. It's almost as fun as the old CM games but nowhere near as frustrating because I control the players. Unlike in CM I can't blame the Centerback for being an idiot because I'm the one controlling him.

Easy to pick up, not difficult to master but making money is helluva hard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080948394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 7730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 31, 'playtime_at_review': 1138, 'last_played': 1712089238}
review:
Great, now I think I am near the end so let us try this again.

First, I think it is a great game. Quite a few flaws, but I like it.

It looks nice, responsive, music doesn't get old (I quite like it) and I am amazed how many animations my little men can achieve + how many things are adaptable given that I happen to quite like micromanaging. Also, localization (how believable local clubs are) is just amazing.

Now to the flaws.

The most glaring problem is pacing.

It has a slow start, grindy middle and a nice end.

You start with little of everything, no prestiege, no money, random players (and next to no knowladge). The problem is that at that point AI will probably immediately outpace you, for some reason it is just more capable to get better players stats-wise which is frustrating, because you get everything by winning, including the opportunity to adapt your team, so it can feel as a chicken and the egg game. AI is also quite smart. Not always, but it will know you are weaker and it will tend to bully you. It doesn't help that many rules are not obvious (or even explained), so at the start it will be hard to outsmart something that knows every one of them and as someone who doesn't watch football, I needed a very long long time before I understood what is "offside" or how the game handles it. Even till this day, AI always had better stats than me, so I do not know how not to be bullied, but I found my ways around it. It doesn't help that AI starts with a hendicap, you can adapt your team to its determened team, which is HUGE advantage ... once your players have proper skills to use it.

As you start to develop skills, this is where the game actually begins because this is the only thing that can get AI under control, because AI might have more of them, but they have the same range + you can adapt your team to counter AI's + look what AI is doing and steal its better tactics (except those that requite high stats to pull off). Once I figured out all that, this is where pain really started. I started getting basic resources, like fans, money, prestiege, but you get more if you win and you can lose fans that are important for revenue if you lose or simply not win enough. But if you win, you get better opponents as your rank is exploding forward. At some point I was almost crying as game evaluates you with 0-5 start and I was getting opponents with 2,5 stars more than myself. It is a pain to play, they WILL bully you. But you want that. Because higher ranks mean more resources. How much more? Well, I think that at the start of a game I was getting 75 Exp per win. Not so long ago my player got 6000 Exp, 750 Exp or so if I lose. I think this is ridicolous, but here are we. So ... most of this time is grinding vs 4,5 and 5 stars, because they cant be better than that, so if you can get closer, difference will slowly but eventually fade away.

At that time I also noticed simulations of the game are broken. I mostly dont use them, but I played some of them when the pain was at its highest and ... they feel random. Some feel plausible, but I once KNEW I would lose, no chance whatsoever, but instead I won 2:1. I would not even today be able to score even one goal with my team from that time agains what was in front of me. So, feels random.

I am now at the point where I finally feel comfortable in my chances to win, by accident I won national, premiere and european cup in the same year and ... I have no idea how. It was a close one, didn't even cheat (quite easy to cheat, but I mostly used it at the start because I was trying to guess how game rules work, which sounds fair). So, yea, game is way better now, but also somehow boring, I feel more motivated with low than great chances, but at least I dont cry in frustration anymore, so that is a plus, my main frustration now is that I get only 1.500.000 money per match as things are expensive now, which is more than ... I think it was 300 per match at the start of the game? Strange times.

Few bugs, but those are rare.

There are 2 gripes that I really miss.
Game is extremly tactical, a lot of numbers. Why do I not see numbers how likely I am to by random chance miss goal when doing headshots? And I also don't quite get how numbers work when you go for a headshot and you get 80, opponent that is trying to prevent it gets 15, but he is better than you, but not if he gets 3 ... I dont get that at all, how do I judge my chances? Sometimes I just roll with the punches, because I have no idea what is going on and hope for the best.
Game can be quickened, but then the entire game is quickened. I would want for animations to stay the same, because it feels more natural, but to only get rid of those long pauses between them that can really pull your nerve after a few hundreds of game as you know what will happen anyway.

Also, I would like to choose to play in lower league than possible at the start of the year. 2,5 start stronger opponent is just a bit too much, I want to have fun, not whatever I was doing.

How to micromanage player apearance feels ... nice, but I think it is a clear overkill. Can my manager get a gf or bf instead? I think he deserves it.

So, nice game, not for everyone, buy if you are willing to suffer and every now and then feel over the moon.

review: I bought the game when it was on sale just to check it out. I hated it at first, then kinda got to like it, then I loved it. Now I`m love-hate when I win-lose lol, but there is absolutely no denying that the game is made with much passion by the developers. If you like blood bowl, turn-based play & team sports it maybe one of the greatest games you`ll ever play but if you don`t .. well it might annoy you. Personally I think this game is better than Blood Bowl & XCOM combined imho.

author: {'steamid': '76561199090605522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4146, 'last_played': 1702099167}
review:
AI cheating on probability, especially obviously in Europa League.
AI 在機率上作弊，歐戰上非常明顯。
developer_response:
I regret you feel like that. But it is a standard problem with the games with probabilities - people feel like AI is cheating even if it's not. 

To show that we don't need to cheat, I want to point you to the settings of the new campaign - there, you can choose one of several RNG types. One of them called Expected - it slightly plays in favour of the player. We call it "Expected" because when RNG helps to the player a bit, the player feels the RNG behaves as expected.

So if we provided this type RNG, it shows that we don't need to cheat - we want the players to have fun. I hope you will try this new RNG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123243064', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1704034099}

author: {'steamid': '76561198088662421', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2558, 'last_played': 1701781646}
review:
It's alright, however not being able to change difficulty settings is during a campaign is annoying. After a few seasons you understand the game and you want to make it more difficult, it forces you to restart a brand new campaign. Couldn't even find a way to change it in the config files :( 

Very annoying
developer_response:
You can't change the difficulty settings because the difficulty is a complex thing. If you have a strong team, it will be strong either on normal or hard. The difficulty comes mainly from your starting conditions, so it totally makes sense to start a new campaign. 

In the aspect, FTG is more like a Civilization game where it doesn't make sense to change the difficulty mid-game.

review: Toi aussi tu adores Football Manager depuis que tu es ado, tu te souviens encore comme si c'était hier de cet obscur club de D2 Danoise que tu as mené aux sommets de l'Europe, mais maintenant tu as des gosses, un boulot et un crédit immobilier ? Trentenaire contrarié, ce jeu est fait pour toi : presque les mêmes sensations avec beaucoup moins d’investissement demandé. De quoi garder ton foyer et éviter le divorce en toute quiétude. Gros gros pouce en l'air :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198286877618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 8506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4662, 'last_played': 1705154414}
review:
+ skvelý nápad  zasadenia ťahovej stratégie do sveta futbalového manažéru
+ čeština
+ workshop
- cena hry (25 €) premrštená
- bez licencií
- po dlhšom hraní repetetívnosť

- vylepšenie hry vydané iba ako dve platené DLC (obe po 15 €), podľa môjho názoru by tieto DLC mali byť  zdarma (max. za symbolické 1€) , kedže i hra samotná je predražená
    Záverečné hodnotenie :  momentálne 27%  potenciál 80% 
   Excelentný nápad s obrovským potenciálom , bohužiaľ nedotiahnutý. Cena hry riadne premrštená , spolu s takmer nutnými vylepšeniami  Vašu peňaženku odľahčí o 55€ . Príjemná hra na pobavenie, nekupovať však kým nebudú DLC zdarma alebo za symbolický poplatok.

author: {'steamid': '76561198846916443', 'num_games_owned': 2639, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 8701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8701, 'last_played': 1671828013}
review:
[h1]Diversión por toda la escuadra[/h1]

Muy disfrutable para entusiastas de los juegos tácticos, te resultará un puntito más atractivo si gustas de la táctica deportiva, que ni será necesario ese estímulo si lo afrontas sin prejuicios por tratarse del, comúnmente, considerado [i]deporte rey[/i].

Una vez entendidos sus mecanismos y jugando en máxima dificultad (por lo contrario, puede que llegue el momento insulso en el que casi todas tus partidas sean victorias), vas a tener muchas horas de entretenimiento y de emociones que van del enfado (por momentos podrá parecer injusto porque, sobre todo, tus rivales tendrán mejores estadísticas —decisión insuficiente de diseño de dificultad—) al estallido de alegría por favorecerte una jugada que parecía estar en manos (más bien pies, je, je) del rival.

El estudio lleva actualizando todo el contenido desde hace años. De hecho, algunos análisis profesionales no le hacen justicia por publicarse cuando el juego apenas acababa de salir al mercado y necesitaba más trabajo. Pese a que no alcanza cotas de genialidad por su envergadura y ciertos detalles acá y acullá, es único en su especie; ojalá hubiera más juegos así.

Un apunte al margen de su recomendación: me causa cierto desagrado que estudios pequeños/medianos recurran a contenidos extra de pago, más aún si influyen/modifican mecanismos, pero lo disculpo por tratarse de una propuesta original, haber sufrido al ser ucranios, porque uno de sus miembros está atento a la comunidad y, de algún modo, es otra manera de financiación. El juego es perfectamente disfrutable sin ellos, no hacen falta aunque el de Football Stars (que acabaré comprando) añade características que me hubiera gustado experimentar por defecto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962374802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5924, 'last_played': 1694223984}
review:
Football, Tactics & Glory is an absolute gem for those seeking for strategic depth and football excitement.

The gameplay is a strategic symphony where your team's development mirrors an epic journey. Starting from the Amateur League, you can meticulously craft your squad, train players, experiment a variety of formations, and relished the thrill of climbing through the ranks to achieve top rank leagues, while clinch national cups, championships, and even continental cups along the way.

What sets this game apart is its meticulous control over every aspect of the game. Every pass, shot, and off-the-ball run is within your grasp, giving a sense of command unlike any other football game. Even for non-football enthusiasts, the turn-based strategy aspect is enthralling, making it accessible and enjoyable.

The game's parallels with XCOM are evident, where you're not fighting extraterrestrial beings but battling against formidable league opponents, each match a strategic chess game for the fate of your soccer team. The tutorials are well-crafted, ensuring accessibility while providing depth for seasoned players.

And it's not just for soccer fans, even those less inclined towards the sport can find immense joy in the game's tactical intricacies. From team management to player positioning, every decision feels crucial.

The game's evolution through updates showcases the developer's commitment to refining an already outstanding experience. While the multiplayer aspect might feel limited, the single-player depth more than compensates.

In summary, Football, Tactics & Glory is a testament to meticulous game design, offering a challenging yet immensely rewarding experience. Whether you're a die-hard sports strategist or someone seeking an engaging, visually satisfying sports game without the hefty price tag, this is a title that warrants attention. It's not just a football game, it's a strategic masterpiece that captivates and challenges at every turn.

developer_response:
Could you please write more about your experience so I can figure out what can be improved? 

- You played the game with all DLCs as your first playing experience?
- Did you play on Normal mode with enabled Tutorial and Expected RNG at first?
- The tasks the president was giving to you were too hard?
- But he didn't fire you anyway, correct? 
- Why do you think the promotion was bad to you?

author: {'steamid': '76561198009937158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 3539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 948, 'last_played': 1702028440}
review:
Genuinely one of the most underrated games Ive come across.

Scratches soccer itch (that i dont have)
Scratches management itch
Scratches xcom itch better than xcom

Very well designed, no euro-jank (its quality), complex and in-depth without being tedious. Dev is responsive. 
One of very few complex tactics/strategy games ive come across that is feasible on steam deck.
It's hard for me to even come up with negatives, but the biggest is probably that gamepad controls are lacking., I use the trackpad on steamdeck.

(The dev comment below is from my initial negative review, because i was getting soft locked due to controls.. it did resolve itself though)
developer_response: Could you please clarify where do you have a problem? We tested it, and there are many players who play on Steam Deck and leave feedback for us. We didn't hear about any such problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174357729', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4762, 'last_played': 1709944113}
review:
З часом я зрозумів, що мені сильно набридли типові футбольні ігри, через певну обмеженість того, що я особливо ціную. 

Ми маємо аркадну FIFA (зараз EA FC), або навіть Pro Evolution Soccer (зараз eFootball) в яких може бути який завгодно геймплей всередині футбольного матчу. Але все, що поза матчу - мене скоріше дратує. В дитинстві відчувалося не настільки обмежено, наскільки зараз.

Я не фанат мультіплеєру, мій максимум - це кооп. Тож я оціню ігри, зазвичай, по тому, що вони можуть запропонувати мені в соло режимах. І режими кар'єр в названих іграх вже давно мене не радують. Абсолютна топорність, нереалістичність, нудьга та і просто відчуття безсенсовості. В пошуках чогось більш наближеного до менеджменту і всього, що коїться у футбольному світі, всі приходять до Football Manager. Але ви і без мене прекрасно знаєте наскільки це штучний продукт ДЛЯ ОСОБЛИВИХ гравців.

Я був у захваті від Rocket League, але це мультіплеєр, тож вона залишається поза списку...

І тут, випадково, я натрапив на Football, Tactics & Glory. Побачив десь відео, багато років тому, і мене вразив геймплей. Він здавався чимось середнім між класичними шахами та вподобаним мені XCOM. І я не буду далі писати детальний огляд по можливостям та плюсам цієї гри. На цій сторінці ви достатньо прочитаєте подібного.

Моя місія проста - налити побільше "води" для контексту (виконано), а також сказати, що ця гра варта вашого часу та грошей. В ній просте гармонійно існує зі складним. Тут можливостей більше, ніж можуть дати більшість ігор на тему футболу на всіх платформах. Розробник зробив те, що в кожному елементі кричить про любов автора до тематики та свого творіння. І вам не потрібні сумнівні ліцензії, знайомі назви. Це все не має значення.

Пограйте і ви зрозумієте в чому шарм. Це гра, яка повернула давно втрачене бажання, яке було раніше при грі у FIFA 11 чи PES 2013... і це фантазія. Здатність відчути себе справжнім тренером, якому не байдуже на результат та на успіх та прогрес своїх гравців. Якщо ви хочете свіжого подиху, то ласкаво просимо!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198250977404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 1262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1700984643}
review:
This is first impressions review which I will change if my opinion changes after playing it more:

I bought this game 90% off, roughly for the price of a slice of pizza. After playing it for a few matches, I wish I had a slice of pizza.
The game basically works but there is nothing in it (so far) that would make me look forward to playing more of it. It's mostly RNG/stat battles that neither look nor feel like football.

The game has two DLCs that, for all I know, might make the gameplay very enjoyable. They contain "extra features" such as being able to switch clubs during your career, being able to make transfer offer for a player who is not transfer listed and being able to see your stats from the previous season. However, since either one (while on sale!) costs almost four times the price that I paid for the meh base game, I doubt that will ever find out if that's so or not.

Finally, when I started the game it asked me if I would mind sharing a little bit of my personal info because that will allow them to get more money from advertisment banners on the side of the pitch. Reminder: this is not a Free2Play game. This is after you purchase it for money.
Edit: Later, when I entered Settings I found that Advertising is checked On by default. I very much unchecked it. 

Conclusion: This one of those "Why doesn't Steam allow Neutral reviews" review. The game is meh. If you're OK with the practices described above (gameplay gate locked behind DLC and in game advertising), I suggest that you watch a gameplay video (or a really big discount) before making the purchase.

review:
This is my first steam review ever- but this game deserves it.  

It is incredible.  Sports fans will love this.  Strategy fans will love this.  If you are both of those, you will be HOOKED. 
 The strategy is extensive and the more you play the game, you master new lineups and techniques.  DLC's make this amazing game even better.
I have logged over 750 hours, and don't see an end in sight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047341268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2043, 'last_played': 1701105713}
review:
An excellent game, 10/10. If you're looking for a turn based sports strategy game, this is for you. 

Main difference between other tactical RPGs is that the players are the resources you must sell in order to finance club upgrades, purchase more players and extend contracts which makes squad management very interesting.

Pros
- Interesting strategical decisions with resource management
- Good tactical depth without being a slog through charts of numbers

Cons
- Weak user interface, not that easy to tell which skills + positions players have
- Interactions are almost all RNG, especially in the starting amateur league many actions are around 50/50 but this can be changed in the settings

author: {'steamid': '76561198052627316', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1698170114}
review:
В игре на стадионах установлены политически-ориентированные баннеры. Играть неприятно. Я честно терпел, пытался играть. Но постоянное напоминание о войне не идёт на пользу развлекательному процессу. Я хочу вернуть деньги. Не уверен, что вернут - прошло 5 часов. И игра-то хорошая. Но политика в играх неприемлема. Как и в спорте. Такие дела.

P.S. Что ж, деньги, естественно, не вернули. Ну, тогда придётся ждать когда закончится хренова война и разработчики уберут долбаные баннеры. До тех отвлекаться от реала в этой игре никак не получится. Если для вас это имеет значение, то не покупайте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065810569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11426, 'last_played': 1701466490}
review:
It's an ok and fun game. However I think it is a bit mixed. Overall positive because of the strategic play style of XCOM in a manager game.
However it gets very grindy after a while - the introduction of the stars on players made it a very long grind to promote and develop your team, and I actually think it made the game experience worse.
Gaining skills on players so that they can develop further is also quite a lot of grind and there is no way to get the points besides from playing them in matches. 
Lastly, a few season into the game the game gets extremely slow and laggy and it seems that the game cannot really handle the data for statistics

author: {'steamid': '76561197967137313', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 77073, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 692, 'playtime_at_review': 68699, 'last_played': 1712408373}
review:
Get it!  Play it! Browse Workshop for League Names, Team Names & Logo's etc. This has given me more FUN and ongoing replay interest than the old (and trying to be new) boooorrrring and tedious over the top micro management spreadsheet offered by FM & Champ. Manager.

Oh that's right before I forget... you actually choose the match mode for all games by playing the game turn based RPG style, watch your team's AI to the hard work or fast track by simulation as often or not as you wish. Your choice!!

author: {'steamid': '76561199352953219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 5297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1137, 'last_played': 1702255262}
review:
Hola.
Si te gusta el fútbol, las estadísticas y los juegos por turnos, probablemente te gustará.
Es divertido, vas mejorando tu instalaciones, personal y jugadores. No es nada del otro mundo pero hace que te salgan mejores jugadores de la cantera y que los entrenadores sean mas eficientes.
Los jugadores se pueden mejorar mediante unos arboles de técnicas y entrenando, aunque no los puedes mejorar ni entrenar cuando quieras. (creo que es si juegan partidos habitualmente)
Es bastante rudimentario a la hora de deshacer opciones, rudimentario no, no se pueden deshacer así que como te equivoques pulsando el ratón así se queda.
El campo para mi tiene pocas posiciones, me hubiese gustado que fuese el doble de grande y que tuviese zoom.
Lo bueno son las mejoras y entrenamientos de los jugadores, cuando las adquieren ves como rematan de cabeza, interceptan balones y mucho mas.
Para los mas torpacos el propio programa tiene la opción de dinero infinito (si la elijes en opciones), está muy bien, pero como abuses contratando jugadores de nivel 100 para tu equipo de tercera división, no lo disfrutaras tanto y no tardaras en aburrirte.
Saludos.

author: {'steamid': '76561199485868492', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1711930504}
review: Llevaba tiempo queriendo probarlo y ahora con la rebaja no he desaprovechado la oportunidad. Tiene más profundidad de la que parece, una jugabilidad adictiva y muchas opciones de personalización de ligas, jugadores, escudos, uniformes...Una maravilla. Los partidos pueden pasar rápido y hay veces que solamente 3 turnos por equipo se puede hacer corto, pero las habilidades compensan eso metiendo acciones extra si se consigue realizar con éxito. Solamente he probado la "campaña" por decirlo así en estas 6h y no podría en profundidad realizar una crítica. Me gusta cómo intercalan entrenamientos (tutoriales) entre partido y partido así vas entiendo más todas las opciones que hay. De momento todo bien, recomendable si te gusta la gestión, la táctica por turnos y sobre todo, el fútbol. Un saludo

author: {'steamid': '76561198297331608', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 5354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1699787847}
review: Ein Spiel für Simulationsfreaks! Man kann nicht nur selbst spielen sondern auch Simulieren oder der Ki zuschauen! Alles editieren an Teams und Ligen! Es gibt alle möglichen Länder. Im Multiplayer kann man auch eigene Wettbewerbe mit freunden oder allein spielen oder simulieren! Die Stadien und Wetteratmosphäre sind liebevoll gestaltet. Es fehlen zwar viele dinge oder sind stark vereinfacht, aber es ist auch mal schön ein Spiel zu haben was nicht allzu kompliziert ist. Für 3,74Euro im sale ein Geschenk!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007981462', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1698533333}
review:
As other reviews say, this is football-XCom. There is a tactical part and a strategy part.
The tactical part is where you move your footballers on the pitch. This part is insanely good. Players roles are basically classes, each one with special abilities (wings can move 4 tiles, defenders have auto-intercept, you getbthe idea) and the sinergy level among classes is insane. Soon enough you'll start thinking about training a wing to increase the number of crosses because all your forward have the "headers" ability, or the multiple ways you can organize your defense. There are a lot of possibilities here, and it's really great when a piece of tactics comes together.

Then, there is the strategic part. This is where you decide how to train your players, which skills you want on them and obviously sell/buy them. And your team's permanent upgrades (stadium, youth center, scouts, etc.).
I have to admit, I'm finding this part incredibly hard.
Now, the devs when for a simplified approach here: there is a lot of depth when it comes to your strategy decisions, but they also decided to not overcomplicate things. It's really a easy to learn, hard to master approach. Unfortunately, it's VERY hard to master. You are supposed to take young players train them and then sell them for profit (buying old players is basically only useful as a desperate move to cover a temporary hole in your team, as the older the players get, the less valuable they are). And yet, you are always short of money. Your player stats start very low compared with the opponents and so you can't score. You'll start losing game after game, the sponsors won't pay you and you can't buy better players, while the good you have will inesorably age. Sinxe you have no money, you'll end up buying only young players, with low stats and so you'll never break this loop of mediocrity.
There is an easy mose though, but it totally trivializes the strategic part.
Still, with effort, you'll be able to see some progress: the bank account will SLOWLY increase, you'll start investing in better coaches to train the player faster and things will start rolling. But this game gives a new meaning to "slow start" :)
(Well, this is all based playing with the lowest league in sandbox mode, perhaps things are better if you just choose the best team of the premier league as starting point).

But anyway, it's a great game and well worth it!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970817851', 'num_games_owned': 1557, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 49884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20173, 'last_played': 1697552072}
review: Absolutely wonderful tactical football management / turn-based game simulator. For those who want to control literally everything, including each and every pass / shot / off-the-ball run. The "X-Com of football" tag gets thrown around a lot for this game, but it is completely apt, to the point where I think even non-football fans would get something out of it if they enjoy turn-based strategy games. If you want a full-on football sim, but don't have the reactions for, or don't enjoy the pace of Fifa type games, this is perfect. One of the most original (and fun) sports games I've ever played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198345542268', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1703906259}
review: 反应一个bug，我开启游戏窗口普通模式后，窗口不显示了可游戏还在运行，删掉启动文件后其他显示模式都正常唯独窗口普通模式看到不窗口画面？非常奇怪？能否提供一下解决方法！谢谢，还有我很爱这个游戏祝福你们工作顺利！
developer_response:
你可以试试这个：

找到这个键 Regedit: current user/software/creoteam/football tactics/windows_pos.

删 windows_pos.

该键存储普通模式下窗口的位置和大小

author: {'steamid': '76561198856043396', 'num_games_owned': 344, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 4298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4278, 'last_played': 1709583110}
review: Цікава гра на декілька годин, тактичний футбол з походовкою це щось нове в світі футбольних ігор. Але є й дуже великий мінус, це вдача під час виконання будь-яких дій, яка явно не на твоєму боці, якщо грати самому без симуляцій гри, то навіть найкращим складом гравців м'яч не залітає у ворота супротивника.
developer_response:
Дякую за огляд. 

Нажаль, схоже, склалася невірна думка про ігрові механіки. Якщо використовувати весь тактичний арсенал гри, то ви, граючи більш слабою командою, можете стабільно вигравати сильніших супротивників. Досвідчені гравці навіть кажуть, що гра для них достатньо легка.

Впевніться, що ви використовуєте активно навички (наприклад, Гарматний постріл чи Пас на хід). Також дуже важливо навчитися виконувати простріли з флангів. Гра головою - один з ключових тактичних інструментів, який дозволяє забивати багато голів. Я не знаю, чи ви проходили ігрові навчальні тести, але їх можна перепроходити безліч разів, щоб краще зрозуміти ті чи інші механіки. Щоб їх запустити, натисніть знак питання у верхньому правому кутку, і там перейдіть на останню вкладку.

Для нас принципово, що генератор випадкових чисел не має чийогось боку, він - нейтральний. Коли розумієш ігрові механіки, то в довгій перспективі видно, що випадкові числа - дійсно випадкові. 

Разом з тим, ми добавили в гру декілька додаткових генераторів випадкових чисел. Якщо почати нову кампанію, то можна вибрати Зменшену випадковість та Очікувану випадковість.

Зменшена випадковість викидує випадкові числа у меншому діапазоні (не від 0 до максимального потенціалу футболіста, а від 30% до макс. потенціалу). Тому,  якщо у футболіста при ударі по воротах Точність = 30, то випаде випадкове число не від 0 до  30, а від 10 до 30.

А Очікувана випадковість трішки підігрує гравцю, тобто з трохи більшим шансом викидує для нього кращі значення. Ми її назвали Очікуваною, бо помітили, що гравці очікують саме таку вдачу, і вважають її більш чесною чи справедливою, хоча насправді це не так.

Надіюся, ви ще пограєте в FTG, оволодієте ігровими механіками і отримаєте значно більше задоволення від гри.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257130439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 2320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1692396906}
review:
Avaliação definitiva:

Parecer negativo:  Comecei jogando a carreira no modo normal, meu time foi esmagado pela IA. Resolvi então começar no fácil e o resultado não foi diferente: meu time levava gols absurdos. Não aconteceu por falta de estratégia, aconteceu por que o jogo é meio tosco mesmo. não existe uma função de marcação, o tutorial não esclarece todos os aspectos do jogo, e, depois de jogar várias temporadas concluí uma coisa: é IMPOSSÍVEL vencer um jogo contra um time de 3 estrelas ou mais comandando um de 1. Esse desequilíbrio deixa o jogo menos realista, já que no mundo real, times pequenos as vezes derrubam os grandes. ah, e os gráficos são pobres, há jogos hoje para smartphone com mais esmero nesse quesito.
Dito isso,  desisti de tentar jogar as partidas. deixei a IA fazer o serviço por mim e qual não foi minha surpresa quando até ganhei o campeonato da divisão de acesso? isso não melhora muito a minha primeira impressão do jogo, já que eu não estava procurando um "Championship Manager" para jogar e sim algo em que eu participasse da partida, mas enfim...

Parecer positivo: Um ponto que agrada é que, apesar dos times serem versões genéricas dos reais, é possível durante o andamento do jogo modificar tudo neles, desde nome, escudos, uniformes e nomes de jogadores.  Na oficina Steam é possível baixar mod que trazem os times e escudos reais (jogadores é mais raro). As partidas são rápidas o bastante para não dar tempo de enjoar. Depois que jogar um bom tempo e pegar um pouco da dinâmica estranha do game, dá até para viciar. Viciei tanto que resolvi mudar pela terceira vez minha análise do jogo (inclusive a recomendação). Alô Creoteam! Pode vir a ser um jogo muito bom, mas será necessário rever alguns aspectos para evoluí-lo.
developer_response:
Lamento que você tenha tido uma experiência ruim. Mas o jogo é realmente profundo e tático. Você pode ver isso pelos revisores que têm centenas de horas de jogo. Muitos deles trouxeram tempos no início, mas quando você descobre como os atributos, habilidades e classes se conectam, você pode fazer muito. Você pode vencer oponentes significativamente mais fortes com táticas puras.

Por favor, habilite o tutorial e jogue os testes do tutorial. Eles explicam as partes mais importantes do jogo: ações básicas, habilidades, cabeceios, etc. Por exemplo, quando você domina os cabeceios e quando consegue um jogador de futebol com o talento de cabecear, você pode marcar muitos gols bonitos após cruzamentos do flanco .

Espero que você jogue o jogo com o tutorial novamente e se divirta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198981736614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1105, 'last_played': 1689159871}
review: iyiyiyi

author: {'steamid': '76561198306134162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1694628449}
review: 游戏的概率系统明显不完善，以至于产生了类似剧情杀的情景，敌队开球后一个进攻40+的前锋隔着我两个70+防的后卫及门卫轻松进球后我气不过SL了两个小时，各种调整战术后依然无法阻止这一进球，让人无语至极
developer_response:
你好！
看来你还没有学会所有的游戏机制。这很正常，因为这个游戏很有深度。

根据你的描述，对方似乎使用了炮弹技能。技能不使用属性。所以足球运动员不应该有很高的准确性。这些技能利用了足球运动员的潜力（在基础游戏中等于 10）。要阻止对手使用加农炮射击，您应该阻止其他足球运动员的方块。

但也许，对手使用精确射击而他得分是因为游戏中使用的随机性。

随机在游戏中是公平的。但很多人可能认为事实并非如此。因此，我们实现了 3 个不同的随机数生成器。您可以在活动开始时选择它们：
1）公平——普通随机
2）减少——球员属性越高，rng数越高
3) 预期 - 为玩家生成更好的数字

我希望这有帮助。

author: {'steamid': '76561198114056925', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 5257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5257, 'last_played': 1684437764}
review:
!!!Disclaimer!!!  
This is not an insult. This is an honest and accurate review. If you don't like it, it says more about you then me.  

Game has flashes of fun ideas. But it ends up being boring. Early game without developed players the game is an absolute chore. And if you choose to skip it and go with a pro team the game is an absolute nightmare bogged down with... idk. It's just a mess. It's ultimately an overly convoluted rock paper scissors simulator with gambling elements. As every action relies on different amounts of rng, depending on the game settings you use. The limited customization options and impossibly slow pacing kill this game for me personally. 

Oh I got a 5 star recruit. Its another goalie... I already have one of these. Well. I guess I could've spent every resource I made last year to try and get a forward instead of improving my team and maxing injury recovery, seeing as how 2-4 players get injured each game. Unless you sub them out before they are at 70% stamina. Which means they don't get stats, which means they don't level... Hmmm... Oh! I got the 5 star forward recruit?! Oh... and he can choose from slide tackle, header and cannon shot... right... So... trash... Very cool. Well, there is always next year. Decisions, decisions, decisions. And all of them suck. Also. It should be noted that the dev seems unhinged. He is releasing a new game at 35 euros, which is basically this game, but racist. So we'll see how that goes. Like no discount for people who have the non-racist version already, along with a history of hilariously overpriced dlc for what is essential a large flash game. Idk. The whole thing is weird.

P.S. The team with the larger numbers absolutely do win unless you've just so happen to have trained into rock and the other teamed trained into scissors. In which case the outcome gets A LITTLE fuzzy. And because the only way to develop the rock and scissors aspects of players is through playing in game, in games, its hard to have fully developed "counter" subs. And if you buy them, so can other teams, and that would just adds to the mess. Because there is still rng. If you don't have rng enabled, the lower team will never win, but if you have rng enabled, then literally anything can happen. Because that's what rng is. Gambling. Not tactics. It can be strategy. But it's very shallow as it boils the gore game-play down to risk mitigation. And yeah, yeah, I know the rock paper scissors is the "tactics" part. But you have no control over what players spawn and what talents they can develop. You could go 2 full years without being able to get your hands on a forward with nutmeg, and even then you have to settle. They are over 30, a 3 star player, etc. And if that's the only weakness of the other team. It sucks to suck i guess. It's a gambling simulator with notes of risk management. 

P.S.S. Cannonball absolutely sucks. Any team with a sweeper completely counters the ability. And slide tackle can be useful on offense, but what it won't do is put the ball in the net. And if you need a guy to do that...yeah. Not helpful. Header is meh. But ultimately relies on the other team not having header, their goalie can't have high control, or the skill that lets them play out, as well and you having a wing player with the ability to reliably cross the ball while also hoping there is a gap for the header player to attack. Comparatively, nutmeg, Olympic kick and  rainbow feint are infinitely more useful skills as they work on a 1 to 1 basis. But seeing as you seem to be struggling, what I was actually referring to was the fact that each player gets randomly assigned 3 abilities and you have no control over what they are and have to pay more and it takes longer to develop the ones further down on the list. Nice unprovoked insults by the way. Very big of you to take the high ground. "Waa! somebody doesn't like my game! Waa! They must not understand it and suck at it! Waa!" Played football all my life dude. Coached it for two years. Reworked and re-coded 3 games. Your game is just mid and your business practices are questionable at best.
developer_response:
I won't react to insult commentaries. But I'd like to clarify some things:
- Sliding Tackle / Cannon Shot / Header - all are very powerful skills for a forward. I wonder what skills did you expect to have. 
- Starting in the Higher league makes sense if you understand the game mechanics. After years of talking with players and improving the game, I see some clues in the feedback that tell me that a player doesn't understand how to play. One of the clues is "2-4 injuries every game". As injuries depend on how you play, you can avoid them mostly. 2-4 per season is a typical average. There can be more light injuries in 1 day. But usually, those are not a problem for experienced players.
- Another clue that says a player doesn't know how to use skills, classes etc is calling the game "flash game". There's so much variability and diversity so you can explore it for tens or even hundreds of hours. Unlike an average flash game (and even premium games), our game has depth. Usually, to win matches, in football managers, it's enough to buy better footballers with higher numbers. In FTG, it's different. When you understand the game mechanics, you can play smartly so even if your team is 3,5 stars, you can outsmart and win 5-star opponent. It's a lot of joy to win such matches because when you understand the game, you see that your win wasn't random.
- I didn't get why you call the new game to be racist. 
From time to time, I see angry players who didn't get how to play (maybe, they skipped the tutorial or didn't think it gives important information). But when they put some effort into figuring out how to play, their opinion about FTG changed. Therefore, if you still want to be entertained by FTG, I suggest you play the tutorial lessons again, and play the campaign from the bottom up (possibly, on Easy mode). The main way to play the game is to look at the opponent and prepare your countertactics. This way, every match provides you with a new experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198179148150', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 14463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9820, 'last_played': 1708291231}
review:
Nach über 150 Stunden kann ich sagen,
das Spiel ist toll - es ist ein schönes Spiel für zwischendurch und das dann halt jeden Abend. 

Fast überall heißt es, Footbal, Tactics & Glory sei "Fußball als Schach". Und das trifft es schon ganz gut. Aber es ist sogar basser als Schach und hier kommt warum:

1) Formation: Anders als bei Schach ist die Aufstellung immer anders und es gilt die beste Lösung für jeden Gegner zu finden. Er stellt um? Dann solltest du vl. auch die Formation wechseln.  Du führst überraschend? Dann könntest du deinen Sturm zu Gunsten eines Abwehrbollwerks wechseln und den Sieg über die Zeit retten... 
2) Spielerentwicklung: Stellt euch vor, eure Bauern, Springer und Türme haben individuelle Werte, Positionsvorlieben und Entwicklungspotentiale und ihr müsst sie geschickt trainieren und weiterentwickeln und auf geeigneten Positionen einsetzen.
3) Wahrscheinlichkeit. Manchmal frustrierend, aber letztlich eine tolle Ebene des Denksports, wenn man zusätzlich Wahrscheinlichkeiten des Erfolges von einem Spielzug berücksichtigen muss. Ein gewisser Zufall bleibt. Man kann auch mal unglücklich verlieren, es ist aber kein Glücksspiel - gewiss nicht. 
4) Wetter: Spielt beim Schach keine Rolle. Hier verändert das einiges.
5) Fußballmanagement & Karriere: Anders als bei Schach muss man seine Mannschaft gut zusammenstellen. "Figuren" mit ihren unterschiedlichen Fähigkeiten können frei variiert und kombiniert werden. Spieler kaufen & verkaufen. Wen trainiere ich was? Oh nein, mein bester Mann geht in Rente. Soll ich lieber den neuen Stürmer kaufen, den mir der Scout empfiehlt, oder doch besser das Stadion ausbauen, um die Ticketverkäufe zu steigern. Lohnt es sich, jetzt Geld in Jugendtrainer zu stecken, um neue Talente hochzuleveln oder gehe ich eher auf Oldies mit Top-Werten? All das sind ständige Fragen. Dabei hat das Spiel nicht den Tiefgang eines "echten" Fußballmanagers. Das sollte es aber auch nicht. Ich finde die das Finetuning genau richtig. Ich will nicht von Tabellen erschlagen werden. Ich will spielen. 

Kurzum, das spiel ist klasse. 
Kasparov kann kommen. Ich habe Babelsberg von der 5 Liga in die KO-Phase der Championsleague geführt.

*Ich empfehle die Erweiterung Football Stars, denn das bringt weiteren Tiefgang.

developer_response:
Could you please clarify why you don't like the game?

We see that sometimes, when players don't pay attention to the ingame tutorials, they might miss very important information and it leads to frustration. But when you try to figure out the game's mechanics, you can see that the game is very deep and give a great managing experience.

Paying attention to skills and classes, and preparing your team for every opponent makes a difference. When you understand the game's mechanics, you can outsmart even stronger opponents, and such matches provide a lot of joy.

author: {'steamid': '76561199062141635', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1710188405}
review: Somehow more boring than chess
developer_response:
Early, when you are playing in Amateur league, there aren't many tactics. Footballers are weak.

But eventually, when you get to the higher league, you will meet stronger opponents, you will have to learn different game tactics to get better. And you will see that the game is significantly deeper and more varied than you expected initially.

Using skills, fitting your team to stronger opponents to outsmart them, and combining the right classes/skills/attributes give you a lot of tactical variabilities. And when at one moment it clicks in your head, you will have a lot of fun.

I hope you will give the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272911393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 17336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15068, 'last_played': 1707760943}
review: Man sollte keinen tiefgründigen football-manager erwarten, aber die rundenbasierten Matches machen schon Spaß. Weshalb ich das Spiel nicht weiter empfehle liegt an der Skalierung des Schwierigkeitsgrads. Mit steigendem Grad wird nicht der Gegner besser sondern der Zufallsgenerator wird in seine Richtung manipuliert, sodass man obwohl man die statistisch bessere Mannschaft hat, gegen deutlich schlechtere Mannschaften verliert. So wird für mich das ganze (gute) System mit den gegeneinander ausgespielten Werten, wie Verteidigung vs. Kontrolle oder Schuss, nichtig.
developer_response:
Es tut mir leid, dass Sie das Spiel nicht empfehlen. Sie haben jedoch erwähnt, dass das Spiel nicht fair ist, und ich möchte dazu Stellung nehmen.

Das Spiel ist so konzipiert, dass der Spieler stärkere Teams gewinnen kann, indem er sie überlistet. Wenn Sie die Spielmechanik, Fähigkeiten, Klassen usw. verstehen und ein gutes Team aufgebaut haben, können Sie die stärkeren Teams überlisten.

Erfahrene Spieler können beispielsweise mit ihrem 3,5-Sterne-Team 4-5-Sterne-Teams gewinnen.

Daher macht es für uns keinen Sinn, mit RNG zu betrügen oder etwas Unfaires zu tun. Der Spaß liegt darin, stärkere Gegner auszutricksen. Das fördern wir.

Aber gleichzeitig wissen wir, dass einige Spieler Tutorials überspringen oder sie vergessen. Und deshalb kennen sie nicht alle taktischen Möglichkeiten, die das Spiel bietet. Wenn Sie nur grundlegende Aktionen wie Passen, Schießen, Tackling verwenden, werden Sie keine stärkeren Teams gewinnen können. Sie sollten verstehen, wie Fähigkeiten funktionieren, wie Kopfbälle funktionieren und wie verschiedene Klassen funktionieren (Flügelstürmer sind beispielsweise sehr mächtig, wenn sie richtig eingesetzt werden).

Hier ist eine der vielen Kombinationen: Platzieren Sie einen Mittelfeldspieler mit einem langen Pass der Stufe 2 oder 3 in der Mitte und setzen Sie einen Universal-Stürmer mit Regenbogenfinte oder Kanonenschuss in den Angriff. Mit diesem Stürmer können Sie in die Strafzone laufen, einen langen Pass erhalten und problemlos ein Tor erzielen. Es funktioniert sogar gegen ein stärkeres Team. Es gibt viele solcher Kombinationen, die es Ihnen ermöglichen, jede Verteidigung zu durchbrechen.

Sie können jederzeit auf das Fragezeichen in der oberen rechten Ecke drücken und sich über jede Fertigkeit oder jedes andere taktische Element informieren. Dort können Sie auch noch einmal Tutorial-Tests spielen, um einige Mechaniken besser zu verstehen.

Ich hoffe, Sie werden es noch einmal versuchen und danach mehr Spaß haben.

review: I don't really like sports games, but I like tactical games like X-com, Battle Brothers, etc. So this football is the same almost like Battle Brothers only in a different setting. Highly recommended for fans of tactical games. You start with the Amateur League, gradually acquiring better and better players, train them, find suitable combinations and eventually win the most prestigious cups. It took me 120 hours and 17 seasons to take the team from the Amateur League to the Premier League and win the national cup, the championship and the European Cup. It was cool.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146220169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 116757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1138, 'playtime_at_review': 97964, 'last_played': 1711766921}
review:
First, the customer support is SUPERB.  One on one with the developer to address the only issue I've had with the game, after logging in more than 1,500 hours.  I think the only game I played more was Sid M's original Civilization back in the '90s.
Second, I highly recommend this game if you like (a) Turn-based (b) RPG (c) Management Sims about (d) Sports.  These are all in my wheelhouse, hence the huge amount of time invested in it.
The modes are all fun.  The greatest pleasure is in taking a team up the ranks and developing your players along the way.  Hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

author: {'steamid': '76561199057609519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1696725400}
review: El juego es bastante entretenido, lo único que tengo que criticarle es la forma en la que te mete todas las mecánicas de golpe cuando en realidad las vas aprendiendo en los partidos, considero que la mecánica de la licencia esta bien pero molesta en ocasiones, luego de eso el juego es mucho mas entretenido de lo que pensé en un primer momento, aproveche que estaba en oferta, el juego cuenta con mecánicas entretenidas y un sistema en el que tienes que realmente hacerte cargo de tu equipo, en mi opinión es de los pocos juegos donde te entretiene revisar el estado de los jugadores ya que con el solo hecho de hacerlo sabes que el siguiente partido puede ser un paseo o al menos facilitarlo, el sistema de fichajes se puede aprovechar al entrenar jugadores y venderlos, es bastante recomendado, si te gustan los juegos de táctica y gestión esto es claramente y sin duda para ti, pero si dudas no sabría si recomendarlo, es un juego que esta planeado para jugarlo muy a largo plazo por lo que no puedo asegurar mucho, tenga un buen día.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287718465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1684820723}
review:
재밌음. 근데 억까 당하면 세상 거지같음.

거지같은 게임이 억까도 한두번이지 스텟 높으면 어느정도 저점이 있어야되는데 그런게 없으니까 진짜 거지같은 경기 나오네. 컨디션 시스템이라도 있어서 내가 그 억까를 감당할 수 있는 것도 아니고 수비 스텟 20따리한테 공격스텟 40따리가 슛을 5번을 쏘는데 한번도 못넣는게 시발 말이 되냐... 슛 쏨. 40짜리 슛이 1만 나옴. 레인보우 페인트함. 1나옴 실패함. 
이러다가 17짜리 공격수 슛이 40짜리 수비수 둘 제치고 40짜리 골기퍼까지 제치고 골 넣어서 졌다 .시발 이게 말이되는 게임이냐 진짜

전략에서 진 것도 아니고 그냥 우리팀 공격수가 버러지처럼 못해서 그 기회 하나도 못 살리고 지금 무/패만 존나 쌓이는데 스트레스 엄청 받네.



++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

다른 평가 개발진들 댓글보니까 억까 싫으면 RNG 기대로 낮추라는거 보고 낮춰봄.
난이도가 중간이 없어서 이번엔 억빠 느낌이 가끔 드는데 그래도 기본으로해서 억까에 답답해 뒤지는 것보단 훨씬 낫다.


진짜 내가 현실 감독 체험해보고 싶어서 전날 술처먹고 온 에이스가 경기 내내 병신같은 짓을 하는것조차도 경험해보고 싶다하면 기본하고 그냥저냥 하고 싶으면 RNG기대로 바꾸고 나는 선수들 저점도 높여줄 수 있는 개쩌는 감독이다 플레이가 더 나을 것 같다. 

RNG 수정이 있었으니 다시 추천으로 바꿈.

- Right Click on the Desktop
- NVidia Control Panel
- Then, use the options shown on the screenshot:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2916385607

If it doesn't help, send me a report:
- find our support utility STEAM FOLDER\steamapps\common\Football Tactics\config.exe
- press Troubleshooting
- press Generate report
- send it to me on kos @ creoteam . com
- describe please the bug in the letter

review: It makes me sad to give this game thumb down, but I cannot simply recommend it due to its state it is in now. The game runs fine for about 30-45 minutes, but then it starts horribly lagging leading to 5-10 fps stuttering. From the gameplay perspective this game is a true gem, the parallel with X-com is obvious and it is highly addictive. I really hope devs release patch that will fix the laggins, then I will more than gladly change the review to positive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077307807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1696539426}
review: Öğreticiyi çok abartmışlar. Tamam her aksiyonu ayrı ayrı öğretmeye çalışıyorsunuz da anladık işte sal oynayarak öğreneyim oyunu. Başlarken çok umutluydum oyundan ama alt f4 ile bitirişi yaptım..
developer_response:
Oyun benzersiz olduğundan ve başka hiçbir oyunu klonlamadığından, oyuncuların bilmesi gereken pek çok taktiksel nüans vardır. Bu tür eğitimler olmadan oyuncular önemli taktiksel unsurları asla anlayamaz.

Ancak, sizi rahatsız etmemeleri için devre dışı bırakılmış öğreticilerle yeni bir oyuna başlayabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, Sandbox modunu etkinleştirirseniz, gerçek kulüplerle ilgili değişiklikleri indirebilir ve doğrudan Premier ligde oynamaya başlayabilirsiniz. Ama taktikleri anlamadan zor olacak.

Ayrıca, bu videodaki öğreticilerin nasıl geçileceğini görebilirsiniz:https://youtu.be/QLcJ0ZjfrR4

author: {'steamid': '76561198063537612', 'num_games_owned': 310, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 977, 'last_played': 1690011153}
review:
16 h into the game and this is the review:

Being fan od FM and tactical strategy games this game seemed like something I should like, and to be honest it is.
Game is very unique in it's mechanics but tutorial explains eveything to a new player with very intuitive small mini games.
If you're not sure if this game is for you, I would recommend trying games demo.

To me this game would easily be 10/10, but at the time I'm writing this review, there are still some game crushing bugs that happened during goal celebration animations and from what I've read during cup/league winning celebrations. Devs wrote that they fixed this (from what I see they are still very involved with the game) but it's happening to me every few games and gets really annoying.

I will recommend this game, but be aware that it still needs some fixing and that you might lose some nerves because of that.

review:
8个小时升到超级联赛，总体来说不错，可以一玩。
青训是重中之重重重重重重重，培养好后球队基本能走上正规，在转会市场买人属于大怨种了。
从丙级联赛开始就基本上全模拟，一颗半星夺冠，两颗半星吊着别人4四颗星打.....

但是查看技能（的效果）我没法在球员界面找到，还得进帮助看，这是可以改进的。

review:

megvettem a terméket, de sajnos mindig lefagy a meccs indításánál, így ebben a formában játszhatatlan. A gép amin futtatom egy MSI GE77 HX Raider, szóval a gépet nem mondanám, hogy nem tudja meghajtani.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050074370', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10947, 'last_played': 1691093802}
review:
I was looking for a long time for a lighter alternative to Football Manager, but that still kept the same depth in terms of tactics, transfers and attributes. There are a lot of pay to win games who try to clone FM, but without the same success or fun.

Football, Tactics & Glory combines the best of two worlds. It allows me to have a streamlined experienced where I can play a whole season in 4/5 hours, but also have to think thoroughly how to set up my team, decide my favourite style of play, learn about the opponents strengths and weaknesses, and make me feel like every decision I make matters.

All of this while keeping a random factor which makes the improbable win (or loss) happens sometimes :)

To top all of this, their support team is top notch!

Highly recommended to everyone that, like me, does not have the time to get overwhelmed by the usual football managing games, but still wants a challenging and in-depth experience :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198041096591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 68387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1154, 'playtime_at_review': 27724, 'last_played': 1712439989}
review: A really absorbing game, verging on the addictive. Understanding and exploiting the skills and tricks genuinely give you an edge in gameplay, and bear reasonable correspondence to the principles of football. In particular, there's a well designed tension between buying players, developing youth players, investing in facilities and enhancing coaches. The customisation of players' facial appearance is a nice touch if you are into that sort of thing, and you could spend hours trying to make someone look like David Moyes... not that I did... ...  obviously.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035356460', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11187, 'last_played': 1701651923}
review: That feeling when at the end of 16th season in Hard mode and after 5 seasons of struggle in 2nd league, you play last round in a season with table leader, you are winning which gives you promotion to 1st league, you just scored a goal for 2:0, it is 85 minute, you make substitutions, and FUCKING game crash, giving you 0:3 defeat because of Ironman, and leaving you with 1 point short for promotion so that you can go fuck yourself and stay in the same fucking league for next season. Enjoy!
developer_response:
I really regret that happened :( 
There can be two reasons for that as far as I know:

1) To weak graphics card. If that so, you can disable graphical improvements in the graphics settings: 3d grass, antialiasing etc.

2) On some PC there can be a problem with memory which leads to crashes. Players who had this problem informed us that if they disable banner animation in the match graphical settings, the crashes stopped happening.

While the first type of crashes happens solely because of the weak PC, we are trying to find the reason for the second problem. And I hope to fix it in the near future.

I hope you will still have a lot of a great time with FTG.

review:
A creative video game approach to the football game in a space saturated with copycats and poor executions that rely on their licenses...
The managing aspect of the game is enthralling and completely developed in the game, creating great stories of success and failure alike!
Also, it is made by an Ukranian videogame studio! 🦾

author: {'steamid': '76561198003731124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1492, 'last_played': 1705986629}
review:
From the minute I played the demo I was hooked. This is a fantastic take on football management. It takes aspects from games like XCOM and plugs them well into a sports setting. It's an easy game to understand but a difficult one to master. Taking a club from National League obscurity to Premier League glory has never been so satisfying.
Steam deck note: It runs well except for a couple of crashes, thankfully the frequent saving avoids a lot of frustration.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985826952', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 16092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15921, 'last_played': 1701050341}
review:
FYI - some of my description may apply to the DLC for this game. I bought the DLC awhile ago and don't remember which details were added to the base game. Apologies.

Football/soccer & turn-based tactics shouldn't mix this well. But there are so many layers of strategic decisions to make, I find myself playing this game for hours. "One more turn (or game)" syndrome.

As coach, you pick your team of players to do battle on the field. You can play out each game but I usually transition over to simming the games as the competition gets tougher. Each player has a designated position (each with special abilities). Players level up increasing their stats. They also can specialize using a 'talent tree' of sorts as they level. And each player can train in another set of special abilities. If all of that sounds confusing, it's really not when you play. But it provides a LOT of choices in terms of how to build your team. 

Then, you can tailor the setup of your club by: - hiring coaches that provide XP boosts, -expanding your stadium to increase cash flow, - buffing up your scouts to find new players, - or leveling up your team docs to better deal with injuries. You also level up as a coach which will provide cash and fame and access to another set of perks to help you out. 

Combine that with the usual soccer trappings of promotion/relegation, tournaments & league play, and contracts & transfer seasons and there's a LOT to do. Oh yeah - your team owner will have goals for you to strive for with bonuses for achieving them, or possibly getting fired if you don't.  You can always team hop (and league hop) if you'd rather not stick with one team. Add in mods that let you mimic real leagues/teams and this game really offers a lot for the money. I've run several teams up from the bottom leagues, have drifted off to other games, and still get all sucked in building a new team when I return. I love this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142700506', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 17337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13794, 'last_played': 1677717595}
review:
very good game for strategy players. I think it's even better than vanilla xcom, longer campaign makes it more comparable to long war. Losing cups instead of perma-death of soldiers offer a better punishment to players emotionally. 

my only problem is game encourages micro management to win the matches. You need to change your formation (before kickoffs, corners) many times if you want to win matches. This is not very fun and I feel like I am cheating, because AI is not allowed to do that.
