author: {'steamid': '76561198002375114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9208, 'last_played': 1707997171}
review:
I love football management games and decided to give FM a miss this year as i don't believe it was improving enough year on year. I had an itch to play a football management game and stumbled upon this. It's definitely complex to master and when you do it's rewarding so don't give up too early - i was still learning things after playing 80 hours.

One thing i would love to see in future DLC's is the ability to loan out young players as when you get to elite level (squad level 90+) the youth players struggle to get a look in and therefore do not improve. Keep up the great work!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998098115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2799, 'last_played': 1673191826}
review:
Bardzo uzależniająca, zdecydowanie bardziej przystępna niż Football Manager, nie zarzuca tabelkami, rozgrywkę taktyczną można sobie darować i bawić się samymi symulacjami i zarządzaniem klubu / transferami zawodników i treningiem.
Jedyne czego mi brakuje to szkolenia zawodników poza meczami (np jakiejś mini gry treningowej, albo pasywnego treningu za pieniądze lub  punkty "glory"
No i fajnie by było móc poprowadzić od razu reprezentacje narodowe
Poza tym genialna gra, polecam fanom gier taktycznych zarządzania i piłki nożnej.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004490181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1281, 'last_played': 1675010388}
review: I've been a die-hard Championship Manager/Football Manager fan for *years* and never felt the need for anything else, but this is a neat little game.  Enough strategy to be interesting for when I want a casual break from spreadsheets.   Certainly on sale it's a no-brainer if it sounds remotely interesting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255130480', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1671230694}
review:
Football , Tactics & Glory risulta essere il perfetto mix tra calcio e scacchi.
Il gioco consiste nel creare una propria squadra , fare mercato , scalare le divisioni e giocare le partite in un match a turni , sfruttando la posizione , a mò di scacchiera, dei propri giocatori, i loro movimenti e le abilità di essi.
Il gioco risulta immersivo e subito abbastanza chiaro , tranne per il calcolo punti per esempio quando si prova a superare un avversario.
Attraverso i contenuti creati dalla community , è possibile mettere i nomi dei team e dei giocatori reali e potrebbe essere un più ma sinceramente visto il modo di giocare abbastanza particolare , anche giocare con i nomi fake risulta allo stesso modo piacevole.
Le animazioni dei giocatori sono carine , tranne a mio parere per qualche esultanza un po' monotona.
Il colpo d'occhio è buono , facendo il suo dovere ,senza essere nulla di eclatante . Il comparto sonoro risulta curato bene e piacevole .
Il gioco tuttavia in alcuni momenti risulta essere difficile e sbilanciatissimo , rendendo l'esperienza nervosa e aumentando la sensazione di frustrazione.
Il gioco , seppure non sia un capolavoro , lo consiglio senza alcun dubbio , ma non è sufficiente essere appassionati di calcio per provarlo gradevole , dato che sembra essere un qualsiasi gioco a turni.

[h1]Pro[/h1]
+ Idea originale , ben sviluppata e ben curata
+ Longevità e rigiocabilità
+ Possibilità di modificare totalmente i giocatori per quanto riguarda nome e aspetto
+ Belle animazioni
+ Comparto grafico e audio gradevole

[h1]Contro[/h1]
- Sensazione di gameplay sbilanciato in alcune situazioni
- Frustrante
- Longevità e rigiocabilità?Si, ma davvero riuscirete a terminare la carriera e addirittura a rigiocarlo?

[h1]Voto[/h1]
★★★★★✰✰✰✰✰
5/10

(Il voto si basa su impressioni mie personali complessive probabilmente anche date dal momento personale in cui lo gioco, , prendendo in giudizio solo questo gioco , senza confrontarlo con altri giochi.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198070256269', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 7089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5363, 'last_played': 1703601619}
review:
Started with a team in the amateur league. Through clever trades, good gameplay and some luck, rose through 3rd, 2nd and first league to the premier league by the fifth season. Had my ass handed to me by Dortmund FC in the first round of the EFA cup to remind me that being good in a small country doesn't mean I'm ready for the big leagues.

This game is excellent. It offers a combo of team management outside the pitch (trading and training players, improving facilities and so on)  and tactical game management on the field in a turn-based gameplay that's easy to learn but challenging to master.  Developing your own managerial skills and your team is a rinse-wash-repeat business that doesn't get old. Management offers a good balance between complexity/detail and ease of play. It doesn't go into the tedious level of micromanagement detail that some other managerial games go into but doesn't dumb down things either. 

I'm having tons of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198369913271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 615, 'last_played': 1676828831}
review: Empolgado pela Copa do mundo e afim de jogar algo com um dos meus amigos, comprei esse joguinho que estava na promoção. Abri ele pela primeira vez apenas para testar, mas acabei jogando 10 fucking horas sem parar. A costumização dos jogadores poderia melhorar, e mais interações diferentes da diretoria poderiam permanecer no decorrer do jogo, mas a mecânica em si é muito divertida e desafiadora. Com os mods da comunidade você não vai sentir falta do seu time do coração. Esperar uma promoçãozinha e lembre-se que emplacar um time de sucesso demora tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333866915', 'num_games_owned': 422, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 4320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4115, 'last_played': 1708482026}
review:
游戏商店页面介绍上写着开发商借鉴了XCOM和FM，身为XCOM爱好者和足球迷，我一看这不得不试一试了，玩下来也确实很上头。
[i]以下内容针对模拟比赛[/i]
关于经营，其实手操环节也是很有特色的，回合制行动的足球游戏独树一帜，但是因为我太懒，在教程赛季过后的新档就全程模拟了（偶尔观看几场找找问题），对我而言这游戏的乐趣也正是经营部分。普通模式历经23个赛季从业余联赛到超级联赛三冠王，球员换了一批又一批，期间自己摸索着玩，也没有太急着升上去。经营理念的核心其实就是买年轻人→培养→卖高价→再买资质更好的年轻人，辅以每赛季选择合适的赞助商目标以及主场门票，这就是全部的经济来源（夺冠奖金在前期不敢想）。球员在30岁以上会迅速掉价，所以提前规划哪些球员下赛季要卖，而哪些又是你需要继续依仗的。除了在业余联赛，你不可能一队全是能力还不达标的年轻人，否则保级都难，需要留下几名熟男老将来带娃。
关于阵容，个人认为一个好门将和一个能进球的人（可以是前锋，也可以是前腰AM）是必须时刻要有保证的，因为无论怎么进攻最后都要过门将的手，而无论怎么赢比赛都要有进球。除此之外，个人喜欢阵容里有一名防守高的后腰DM以及一名传球高的CM/MF，DM提供的中场拦截可以很大程度上保护后防线，CM/MF负责把球向前准确传给负责射门的人，这也是我主玩中路进攻的几个核心位置，当然还有其他阵容玩法，需求自然也不一样。
关于俱乐部升级，按我的打法，DM、CM/MF、AM三个位置都是中场，因此升级中场教练的性价比极高，优先点满，而进球自然就交给AM（练射门），顺道练出来的其他中场就可以优先卖掉换钱了，核心位置尽量找到资质更好的年轻球员再换，而且尽量一年只换两三个位置，慢慢完成换代升级，实力也有保证。球场、球探、医疗在没有资金升教练时适当点点即可，青训我没点，投入大见效慢，[spoiler]我犯了中国足球的毛病。[/spoiler]
关于技能，技能与四维同是非常关键的部分，且技能发动的成功率与天赋和技能级数有关，与四维无关。首先铲球是万金油技能，哪个位置都好用。后卫个人喜欢带一个会长传的，能快速从后场发动进攻，多一种向前的手段。中场抢断高手、铲球、长传、直传都不错，角球旋门很鸡肋，因为角球次数太少了没机会用。前场重炮轰门、挑球、穿裆都行，空霸则对于玩边路传中的阵容很重要。门将的技能尽量跟后卫线互补即可，比如后卫有高的空霸和神反应，那么对头球和挑球就有了应对，门将可以考虑选门神防重炮。
关于板凳深度，其实在升入超级联赛并准备发力之前都不需要太多替补，在保级的赛季一周一赛（保级赛季国内杯赛肯定也不用考虑了）首发加上两三个水平一般的替补完全够用 [spoiler] 什么？主力前腰被铲伤7个月？读档重来。铁人模式另说 [/spoiler]。冲冠军或升级的赛季考虑核心位置的高水平替补。三冠王赛季7个高水平甚至同水平替补得坐满。

暂且想到这么多，以后找时间开一档困难或者铁人试试。总的来说，很不错的足球游戏，值得体验♥。

author: {'steamid': '76561199247671200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1007, 'last_played': 1674411576}
review:
For a change, a football management game which looks good (but for a few match rendering scenes, like kick off,  which look quite basic).
Very detailed but it does not seem like playing with a spreadsheet, a problem that other, more famous games, have.
Matches are played in a turn-based. XCOM like fashion, which initially is a bit alienating, but once you understand the mechanics and how to exploit player characteristics and skills it is lots of fun. 
Overall, a great game, highly reccomended, two thumbs up.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966155489', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1072, 'last_played': 1674068334}
review:
This game is basically for people who love developing their club and climbing from the bottom to the top, but aren't invested enough in football to deal with the intricate tactics of classic FM-Games, or maybe just want to be more involved in the actual match without going full FIFA.

Because FTG introduces its own turn-based gameplay, there is basically zero knowledge of football required.
It seems fairly simple in the beginning, but you will have to constantly adjust your roster because of changing weather, injuries, stamina issues, transfers, youth development etc. The opponents have to be carefully analyzed to counter their strategy, while keeping your own gameplan valid. Despite a seemingly limited number of moves, no two games ever felt the same to me.
The tutorial is nicely integrated into the first season, and in the beginning a large number of players have neither skills nor specializations, which enables a steady introduction into the mechanics.

This game is one of the best I have tried in a while, and I think it will keep me busy for many many hours.
The fact that I can support Ukrainian developers in the process is just a cherry on top.

author: {'steamid': '76561198404381427', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1218, 'last_played': 1672125667}

author: {'steamid': '76561198009296773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 449, 'last_played': 1701123055}
review:
Well, this is as any other football manager game but mainly focused on the chess side than complex management systems. This tactics element  brings more depth then just managing your squad, in reality it brings life to the game genre as you don’t rely on just RNG numbers fighting against each other, however whenever you face a team with higher stats than your players it is still almost (if not) impossible to beat them either if you are a master chess player, you know when you watch a match in RL that the underdog team beats the favorite team? That unlikely will happen here, so in the end of the day the RNG when comparing players stats still have a huge impact on the game, basically you will lose anyway against best teams and you’ll have to face it anyway.

The graphics are cool, very minimalistic and somehow a mix with low poly art. UI elements looks weird and too simple to be honest where it can look like an outdated game already.

The tutorial can be tricky and buggy, a bit over complicated for new beginners bug I like the idea of learning new stuff by the calendar goes by. [b]BUG: If you perform any hold ball option as your last action, the game will stuck and you have to restart (up to this date, this issue was not fixed yet).[/b]

Users being unable to change the number of actions after starting the team journey is a bit annoying, you need to find the perfect action balance that you feel comfortable to play with before playing it seriously, just because this will be set in the stone for from the moment you select it and you can’t change at all, and this means the game could be too fast or too long to what you were looking for.

Another problem is in regards online play where you’ll barely if not never will be able to play online matches at all, up to this day there are ~30 online players and matches are never found of course. In my opinion if the game was designed without the online mode, they would it the jackpot bringing a lot of offline features and more complex gameplay instead of investing in a such waste.

Basically this is a match of FF Tactics + Football, it can be a bit complex in terms of skill trees and how you manage your team, contracts and so forth. You can costumize so many things within the game like players avatars, names, team jerseys, cups, leagues and whatnot. There are SEVERAL MODS on Workshop that brings even a deeper experience to your playthrough that is definitely a must to have a look what matches to your prefferences.

The game full price is a bit over what you will expect, however offer seasons it can go very cheap that would definitely worth to give a go.

[b][u]TLDR[/u][/b]

[b]Gameplay Mechanics:[/b] OK, a bit confusing for new players to learn
[b]Gameplay Features:[/b] This is where it stands out, complex but not too complicated
[b]Graphics:[/b] Good, matches the game purpose
[b]AI:[/b] Not dumb, but everything relies on a RNG between lower X higher numbers
[b]UI:[/b] Fair, nothing too convoluted but nothing extraordinary in terms of design


[b]Overall score: 7.9/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198005929695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1896, 'last_played': 1673205912}
review:
Its a bit different from other manager games, in a good way.
You can watch the game unfold, substitue player as in other games.
Or you can move the players around your self, a little like in the UFO games.
Or just simulate the match and be done with it.

All ways to play a match is fun.

And the way you set up the tactics, and witch players you choose, make a difference.
More than it does in Football Manager.
Here you need to mix your tactic to ensure your players can use there skills to your advantage, and to stop the oposing players skills.

Here you can be the manager in a way that F.M dont let you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354544052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1308, 'last_played': 1671680384}
review:
很好玩，但是目前发展到乙级联赛之后手动比赛会卡死退出。不知道发行团队是否可以解决。如果可以流畅游戏，会改好您的邮件被收件人（kos@creoteam.com）所在服务商判为垃圾邮件，对方不予接收。 

本人尝试发邮件，但是你的邮箱拒绝了我——“您的邮件被收件人（kos@creoteam.com）所在服务商判为垃圾邮件，对方不予接收。 ”
开发者KoS，请问要如何避免拒绝呢？
developer_response:
将报告文件发送给我，我们将尽力帮助您：
1) 找到我们的支持工具 STEAM FOLDER\steamapps\common\Football Tactics\config.exe
2) Troubleshooting
3) Generate report
4) [通过kos@creoteam.com发送给我](mailto:%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87kos@creoteam.com%E5%8F%91%E9%80%81%E7%BB%99%E6%88%91)

author: {'steamid': '76561198149689275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1671577437}
review: First time in 15 years of gaming stuck in a TUTORIAL with incomplete/unclear instructions. 12/10
developer_response:
I regret you are not satisfied with the game. But let me help you. 

First of all, if you fail few times in a tutorial test, the question mark starts blinking. When you click on it, there is a button "Help" that shows how to solve the test.

Second, you can ask on forums where friendly community will always help.

As we figured out for many years in Early Access, the tutorials are crucial to our game because the game looks so simple that players think it's a shallow game. But there are so much depths that players who figure out the game mechanics, stay with the game for tens or hundreds of hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002562708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 144, 'playtime_at_review': 909, 'last_played': 1711504256}
review:
My original review was predicated on my belief that the tutorials aren't accessible unless you run a game with tutorials enabled. Turns out that's not true - after you complete the last tutorial, the game tells you they are available from the "help" menu, and sure enough, there they are. My mistake.

I still say this is a fun game - even for a casual soccer fan like me - that has some annoying UI issues - I still don't understand which players I can or can't move around to defend a corner or free kick - but there's a fun tactical football club simulation here if you want to spend the time to find it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053559897', 'num_games_owned': 895, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 22187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16497, 'last_played': 1691174219}
review:
This game surprised me. I went in expecting a fun and less-complex alternative to Football Manager, but what I got was more than that. 

The gameplay is simple on the surface but as you progress becomes more tactically and strategically deep, which keeps you engaged for (far too many) hours. It's easy to pick up and play, but don't be fooled by its simplicity. As you dive deeper, you'll discover layers of complexity that keep the experience fresh and challenging.

What sets this game apart from other similar titles (FM more specifically) is the direct link between your tactical decisions and the outcome in matches. It's not just about which team has the best footballers; it's about outsmarting your opponents: both tactically within the game via effective use of formations and skills, and more strategically with developing and upgrading your club and roster. Outperforming technically stronger opponents through smart decision-making is immensely satisfying.

The development team behind this game deserves high praise. They are highly committed and consistently provide updates and new content to keep the experience fresh. They are also responsive to bug reports and offer direct 1:1 support, ensuring that any issues are promptly resolved. I recommend joining the discord server for the game if you are interested, while the community is small they are always friendly and willing to answer my stupid questions. 

In conclusion, this hidden gem of a game deserves the spotlight. Despite being overshadowed by industry giants in the same niche, it confidently stands up to them and, in many ways, surpasses their offerings. You don't even have to know much about football to enjoy this game. 

While it may not have the same level of mainstream recognition, its in-match depth, ability to dip in and out, and the direct impact of your choices make it a standout contender. It's a refreshing alternative to the more well-known titles in the genre, offering a unique and satisfying experience that sets it apart.

Give this game a chance, and you'll discover a true diamond in the rough. It's a testament to the fact that greatness can often be found in unexpected places. Prepare to be pleasantly surprised as you uncover a gaming experience that rivals and even outshines its better-known counterparts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155479533', 'num_games_owned': 1951, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1672463300}
review:
Still pretty new to the game, haven't finished the first season. Prompted to make a review by the game devs, unsure of how fast can get to this point. For me it took me 4.6 hours, after dabbling in statistics, looking at new players.. tbh, the game seems really easy AT FIRST. You could even manage to get over clubs way better than yours thanks to having a strong(even tho older) forward, who has high accuracy, especially when combined with a good passing midfielder and playing around with positioning. 
As you advance through what I consider the tutorial part of the game(getting your football license that can get you out of amateur territory) you start to understand that there are deeper mechanics and going forward you'd have to think a lot more about positioning your player, using their skills at appropiate times and placing your players against such football player from the opposing team that would either hardly contain them or be ineffective against them. The complexity is deeper than it seems at first and it could be harder to properly advance, as in the beginning it feels more casual than it really is. 
Overall, being still new to the game, I can say I deeply admire the hidden complexity that's behind the engine, the strategy behind it, and the need that arises for the player to take smarter decisions if they are willing to properly advance in the game. Taking it a little "too casual" as I did in the beginning can lead to many draws, that could be prevented if the right thought process and strategy is applied.

The 25 euro mark is not for the casual football admirer, but is definetly worth it to people who admire turn-based combat and strategy element. Really looking forward to revisiting this review once I amount some hours on it. I suggest that you do the same and decide that if this is your cup of tea!

Edit1(2 minutes after writing up the review): I consider it very helpful that the game presents you with challenges that can help you get finances, as long as you do them, This leads to the player experimenting with different playstyles and trying to "work in" new ways of playing the game, making sure that if the player decides to try achieving them - can learn the mechanics easier and experiment with different approaches early on. Nice touch by the devs on that part!

author: {'steamid': '76561198045720462', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1671359376}
review:
Steam deck review:

I feel for the developers, and this game seems like a great premise, but I can't recommend it.

It is currently verified and has full controller support, according to the Steam page. This seems to be wrong.
The controller icons are missing. At least, I'm expecting there are supposed to be icons in the circle over the menu button in the top left, for example. The circle is simply empty.

This would not be a problem by itself if the controller functionalities actually worked. But for example, in the setup, there is no way to use the controller and change a league from "premier league only" to "fully simulated". You are left using the touch screen and at that point it becomes a big hassle.

Then the game crashed during the tutorial, at the point where I tried to cancel my shot.

I restarted and chose a different controller lay-out as opposed to the included, recommended one (I went with  the default "controller" one, seeing if it might make it workable) but that didn't work at all.

From a Steam Deck point: Would not recommend yet, and I'm a little suprised about the Verified status.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042625339', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1671225409}
review:
I should be a perfect target for this game. It's XCOM meets Football Manager and I love both of those but...

I returned it game after and hour and a half.

Why?

Because I couldn't stand all of the UI bugs (controller buttons despite it not being plugged in, them just flicking randomly, scrolling buttons only working when you scroll to the left etc etc.). Custom logos wouldn't uplod despite me choosing right size, Custom ingame part of logos don't fit in each other and you can't scale them up or down. It just has this cheap console port vibe which from what I've read is not true.

And gameplay

Jesus

I've seen here people basically becall one another because they didn't like the amateur league level (starting point of a default career). Well it just consist of transporting the ball to the striker in 2 turns and then scoring with him a goal on a 3rd turn. So what's there to like? Monkey could do it. Most of your squad won't even move from their starting positions during the game and you'll have like 3 shots on goal combined with your opponent per game (again on recommended settings). Gameplay loop is just no fun.

Idea of this game was amazing but because of awful UI, bugs and meh gameplay at best it just fails short.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198044267534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1710125729}
review: Excellent little tactical soccer game with a lot more depth than it originally appears.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076663799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 53718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52102, 'last_played': 1671274334}
review:
Amo questo gioco e lo considero una gemma nascosta per un motivo principale: riesce a mescolare complessità, divertimento e rispetto del mio tempo, ma soprattutto perchè è il primo gioco che applica dinamiche RPG al mondo dello sporto in modo discretamente profondo.
Il gioco è complesso perchè abbina caratteristiche gestionali, gioco a turni e progressione stile RPG.
Divertente perchè le meccaniche sono varie e le strade per avere successo sono molte.
Rispetta il mio tempo perchè posso giocarci anche quando ho solo 30 minuti e pur avendo una curva di apprendimento non semplicissima non richiede decine e decine di ore prima di poter raccogliere qualche frutto di ciò che si è appreso.
A mio avviso supera di molto titoli dal nome più blasonato.

Some ideas for devs:
- 5 substitutions 3 more reserves
- 1 new mental attriibute: professionalism
- professionalism influences the growth of the 4 main attributes and the experience in the roleeven if the player does not play
- the tunnel talent is not usefull: need to work in al directions

thanks if you want consider my suggestions
developer_response: Grazie per la recensione e per i suggerimenti! Ne terremo conto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150579448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1699115735}
review:
Um game pra quem gosta de futebol e RPG tactics, quanto mais eu jogo percebo o tão incrível o game , é preciso pensar com calma a cada jogada, a cada turno a melhor estratégia para chegar ao gol ou se defender.

Podendo criar uma "build" pro time se vai ser estilo ataque aéreo com especialidade nos cruzamento/cabeceamento "upando" os atacantes com a habilidade de cabeceio e laterias com bons passes, ou ataque mais tático com foco nos toque e controle da bola, ou com mais infiltração na grande área com diversas habilidades de dribles, ou claro, podendo ser hibrido em tudo, mesmas estrategias se aplicam para defensores.

A cada jogo é preciso analisar qual melhor formação, pois cada adversário analisa (sim, a IA do jogo é muito boa nisso) sua equipe posicionando os jogadores que melhor lhes favorecem aquela área.

Na hora do gerenciamento do time, tem que ter mais atenção, precisa analisar onde será gasto o investimento ao longo da temporada, deve-se pensar se é preciso investir na infraestrutura em geral do time, que é muito demorada a evolução, ou se vai manter alguns jogadores pagando (as vezes) altos salário para determinados jogadores, e claro, podendo equilibrar cada setor desse gerenciamento.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065925520', 'num_games_owned': 515, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1859, 'last_played': 1670110498}
review:
O jogo é até divertido quando comecei a jogar, porém quando vi que evoluir o clube em geral é extremamente lento, o jogo deixou de ser divertido e virou um puro grind simulator. (OBS: nenhuma DLC comprada, apenas o jogo base)

Os jogadores demoram muito para evoluir, ganhar dinheiro basicamente é só com venda de jogadores, e pouco dinheiro ainda. (estádio e patrocinadores não dão praticamente nada). Os upgrades com fama nao deveriam compartilhar o mesmo valor. Ex: todos os upgrades começam custando 10 de fama, se eu upar alguma coisa, todos os upgrades passam a valer 20 de fama e assim sucessivamente. Além disso, para comprar jogadores do olheiro é necessário gastar bastante fama.

Se você estiver querendo começar com um time da ultima divisão e ir até o topo, se prepare para jogar mais de 40 temporadas. Caso não queira simular nenhuma partida ainda, pode esperar ter mais de 200h de jogo facilmente.
developer_response:
Lamento que você não recomende o jogo. Mas gostaria de esclarecer que o problema não está no jogo ser um simulador de grind.

Posso parecer assim quando você não entende a mecânica do jogo.

O jogo é feito de forma que, quando você entende as classes, habilidades e todas as outras mecânicas do jogador de futebol, quando entende como combiná-las, pode superar adversários significativamente mais fortes apenas com suas táticas e formação de equipe inteligente.

Claro, a economia é importante, vender e comprar jogadores de futebol com inteligência é um fator muito importante. Mas quando você pode derrotar seus oponentes com inteligência, a promoção se torna significativamente mais rápida. E fica divertido.

Eventualmente, muitos jogadores entendem que o jogo não é sobre uma rotina, mas sobre táticas.

A propósito, você pode iniciar o jogo diretamente na Premier League. Para isso, inicie um novo jogo e habilite a opção Iniciar em ligas superiores.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334887567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1276, 'last_played': 1669792531}
review: 游戏好的地方：1、游戏操作简单，比fm系列简单明了，操作更加容易上手 2、回合制的操作非常有意思，是这个游戏的亮点。需要改进的地方：1、球员等级设计极不合理，1星到5星除了获取难度不一样，但是经过一段时间的训练，能力值没有任何差别，经过训练全世界的球队基本都是5星了，让你欧洲最强球队打亚洲球队都未必能赢，强烈建议星级不一样的队员升级上限不能一样，例如5星的可到100级，四星的可到80级，三星的到60级，这样才能体现球员的差异性，增加玩家对于获取4星以上球员的幸福感和获得感， 2、年轻球员有的出来太变态，3,4星的球员，17,18岁出来就能到80级，比我5星球员还牛逼，建议年轻球员一定要通过几年的比赛成长才能体现能力值，还是那句话一定要体现，4星和5星球员的优异性，否则游戏真的没有什么可玩性，把我打造全5星球星的球队目标给磨灭了。 综上所述，后面两点不改进，整体游戏没有什么可玩性。

author: {'steamid': '76561198072354601', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 44477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36152, 'last_played': 1698527651}
review:
For me, as someone who doesn't want to "study a game to play it", it is a really good, simple, soccer manager. 

+ Simple to understand
+ Not too many unimporant choices (like the complicated managers, may be a negative for some tho)
+ Multiple options to play the game, as turn based or just sim (I like to SIM personally)

- Could be adjusted to "modern" soccer rules
- Wish there was a way to play a league with multiple friends, back in the day we could just hang out 3-4 ppl on a hot-seat and game together... this would make it epic

Overall I had a lot of fun playing this game, and I am gladly returning for more :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198143559873', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 804, 'last_played': 1671070810}
review:
I always loved managing my own teams to victory where-ever I could, and I always wanted to make my own team from the ground up and leading it to glory despite all the obstacles I knew I'd face.

This game itches that itch beautifully, and while I've yet to join the true elite of 4.5 or 5 stars, I have been the David that has defeated Goliath multiple times, and it feels good.

Sure it'll take you a few seasons before you get to enjoy the highs of continued success, but it's well worth it in the end, and that's what matters most.

Get this game if you can, and pick up the DLC as well. 

Sure the DLC make things more complex and tricky, but it's a fair and just challenge, which I greatly prefer to unfair and unjust challenges.

author: {'steamid': '76561198826364175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3127, 'last_played': 1704504222}
review:
Ой. ну що можна сказати про цю гру.
Почнемо із плюсів:
1.Це українська гра, і звісно і ній є українська мова.
2.Футбол у жанрі стратегії, це дійсно цікаве поєднання.
3.Гарна графіка та інтерфейс.
Мінуси:
1.Заставки святкування та розіграшу м'яча, вони не дуже плавні (але це може бути через мій комп, він у мене середніх характеристик)
2.Онлайн суто щоб грати з друзями (Оскільки в мене їх немає, то я його ні разу і не грав)
Та усе впринципі, так то гра дуже якісна та цікава, якщо ви не цікавитесь футболом все одно можете пограти вам має сподобатися.
Із побажань тільки одне це зв'язане із онлайном, можливо там зробити якісь турніри щоб можна було грати із іншими гравцями, якісь змагання між країнами по набору очок або щось типу того.
Моя особиста оцінка гри 9 із 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162965974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 68901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59998, 'last_played': 1674099767}
review:
Я прошёл с этой игрой долгий путь длиною в 4 года от ЧМ18 в России до ЧМ22 в Катаре. Она по праву занимает достойное место в списке моих самых любимых игр. Много раз бросал карьеру, в силу разных обстоятельств, но каждый раз возвращался вновь с не меньшим интересом, чем в первый раз. Надо отметить, что ни до FTG, ни после, аналогов чего-то подобного я так и не увидел. Уникальный сплав игровых механик делает игру особенной. Если вы любите тактические игры, при этом не подгораете от броска кубика – гарантированно получите массу удовольствия от процесса.

Вышедшие 2 аддона открывают новые горизонты и поднимают тактические возможности на новую высоту. Игра без них, несомненно, смотрится пресной и однообразной. Радует постоянная работа команды проекта над улучшением продукта и чуткая обратная связь. _K_o_S_ (разработчик) в эпоху до инверсии, но об этом позже, постоянно держал руку на пульсе. Всегда можно было пообщаться на тему тех или иных особенностей механик, обсудить баги. Каждый год я номинировал FTG в рубрике «Любимое дитя» на премию Steam. И было за что. То с какой любовью и чуткостью к своему проекту подходил коллектив создателей - вызывало уважение. Ошибки постоянно исправлялись, баланс правился, планы на будущее поражали воображение, а маленькие и большие патчи каждый раз улучшали игру.

Но вот прошло время и где мы находимся сегодня. На дворе ноябрь 2022 года. Цена для RU региона подскочила в 4 раза, с условных 350 рублей до 1400. И дело не в том, что жить стало сложнее. Дело в том, что в эту игру пришла политика. Наглая, кровавая, лживая. Автор не стесняясь транслирует в мир свои нацистские взгляды, подверженный пропаганде неонацистского террористического режима своего президента-наркомана. На наших глазах, США и их безвольные вассалы в Европе пытаются надуть нелепую фигуру жалкого преступника Zеленского до масштабов Гитлера, накачивая последнего оружием, наёмниками и кредитами. Существа (потому что назвать их людьми нельзя) стравливают две части одного этноса, оболванивая морально неустойчивых жителей окраины России, не жалея ни сил, ни средств для раскручивания братоубийственного безумия. И что самое поразительное – находятся глупцы, которые и словом, и делом готовы выслуживаться перед западными хозяевами! Наплевав на все морально этические нормы, плюнув в лицо своим дедам, проливавшим кровь в борьбе с фашизмом, полностью отринув доводы разума, совести, сердца.

_K_o_S_ открыто говорит, что часть средств, полученных за игру, пойдёт на помощь ВСУ. Вооруженным силам террористического государства, которое с 2014 года устраивает геноцид собственного населения на приграничных с Россией территориях. Тысячи убитых и раненных женщин, детей, стариков. Каждый рубль, евро, доллар поступивший на счёт Creoteam сегодня, может принести смерть мирным жителям и воинам-освободителям завтра. Поэтому я крайне не рекомендую покупать эту игру кому бы то ни было, до полного разгрома ВСУ и капитуляции нацистского режима сумасшедшего наркомана.

Подлые баннеры, где фотография нашего Верховного главнокомандующего стилизована под портрет худшего человека на Планете Земля XX века показывают лишь культурный уровень и уровень озлобленности создателей. Триумф русофобии и нацизма. Это дно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062585950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1494, 'last_played': 1679330952}

author: {'steamid': '76561198314543287', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2941, 'last_played': 1669130039}
review:
The basic game
I bought the game a few years ago for the Playstation and now I remembered it again when I was a little bored... now I had to get it for the PC. 
I love the turn based game mechanics. Now I have the advantage of being a soccer fan anyway but even for non soccer fans this game is something because the mechanics is what makes the game worth playing. 

Expansion Football Stars
with the expansion and the many new features the game gets a completely new touch. Players are now gifted differently, for statistics lovers they have also done something, There are new game pieces and much more. The DLC is worth the money and makes you want to play again.

Expansion Manager's Journey
Finally I am in the center as a manager. Is my team just not getting any better? Then I change, is my starting team not the one I like? Then I change.  Do I need more money to buy players? then... well, you can change here, too, if you get the right club or you develop your own skills accordingly... Piece by piece you climb up in levels and can acquire new skills or expand already acquired. This helps me to gain more experience, to get fame, to ask the board for money, to motivate my team and to hold the necessary speech in the helb time to maybe turn the game around. 

Software
Here and there it can happen that the game crashes, especially with the manager extension in the loading sequences. This is usually not a problem, because the game has usually saved a few moments before and you get back in immediately before the loading sequence. 
In a few cases, the game does not start after the crash. In this case, an error message with "Cannot initialize video" appears. In my case the following solution was found: 
D:\games drive D\steamapps\common\Football Tactics -> double click config.exe -> change resolution (top right) from 16:9 to 16:10 -> Start Game
Since then everything is as before. 
In between I had already tried uninstalling and reinstalling, that didn't help. you have to go into the config.exe

review: Oynarken çok zevk aldığım bir oyun strateji ve şans odaklı bir futbol oyunu gerçeğe yakın diyebiliriz çünkü oyuncular yetenekleri top sınır olup 1 de min sınır olup arasında zar atıyor ve bir sayı çıkıyor buda çoğunlukla top sınıra yakın oluyor lakin  gerçektede olduğu gibi oyuncu o gün ruh hali iyi değilse gibisinde oyunda olmadığı için zar sisteminde gelen düşük sayıları böyle yorumlayabilirsiniz. author: {'steamid': '76561198164567984', 'num_games_owned': 321, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 13980, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7576, 'last_played': 1699654063}
review:
Gosta de futebol e de jogos de estratégia em turnos? Pode comprar!

O jogo é excelente, divertido e muito inovador! De bônus, é perceptível como a empresa que o desenvolveu tem um carinho muito grande pelo jogo, resultando em boas atualizações com o passar do tempo, mesmo sendo uma empresa pequena da Ucrânia que vem sofrendo com a guerra que invadiu a terra deles (o que explica um número menor de atualizações no ano de 2022). E esse é outro ponto interessante, parte dos lucros vão para a assistência da defesa do próprio país. Outro detalhe: quem escolher o idioma russo, verá plaquinhas publicitárias pedindo o fim da guerra (no lugar das plaquinhas de empresas que já existem nos estádios, ou seja, mudando nada no jogo). Muito nobre da empresa correr o risco de se posicionar (e receber notas negativas por causa disso).

Vale até o preço cheio, o jogo é um GOLAÇO!

author: {'steamid': '76561199126198606', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3316, 'last_played': 1708189956}
review:
I long waited to make this comment because I wanted to be sure. Now I am sure. This game has nothing to do with the probabilities. Because you can not score 1, 2 consecutively all the time when your attribute is 70+. I am developing games and I studied probability. There is a problem with this game's math calculation because this happens all the time. Forwards, goal keepers, special moves constantly I score around 1. 

During a match with 45 moves, you barely have a chance to make a shot (3 times at most). Because when you tackle with 60+ defense to 30 control ai, you score 1. Otherwise you make 3 tile long balls with 70+ passing this doesnt go to the tile of the forward. Even you somehow make it to the forward, with 77 attacking you score 1 again. But ai can score with 38 attacking thru your 70+ 2xdefenders and 55 goalkeeper.
developer_response:
I regret you have problems with the game. But I want to assure you that probabilities are pure random (as much as C++ allows to make it random).

Usually, I see a repeatable pattern of some players having hard time understanding all game possibilities, and so they use only basic tactics which in turn are very limited and heavily depend on random. However, the game gives a lot of tactical tools to reduce the effect of random and make your weaker team beat significantly stronger team by outsmarting them. 

Many players win Premier league with their 3 star teams while in Premier league many teams have 4-5 stars. That's possible because rng is fair and the game gives a lot of tactical possibilities.

Here, you can find a video playthrough of a very experienced player on Hard mode: https://youtu.be/lrGIi7fIhXc Starting from the second season he starts beating stronger teams. Sometimes, rng plays in his favour, sometimes - it is not. But on the long run, what matters is your understanding of the game mechanics, your squad management and your match tactics. 

I hope that you play again our game and have more fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998316489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3381, 'last_played': 1667968393}
review:
Unlike in EA's FIFA or SI's Football Manager, I can now successfully use defensive tactics that would make the old Italian masters weep in awe and terror. This game challenges my understanding of modern football with formations governed by a cursed geometry beyond comprehension.

This is a dynamic and ever-changing fantasy universe where strong clubs exist all around the world, where an African team has a fighting chance in the Club World Cup. Europe is no longer the undisputed superpower, though they still enjoy an early advantage. The game features 4 large Champions League style systems (Europe, Asia, Africa, the combined Americas), along with country rankings that change as clubs perform better. North American fans might be happy to see US, Canadian, and Mexican clubs in the Libertadores competition. If you are familiar with the European system of promotion/relegation and their Champions League and Europa League, you should know that every country and continent follows this system. MLS clubs can now be relegated into the 4 leagues below them, but now your little hometown team has a chance to rise to the top and challenge Real Madrid for the Club World Cup.

If you like obsessively creating teams, logos, etc, the in-game editor allows you to do this at any time, even in the middle of a campaign. You can also rename all the league and tournaments. Mods can also do this for you.

I love Xcom and sports management games, so this is a nice mix. But the game can be brutal, especially if you skip the tutorials like me, and manage to get promoted into a higher division against the odds. This is the first football game where I've suffered relegation.

My only complaint is that you are forced into de facto "iron man" mode. There is no real save system, no save slots, it just auto-saves. If you want to revert to an earlier stage in your campaign, you'll need to start making backups of your saves (Documents / Creoteam / Football Tactics / saveGame).

(Note I reviewed this with all DLC, so I don't know where the vanilla game end and the DLC begins.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198102681906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4483, 'last_played': 1664543657}
review:
사람마다 취향이 다르긴 하겠지만 본인은 축구 좋아하고 턴제 게임을 좋아하는 편인데도 상당히 지루하다고 느낌

1. 모든게 주사위 수치로 결정나는 게임이고 이게 이 게임의 전부인데 이 수치가 너무 빨리 지나가버려서 내 선수 주사위가 몇이 떴고 상대 선수 주사위가 얼마가 떴는지 확인 못하는 경우가 있음
단순한 상황일 때는 문제없다고 할 수 있겠지만 코너킥이나 크로스를 올리는 상황에선 꽤 여러명의 선수가 주사위를 굴리는데, 각각의 선수들의 능력이 몇이 떴나 확인을 제대로 할 수가 없음
그냥 "기도 후" 액션을 취한 다음에 나오는 결과만 보고 '그런갑다' 하고 넘어가는 수밖에
2. 리플레이 기능이 없다!!
위에서 얘기한 거와 이어지는 건데 리플레이 기능을 넣고 순간순간 정지시킬 수 있는 기능을 만든다면 위의 상황에서 주사위 수치를 확인할 수가 있음(하지만 만들 생각이 없는 듯 몇년 동안 안 만든거 보면)
그래도 축구 게임인데 리플레이는 당연히 볼 수 있어야지
타 유명 축구 게임들에서도, 현실 축구에서도 리플레이는 필수다
3. 그냥 게임이 지루함
초반에는 선수 능력치가 낮아서 지루함
육성하면 선수가 성장을 하긴 하는데 시간을 꽤 많이 투자해야함
시간 투자 해서 육성하면 좋은 선수가 되긴 하는데 막상 키워놔도 그렇게 게임이 드라마틱하게 재밌어지진 않음

#그냥 딱 초반 아이디어만 신선하고 좋았던 게임
게임을 재밌게 만들진 못하는듯
가격도 게임 퀄리티에 비해 너무 높음

author: {'steamid': '76561198296535824', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6680, 'last_played': 1690729148}
review:
non sono solito lasciare recensioni....però qui "due" righe vale la pena di spenderle. Ho acquistato il gioco tempo addietro, in sconto, proprio perché ero incuriosito ma allo stesso tempo dubbioso, non avrei mai pagato il prezzo pieno per un gioco incompleto.
L'idea di base è buona, ma di per sé il gioco è molto macchinoso, dovuto al caso e spesso sbilanciato in favore dell' IA. Il tutorial lascia presagire un gioco molto accattivante, ma dopo le prime due stagioni non è così. Ripetitivo e spesso frustrante, per questo, nonostante l'abbia acquistato un paio di anni fa, ho poche ore giocate. Stancato dopo aver creato svariate partite con il raggiungimento di pochi gratificanti risultati. Scarso io? Probabile, ma francamente trovo assurdo dover vendere i giocatori migliori per poter rinnovare altri o agire su un mercato a dir poco ridicolo. Per migliorare lo staff ci vogliono dei punti fama, ma se non ottieni risultati non avrai punti fama, indi, torniamo al discorso iniziale. Volendo fare un paragone con la realtà (o con gestionali che traggono ispirazione dalla realtà), anche le squadre in fondo alla classifica riescono a togliersi soddisfazioni. Qui no. Scordiamoci colpi di scena come in FM oppure come il vecchio ma mai dimenticato PC CALCIO.
Lo ho definito incompleto. Sì, perché tu scegli la squadra all'inizio e fino a che non ti stanchi rimarrà quella. Ci sono volute due DLC per bilanciare gli effetti del gioco e per poter dare un po' di brio alla parte manageriale e alla carriera allenatore. Ovviamente, le DLC costano ognuna quasi quanto il gioco base. In pratica, ai prezzi di oggi, con quello che si spende per avere il gioco base più le due espansioni ci si può acquistare FM. In ogni caso, le due DLC le tengo nella lista dei desideri aspettando di provare gli effetti sul gioco a prezzi in linea con le aspettative. 
Per fare un sunto, l'idea è buona, il gioco può essere divertente e avvincente, ma acquistare solo il gioco base è inutile ed è meglio spendere soldi in altri titoli.
Da apprezzare la possibilità di editing sia della squadra all'inizio sia dei singoli giocatori

EDIT: dopo aver scaricato la DLC football stars, ho notato che pochissimo è cambiato rispetto a quanto recensito precedentemente relativamente al gioco base. Le meccaniche sono sempre quelle, sempre sbilanciate in favore dell'IA, casualità troppo troppo...casuale! Dopo aver giocato 5 stagioni posso dire che questa espansione nulla cambia né alla giocabilità né alle funzioni. Le novità aggiunte sono del tutto ininfluenti ai fini della carriera di allenatore. Resta da provare la seconda espansione che, se non hai la prima, non puoi far funzionare. Insisto nel volerlo provare, ma continuo a non consigliarlo e a spendere i soldi (non pochi per gioco base + 2 DLC) su altri titoli

EDIT parte 2: dopo aver acquistato anche la DLC manager's journey posso confermare quanto detto prima. In aggiunta posso dire che il mercato è pressocché RIDICOLO senza un minimo di contrattazione. Hanno aggiunto la possibilità di motivare i giocatori, ma i punti motivazione vengono assegnati random e per un numero di turni spesso insufficiente per poterli sfruttare. I punti "fama" poi sono un qualcosa di aberrante. La fama è un valore che può variare a seconda dei risultati, è vero. Ma non può "consumarsi" quando si porta a termine una "contrattazione" oppure l'acquisto di un giocatore dal taccuino oppure ancora per le migliorie dello staff. Dovrebbero invece mettere un valore fama e poi in base a quello un giocatore può decidere se firmare o meno per un club o un allenatore più blasonato. 
Insomma, non è cambiato nulla di nulla di nulla. 
Solo uno sperpero di soldi per un gioco incompleto, sbilanciato e piatto come non mai.

review: This is not even a sport I follow much, but with that being said,  here is an excellent merger of soccer (football) and turn based tactics  which keeps me immersed for hours on end. Thank you Devs for such an excellent game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198179273510', 'num_games_owned': 1989, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 4673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4324, 'last_played': 1677779449}
review:
Este juego se podría decir que es una mezcla entre estrategia y fútbol. Y una cosa sorprendente en juegos basados en RNG: aquí el RNG trata bien al jugador.

Cada partido dura 48 turnos (24 para cada equipo) y cada equipo de la CPU juega un poco diferente.
Cada jugador tiene 4 stats (Precisión, Pases, Defensa y Control) y habilidades (sombreros, pases al hueco, etc.)

Cada posición en el campo da bonus a los jugadores.

- Portero: Bueno, es un portero xD 

- Central: Entra directamente al jugador durante el turno del rival.
- Lateral: Se mueve 3 casillas y reduce las habilidades del rival.
- Defensa polivalente (universal): sale al corte de tiros y pases durante el turno del rival si está cerca.

- Pivote defensivo: Intercepta genial los pases de los rivales en una gran zona para recuperar el balón rápido. Te vas a querer casar con él xD
- Organizador (MEC): +30% en Pases y presiona "gratis".
- Centrocampista de banda: Se mueve 4 casillas y presiona "gratis".
- Centrocampista polivalente (universal): Sinceramente estos no los he probado xD
- Mediapunta: Filtra pases, atrae defensas y chuta bien desde lejos.

- Extremo: Se puede internar desde la banda "gratis"
- Delantero centro: Bien de cabeza y buenos desmarques
- Delantero polivalente (universal): Se motiva más, se mueve más si no tiene el balón y protege bien el balón.

Se pueden combinar con las stats, habilidades y talentos de los jugadores. 

Por ejemplo, un mediapunta puede atraer a un defensa y chutar bien desde lejos.  Si escoges un delantero para entrenarlo como mediapunta tendrás a un gran lanzador lejano.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970889689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 1267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1267, 'last_played': 1663455562}
review: badly balanced career mode and ultimately the turn based part on the pitch ha sthe same patterns und moves.
developer_response:
I regret you don't recommend the game.

But I want to assure you that when you better understand the game mechanics, you will see that the game is deeper and significantly more diverse than it seems.

Some players fall into a "trap" of the Third or Second league. There, they can't figure out how to deal with economics because they use the same basic playing patterns they used in the Amateur league.

But the game provides significantly more for those who are ready to spend some effort. Because, when you understand the game mechanics, you will be able to build a squad that beats significantly stronger opponents just because you know how to use the game's tactical elements.

One of the things players underestimate is crossings. You might think that they are too hard to understand but when you spend some effort in understanding how to perform them, you will see how your tactical arsenal increases. There are other tactical elements as well that allow you to play differently.

It affects the strategic plane of the game. Because as soon as you figure out different tactics, you will see what classes/attributes/skills you need. The management of FTG is not about just getting footballers with better levels (as it is in all other football management games). You can build a squad of lover-level footballers with the right classes/skills, and that will allow you to win the most prestigious trophies.

While you are in the lower leagues, it's hard to grow (like in real life). So nurturing and selling great talents allows you to keep ends. I know that many players avoid selling their talented footballers but this is an important part of the game.

If you need any help with figuring out different game aspects, we have quite a friendly community in discord: https://discord.gg/HkT8FC7sr4 You just come there and ask questions. Also, there are plenty of good guides on Steam.

I hope you will try to play more and have a lot of fun with our game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271929507', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 87481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3363, 'playtime_at_review': 37665, 'last_played': 1712428505}
review:
For me, this is a gem of a game.
Simply the best implemantation of boardgame football I found out there so far.
It has a lot of clever mechanics and the game just keeps You playing without going into too much details.
Also, all is in Your hands, but without thinking Your plans through You will most likely fail.
I know, the RNG can sometimes ruin even the best strategy, but that's what keeps it interesting, isn't it?

I'm kind of an old school player.
I love:
1. Turn based, preferably boardgame-like games.
2. Football (or soccer for US residents).
3. I played a lot of old games from '90, including some football managers of that time.
4. I was an owner of Atari in the past, so patience is my thing, I guess :).

ABOUT GOOD THINGS:

First of all, it's just like Premier Manager 3 on wheels with the possibility to play matches on Your own.
The simply-but-deep match mechanics is just so neat and balanced, it certainly triggers "just one more match" mode in me.
I used to sit to play 1 or 2 matches and end up in playing through whole round (about 20 games) because it's so engaging and addictive.
The little game in-game seems very limited, but it have a lot of strategic depth.

The players development is slow but very satisfying.
You have a strong grip on the process, Your player is learning the position he's used to take on the field but You can choose what type of player he should be.
For example - should Your forward be a strongman battling with defenders or fragile, but very efficent executor?
You can't have both, but You can choose what to develop pretty well to fit Your tactics.
The feeling when the youngster You train from the green dot (an amateur player) into a pretty well-customized striker, few seasons later shots a goal in the Champions League final is just something unique.

The game really correspond to the theme very well.
If You like football, You'll find it's spirit in the game.
You can tell for sure that people who made this game knows the vibes of this wonderful sport.

I found no better mix anywhere.
I played Football Manager for some time, it was interesting but sometimes it just felt "too much" for me.
I have a impression that even though I have a lot more managial options in FM, at the end, also much less control about how the things are really going.
Football Tactics and Glory is much more arcade, but it feels complete, I buy all its simplifications without hesitation.
Examples:
Your players don't have their own ambitions, if You pay them, they will never leave You to play in Real Madrid ;).
You pay the contracts up front for the whole year, without monthly wages.
You don't have real costs and financial balance to manage, but sometimes You need to sell someone to keep others and this decisions are crucial.
You don't play extra times in matches - when the match is finished, You go right to the creme de la creme, which is of course, the penalty shootout.
These are the things that I wasn't sure is not lacking when I first played the game, but it really give the game a right flow.

ABOUT (not so) BAD (for me) THINGS:

About bugs and working issues.
1st one:
Loading time (please note that I always demand my PC to count all leagues possible).
I was an Atari 130 XE owner in the past.
You know, games were loading from cassete tape, it takes several minutes to play Bruce Lee, Zorro, Boulder Dash or Arkanoid and when Zybex was loading everyone in the room have to be quiet and not breath for almost half an hour to not spoil the loading process.
Those times are gone, but I still remember it and when I have to wait for a minute or two between the seasons, I'm not bothered at all.
I just go brush my teeth or something :).

2nd one:
The game stability in general.
There are some issues, altough nothing really ruining the fun.
After very long session and running some programs in the background, my computer hanged just once (in almost 400 hour long experience so far).
As I played with "Iron Manager" mode, it turned my 2:1 win into 0:3 walkover, but it just made the battle for the title even more interesting, so I haven't really bothered.
Altough, I switched off the animations just to make sure it won't happen again.
The second time the game hanged at the end of the match screen, it remembered the score (4:0 for me, yay!), just haven't given me enough expierience points and credit to the strikers who shot goals.
And remember that I played it A LOT and it happened very rarely.

To sum up, I love the game.
You should buy it, You should try it, You may fall in love with it.
I did and I'm happily ever after.

review:
Absolutely brilliant game.  If you like XCOM or Civ you'll love this.  I haven't had "just one more turn" syndrome this badly since I first discovered Civ.  If you also like football/soccer it'll be bad for your health - I haven't been this tired from lack of sleep since I had twins.  It's so simple yet so strategically deep!  Love it.

Time to get back to my promotion push with Inter Mipants!

author: {'steamid': '76561198318408478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1669873996}
review: Not terribly fun. The gameplay is boring after the first few games and very repetitive.
developer_response:
I regret you didn't have a great experience but It's a common thing in the first hours of the game. Because Amateur league is quite easy and there's so much to learn about game mechanics so players don't use even 10% of the tactical potential the game provides. 

However, later on, in the Third league, the opposing teams will be stronger. And you will have to start learning how to beat them.

The game mechanics build in such a way that with smart tactics and team management you can beat stronger opponents. But to do so, you will have to learn how skills work, how classes work etc.

Actually, there are so many tactical game elements so you will learn something new even after 50-100 hours of playing.

I hope you will play longer and have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067560182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 24439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24439, 'last_played': 1660587746}
review:
My over 400 hours shows this game will keep your attention. 120+ hours on a single team from start to winning a treble and being undefeated 3 seasons in row. Very addicting when you start, and challenging. Any turn-based fan or football/soccer fan will love this game. I never got the DLC, I've been satisfied with the main game. There's also a league editor that integrates with Steam Workshop if you want to put in real world teams, or create a fantasy league.

This game is a gem, easily worth the $20 I spent when it was in Early Access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161366009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1931, 'last_played': 1656016723}
review:
Excelente juego, diría que bastante complicado al principio xq tendrás jugadores amateur sin habilidades, pero con el paso del tiempo si te gusta lo de ser mánager podrás administrar mejor la plantilla y obtener jóvenes promesas muy buenas. Recalco que el inicio es muy complicado xq tus jugadores son bastante malos y concretar jugadas que terminen en gol no es tan fácil. Te dará bronca e insultaras el juego, pero con el tiempo te das cuenta que progresa la jugabilidad y las posibilidades de jugadas son muchísimas ya que tus jugadores van descubriendo habilidades (como un ajedrez, o el XCOM).
*Jugabilidad:* Fácil de entender, con muchas mecánicas a descubrir y desarrollar.
*Gráficos:* Bajos-Medios, una PC potato lo correría.
*Gameplay:* Infinito, todo el tiempo que quieras dedicarle.
*Tácticas:* Tendrás que ver bien donde ubicar cada jugador dependiendo de sus habilidades para ver si solo uno puede cubrir más campo de juego.
*Duración de partido:* Óptimo, está bien pero si gustas más turnos por partida, se puede editar sin problemas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981132141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1627254239}

author: {'steamid': '76561198051848225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 6482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4313, 'last_played': 1703442223}
review:
Un gran bel genere, un mix tra strategico e gestionale, semplice e profondo allo stesso tempo.
è un prodotto che mancava nel genere calcistico.

Ogni partita si svolge a mo' di scacchi, con il campo diviso in caselle e con i giocatori con abilità diverse in base al proprio ruolo, la propria specializzazione e le loro statistiche.
Non a caso la prima stagione verranno date lezioni tutorial poco alla volta, perché ci sono molte regole e dettagli che fanno la differenza e ci vuole tempo, pazienza e dedizione per impararli tutti e applicarli al meglio.

I confronti statistici sono di semplice concezione, ma ci sono molti fattori che possono influenzarli, come l'azione decisa, il ruolo, vari malus/bonus ecc... 
Il risultato è sempre dato dal lancio di un "dado", quindi deve piacervi un po' di fattore casuale (anche se può essere modificato il range di tale casualità).

Plus fondamentale per ogni squadra sono le abilità speciali dei singoli giocatori, che permettono anche a una squadra di brocchi di poter battere i campioni in carica, con le giuste combinazioni.
Ovviamente ce ne sono alcune oggettivamente più utili di altre (Passaggio Lungo probabilmente è la più letale), ma ognuna può essere utilizzata in modi e contesti diversi, trovando cmq un suo perché (tranne forse Rimessa Lunga).

C'è anche una parte gestionale fuori dal campo, una versione semplificata di Football Manager, appassionante quanto il gioco in campo. Vendere e rinnovare i giocatori, scoprire talenti, migliorare le strutture e gli allenatori... 

Si aggiunge anche una personalizzazione completa. Ogni squadra, giocatore e campionato possono essere modificati a proprio piacimento, in qualsiasi momento, anche usando delle mod già pronte sullo Workshop.

Ci sono molti dettagli che potrei citare, ma sarebbe alquanto inutile e confusionario.
Mi limito a dei semplici consigli, recuperando anche quelli menzionati in altre recensioni:

1) c'è la demo, quindi provatela per capire se vi può piacere il genere

2) se procedete all'acquisto, dovete prendere anche il DLC Football Stars (compreso nella Deluxe Edition), perché aggiunge alcune meccaniche interessanti e migliora l'interfaccia e la completezza dei contenuti.
è praticamente una versione 1.5 del gioco base.

3) le impostazioni non possono essere modificate una volta iniziata una partita, quindi vi consiglio di mettere subito la durata a 60 turni (altrimenti durano troppo poco). Il fattore Random impostatelo in base ai vostri gusti (io uso il Normale, ma da risultati spesso troppo assurdi... forse meglio Ridotto)


In conclusione, è un gioco che qualunque appassionato di giochi di calcio dovrebbe provare.
Mi ha riportato di nuovo interesse dopo la decadenza attuale di PES e FIFA.


Pregi:

+ Semplice e complesso allo stesso tempo
+ Esperienza curata e originale
+ Personalizzazione dei contenuti

Difetti:

- Il DLC Stars dovrebbe essere incluso
- Poche impostazioni e poco personalizzabili
- Tecnicamente un po' retrò

https://youtu.be/rnHeENoR8eY

author: {'steamid': '76561198187400919', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 8499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1741, 'last_played': 1665586153}
review:
Very surprised by this game! It's soccer/football but the games themselves have a chesslike quality to them! I love it. A lot of time I'm staring at the pitch in the final minutes of a match trailing by one saying "I know there's a goal in here somewhere" to myself. Setting up your initial lineup and formation also has a bit of a chess puzzle aspect to it. It's so cool! 
The roster management aspects of the game are simple but surprisingly effective, It's difficult to keep a team playing at a high level over the long term. 
One of the best things about this game is that you will be able to go through seasons very quickly, since matches only take 5-15 mins to play. 
I find it a lot more engaging than Football Manager because I have more of a connection to the things that happened during the matches.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039683961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 11757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11716, 'last_played': 1674339026}
review: Игра интересная, но как же ГоРиТ жо5а от рандома, от бляд5кого рандома... Если команда соперника выше вас хотя бы на половину звезды, вы проиграли. Рандом сделает всё чтобы вы прое5али. И игре будет пое5ать на то что у вашего нападающего точность 100 а на воротах оппонента стоит дырка с защитой 20 - ты не пройдёшь! Такая же мутатень с навыками...
developer_response:
Игра сделана так, что при грамотной тактике игрок может обыгрывать значительно более сильных соперников. Рандом в единичных матчах может "помешать" вам или сопернику, но на длинной дистанции правильно выстроенная команда и грамотная тактика являются основным фактором, влияющим на результаты команды.

На ютубе можно даже найти прохождение (на английском), в котором очень опытный игрок на сложном уровне за два сезона выходит из Любительской лиги в Третью. Там видно, что иногда рандом ему мешал, иногда - был на его стороне, но глобально он прошел именно благодаря правильно выбранной тактике и стратегии. https://steamcommunity.com/games/375530/announcements/detail/3059626550260712887

author: {'steamid': '76561198051217369', 'num_games_owned': 75, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 2691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1660929811}
review:
Changing my original poor review due to Developer response. Fair play for such a basic looking game there is definitely some understanding of classes etc.

Will update again in depth once i have put some hours in :-)
developer_response:
The mechanics are very extensive so it's natural it can be confusing at first. 

There are 3 cations per turn. But there are also 
- bonus actions for performing successful skills
- specific abilities of some classes that allow them to move without spending action points (for example, Sweeper automatically moves when it's your turn and you are approaching the opponent's goal; same works for your sweeper).

When you better understand the game mechanics, you will see how interesting it is to outsmart the stronger opponent with your tactics.

Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198275126039', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 4310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2575, 'last_played': 1683163291}
review: FM alacak paran yoksa al oyna. İndirimlerde DLC'ler ile birlikte 30 liraya kaçırılmaz. Oyun zekanızı ve taktik becerinizi sınıyor ayrıca oyuncuların kontrolü de sizde yani her an oyunun içindesiniz. Oyunun ilk saatleri cidden çok keyifli ancak 30-40 saat oynadıktan sonra sıkmaya başlaması ve oyunu daha keyifli yapan güncellemelerin DLC olarak satılması oyunun zayıf yönleri. Tam bir menajerlik oyunu olması için daha pek çok içerik gerekiyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001911166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 19175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5185, 'last_played': 1709326515}
review:
Jeu de stratégie de foot. On est là comme aux échecs. On avance un pion, on le recule, on réfléchit à une combinaison pour avancer et marquer un but, bref du remu-méninges... 
Le jeu est en cela plaisant et pas "prise de tête". 

J'y joues quand je suis en déplacement sur un pc qui ne demande pas beaucoup de ressources et je prends à chaque fois une équipe du pays ou je suis. Dépaysement total et cela donne envie d'aller voir les clubs que l'on prends. 

Petit bémol sur la difficulté à bien régler selon son expérience de jeu. 
Débuter du fin fond des divisions Polonaises pour gagner la Coupe d'Europe est un enjeu fort et compliqué. Mais combien jouissif !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198342113073', 'num_games_owned': 3144, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 19222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19222, 'last_played': 1645017680}
review:
Excellent game. Innovative turn strategy game combining the manager stuff on it.
I would recommend it 100% to people who liked the PCFutbol series, even Fifa Manager players would enjoy this gem.

Note: Expansions are worthless since they destroy the experience by being extremely badly optimized. Keep to the base game that is completely worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561199026098884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 33494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28046, 'last_played': 1689521478}
review:
Наконец-то решил свой первый отзыв в Стиме, а то суммарно наиграл +- 600 часов в T&G (учитывая пиратку ванильной версии), в нынешнем клубе закончил сезон со всеми победами, 400+ забитыми и 15ти пропущенными, так что, думаю, могу сделать вполне адекватный обзор :)
Много расписывать о плюсах и минусах игры как-то не могу. Игра просто шикарна. Хотя бы в плане ощущений от геймплея. К самому концепту футбольных шахмат у меня вот вообще никаких вопросов нет, игра меня поглотила с головой недели на 3 (первая версия игры). Затянуло на уровне HMM 3, если что (а это показатель). После выхода первого ДЛС я уже понял, что введение одаренности - очень правильное решение для баланса, ибо в моей команде (в версии без ДЛС, соответственно) были монстры с профильными статами по 260+ без прокачки специализации на увеличение статы (делал упор на специализацию в умения). Ну и дали возможность покупать футболистов на прямую, а не через список агента, что тоже очень приятно (хоть и наценка раза в 2 больше).После выхода второго, и на данный момент - последнего, дополнения игроки получили возможность переходить из клуба в клуб и прокачивать тренера. Жалко, конечно, что не были введены сборные, но ДЛС все равно оставило очень приятные впечатления (да, на старте были проблемы технического плана, но сейчас их уже нет (я на ноуте с Пентиумом B960 играю, как на Хеоне 540 на релизе, так что, думаю, проблема решена)) от переходов в клубы и исходящих от этого возможностей. Да, баланс не был изменен существенно, это просто модифицированное второе ДЛС. Но очень приятно модифицировано.
Если говорить о самом геймплее, то у меня претензий очень мало, и они из разряда "ну вот можно было бы добавить, и было бы лучше". Концепция футбольных шахмат реализована так, что мне придраться не к чему. Все стоит на своих местах, а фундаментальное правило в виде "удачное использование умения не отнимает очка действия" вообще является примером простой гениальности. Игра очень интересна: игрока затягивает построение хорошего состава, желание выиграть трофеи зачастую слабым составом (как тот, кто выиграл 3х звездочной командой ЛЧ - могу сказать, что под каждого противника приходиться подстраиваться, и каждый матч с группы проходил с невероятным эмоциональным трепетом), нахождение новых подходов. И вот это затягивает, затягивает, затягивает, и игрок наигравает под 15 сезонов. Лично мне игра надоедала (и я её прекращал, ибо считал пройденной) тогда, когда уже не предоставляла никаких испытаний, т.е. я выигрывал условные 5 треблов подряд, забивал 400+ голов, имел все необходимые мне инструменты (игроков) в каждой линии для каждого типа соперника. Но да, в конце второго ДЛС я уже думал "спинным мозгом", т.е. решения принимал быстро, ибо автоматически оценивал ситуацию :). Т.е. мне лично процесс поднадоел только под конец игры. Думаю, вполне хороший результат (и плюс, во втором ДЛС  ИИ стал больше разообразней в плане схем, ибо до этого каждый (9/10) выстраивал своих ЦЗ буквой Т (три на высокой линии, один - сзади), так что комбинация ЦП с дальним пасом и НП с обводкой и пушечным выстрелом разбирала все и вся).
Вот как-то так. Так что игру рекомендую любителям футбола и стратегий, ибо я не представляю, из-за чего она может оттолкнуть (это редко бывает).
Но ничто не бывает идеальным. В T&G есть свои проблемы, которые хотелось бы решить.
1) Моя единственная претензия к концепту. Я понимаю, что это - не симулятор, но блин, до чего же не хватает возможности аренды игроков, когда тренируешь топ-клуб с большими амбициями. Перспективные, но молодые и низкоуровневые игроки в такой ситуации зачастую не могут развиваться с достаточной скоростью, ибо из-за них приходиться ломать структуру команды, играть на них, чтобы они крохами по 2 очка специализации (столько дается за неудачное действие). В то время, как у топ-клубов ИИ "рождается" по 4 игрока с 85+ уровнем и иногда - с 3им скиллом (это на максимальной сложности), у игрока - только 45-50 лвл и дай Бог, чтобы хоть с 1 уровнем скилла. И как адекватно в такой ситуации, без насилования игры, развивать ВР, ЦН/НП, ЦЗ, ОП, ЗЩ? Если с другими классами ещё можно придумать костыли (ЦП/ПЗ - пускай дает поверху ближнему своему, ЛФН/ПФН - стартовых 100 контроля в большинстве случаев хватает для прорыва. С ФП/ФЗ не играю, так что сказать не могу, лишь теоретически первые подходят к решению ЦП/ПЗ, а вторые - к проблеме других защей), то с этими - нет. Они ориентированы на свой скилл, и стартовых 100-120 им не будет хватать: вратари будут пропускать почти все удары от хороших (даже не топ) напов, напы - не будут забивать, защитники - не будут отбирать. В такой бы ситуации помогла бы аренда в первую-вторую лигу, чтобы молодое дарование там развивалось. Но пока что приходится покупать уже почти/полностью готовых игроков стартовой обоймы.
2) Игрок (человек) не может использовать "прорыв" флангового напа, если в конечной клетке в штрафной находится свой игрок. Ну ок, я могу понять. Но буквально вчера я увидел, что ИИ может сделать прорыв при таких обстоятельствах (игроки поменяются местами). Это приколы максимальной сложности, или просто дисбаланс?
3) Не знаю, каким лешим это появилось во втором ДЛС, ибо до этого таких проблем не помню. Практически нет ФН с обводны финтом. ВООБЩЕ. Сейчас у меня 13ый сезон, тренирую Реал, и мне нужен был ЛФН с обводным финтом (на правом фланге уже есть 2 игрока с обводкой и пушечным ударом, а слева - только с пушкой). Я прошарудил ВСЮ Европу. И нашел АЖ 5 фланговых напов с обводкой. ПЯТЬ. Это при том, что ФН с пушечным выстрелом можно найти в каждой третей команде. И прикол в том, что среди этих пяти ФН только один был ЛФН, так что мне пришлось расти своего (благо, повезло - выпал игрок без скилла, но первым на выбор была именно обводка). У меня напрашивается вопрос - что за дискриминация финтеров?)  Почему-то проблем с нахождением качественных (4-5 звезд, 170+ точность (ну или контроль, но это невероятная редкость)) НП с пушкой и обводкой нет (я таких под десяток насчитал), а с просто ФН с обводкой есть. Хотя скилл не какой-то имбалансный, просто составляет пару атакующих (для забития гола) наземных скиллов. Отчего такая проблема в рандоме - непонятно.
Как итог, могу сказать, что очень надеюсь, что в следующем ДЛС разработчики привнесут какие-то масштабные изменения в баланс, чтобы игра заиграла новыми красками и в неё снова можно было погрузиться на десятки часов. Игра и так прекрасна, но уже поднадоела. Для меня Football: Tactics&Glory - пример прекрасной индюшатины, которую рекомендую всем любителям жанра. Ну и также приятно, что девы (девелопперы) - мои соотечественники.
Надеюсь, кто-то прочитал до этих строк, а то простынка немалая получилась ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198044719739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1712, 'last_played': 1686893149}
review:
DLC 다 사야 창작마당 적용되서 실제선수 이름 들어감

게임 진짜 재밌음
선수 스킬이 어떻게 쓰면 좋은지
선수 스탯은 어느정도 중요한지 알게되고서 부터는

팀 득점전략 맞추고 상대 전략에 맞게 라인업 짤 수 있게 백업 꾸리고
그런 팀짜는 재미도 쉽고 재밌으면서 인게임은 운빨겜이라 뽕맛도 있음
스탯차이 팀 규모 차이를 뒤집는 스킬전략전술운빨

이거 과몰입해서 겜할때 빡센팀 상대로는 숨도 잘 안쉬어짐 긴장해서
겜 시작전에 어떻게 라인업을 짜서 이길까 고민하는 맛이 엄청 큼

review: К сожалению разработчики данной игры упоротые бандеровцы (к украинцам эти майдауны не имеют отношения). Помимо поднятия цен (вообще пофиг), в обсуждениях не скрывают, что всю прибыль отдают на финансирование всу. Игра на самом деле очень даже ничего, но отношение создателей не располагает к какой-либо поддержке.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155328508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 49022, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38113, 'last_played': 1709447084}
review: 50:50 decisions are ALWAYS going to the opponent
developer_response:
Hi! 

Randomness is fair both to you and AI. But it's the nature of our brain to remember unfair rolls toward us and do not remember unfair rolls toward the opponent.

We know that some players struggle with fair randomness because it might seem too harsh. Therefore, we created different RNG settings that you can choose when starting a new campaign:

- Default - fair. But players might feel that it's too harsh at times.
- Decreased - the same RNG but it rolls from 30% of the footballer's potential. Therefore, if your Accuracy is 50, you will never roll 1. The lowest roll you will make is 15. So the better is your footballer, the even higher your chances of success. Same works for the AI team though.
- Expected - skewed toward player. This RNG usually rolls better numbers for the player's team. If you feel that Default RNG is unfair for you, try Expected. It is made to be perceived as fair.

I hope that helps.
