author: {'steamid': '76561198014219099', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 285, 'playtime_forever': 1085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1085, 'last_played': 1631719066}
review: La aleatoriedad es muy injusto y puede pasar mucho hasta que te compres un buen jugador. Eso si, si por esas cosas del azar de este juego no quiere que ganes a la próxima temporada perdes el jugador por no poder pagarle.
developer_response:
Hola! El juego está hecho para ser divertido, no para frustrar a los jugadores. Por lo tanto, no hemos hecho que el juego te lleve intencionadamente a las divisiones inferiores. Cuando entiendas la mecánica del juego (habilidades, cruces, clases), verás que con tácticas inteligentes es posible ascender muy rápidamente. Hay diferentes guías en Steam que describen enfoques tácticos y estratégicos que ayudan a jugar mejor.

La aleatoriedad es justa tanto para ti como para la IA. Pero es la naturaleza de nuestro cerebro recordar las tiradas injustas hacia nosotros y no recordar las tiradas injustas hacia el oponente.

Pero sabemos que los jugadores luchan con la aleatoriedad justa. Por lo tanto, hemos creado diferentes configuraciones de RNG que puedes elegir al comenzar una nueva campaña:

- Por defecto - justo. Pero los jugadores pueden sentir que es demasiado duro a veces.
- Disminuido - el mismo RNG pero tira a partir del 30% del potencial del futbolista. Por lo tanto, si tu Precisión es 50, nunca sacarás 1. La tirada más baja que harás es 15. Así que cuanto mejor sea tu futbolista, más posibilidades de éxito tendrás.
- Esperado - inclinado hacia el jugador. Este RNG suele sacar mejores números para el equipo del jugador.

Espero que esto ayude.

Traducción realizada con la versión gratuita del traductor www.DeepL.com/Translator

author: {'steamid': '76561198301732993', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1651570905}
review: 买了这游戏有快两年了，玩了这么久连教程都没玩通，教程让做的事不知所云，仅有的提示是第一步，然后之后又不知道他要玩家干嘛，这么差劲的引导，第一次见
developer_response:
我知道教程有时可能很难，但游戏是如此深入，并且有如此多的可能性，我们希望玩家了解其中的许多可能性。

如果您在教程中失败了 3 次，则会出现箭头，显示您应该单击的位置以查看如何解决教程任务。

如果您想在没有教程的情况下玩，只需开始一个新的活动并禁用教程选项。

我希望您在我们的游戏中玩得开心。

author: {'steamid': '76561198452333792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1605488252}
review: Mobile.
developer_response:
The game is _very_ deep even though it looks like mobile on the first sight. 

When you learn the game's mechanics, you will see that the game provides a lot of tactical and strategical depth. While you are playing in Amateur league, everything is simple because the footballers are amateurs. But the higher you get, the more interesting the game gets. You will have to think strategically to build a team that can beat even significantly stronger teams.

Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198295767461', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3002, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3002, 'last_played': 1650816257}
review: Il gioco in sé è carino, anche se le meccaniche sono molto semplici e con le probabilità del tutto sballate. Grande critica è l'elevata mole degli infortuni, che rende lo sviluppo di alcuni calciatori impossibile. E' vero che questo si può mitigare con le impostazioni, ma lo trovo comunque un difetto. Bello il sistema delle classi, anche se a lungo andare ci sono dei giocatori che possono diventare divinità. Per concludere, I difetti sono più dei pregi. Bocciato!
developer_response:
Puoi leggere Footballpedia sugli infortuni (premi il piccolo punto interrogativo in alto a destra).

Se prendi in considerazione le informazioni da lì, raramente avrai lesioni. Di solito, vorresti non tenere la palla da un calciatore se c'è un avversario dietro che sta per placcare. Inoltre, cerca di non trattenere la palla dai calciatori esausti.

Spero che aiuti.

author: {'steamid': '76561198369282651', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1650963257}

author: {'steamid': '76561198047519198', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 1221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1126, 'last_played': 1650301029}
review: RNG sim
developer_response:
I regret you feel that it's an RNG sim. But when you figure out the game mechanics, you will see that like in real football, in the long run, what matters is tactics, good squad management, and the proper formation against every opponent.

Btw, there are three kinds of RNG that you can choose before starting a new campaign:
 - default: fair but most people complain about it (like in other RNG games)
 - expected: skewed toward a player so it _feels_ like it's fair
 - decreased: fair, however, its range is not from 0 to max potential but from 30% to max potential. So the stronger the footballer is, there are even higher the chances for him to win the encounter.

I hope you will play more and uncover the tactical beauty of the game.

review:
サッカーに詳しくて英語ができるのなら
（そしてシュミレーション好きなら）
まちがいなく買いだと思います。
自分は英語がまるでダメなのにがんばって90時間近くプレイしました。

ただ…やはり英語ができないと厳しいです。
攻略サイトも自分は見つけられなくて
ゲームの半分以上を理解できていません。

日本語化してもらえたらと思う作品です。

author: {'steamid': '76561197960822242', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 7158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3484, 'last_played': 1708602910}
review:
Finally a sequel to Tecmo cup! ;)
Simple but addictive. Easy to pick and play a bit. I definitely recommend getting the Manager's Journey DLC (and not creating your own team). There's a very cool balancing act to meet the short term expectations of the board to not get fired, but to still make improvements to team long term.

Though don't start with all countries or processing times will be atrocious!

note. the developer is from Ukraine, pay respect to them. Buy the game and its DLC:s!

review: Velice zábavná hra, odlišná od ostatních fotbalových manažerů. Kombinuje klasické věci známé ze série FM (řízení týmu, financí, taktiky, prodeje/nákupy hráčů) s vlastním tahovým hraním, u kterého je třeba rozhodně přemýšlet a zároveň tu hraje i svou roli náhoda (takže vlastně jako ve fotbale...). Doporučuji všem fanouškům fotbalových her, ale i těm co mají rádi přemýšlivé tahovky.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009079999', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 182, 'playtime_forever': 43135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41578, 'last_played': 1662060324}
review:
[b]Football, Tactics & Glory[/b] (FTG) ist mit den neuartigen Spielelementen im Fußball-Manager-Segment recht einzigartig aufgestellt, ohne dabei den Anschluss an herkömmliche Fußball-Manager zu verlieren. Schließlich gilt es seinen Club zur Meisterschaft zu führen oder aus vom Abstiegsstrudel fernzuhalten. Emotionen sind also unser Begleiter, dafür lieben wir Fußball & das bietet FTG reichlich. Dabei gestaltet sich der Club-Aufbau sowohl über finanzielle Mittel & Punkte. Die Punkte müssen durch Erfolge mit der Mannschaft zunächst erspielt werden. Dann sind weitere Investitionen in den Verein möglich. Die Jugendarbeit, die Scout-Abteilung, der medizinische & sportliche Bereich uvm. lassen sich so weiter entwickeln. Spieler lassen sich zusätzlich mit Rollenspiel-Elementen spezifisch entwickeln. Fußballspiele lassen sich simulieren (was schnelle Saisons ermöglicht!) oder in einem rundenbasierten taktischen Fußballspiel selbst steuern. Dazu werden den Spielern Spielzüge zugeteilt, die je nach entwickelter Eigenschaft dem Fußballspieler taktische Möglichkeiten bieten.
Da im Spiel die die Vereins- & Spielernamen nicht lizensiert sind, lässt sich über den Workshop so ziemlich jede Liga finden, die dein Herz begehrt. Sofern du nicht fündig wirst, bietet der FTG-Editor umfangreiche Gestaltungmöglichkeiten im Ligasystem & Spielerindividualisierung. 
Dank an das Creoteam, deren Unterstützung ich mit der Rettung meiner Workshop-Datei erfahren habe, das Team hilft & unterstützt. Einzigartiger & empfehlenswerter Fußball-Manager mit Suchtgefahr!

Weitere knackige Reviews findet ihr hier: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/2028714-N.I.C.E.-Now-In-Call-Extreme-Public/]NICE-REVIEWS[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561199045113739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4557, 'last_played': 1706368096}
review: Excelente juego de fútbol, lo recomiendo. Permite entrenar jugadores, comprar, vender, hacer mejoras en el club, cambiar las tácticas. Si bien no es un juego que permita manejar los jugadores al estilo del FIFA, si permite guiar las desiciones de los jugadores. El concepto de juego por turnos puede ser algo confuso, creo que es algo en contra que tiene el juego, pero de todas maneras me resulta muy divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099731325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1699175299}
review: Здесь, как и во многих пошаговых тактиках с процентным шансом на попадание, успех слишком зависит от удачи, в гораздо большей мере нежели от твоего планирования и продуманности ходов. В итоге львиная доля геймплея превращается в сплошную случайность, где любое планирование и продуманные ходы нивелируются неудачно для тебя упавшим внутриигровым кубиком. В итоге игра превращается из удовольствия и отдыха в неприятную и наскучивающую рутину. Впрочем, это проблема не самой игры, а жанра в целом. Концепция самой игры то хорошая.
developer_response:
Жаль, что показалось, что удача играет решающее значение. Но по факту это не так.

Когда вы лучше поймете, как работают разные механики, как работают навыки, как использовать особенности классов футболистов, как можно по-разному использовать комбинации классов-параметров-навыков в разных игровых ситуациях, вы откроете игру для себя по-новому.

Если бы удача играла ключевое значение, то более слабая команда не смогла бы стабильно выигрывать у более сильных команд. Однако в нашей игре ключевой является тактика. Удача играет немалую роль, как и в реальной жизни, но на долгой дистанции при грамотной игре роль удачи можно значительно уменьшить. 

Здесь, например, я давал ссылку на видео прохождение (на английском) очень опытного игрока на сложном режиме. В этом режиме играть значительно сложнее, чем на обычном. Но благодаря тактике он смог продвинуться в Третью лигу всего со второго сезона: https://steamcommunity.com/games/375530/announcements/detail/3059626550260712887

Надеюсь, вы уделите больше времени игре, и она для вас откроется с другой стороны.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032170134', 'num_games_owned': 1096, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 8673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4618, 'last_played': 1702172301}
review:
太好玩了！
目前刚玩到乙级，一开始喜欢强力前锋突破，现在喜欢头球战术。
贴一下个人笔记，供低等级参考：

主力：

1GK
1SW
2CD
1DF
1DM
1MF
1CM
1AM+L/RM
1FW
1CF
1 other

替补：
1GK？似乎不需要，目前还未遇到门将受伤情况，但看到过对手门将受伤
1SW
1CD
1DM
2CM
1AM+L/RM
1FW
1CF

以下，攻击/传球/防守/控球后面的数字表示重要程度，0-5，0表示这个属性越低越好，5表示越高越好，其他数字以此类推。

GK：门神防重炮，神反应防脚跟挑球，出击防传中和角球旋门
在CD重视空霸的情况下，首选神反应，次选门神
攻击1，传球1，防守5，控球0

SW：长传，便于出球
攻击0，传球0，防守5，控球0

CD：空霸，防头球，定位球进攻（队中至少两个，首发至少1个）
攻击0，传球3，防守5，控球3

DF：空霸+神反应
攻击0，传球3，防守5，控球3

L/RD：不知道有什么用

DM：抢断高手
攻击0，传球3，防守5，控球4

MF：铲球+长传，直传
攻击0，传球5，防守0，控球5

CM:直传，长传，穿裆过人
攻击0，传球5，防守2，控球4

AM+L/RM：长传，直传
攻击0，传球5，防守0，控球5


L/RF:不知道有什么用

FW：脚跟挑球+穿裆过人，重炮
攻击5，传球0，防守0，控球5

CF：空霸
攻击3，传球0，防守5，控球0

author: {'steamid': '76561198352917766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1643860741}
review:
별5개 만점에 3개

<< 장점 >>
체스두듯이 축구를 할 수 있다는 점이 신선하면서 재밌음.
육성도 너무 무겁지 않게 가볍고 재밌게 즐길 수 있음.

<< 단점 >>
팀이 약하면 턴제축구고 나발이고 못이기기 때문에 선수진을 강화해야하는데 이 과정이 너무 오래걸려서 결국 경기는 자동으로 돌리면서 육성에 치중해야 하는 시기가 온다.
즉, 원치 않게 턴제축구는 팽개치고 육성, 경영겜을 하고 있는 셈.


<< 개선할 점 >>

1. 육성 요소가 없는, 월드컵이나 스토리모드 같은 아예 정해진 선수들 데리고 쭉 깨나가는 모드가 있어서 턴제축구를 집중적으로 즐길 수 있게 한다.

2. 경기 출전하지 않고 훈련만 받는 선수들도 경험치를 충분히 받을 수 있어야 한다. 지금은 누가봐도 자격미달인데 키우기 위해서 억지로 꾸준히 경기를 출전시켜야 한다. 안 그러면 선수 양육 자체가 불가능함.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082955797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 14457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10827, 'last_played': 1705503459}
review:
Nem XCOM-hoz, hanem inkább sakkhoz, gombfocihoz hasonlítanám, körönként 3 akciód van, ezt speciális képességek alkalmazásával (esernyőcsel, kiugratás, hosszú passz) lehet növelni. Ajánlott módban 48 akció van az egész meccsen, ez nagyon kevés ahhoz, hogy a csapat felfejlődjön támadni, visszaálljon védekezni, inkább 1-2 játékosos partizánakciókkal lehet operálni. A meccsek legfontosabb része az ellenfél feltérképezése, felállás, stratégia kitalálása.  Maguk a meccsek viszonylag sematikusak,  2-3, a csapathoz illő támadás variációt kell erőltetni, az AI is ezt teszi.  Nagyon valósághű, ahogy a játékosok fáradnak meccs közben, érdemes rotálni őket, ha több fronton is küzd a csapat és külön izgalom, hogy lesérül-e játékosod (akár több hónapra is!).  
Bár a foci alapvető elemei hiányoznak a játékból (letámadás, körbeadogatás, kényszerítő) mégis meglepően vissza tudja adni egy meccs hangulatát.  Plusz pont a készítőknek, hogy a random generátor állítható valószínűtlen esetek kizárására. 
Ajánlom azoknak, akik szeretnek elmélyülni egy játékban és szeretik a taktikai játékokat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004613667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 19393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1207, 'playtime_at_review': 1936, 'last_played': 1712432994}
review:
Da habe ich ein absolutes Meisterwerk entdeckt. Ich hatte das Spiel lange auf der Watchlist, aber Lothar Matthäus schreckte mich irgendwie ab. Und natürlich ist man von anderen Managerspielen Originalnamen (es gibt Usercontent mit Originalnamen und Wappen) gewohnt. Das ist hier ist allerdings kein Managerspiel, sondern eher ein rundenbasiertes Strategiespiel. Man erobert oder besiedelt nicht unbekannte Welten, sondern versucht mit taktischen Kniffen auf dem Fußballfeld zu bestehen. Allerdings weniger taktische Kniffe ob ich Messi oder Neymar spielen lasse, sondern wie "entwickle" ich Spieler. Möchte ich einen neuen Fanliebling aufbauen, was gut für die Finanzen ist oder brauche ich in drei Jahren einen neuen Rechtsverteidiger und baue einen jungen Spieler auf dieser Position auf.
Das Tutorial ist sehr smart ins Spiel integriert und bringt einen die Basics gut bei. Bei Fragen gibt eine Footballopedia und auch das Forum ist sehr hilfsbereit. Das Spiel ist in der Vanillaversion sehr übersichtlich gehalten was am Anfang den Spielspaß enorm erhöht und den Einstieg erleichtert. Man lernt Spiel für Spiel und langsam fallen die Würfel in Sachen taktischer Entwicklung. Eine Saison dauert besondern im unterstem Ligenlevel, wo man einsteigt, nicht ewig. Man muß nicht unbedingt die-hard Fußballfan sein, um das Spiel zu mögen. Klare Empfehlung! 
(spiele gerade mit dem Workshop-Content norwegische Liga - und auch das läuft perfekt)

author: {'steamid': '76561198266052680', 'num_games_owned': 736, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1642013170}
review: Знатная трата времени
developer_response:
Могу предположить, что в первые 40 минут создалось впечатление, что игра очень простая.

На самом деле, это довольно глубокая тактическая стратегия, которая позволяет побеждать значительно более сильных противников благодаря грамотной тактике, подготовке к матчу и подбору исполнителей. Надеюсь, вы поиграете, разберетесь в механиках и получите удовольствие от игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198859348403', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1651808943}
review: за что такие бабки то блядь?
developer_response:
Игра довольно глубокая, и можна находить новые подходы и тактики даже наиграв 100 часов. В самом начале может показаться, что просто кликаешь да бьешь по воротам. Но постепенно игра обучает все более новым возможностям, противники становятся все сложнее, нужно под каждого подстраиваться, искать тактики, строить команду и т.д.

Понимая игровые механики и правильно выстроив команду, можно тактически побеждать противников значительно сильнее тебя. И при всем при этом нет бесконечных таблиц, миллиона циферок, кучи окошек и т.д. Все взаимодействия простые, но выстроены так, чтобы создать глубокую стратегическую игру.

Надеюсь, вы еще поиграете, больше вникнете и получите удовольствие от игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087797897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 14786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9071, 'last_played': 1694278346}
review:
Szerintem szórakoztató játék, szimulációval és körökre osztott játékmenettel. Jó logikai megoldásokkal. Szinte bármi testre szabható és nem csak a saját csapatban hanem a teljes játékban. Csapat név, mez és címer. Futballisták nevei, arca. Időjárás stb... Ha szereted a logikai és menedzser játékokat, vagy ezek kombinációját, akkor ez neked való :-)

A meccseket lehet játszani körökre osztva, vagy nézheted ahogy a program játszik, esetleg gyors szimulációt is választhatsz. Megadhatod a kezdő játékosokat és azok pozícióját ezzel együtt a posztját. A játékosok a meccsek során folyamatosan gyűjtenek tapasztalatot, amelyekből fejlesztheted készségeiket. Az átigazolási időszakban vehetsz és eladhatsz játékosokat. Persze a cél a csúcsra jutni :-)

Az alapjáték mellé ajánlom a "Football, Tactics & Glory: Football Stars" kiegésszítöt (DLC-t), mert így lesz igazán élvezhető a játék.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344164915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 1519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1642254111}

author: {'steamid': '76561199034758502', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 23995, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20889, 'last_played': 1642366871}
review:
О, я в восторге, 10 Лестеров из 10. Это при том, что я вообще не люблю и не смотрю футбол.

Идея шикарная - соединили пошаговую тактическую стратегии и спортивный менеджер, не перегрузив игру механиками. Действительно X-Com или Jagged Alliance (можно еще HoM&M с натяжкой вспомнить) - в футбольном сеттинге. 

Давно мечтал о каком-нибудь спортивном менеджере, в котором дефицит ресурсов можно будет компенсировать личным мастерством - и вот оно. Даже на самом высоком уровне сложности, если обдуманно подходить к подбору игроков и к каждому матчу - можно выигрывать значительно более сильные команды.

Большое спасибо за продолжающуюся работу над игрой - разработчики с любовью к ней относятся и периодически дорабатывают.

И, конечно, спасибо за саунд-трек. Я уже несколько сотен часов наиграл, но музыка не приелась.

review:
Its good... but the manual tactical play is very complicated by the lack of icons (with tooltips) to inform the player the exact abilities of each class. The only thing it is shown is the special skill.

And the game has so much information to learn, that you will might get tired of the game before you understand the basic abilities of each class plus other play situations that was made cryptic to grasp thanks to the poor UI.

review:
Some nice features with the math-football, but also numerous limitations.
For example players can, even with 1 in passing, pass right next to an opposing player, even in between two opposing players.
There should be a mechanic related only to the players ability unconnected to the opponent ... also needed when a bad forward shoots from far out against a bad keeper, wonderstrike is likely, but makes no logical sense.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020838155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 9857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8918, 'last_played': 1679038350}
review:
Pretty darn good game for what it is.  Good AI, solid replayability, decent music, easy to pick up, good manager & gameplay strategy depth.

Main issues are just a couple things:
-English not the first language of the game makers.  It's not horribly obvious, but it's a thing you notice every once in awhile.  Always bothers me in a game, your translator for a game should always be a native speaker who speaks your language second, not the other way around.
-Every single season I score half as many goals and let in half as many goals as every other team in the league, and it is really hard to score.  More forwards doesn't help, more midfielders doesn't help.  Higher Acc forwards doesn't help.  75% of my goals happen on 4 tiles outside the box, and it is near impossible to get anyone into that position or inside the box more than once or twice a game because of how the AI sets up defensively.  I can't even make it into the 2nd to highest league with most of my restarts.  You basically have a team that just crosses into the box 100% of the time, or you are stuck scoring 1 goal max per game in any league outside of the Amateur League.
-Ai teams vs AI teams always beat the team that is lower rated than they are, there are no upsets that I've seen.

I think most of the issues with the game that I have are resultant from the fact that you must have to play like 20+ seasons or something to advance to the highest leagues.  So that's a plus or minus depending on what you're looking to get out of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043272952', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 757, 'last_played': 1654159831}
review: Franchement un super jeu de simulation/gestion, qui n'a rien a envier a son homologue football manager....et même pour ma part je le trouve meilleur, tout dans ce jeu est plaisant, déjà l'interface bien que complète est simple a utiliser et bien pensée, pour ce qui est de la gestion j'aime aussi sa simplicité mais malgré tout très complète aussi, on n'a pas ce coté usine a gaz de son rival ( et pour moi bien que je soit conscient qu'il y a des personnes qui apprécient ) c'est un des gros points fort du présent jeu....et que dire des animations j'adore. Tout est pensé dans ce jeu pour alléger le coté lourd et pesant de la gestion d'un Football Manager et c'est vraiment une aubaine pour moi. Désormais exit Football Manager, Football, Tactics & Glory devient mon jeu de simulation Footballistique. Merci aux Devs d avoir sorti un jeu pareil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012423340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 8867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8867, 'last_played': 1628915033}
review:
In Conclusion, 
Make sure to check the starting rules, and set RNG to Default or Decreased. Playing with Expected RNG, feels like cheating, even if it was unintentional. You'll doubt every success, seeing it as a product of the stacked rules, rather than a personal success. Otherwise, this twist on the classic sport management sim, Football, Tactics & Glory, does not disappoint. It satisfied my desire for a board game/video game fusion. It offered good systems for a first attempt. Yet it would be negligent to pretend it doesn't lack in a number of areas. Creoteam knows this.

In 2020 they released an expansion, Football, Tactics, & Glory: Football Stars. It expands stats, differentiates characters, adds complexity to the many simple systems (economy, trading, club improvements), and improves visual effects. This list is a perfect catalog of criticisms I have with the base game. The developer knows exactly where the flaws of the game lie, and they want customers to pay another fifteen dollars to fix them.

While Creoteam succeeded in their goal of merging turn-based tactics with sports management, they only offer the pinnacle of the sport to season ticket holders. 

[url=https://awkwardmixture.blogspot.com/2021/07/football-tactics-glory-from-stardom-to.html]  Football, Tactics & Glory: From Stardom to the Sidelines and Back [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198062779530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 4359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3649, 'last_played': 1667127677}
review:
Che dire, erano anni che lo tenevo nella lista desideri ma alcune recensioni negative mi spingevano sempre a rimandare l'acquisto finché, vittima di noia e per via del deludente Efootball 2022, ne ho approfittato durante gli sconti.
Il gioco, a difficoltà normale, è davvero ostico e duro, molto punitivo, dopo 3/4 stagioni potrebbe capitare che sarete ancora in Serie C dopo le passeggiate in Serie D e Eccellenza.
Questo potrebbe scoraggiare i giocatori meno pazienti, che pensano di portare i loro giocatori più forti fino alla serie A, ma che prima o poi dovranno vendere per poter comprarne altri.
C'è da mettere in conto anche i potenziamenti delle varie strutture, come il centro medico, lo stadio, gli osservatori ecc, che più si potenzieranno e più costeranno.
Prima di iniziare una nuova partita consiglio l'acquisto del DLC Football Stars, che aumenta le meccaniche e i dettagli di gioco, dato che i giocatori avranno la meccanica del "Genio" e potrete capire subito chi è destinato a futuri luminosi e chi se arriva in Serie C deve dire grazie a voi.
Consigliato per gli amanti del calcio, gli amanti dei tattici a turni e, forse, dei souls XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198095698745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 7437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2130, 'last_played': 1652982072}
review:
Отличная игра!
По картинкам и видео с трудом представляешь как в это играть. Но начав - затягивает.
Долго игра висела в списке желаемого. Но так как люблю футбол, тактические и стратегические игры, то решил взять на осенней распродаже. 
Игра понравилась. Однозначно рекомендую. А учитывая, что разработчики из постсоветского пространства, то тем более не жаль потраченных средств. Ребята, так держать ✌
Хотелось бы отметить и музыкальное сопровождение. Например, песня из трейлера огонь ♬
P.S. У меня, почему-то, возникла ассоциация с игрой Kicks online ⚽

review:
A fun little game if the load times weren't absurd. I've seen mention in the dev note that this can be fixed, but no clear directions on how to.

UPDATE: The developer has responded with the fix I mentioned, but I still see no way to reduce the simulated countries or any link to an explanation of how to.
developer_response:
You can reduce the number of simulated countries before starting a new campaign. It will greatly reduce the loading times.

Have fun!

Here's how to do that: https://steamcommunity.com/app/375530/discussions/0/4577340984550762827/

author: {'steamid': '76561198007938337', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 29158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15289, 'last_played': 1704741252}
review:
Дополнение норм. Появилась интрига в игре. Но игровой процесс остался таким же как и был.
Игра заточена в "одни ворота". Количество случайностей(80%) в пользу ИИ просто зашкаливает, при обычном режиме. Игра не приносит удовольствие, а только раздражение. А если игра раздражает, значит это плохая игра. В этой игре практически от геймера ничего не зависит. Можно только нажимать кнопочки,  ну и продавать и покупать игроков . А результаты матчей зависят от того как комп. сам с собой сыграет.
Что за хрень. Что за антироссийская реклама. Европейские ублюдки. Ни копейки больше в стим не вложу.
developer_response:
Игра зависит от ваших решений. Игроки, которые научились играть, выигрывают 5-звездочные команды, хотя у самих команды имеют 3 или 3.5 звезд. Если вы понимаете игровые механики, то понимаете, что у вас достаточно тактических инструментов, чтобы добиться превосходства над противниками. Конечно, не малую роль также играет правильный подбор футболистов. Причем, важны не уровень или количество звезд футболистов, а правильные классы, правильное их расположение в каждом матче. Нужно подстраиваться под каждого противника.

Например, в этой серии видео игрок показывает, как он использует все возможные тактические инструменты, чтобы играть на Сложном режиме, и при этом за 2 года с нулевой командой выходит в следующую лигу: https://youtu.be/lrGIi7fIhXc (на английском, но по видеоряду можно многое понять).

Если вас не устраивает рандом "по-умолчанию", вы можете перед началом кампании выбрать рандом "Ожидаемый", который воспринимается, будто честный, но на самом деле немного подыгрывает игроку.

Надеюсь, вы еще поиграете и получите удовольствие от игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293690185', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1413, 'last_played': 1701087861}
review: 非常惊喜的游戏，没想到足球竟然能做成回合制的，而且还很有策略性，能模拟各种足球战术，非常好玩（感觉比FM好玩）。耦合在游戏流程中的分步的教程做的非常好，可以逐步加深对游戏机制的理解。

author: {'steamid': '76561198228872180', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1503, 'last_played': 1671628016}
review: Я честно говоря не знаю как выигрывать , в один момент это стало просто невозможно , обладая очень сильной молодёжью, по статам превосходящим игроков соперника , тремя нападающими в том числе просто мяч не идёт , кайф от игры получил конечно , но когда почувствовал деградацию в турнирной таблице с каждым сезоном немного разочаровался в потраченном времени . На счёт длс могу сказать , что сделано достаточно балансно , интересно . У игры очень удобный дизайн и интерфейс , хорошая локализация , внутриигровая экономика тоже на уровне . Заметил пару ненужных перков , которые так ни разу и не вкачал . Игра может послужить хорошей "разминкой" перед FM-ом.  Хочется сказать спасибо разработчикам , что не перестают заниматься своим проектом , надеюсь со временем игра будет становится всё лучше и лучше , теперь я ваш фанат , big love!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198091189494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 9705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5216, 'last_played': 1680553871}
review:
Good casual football game ! At first i bought the game because I like the idea of helping developpers facing FM. And then I liked the game because it is fun and it is different from FM. Easy during the first seasons in the lowest divisions, it becomes more challenging in the best one. Evolving your team by selling and then buying better players is really important (don't get attached to them). BTW if the mechanics to play a match seems too hard  at one point then just let the AI play or just watch the highlights as texts (like FM in the old days). 
P.S : if one of you want to gift me the Manager expansion, then feel free to oblige :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197999059064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1698581006}
review:
This is surely the biggest surprise on Steam in years!!! Lovely little gem. 
Do not get discouraged by the tacky title and the cover. This game is polished, fun, addictive and most of all - it has the most important trait of the genre i.e. it is “easy to learn, hard to master”.
It is indeed a mixture of XCOM and Football Manager but at the same time with a much lower entry barrier. It does not mean it is not complex. It is and can be quite demanding. But is much easier to learn and follow.
Totally recommend for any football and turn-based strategy fan. I like that you can jump in for one match while drinking coffee. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198009364677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 13152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6944, 'last_played': 1670690071}
review:
Football, Tactics & Glory — отличный пример того, что даже самая смелая концепция имеет шансы на успех, если подойти к делу с должным старанием. Пошаговый футбол получился весьма неплохим вариантом время препровождения: для победы на поле приходится тщательно раздумывать над каждым ходом, а менеджмент клуба дарит ощущение работы настоящего футбольного тренера, ведущего свою команду к славе.

Плюсы: низкий порог вхождения; за внешней простотой скрывается богатый на возможности геймплей; симпатичный и удобный интерфейс.

Минусы: не хватает журнала событий во время матча; долгий розыгрыш стандартных положений.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006734457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 17539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1701374737}
review: Massively punished for losing games.  Avoid
developer_response:
I regret to hear that.

The game doesn't have any problems with saving process. However, if your Steam cloud is full (or if it "thinks" by some reason that your new save is older than the one that is in the cloud) it rewrites the new save right after you quit the game.

Try to disable Steam Cloud, play several games and check out if the saving progress is kept.

I hope you will continue having fun with FTG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092029222', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 20915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16803, 'last_played': 1668373296}
review: Alright let me start out by saying I do like this game hence the 280 hours. The game does a really great job at valuing the players time yet doesn't sacrifice much in terms of game play, as the strategy has a good amount of depth to it and the overall management of the team is quite fun. That being said the game has two expansions which in my opinion are essential to flesh out the game, which is fine I think they had a ton of value but I'd wait to get them on sale. Here is where my gripe comes in, the last expansion "Manager's Journey" is really neat as it adds some great features including the risk of getting fired for poor management, which is nice because I was looking forward to immersing myself into the role. The club sets a goal (finish above last place is the league for example) for you to achieve in an allocated amount of time and from what I can tell the contracts can only range from 1-3 years which I think there should at least be a maximum of 4 years but it seems like I only get offered 1 year contracts anyways. My biggest complaint is that for the goal of the club you can either complete it, have a satisfactory performance or an unacceptable performance and many times now I have been fired by my club for having a satisfactory performance even though I finish the season with like 50% happiness which I find to be BS. Now this could just as well be a positive review and perhaps this is going to be skewed to a smaller percentage of players as I play on the hardest difficulty as well as the highest stress level (the new difficulty factor involving how happy of unhappy the club is based your results as a manager.) I do understand that playing on the highest stress level should mean I get fired easier but why the hell is it called a satisfactory performance if I get fired every time. Also another point I find mildly annoying is that if you start a club from scratch like how the vanilla game use to be then it seems like from what I can tell there is no way to get fired even if you have the highest stress level on and intentionally try to fail the goal, I want to be able to start a club from scratch whilst still having the risk factor of getting fired.
developer_response:
I just want to point out that there is a difference between being fired (you can't ask the management to continue the contract) and contract ending (when you can persuade the management to continue the contract).

Usually, if you achieve satisfactory performance, you are not fired. 50% mood means that there is a penalty but you can persuade the management to work with you.

However, if you play on Hard with Very Strict management, the penalties for bad mood (50%) are very high. The cost of prolonging the contract is very high as well. Reaching satisfactory performance gives you chances to not be fired and decreased the penalty. But the management hired you to achieve their goal, not reach the satisfactory performance. Especially on all the hardest settings available. They are made for those players who understand that they will be penalized heavily for not achieving what the club expect them to achieve.

I strongly recommend playing with Adequate management settings because in this case, all the penalties better reflect real life and are just better in terms of game balance. As a developer of this game, I prefer to play with this option because it's fair (and is still challenging). 

I hope you will reconsider your review after reading that information.
Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197992874418', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 7273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7120, 'last_played': 1638621638}
review:
[h1]最高のサッカークラブ運営ゲーム！[/h1]

同ジャンルのゲームでは、これまでfootball manager やサカつくなど様々なゲームをやってきたが、サッカーの試合の楽しさと、選手育成の楽しさ、クラブ運営の醍醐味という意味では、個人的にはこのゲームが最もバランスが取れていると思う。

プレイ100時間を超えてなお、新たな発見・気づきがある奥の深いゲーム。

本作でまず目につくのは独特な試合画面だろう。
「Ｘ-ｃｏｍ」風のターン制ストラテジーとなっており、これが将棋やチェスのようで面白い。

また本作はいろいろな意味で成長要素が色濃く、ユースアカデミーへの投資などをはじめとして、結構苦労して選手の能力やスキルをちまちま育てるのだが、この作業が非常に楽しい。

そして、育てた選手を用いて試合に臨む際にも、各々の試合前に対戦相手のフォーメーションや選手の能力をチェックし、先発メンバーや布陣・作戦の検討に頭を悩ませることになるのだが、これがまた、たまらなく楽しい。

ターン制サッカーと聞いて「展開が遅いし、つまらないのでは」と思う方もいるかもしれないが（自分も最初はそうだった）、一度経験すれば皆面白さがわかると思う。Ｘ－ｃｏｍと同様、ある程度はランダム要素も絡むし、対戦相手とのスキル効果の相性の良し悪しなども考察せねばならず、毎試合が異なる展開になるため、飽きがこない。

クラブ運営に関しても、スタジアム、ユースアカデミー、スカウト、ポジション毎のコーチ陣への投資の優先順位をどうするか、また人材市場を通じた選手の売買のタイミングや内容によって、クラブの成熟度や経済状況も様々に変化するのが、たいへん興味深い。
かといって「数字の羅列だけのゲーム」にならぬよう、ビジュアライズの工夫もなされている点も好印象である。

世の中には、マイクロマネジメント的な数値イジリが主体のスポーツクラブ運営ゲームが氾濫しているが、それだと「リアルさ」と引き換えに「遊ぶ楽しさ」が半減してしまう。
その点、本作は非常にバランスが取れていると言えるだろう。

また、開発者によるアップデートがいまだ頻繁に行われており、さらにDLCが昨年・今年で合計2本、発売されている。
このうち1本目のfootball starsは、出来れば最初からセットで購入すべきと思える優秀なものであり、同DLC導入によってさまざまな要素が追加される。

例えば、選手の能力値に、新たに潜在能力ポテンシャルを表すgiftedness（天賦の才とでもいうべきか）が新設される。これによって、ユース卒業直後のズブシロ新人でレベルの低い選手でも、能力ポテンシャルによっては市場で高値が付いたり、レベル成長の上限が高くなるといったことも生じてくる。
他にもクラブの各種アップグレードの種類が追加されたり、クラブスタッツ分析が大幅強化されたり、などなど非常に有益なＤＬＣであり、是非導入をおススメしたい。

一方、2本目ＤＬＣのmanager's journeyは2021年11月上旬に発売されたばかりだが、主人公自身が監督として成長するにつれて、世界各国の強いクラブから求められて次々とクラブを渡り歩くという設定となっている。
そのため、世界各地のリーグの全チームを全てシミュレートするものとなっているが、現状デフォルト設定では、シミュ時間があまりに膨大であり、それゆえ今のところ評判は芳しくない。ただ計算対象国は設定で減らせるし、早晩プログラム改修されるだろうとは思うが。

色々書いたが、このゲーム本編は、本当に大変面白いゲームなので、興味があれば是非やってみて欲しい。
なお出来れば、ＤＬＣ1本目のfootball starsを同時に購入されることをおススメしたい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198365393418', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 32774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2661, 'last_played': 1711107091}
review:
В принципе, игра хорошая, мне нравится, сам задумывался о том, что не хватает подобной игры (пошагового футбола), чтобы развлечься на слабеньком компе, который не тянет фифу или пса. Интересен режим менеджера. Достаточно простой, но эффективный и интересный.
Что хотелось бы улучшить (надеюсь, разработчики читают):
1) Замены. Игра останавливается очень редко и реально замену можно сделать только в перерыве между таймами. Ну или когда кто-то забивает гол. Бывает, что за тайм вообще ни одной остановки игры. Это не реалистично. Хотелось бы иметь возможность делать замены чаще.
2) Угловые. Мне не нравится, что при защите я не могу изменить позиции своих защитников в штрафной (например, поставить защитника с умением играть головой против нападающего с аналогичным перком). Неправильно это.
3) Система трансферов тут 2 момента:
3.1. - Нет системы аренд. Это большой минус. Во-первых, не соответствует реальности, во-вторых, не дает возможность развивать молодняк в низших лигах
3.2. - Работа с трансферами. Здесь бесит, что ты заплатил денег за скаутский отчет и после закрытия окна все наработки сгорают. Если мне не хватило денег на какого-то игрока, то все, жди следующего окна и начинай по новой: плати деньги за  отчет скаута и выиискивай в нем нужного игрока вместо того, чтобы поднакопить деньжат и купить тех, кого присмотрел ранее
В остальном игра нравится, к покупке советую, надеюсь на дальнейшее развитие проекта

author: {'steamid': '76561198042527556', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2337, 'last_played': 1695287767}
review:
Cute graphics and fun to play. Gotta do something about "action succes mechanics". Its EXTREMELY inbalanced. The failure of this inbalance cant be explained by just pure bad luck. It seems that odds never favor you. Its frustrating to lose your action with a roll of 49 aganist 10 EVERY SINGLE TIME and i mean EVERY SINGLE TIME.

Loading screens take forever and the game has 3 (three) loading screens at the end of each match...Consecutively... Plus another in-game weekly loading screen... Plus pre-season and mid-season loading screens for each season...which takes even more time to load than regular loading screens

Now, i checked my pc specs and game requirements to see if my PC was to blame for this excruciating waiting sessions...it isnt.

Very good idea to combine the two concepts but its far from being done. This game will be more fun to play when these issues are adressed and resolved.
developer_response:
Thanks for the positive review!

Here are some tips that might help you to have more fun from the game:

1) When you start a new campaign, you can reduce the number of countries that are simulated. Or you can disable simulating lower leagues for most of the countries so the simulation goes significantly faster.

2) RNG is fair both for you and AI. However, people have a confirmation bias that makes them remember only "unfair" rolls while forgetting or unnoticing the rolls that were unfairly in their favour. For example, if you look on youtube at how experienced players play, you can see that the rolls are random.

But also, we created an RNG that plays a bit in the player's favour. We called it "Expected" (because while they generate numbers slightly in the player's favour, most new players feel that that is a true random).

You can start a new campaign and choose this RNG.

Hope you will continue having fun by playing FTG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080878480', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 43109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10398, 'last_played': 1710174399}
review:
Jogo muito legal. Uma mistura de Xadrez, XCOM, Summoner Wars, Football Manager... Ele é difícil e tem uma curva de aprendizado muito longa e interessante. Quando tu acha que aprendeu o jogo o teu time sobe de divisão e apanha dos jogadores melhores com táticas muito mais complexas. Cada divisão do campeonato é um aprendizado diferente.
Os criadores do jogo são muito atenciosos e atualizam o game frequentemente. Eu gostaria que tivesse mais coisas no jogo e atualizações ainda mais profundas, mas o jogo e suas expansões já oferecem bastante diversão.
A customização do jogo é daora e tirando algumas limitações e errinhos é outra característica interessantíssima. Perco mais tempo criando times e arrumando ligas do que jogando, o que não deixa de ser super daora

author: {'steamid': '76561197968770053', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2064, 'last_played': 1638070014}
review:
一些小技巧分享给大家。
1.球探没有用不要升级，球探只增加私人转会名单，而升级球探会加大升级教练的难度，所以需要转会直接花钱去总榜招就好了，总榜每次会随机13-18名球员，年纪最低17岁。

2.升级教练：由于需要声望随着升级次数增加，而每次升级：0星+20%，1星+30%，2星+40%，3星+50%，4星+60%，所以先单升1个位置的教练更划算。可选这中场或前锋。(400%的加成同样加成在特长经验和表现加分中。）

3.位置：位置有发挥范围，全能可以在所有位置使用而专一位置的球员在非发挥位置只会使用面板属性无位置加成。按重要性排名分别是：守门员，全能前锋，前腰，清道夫，后腰，中后卫，边前卫，边锋，中锋，全能后卫。
       守门员是球门最后一道屏障，而且防守属性是1.5倍，也就是50点的防守守门算75。天赋：出击》神反应》门神。出击是唯一对付头球和内旋的技能，而对抗脚后跟可以让清道夫学习神反应，对付重炮可以用清道夫挡路。
        全能前锋有4个特长，最有用的是无球移动2格和敌方行动阶段控球+30%。无球跑可以让全能前锋直接进入禁区单独面对守门员，然后靠长传技能的中场传球直接射门。是突破同级对手和战胜强大对手的最强手段。即使是只有10点射门的菜鸡也可以用技能踢进100+守门员的大门。而把高控球的全能前锋摆在中场或者边前卫的位子可以更好的保护球权，高防守的大部分都是后卫，中场面对+30%的高控球球员很难抢断。
         前腰重要的特性分别是敌方拦截传球防守数值-60%和射门距离精度减益减半（正常距离+1，射门属性-20%,前腰-10%）。由于前腰可设置在敌方半场包括中线，所以可以在中前卫，边前卫，前腰，前锋，边锋的位置都放置，在中场位置增加传球的成功率，在锋线增加直接射门成功率，唯一缺点就是只能移动1格无法直接面对守门员，无法直接发动技能，适合以强凌弱，不太适合对付强敌。
          清道夫是守门员前最后一道防线，而且每次对方行动前都会在禁区内往球的方向移动。敌方每次进攻都需要通过清道夫，这使清道夫成了除守门员外的防守核心。而且每回合前免费移动既能快速增加位置经验，又可以免费拾取禁区内死球。
          后腰可以拦截附近2格的传球，并且自带1级拦截天赋，传球通过后腰位置后腰还会有双倍防守加成。缺点是只能在后腰位子和边后卫最外位置使用。
         中后卫可以自动拦截附近带球球员，可放置在禁区左右角免费拦截敌方进攻。
         边前卫可以移动4格，可以全场左右最外2排位置，既可以在边前卫的位置直接下底传中或射门，也可以移动到边线所有位置抢那些拖时间地方球员的球。由于是专业位置所以可以用边锋中锋前腰后腰后卫边后卫清道夫等兼任，根据敌方阵型选择上场位置。
         边锋主要是可以免费的内切过人一次，而且可以移动2格可以下底传中或直接射门。可以用来对付强敌。也可以用前腰中锋边前卫边后卫兼任。
          中锋每次进攻可以免费往球门移动一格，自带1级空霸，可以在禁区外起跑头球，看起来很强大，但由于只能移动一格大部分时间只能游离在禁区外，所以相对其他进攻球员只有头球才会发挥作用，所以一般技能都要选空霸，主要是用来对付无法战胜的强敌，也可以用备用的中后卫或清道夫兼任。
          全能后卫可以阻拦一格内的传球和射门，一般放在禁区前沿中位的位置，也可以替补后腰或清道夫，还可以根据对手阵型放置在中前卫或前腰的位置上抢断对方传球。
         

4.选择教练：由于教练效果是递增的，做好直接升到5星再升下一个教练。所以选择教练的顺序非常重要，一般来说有两条路线：
           前锋---后卫----中场----守门员。   这条路线是正常路线，先升前锋可以保证进球，而进球可以增加声望用来升级教练，正循环，走这条路线业余赛季结束基本就可以有5星前锋教练，适合每赛季努力晋级的正常游戏的玩家。
           中场---守门员---后卫---前锋。       这条路线是厚积薄发的路线。前锋可以用前腰替代，在锋线上正常射门由于前腰的射程精度减益减半，所以命中率更高，适合虐菜，而全能中场也可以移动2格，虽然没有其他特性，但勉强也可以替代全能前锋直接面对守门员。还可以锻炼出一个后腰缓解后防线压力。
               缺点是无法形成即战力，很难招到射门高的中场，只能用无位置的低级球员慢慢培养，初期获胜艰难，需要等待球队新人成型。优点是成型后传球有60%的增强，远程射门减益减半，后腰大大增强防守能力，还可以在低级联赛锻炼出一个年轻的无敌守门员。适合喜欢碾压获胜的玩家。

5.培养：非核心球员30岁以上价格会下降，34岁将无法交易，适当选择交易时机，这里提一下业余位置升专业免费升2级，获得特技大幅增加身价，进球的前锋的价格一般会更高，获得十大排名可以增加关注度从而增加身价。
             核心球员特长升级以获得经验为先，主属性获得增加可以次之，尽量更晚的选择第二位置。技能等级效果不明显。


6.球队星数是按首发球员能力总和计算的，所以一个好前锋+一个好守门员或清道夫配一群菜鸡可以拉底球队星数，对阵高于自己星数的球队不败时可以获得强敌声望（每半颗星获胜+10平+5），进球同样获得进球声望，进球最多5个或以上+15点声望，而强敌理论上差2星就是+40声望（虽然很难赢，但半星一星难度不大）。是低级联赛刷声望的简单手段。


7.游戏回合数开始是可以选择48，60，90回合的，但每回合体力消耗和获得位置经验是按行动决定的，所以是悬着48回合让主力保持好的体力持续作战还是选90回合快速提升球员位置经验从而快速成长就要玩家自己选择了。
       而敌人是不会因为没有体力而换人的，也可以用碰瓷战术消耗敌人单一位置体力以降低其能力来对抗强敌。


8.由于职业位置可以在场上很多非本职位子依然可以触发能力，所以很多意想不到的战术也是可以实现的，例如：门线前的前锋位，即可以使用全能前锋突进禁区接球直面守门员，用中锋接传中头球，也可以使用其他位置球员。前腰可以减少距离的减益，全能前卫直接带球进入禁区直面守门员。

review: I absolutely love this game!! Highly recommended for those Soccer Strategists out there, especially if you're looking for a good challenge. Not too easy to be boring, and not too hard to not be fun. Plenty of options and choices to make, but not so many to make it hard to learn. This is definitely the XCOM of the sports world. 2 thumbs up! Can't think of any complaints so far, and I'm almost 100 hours in!

author: {'steamid': '76561198008926524', 'num_games_owned': 290, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2984, 'last_played': 1637213973}
review:
Полное говно. Это не футбол ,а шахматы. ПО дебильным правилам,где один человек может всю команду обыграть.Никакого выбора сложности нет. ИИ с развода тебе в ворота мяч заносит. Играть невозможно.
 Ни за что не покупайте. Пожалеете деньги.
developer_response:
Жаль, что у вас сложилось такое впечатление, но на самом деле при грамотной тактике и хорошем подборе исполнителей вы можете обыграть значительно более сильную команду.

А то, что иногда у команды соперника может оказаться очень техничный футболист, который может обыграть всю защиту, так это и в реальной жизни может быть, и вы можете такого футболиста или вырастить за много лет или найти на трансферах.

В игре очень важно уметь пользоваться всем техническим арсеналом, который представлен. И прострелы, и навыки, и умения классов - все это объясняется в обучении, и очень важно. Например, если вы используется ЦЗ (центральных защитников), они автоматически пытаются отобрать мяч у футболиста противника, который проходит рядом (или обводит рядом стоящего напарника). При грамотном расположении ЦЗ, очень тяжело пройти такую защиту. А если еще найти (или натренировать) ЦЗ с талантом Реакция, то обводные финты против таких защитников не работают.

Надеюсь, вы приделите еще какое-то время обучению и получите удовольствие от игры. Также вы можете начать игру сразу с самой сильной командой Премьер лиги. Для этого начните кампанию в режиме песочницы и выберите эту команду. Вам будут доступны самые сильные футболисты. Однако без умения управлять командой, без знания, как использовать весь тактический арсенал, даже с сильной командой не удастся легко выигрывать. В игре очень важна тактика.

Успешной игры!

author: {'steamid': '76561198355123240', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1637197836}
review:
I've played the demo, liked it even though tutorial was a nightmare. 
Game crashes in tutorial time and there is no save. you need to play tutorial again and again. 
Even if you complete them in demo, again you need to cmplete them. so I have spent 3+ hours for tutorials - which you cannot cancel.

Edit: As developer mentioned below, there is an option to disable tutorials in preferences menu. For that, you need to quit from your campaign, and create a new save and disable the option. 
It would be the best if you finish the tutorial in demo and disable it in actual game to get best experience.
developer_response:
Don't you have an option to disable the tutorial before starting a new campaign?

Also, you can quit from the tutorial match and continue playing. If the game crashes, send me, please, report, we will investigate it. We don't have other reports about crashes after the tutorial so we would like to figure out why it crashes for you.

Here's how to make a report:
- find our support utility STEAM FOLDER\steamapps\common\Football Tactics\config.exe
- press Troubleshooting
- press Generate report
- send it to me on kos @ creoteam . com (remove spaces)

author: {'steamid': '76561198012374961', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 2586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1579, 'last_played': 1637766709}
review:
Not bad, not terrible. Definitely not XCOM meets football, like they claim and it has some logic design flaws.

pros: 
+build your own team

cons: 
-logic gameplay design flaws ((long passes that don´t get contested because opponents stand far away don´t pass as free action, so you look for contested spaces, which is utter crap if compared to real football)
-design flaws in the german cup (works completely different in reality)
-design flaw in contracts (you can sell players in their last year of contract, like it´s 1992 lol)
-better youth players come with useless talents and you can just discard them, building the youth academy leaves you less choices than without that academy (thanks, devs!)

All in all pretty crappy designed but the only turn based football game out there, so it gets a free pass on the stupid design flaws.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994748105', 'num_games_owned': 763, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 4103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3643, 'last_played': 1637699026}

author: {'steamid': '76561198293616501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 115130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21287, 'last_played': 1709420356}
review:
This game is simply class. If you want a FM game without all the spreadsheets but still deeply immersive and challenging this is for you. The learning curve is perfect as well, starting in the Conference league new player skills are slowly brought in as you progress upwards so you dont get overwhelmed. You cannot win every game with the same team and tactics. Each game is like a puzzle to solve, looking at the oppositions strength and weakness on will need to adapt your team to focus on there soft spots all the while making sure your defence is covered.
 
The graphics and sound are fab, you easily find yourself fully immersed looking for the next big transfer deal or bringing youths through your academy. Its really is one of them oh just one more game before I go yo bed so beware!! I often found myself still playing when the birds start singing in the morning.

So in closing the games is great if you like FMs but not so good for your relationships.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046504335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 23560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1664, 'last_played': 1698463216}
review:
TLDR: I bought this game less than a week ago and i already have 28 hours played. Nuff said. If you enjoy FIFA, XCOM, Fire Emblem or just watching football, play this game. Trust me.

Slightly longer review:

Ever thought "Football Manager is too dry and complicated, but FIFA's Manager Career is too simple and frustrating?" 

Boy, have you come to the right place. Creoteam bred FIFA with XCOM and added a JRPG-style job system to player positioning. The result may look like FIFA chess, and it's hard to get the hang of initially (especially when you don't know what makes a player good at a given position) but it plays like a dream. 

Its the most enjoyable sports Sim I've ever played - the dice roll system for actions simulates the randomness of "the bounce of the ball" while still giving you steadily better average results as your players improve. It feels like the inverse of XCOM in terms of dopamine hits - in XCOM, hitting a 25% shot feels pretty good, but missing a 95% one feels AWFUL and can literally ruin your 100-hour Ironman run if you're particularly unlucky. Those are the ones you remember, and it forces you to take the game SUPER slow if you want to get anywhere (without your guys getting headshot) which can be very tedious.

By contrast, FTG has so many dice rolls (usually 1 per action, 3 actions a turn, 48 actions a game) that the losses are par for the course - by rolling numbers between 1 and your stat (e.g. 50 passing) and the same for the opposition, it actively rewards you for taking big risks -  if you're a goal down in a must-win game, with 2 turns left til full-time, you have no choice but to go for the outside-the-box shot, or the crazy lob pass, because you have literally nothing to lose. Better take the power shot instead of the precision shot, even though it's less accurate, because the goalie might knock it behind instead of catching it, meaning you'll get a corner and another chance to score. Or he might knock it back in play, to your striker in front of goal, and then their defenders have to tackle him to see the game out... oh, they rolled a 3 and fouled him, now you win a penalty! And so on.

Scoring a last-minute winner feels AMAZING, and the funny little Bighead graphics make your players' celebrations really endearing - more so than the weird uncanny valley smiles of FIFA players. Graphics aren't everything! 

The games themselves are much quicker than an XCOM mission, and because you can see the chances of success for different actions, it feels like you're a lot more strategically responsible for your wins and losses than your average game of FIFA, when you're largely at the mercy of the garbage passing AI vs. the wildly inconsistent defending.

Honestly, I could go on. The brilliant tutorials and accessible manual, the ingenious resource management mechanics (seriously, simple but brilliant), the sponsor objectives... Besides a couple of issues that are largely quality-of-life - the transfer list system is not very user-friendly, for instance, and the load times are oppressive for a game this low on graphical intensity - for an indie game, I would give this game a 9/10 minimum. It does football better than most 25-year-old football franchises. EA and whoever makes FM should be embarrassed about how clunky and inaccessible their games are compared to this absolute gem. If you like tactics, football, or management sims, give this one your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171113551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1553, 'last_played': 1637401080}
review:
Very demanding game even with 'normal' difficulty. You will start with a very weak team with weak players, you will constantly face teams with 10-20 average stats higher than your players'. All those tactics taught in the tutorial are irrelevant because all of them require a decent team with players having all the required perks. You will have very little chance to put them to good use with your weak team which you start with. You will have to spend a season or two to grind experience for your team before you can apply those tactics. There is no option to start with a premier team, you will be sorted of trapped in a 'ELO hell' for a long while before you can have fun.

You can find very few guides, and videos teaching how to play this game because really very few players are playing this game. I believe the deep difficulty curve is what stops most new players from playing and learning this game.

I gave this game the second try. My conclusion is still the same. This game is for hardcore players who love to sink hundreds of hours grinding experience for the players and handle the frustration of losing. Not saying this is a bad game, I think this game could be a great game after some balancing. Just not fun at the current state.
developer_response:
I regret the game feel hard. The "Normal" mode supposed to have a challenge but it seems it is too hard :( Maybe, try an "Easy" mode.

On both Normal and Easy we give the starting team with quite strong footballers in the first season. However, on Easy mode, there are more younger footballers that can be developed for a longer time.

Also, you can use crosses from the wing, break ins with wing forwards and many other cool stuff even without skills at all. 

Maybe, this review from other player would help you: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198047683984/recommended/375530/

I hope you will return to the game and have fun.

review: 这款游戏是真的和传统意义上的足球类游戏不一样，这款游戏更加考验对足球的了解以及管理能力和策略的体现，适合足球类人群，更适合有管理层面以及战略方面的人去玩

author: {'steamid': '76561199015154748', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 18347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 841, 'last_played': 1661962023}
review:
试玩感觉比较新颖，就买了完整版包括拓展包
结果打完一场比赛读条要等1分钟……fm数据那么大也没见电脑自己比赛数据要等太久……
感觉卡着不动好浪费时间啊~
建议玩家在进行游戏的时候系统能自动缓慢进行后台数据处理，让游戏结束这一回合电脑的数据也可以同步更新出来，增加体验感……
瞬间感觉不如单单买个游戏，拓展包太不值得了！
developer_response:
您可以创建一个新的活动并删除所有不需要的国家，这样它们就不会被模拟。比如你在亚洲玩，只留下5个欧洲国家。此外，您可以取消某些亚洲国家/地区的复选框，这样他们就不能邀请您担任教练，但他们不会模拟较低级别的联赛。它可以帮助您更快地模拟游戏世界。

Demo 版本的保存并没有消失。只是有 DLC 的游戏不支持旧的保存文件，因为 DLC 增加了很多新机制。

玩得开心！

author: {'steamid': '76561199093023023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 91668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 607, 'last_played': 1705609394}

author: {'steamid': '76561199219777435', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1696683400}
review:
挂了一个多小时的机，玩了十多分钟吧，设置也看了十多分钟吧，加起来差不多半个多小时，应该有这么久吧。
弹窗一看刚好两小时，点开申请退款，一看还能退。
但是一想也不值几个钱，我又犹豫了一会儿，因为吸引度对我而言确实不大。
首先官方提供的捏脸，亚洲地区的头像，是你上古时候的爹吧，眼睛一看就不是一般人。
其次，确实不知道相比其他战棋类策略游戏它到底好在哪里。

题材？
烂大街了。
回合制？
跟不上时代。
策略？
宁可说养成吧。
养成？
这游戏不配。

最后，也许冲着BGM还不错，留个言不推荐，这亏自己吃了算了。
不过回头一想，20块钱买首歌，还必须在游戏里听，要么自己录音，又感觉不太值得。

你看吧，又纠结了。那就这样吧。
就当心情好，帮你增加点购买量了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198021734339', 'num_games_owned': 1417, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1637152577}
review: FM meets XCOM

author: {'steamid': '76561198304974309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 4786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1257, 'last_played': 1638534430}
review:
Football Manager rencontre XCOM en effet... Mais en tout petit sans les extensions. Et ça c'est un gros hic.

Ce jeu n'est en effet que la "première pierre" de ce qui semble être un jeu complet... découpé en 3 parties à l'heure où je modifie mon commentaire :
- Football Tactics & Glory
- Football Tactics & Glory : Football Stars
- Football Tactics & Glory : Manager's Journey

Cette première pierre est prometteuse.
On contrôle un club dans divers aspects (achat/vente de joueurs, amélioration des structures : stade, centre de formation, scouts et entraîneurs), on choisit quels joueurs on fait jouer où et en match on a 3 actions (avant que l'adversaire n'en ait 3 à son tour) pour utiliser les capacités de base de nos joueurs ou leurs capacités spéciales selon leur classe et leur(s) compétence(s).

L'aspect gestion est présent dès le départ : faut-il vendre ses meilleurs joueurs âgés pour préparer l'avenir ou les garder jusqu'à leur départ en retraite ? Quelle stratégie de développement du club ? Quelle orientation (classe) pour le développement des joueurs amateurs ? Et comme le développement ne se fait qu'en match, quand est-ce qu'on fait jouer les joueurs à développer par rapport aux titulaires ?
Bref, plein de questions à résoudre tout le temps.

La tactique (en match) demande du temps (perso : 30h environ) avant d'en comprendre toute les possibilités. Et donc toutes les implications sur les choix de profil des joueurs (surtout à cause des compétences à comprendre et maîtriser, pour choisir la bonne compétence et la bonne classe selon le joueur). 
Un tutoriel la première année vient nous enseigner les bases.

Mais :

- Les joueurs ont tous le même potentiel : le total de leurs 4 caractéristiques sera le même à niveau égal. Seule la répartition changera, en fonction d'un "naturel" du joueur et du focus de son entraînement, qui ne sert à rien s'il ne joue pas : seul le match fait progresser.
- La première équipe qu'on joue est bien plus forte que ce qu'on peut espérer avoir par la suite et les départs à la retraite font mal.
- Il semble y avoir des caractéristiques cachées (endurance ? qui évolue avec l'âge ?)
- On aurait envie de plein de trucs côté gestion... Qui se trouvent dans les "extensions".
- Pas de licences donc des noms aléatoires.

En résumé : ce jeu est une très bonne base, je prends beaucoup de plaisir à y jouer parce que j'aime développer un club sur des décennies et "payer pour apprendre" parce que le jeu ne m'a pas tout mâché, mais je pensais que le jeu serait encore développé... Jusqu'à ce que je comprenne qu'il l'était via "d'autres jeux" à acheter (au même prix que l'initial !) pour le compléter ! Et là j'ai quand même l'impression de m'être fait avoir.

Je recommanderais donc le jeu s'il était entier, je pourrais éventuellement recommander le trio de jeux si j'avais pu les tester, mais impossible de recommander ce jeu seul. Pas à 25 € pour un demi-jeu.

Not a lot of settings. Don't see a way to save specifically. Took me 7 games to get a goal. Typically my games, while in training, were 0:0 haha. but when I did finally goal, it was 3:0

author: {'steamid': '76561198134926092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 1201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 581, 'last_played': 1637498925}
review:
Cresci jogando ELIFOOT, mas depois perdi o interesse por "simuladores de treinador de futebol", simplesmente me cansava de assistir a mágica dos números (RGN) que são calculados por trás da tela. Abondonei o estilo de jogos por anos... Porém, um dia a steam simplesmente me mostrou o FTG e resolvi testar o demo. O que posso dizer? Finalmente encontrei um "simulador" que me colocava no comando e não apenas um "telespectador" do jogo em si. Em FTG, além das variáveis numéricas, eu participo ativamente da partida (como num Xadrez), participo da tomada de decisões etc. O FTG é o simulador que sempre quis e não sabia, aquele que você usa o cérebro antes, durante e depois de cada jogo. 

PROS
- Participar ativamente do jogo
- Muitas possibilidades e estratégias
- Oficina Steam bem ativa 
- Feito por quem entende de futebol
- Muito imersivo 
- Tutorial que é um "curso" com exercícios e exemplos 

CONS
- O jogo só é realmente bom se usado com todas as DLCs
- HUD poderia ter um design mais "elegante"
- QoL melhoradas
 

E pra finalizar, pra quem conhece Xcom, posso dizer que este jogo é o Xcom dos jogos de futebol.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960320558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1233, 'last_played': 1692305627}
review: Recommended for anyone looking for a fun and interesting mix of turn based tactics and a football themed management game. In particular I find the class system each with their different skills and talents very creative and unique.  The talents and skills reflect what you might find for each position in real life football while adding complexity to the turn based strategy. I think it's very cleverly done.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047683984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 959, 'last_played': 1638214624}
review:
Great game, mix of football and XCOM is a mostly good desription. There are a few pitfalls in the beginning, but once you know/overcome them you get on a good track. My playing experience was starting from the bottom and build up.

1. Making Money:
Make sure to sell players before they retire to make your money. Buy players cheap and build them to regular players.
Invest in Youth Academy to get better players from there and they are faster into regular play and you make your team younger. Dont buy more expensive players until you know how to make your money. With these hints you should run a proper budget.

2. Knowing game mechanics and skills on the field makes all the difference, get to know them, even this will take a little.
More details from my case: Having a stable defense + good goalie + 1,2 good skills for the forwards, got me a good start early on. Also DM seems to be a powerful position if you get or build one.

With 1 & 2 in mind you should counter many negative ratings, claiming that it is too tough, opponents too strong, youth players to weak and so on. I was a bit desperate during the first few seasons, but learning 1&2 got me on a good track and enjoying depth and details.

review:
For me a little too addictive.  

Pro: Nice development of team.
Interesting mechanics.
Cons:
Basic function of skipping started match requires DLC (it waste user time who want to check game).
After I bought DLC my old saves gone.
Sometimes micromanagment against rival teams.
Oppositions formations not changes, so counter of opposition is easier to do (AI should switch players to be harder).
Some automation for corners would be nice.
Mechanics are not well described, I still not know how opposing player go into corner and then wind my side defender.
Counter Abilities for Rainbow Feint is rare and hard to counter. This means lot of randomnes against player with this ability.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271018960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1636959816}
review:
Claiming that this is a mix between X-Com and FM, here is my thoughts: 
X-Com and FM are far from perfect but if we give them a score of 10 just as the scale,
I will give this game:
a 5 compared to X-Com
and
a 3 compared to FM.

It feels like this game wants to be both but not excelled in neither.
The Turn-based is so limited and relies too much on skills.
and NO it's not even logical compared to real football.
like, you can't cross if not on the specific area.
in FM, we have early cross option.

And, there are instances when the numbers (def, ctrl, etc) changed drastically after I left-click to confirm action.
feels more like an RNG even though I know there is a formula why it could change, but I'm not interested to learn further about it.
The Football sim side is even worse and even more limited than the TBS side. Too many limitation in transfer market, contract, and training.

and the exam sessions are so torturing.
No freedom, no creativity, no fun.
everything must be 

So yeah, I played this while free and I don't think it's worth it to spend money on, especially the DLC parts are supposed to be in the vanilla game already instead of being sold separately.

I believe I don't have thorough knowledge about this game yet (just look at my hours), but i really wanna love this game. Too bad No...... I just can't.
developer_response:
I don't persuade you to buy the game, but I saw many times that when players who liked the idea of the game went a bit further in understanding the game, they loved it. 

So I will just point out some game elements based on your feedback (maybe, they will help you to have fun).

1) The tests can be disabled at the start of the campaign (tutorial option). But I they are very important. Even if you just click through them, you will know that such game mechanics exist. It will be very useful in the future when you start to develop your team with a better understanding of how the game plays.

2) The game is _very_deep. You don't have to know everything from the start. But the rules appear to be easier than you think now. After accepting the action, only effects of the classes affect the attributes. And there aren't hard formulas. In 99% of the cases, you can ctr+hover on the footballer to see the effects. The rules are very straightforward there. 

3) We don't simulate real football with 100% accuracy, but there are different spots from which you can perform crosses. Also, the game might seem limited only at the start, when you don't know rules well enough. But later, you will see that you can combine different class effect/skills to achieve the win over stronger opponents.

4) Skills are special because we want to simulate the situation like this: imagine a talented boy who can't compete with other experienced footballers. He doesn't have enough experience, he is not very good in passing etc. But what he is great in - is feinting. His technique is awesome. That's the Rainbow Feint. The skills simulate something the footballers are very good in because they have an inner talent for these features. Also, in real football there situations in which one or another action can be better performed. As it's a turn-based game, we imagine that these footballers also put themselves in such situations when they can use their skills. So, for example, a footballer is bad in passing but he has Long Pass skill. It mean that in real football he has a very good vision of his partners, he can choose the good timing for very long precision pass. 

Well, if you decide to invest more time in the game, our community can help you it getting better in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076265119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 873, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1712386327}
review:
This review was previously negative, before receiving feedback and spending more time with the game.

A lot has changed since then, and it was for good, because the developer gave good hints on how to work around my gripes with the game, which I will explain below:

The heads-up is simple: try the Sandbox mode! Each and every issue I had with the game got resolved when I played there, because you can make it as easy or hard as you want in all fronts: whether it's currencies, players, tactics, you name it. As the name implies, your sandbox is your canvas where you can make your painting as simple or complex as you want, and it works fantastically.

Are the tutorials at the beginning too obnoxious for you? No problem! Turn them off and call it a day. No gameplay feature is tied to them and it doesn't mean you'll never be able to visit them either, because they're sitting in Footballpedia, the game's glossary/help menu, for you to go through them as much as you want, and at your own pace.

Something that still hasn't been fully fixed in my opinion is the controller support. It keeps failing, as menus keep dying on it and it's just clunky to go through all of the game's options with it, so my advice here remains: use the mouse for menus and management, and controller for the actual matches. It's not the most handy, but it's the optimal way to navigate it.

Last but not least, my suggestion is to not be afraid to delete and start as many saves as you want. The starting game's options are FUNDAMENTAL for you to have a good experience with it, and if you choose wrong you'll fight an uphill battle with little to no chance of winning since day 1. This is what happened to me (and I'll bet to most of the negative reviews as well) and I can't stress enough how much did the game change for the better when I started my third file from scratch. So keep choosing and screwing up as much as you need until you find the settings you're most comfortable with. It's actually worth it.

So yeah, the game, fun as it is, has a lot of options that could overwhelm you, and either make or break your first experience with it. But let me tell you: it gets instantly better the moment you find the right configuration for your taste. Because when it comes to ingenuity, FTG is unmatched due to its unique mix of both sports and strategy RPGs into one.
developer_response:
I appreciate the detailed feedback on the game.

While it's negative, it also shows that many things which are already in the game, are not obvious for some or many players.

I will not defend the game (because with some patience you might have a lot of fun - the game rewards figuring out how the systems work, and I saw many times the players changed their opinion after some time, invested in the game). But I'd like to make some points to let you know about some additional possibilities which are already available.

1) I don't know whether you played with DLCs or not. In any way, if you choose the team, the "unknown contact" proposes you to head, it's already significantly stronger than any other team in the league. The footballers there are quite old, so at some point, you will struggle to update your squad. But the initial team has skills and good attributes already so you easily can win any team in the league (if you understand the game mechanics). Don't neglect crosses, btw. While they might seem complex to learn, they allow you to beat stronger opponents even if you don't have other skills in the team.

2) You can disable tutorial at the creating campaign stage, so there won't be tests.

3) Normal mode is challenging - the balance is made to create some challenges which you can overcome by learning the game mechanics. It's quite easy for experienced players but might be hard for newcomers. So you might consider Easy mode which is easier in terms of money and Glory.

4) You can set up the game almost in any way you like. There are some settings on the campaign start stage (including Unlimited money). But another tool for that is very easy to use Leagues Editor. You can build your team there in the way you feel is good for you.

5) However, the easiest way to start with more money, glory, fans and a better team is to start in the Sandbox mode and choose the team which is not at the bottom. This way you can start even with the mouse powerful club in the Premier League. 

Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030893408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 57512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31711, 'last_played': 1690437313}
review:
The game is both frustrating and fun, but the fun is greater, so a grudging thumbs up on further thought. You can read my complaint below and the kind response. When a coin comes up tails 10 times in a row, one person says well that's just luck while another sees a loaded coin. Who is right? I will say that lower numbers versus higher numbers are not calculated correctly (aka 1 v 2 should be 75% to 2 but isn't) so use this to your favor and take unlikely shots on goal.

Computers cannot role dice. Oddly computers cannot come up with a truly random number as you and I can, This game I suspect has a terrible lack of what programmers call the randomize function where the code grabs a number from a registry or a space in memory that changes often then uses it to generate a quasi random number.
I tried over and over a situation where I scored, the other team didn't score and then my play holding the ball suffered along long term injury. It happened every single time in this situation no matter how many times a replayed the game. It was quite interesting but of course frustrating. I think this leads to charges that the computer cheats. I doesn't in that you will win the right number of dice rolls. They are just somehow sitting in a que in memory for certain events and will always play out the same way if the situation plays out the same way. Try to set up odd events and see if they don't always come out the exact same way. 
It is like you could somehow roll percentile dice 10 times and record the results, then rewind time and reroll the dice and they came up exactly the same every time. Of course this does answer some important questions about the illusion of free will that have been plaguing great thinkers for thousands of years. Sadly it doesn't make the game any better.
developer_response:
I regret you don't recommend our game. However, I want to make some notes on RNG or rather confirmation bias. 

We all know that computer rng is not really random and depending on how we look at that, we can "find" the confirmations of that (and at the same time, when playing a real-life tabletop game with dices that oddly roll the same number more often than others, we take it as true random; play Settlers of Catan 10-20 times to see what I mean; If I have the same rolls in the computer game, I'd call it broken).

In your example, you seem to see the pattern where there isn't one.

There is quite a high probability of a foul and injury if the ball is tacked from behind. Often, if the opponent didn't score the goal, players build up their attack by giving the ball to DM to hold the ball. As DM stays in front of opponent's forwards, he is often tacked from behind. Therefore, if you look at statistics, you will see that DMs are the ones who are injured the most.

That's not because the RNG sequence [opponent shoots] - [opponent misses] - [you get a long injury] is flawed. That's because you hold the ball with someone who is often tackled from behind.

Add to that the motivation mechanic. The forward who is not scored (especially if that is his home match) can become motivated. So he tackles using Aggressive tackle which is even more probably leads to an injury.

So if you just take to account that you can be tackled from behind and so you'd better get the ball far away or find another approach, you will forget about injuries. I, for example, very rarely have injuries in my campaigns. I also know players who take it to account and also have rare injuries. So it's not rng, it's the combination of the same actions made by a player that mechanically has the high probability to lead to injury.

Hope that helps to look at the game differently and have more fun.
Cheers
