author: {'steamid': '76561198007233194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1605796623}
review:
Je mets un pouce bas car j'ai été déçu, la promesse invoquée par les autres reviews dépasse ce que le jeu propose.

FTG est un jeu de société de minifoot.

Vos petits joueurs occupent de "grandes cases sur le terrain" et lancent des actions pas forcément très réalistes dans un système sportif simplifié. Vous avez 3 points d'action que vous pouvez "investir" même plusieurs fois sur un seul même joueur, pour par exemple avancer, avancer, tirer et marquer un but. Les stats sont très simples elles aussi. Le système fera un jet de dé entre 1 et votre potentiel et idem pour l'adversaire.

A la défense du jeu, il a une démo, donc rien de mal à dire de ce côté, il faut que vous essayez.
Les développeurs sont je pense passionnés de leur titre ce qui je trouve est une très bonne chose.
Le système de compétences des joueurs, et de poste, est suffisamment détaillé.

Pour ma part je pense que j'avais "stocké" le jeu dans une grande promotion, il s'est fallu longtemps avant que je l'essaie.
Je poursuivrai un jour mon essai en prenant force et courage, et nous verrons si je suis passé à côté. Car mon essai fut dans la douleur ici...

La raison actuelle de mon pouce bas:

- trop de promesse pour un jeu pas très ambitieux "sur le terrain".

- les actions favorisées par le jeu ne sont pas dans la beauté du sport. Elles sont souvent irréalistes, non collectives, plein de joueurs restent passif pendant que vous utilisez vos 3 points qui va en somme souvent exploiter deux joueurs (l'un des deux joueurs passera à l'autre par exemple, ce qui consomme un point d'action) et laisser le reste de l'équipe (vous et les adversaires) passifs pendant les 6 minutes de l'action. (tout ce temps pour avancer et passer!) 

Oui, le temps de faire une progression de deux cases, et une passe, six minutes sont retirées au compteur du match. C'est un système d'action basé sur la passivité et la non-interactivité. Les adversaires ont une sorte de défense automatique selon leur stat.


- la page du store invoque XCOM et foot ; je suis consterné... car le jeu n'est réellement fidèle à aucun des deux sur le terrain. Par contre, à la défense du jeu, il est un peu plus fouillé sur le roster d'équipe, plutôt bien développé par rapport à ce qu'on aurait pu croire.

- si vous avez une manette branchée pour d'autres jeux, vous aurez une invasion de boutons console sur l'interface ; c'est un point mitigé, le jeu devrait demander dès le départ, car pour ma part cela m'a donné une mauvaise impression d'avoir des A, B et X partout sur mon écran sans avoir eu le choix de dire "hé oh pour ce genre de jeu j'aimerai jouer à la souris et pas voir ces boutons de paysan" :D

- on peut comparer un peu à la licence FM sur le détail du roster. En ce sens, FTG est un FM simplifié.

- on ne peut comparer ni à FM, Fifa etc sur le terrain. Le terrain est, selon moi, le point faible de FTG.

- les avis dithyrambiques sur le jeu m'ont réellement consterné. Ce n'est pas honnête de dire tout cela. FTG ne joue pas dans la même cour.

Vous pouvez prendre le jeu (mais à petit prix), il serait plus comparable à la licence FM, auquel cas il faut ne pas avoir aimé plusieurs points dans FM (si vous trouvez FM fastidieux par exemple, car FM peut être vraiment consommateur de temps) mais malheureusement, s'il peut être un FM simplifié sur le roster, sur le jeu sur le terrain il ressemble sans doute encore moins à des jeux d'action sportifs.

FTG est dans son propre domaine, un jeu de société à points d'action simplifié, qui a pour thème le sport, et un roster somme toutes assez avancé pour son thème. Comme indiqué plus haut, j'ai mis un pouce bas car j'ai été déçu, trop de promesse par rapport à ce que le jeu a proposé.

Surtout essayez la démo pour vous faire une idée !

author: {'steamid': '76561198996030760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 713, 'last_played': 1695929434}
review:
Certamente esse título é mais lento do que você espera de um jogo de futebol, mas não se confundam, Footbal, Tactics & Glory é simplesmente fantástico.

As mecânicas de turno são simples, mas o sistema de skils e as possibilidades de jogada que surgem com o passar do tempo podem exigir um pouco de atenção de seus jogadores, de sua formação e também de seu oponente.
Obviamente você pode jogar no mais simplório possível e se dar bem, embora isso possa ser um pouco mais hard.
Claro que você também pode ligar o modo sandbox e ter tudo aos seus pés, mas confesso que pegar o time desde o acesso e brigar para ir avançando temporada após temporada é memorável!  

A possibilidade de mudar nome e aparência dos jogadores também é certamente maravilhoso, perfeito para liberar sua imaginação e suprir a ausência de jogadores reais. Sem contar os nomes criativos que o jogo proporciona, que são adaptados de acordo com a liga que você escolhe.

Em geral, é uma experiência que exige tática para o levar a glória, mas que não deixa de ser envolvente e divertida! 

Um jogo perfeito para os amantes de um desafio ou simplesmente para o que querem um jogo de esporte visualmente satisfatório e que não cobre um Celta por isso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002653992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 107657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75632, 'last_played': 1710486582}
review:
If you're a fan of football, you've probably played your fair share of the Football Manager series and FIFA. This game, FTG, is far superior to both of them. FTG is not a really a Management-simulator, but you do take on a managerial-like role in some aspects; signing/selling players, deciding whose contracts to renew, spending your money earned on upgrading the clubs stadium and facilities etc. But these things are quite straight forward. You're free to focus on playing the matches themselves. You can quickly move on from on match to the next, which is what you will want to do. 

In Football Manager you have to deal with all the tedious stuff on the side, setting up detailed scouting networks, dealing with the annoying press, and so forth. It takes forever to just to finish a single season. You invest so much time and yet make so little progress...

But a season in FTG can potentially be completed relatively quickly, so you're always making progress. You're not distracted by all the fancy pancy details on the side. After the recent update to the game, it has become very impressive showcasing stats, but it's just the right amount of stats; sufficiently comprehensive, but not too much.

The matches are being played in turn-based mode, which is very enjoyable. It gives every game a very tactical challenge, and the games can play out quite differently, and different player qualities are needed in different games. Throughout a season, you're gonna need your whole squad. 

One of the coolest things about the game is that you can create your entire team from scratch. I mean, you can play with real-world teams in real leagues, and download these clubs' club logos, either here on the Steam Workshop in big packs, or you can do it manually, which is really simple and user friendly due to the feature to do so is actually in-built in the game. What I mean by creating your own team is that you can create all the players in your team and give them names, faces (the game has a very impressive character/player customizer), skills and attributes. So, you can choose what division to start playing in, and you can choose your team's strength at the beginning of the game. You can start at the very bottom of the league system, or you can start as an absolute top 5 star team playing in the Champions League, or you can start as a mediocre top division team, whatever tickles your fancy. You can also choose starting year. You can start the game in 2020, or you can start it in 2070, like i did, so it makes sense to have a fictional player database, which is so much more enjoyable. Simply put, the game is tailor-made for YOU to setup the game the way YOU want before you start !! It's gonna be YOUR experience. You can also choose the length of the matches ranging from short. to medium, to long. My personal recommandation is medium length games. I also recommend NOT starting out as 5 star top team, because this game is most enjoyable, in my opinion, if you're striving to build upwards toward success. You don't neccessarily need to start down in the lower divisions, but that's all up to you.  

This is easily the best sports game I have played. I highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043118900', 'num_games_owned': 1324, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1605472542}
review:
Könnte Spaß machen, tut es aber nicht. Ich empfehle es für eingefleischte Fussball-Fans die auch noch Taktik-Spiele mögen. Sonst lasst lieber die Finger davon.

Die Idee einer runderbasierten Fussballmanager-WiSim ist ja ganz prima, es hapert aber an der Umsetzung. Vieles muss man sich selbst er-ARBEIT-en und Arbeit nervt: Ich will SPIELEN. Hier einige Kritikpunkte:
-Warum steht keine Erklärung bei den Spezialfähigkeiten des Spielers? Ein einfacher Tooltipp würde helfen so dass man den Spieler effektiv einsetzen kann ohne jedesmal wieder die Hilfe aufzuschlagen und mühsam zu suchen.
-Dann funktioniert die Auswechslung nicht: Man klickt auf "Aufwechslung", zieht den Namen des müden Spielers auf den Namen des frischen Ersatzspielers. In dieser Aufstellung ist dann alles richtig (der Neue steht in der Aufstellung, der Alter auf der Ersatzbank), aber auf dem Platz steht der abgekämpfte Recke und verliert Zweikampf um Zweikampf. Man kassiert unnötige Gegentore und wird frustriert.
-Außerdem ist auch die Geschwindigkeit von Faktor 2 immer noch langsamer als der Libero in der Kreisklasse.
-Toll gedacht aber richtig nervig umgesetzt ist der Trainerschein, in dem man zwischen den Spielen immer wieder Spielzüge befolgen soll um sie zu lernen und im Spiel anzuwenden. Da ist aber SEHR VIEL Trial-and-Error bei bis man versteht, wie man das ganze lösen soll. Und das zieht sich wie alter Kaugummi. Besser wäre, wenn man auch mal "überspringen" könnte (und halt ne Strafe kassiert oder sonstwas) um wenigstens weiter spielen zu können. 

Es gibt siche rnoch weitere Nerv-Faktoren aber nach 6 Spieltagen werfe ich das Handtuch, äh ich meine: ich hänge die Boffer an den Nagel. Sollen sich die Jungen mal beweisen...

Ich rate eindringlich dazu, vorher die kostenlose Demo zu spielen. Hab ich auch gemacht und fand es ganz witzig. Hab dann im Sale zugeschlagen so dass mir die 12,50 Euro nicht wehtun. Es ist nur schade um das Potential was hier verschenkt wurde.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978847162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1709925944}
review:
This game is very similar to a tactical turn based wargame mixed with a sports tycoon. You build up your team, use the skills and special abilities of your players, you have to take into account the part of the field they play better, the weather, their stamina; you have to watch their contracts, injuries, offers... You improve your players and specialize them for a certain position, you make them learn new abilities...

I love wargames and I love games in which you build something you end up attached to (in this case it's my hometown football team, which I attached to the amateur league and I'm going to turn into an internationally renowned team). 

I really love it. I can't stop playing it. Worth every cent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148694301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1617106766}

author: {'steamid': '76561197997014166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 22716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 148, 'playtime_at_review': 8680, 'last_played': 1712159798}
review:
Отличная игра. Играю в нее практически с момента выхода.
Всегда нравились подобные необычные по формату игры.
Отдельный кайф создать команду из своего города и поднимать ее до самого верха, заниматься менеджментом и выстраивать несколько стратегий на матч.
Дополнение очень сильно ожидалось и также сильно порадовало.
Спасибо разработчикам, это воистину шедевр, в FM больше не играю

review: Nice squad based tactics game.  It would be cool if injuries were less rare so that you could incorporate a larger squad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344502951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 167, 'playtime_at_review': 1375, 'last_played': 1712249706}
review:
Very nice game! I like that the matches are some kind of puzzle instead of a realistically simulated match like with fifa. I also like the way you can improve your team by upgrading the scouts and trainers.

I have one point that I would also like to see in the game: A option for a female team/female competition. This could be easily implemented, at the start of the game a promt that says would you like to participate in male or female competion? And then depending on that choice the players are male/female. That's all (yes and maybe the pronouns ;)). But none of the game mechanics etc would have to change as the teams I play with are imaginative. But even if the clubs would be real life teams it would indicate that all clubs also have a female team (which they now might not have but it is a nice thing to strive for).

author: {'steamid': '76561198038244120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 72263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 235, 'playtime_at_review': 70069, 'last_played': 1712424028}
review:
I've owned this game from its beginning. Even to this day 2024 the developer is very responsive. 
I've always liked sports management games. For me, this is the best I've ever played. 
I enjoy it because: it cleverly challenges you to think about the big picture of building a winning team and actually playing the game yourself. 
What it does better than any of the 300 games I own is teaches you how to play. Tests allow you to practice your skills. Everything is clearly explained. You can go back time and again to hone your skills. And you'll need to. 
I like turn-based games.
Wonderful customization of uniforms etc. I enjoy the colorful graphics. 
In my opinion, the people behind this game are smart. It's well thought out. There's more to it than meets the eye. 
For me, as with my own business, I don't pay attention to reviews from someone who hasn't fully experienced the service as it was intended to be experienced. For this game that would be over 30 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960447284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 15994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 134, 'playtime_at_review': 11346, 'last_played': 1712425031}
review:
It has a surprisingly steep learning curve and is a bit grindy. 
But if you like football and turn-based strategy games, it is a must have game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029704499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 1643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 610, 'last_played': 1612562873}
review: A resounding yes! I can easily recommend this game to others. Getting the new DLC with the base game is a must. Turn based tactics, upgrades, skill trees, facilities, coaches, tournaments, workshop...and now stats galore. This game is a gem and a nice change of pace to the FM series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064659928', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 2982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1951, 'last_played': 1696689410}
review:
The game was good, but with the expansion went to a whole different level! If you are interested in football, tabletop, turn-based or manager games this one is for you.
For NEW/RETURNING players: If you feel lost in the mechanics and how it all works start a new career and then click the question mark button at the top-right. After that choose Tests and play them all. You will have no more questions about the match mechanics. These tests should be in the main menu like an option which is my only complain. Great game, extremely addicting!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003102117', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 37257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6477, 'last_played': 1705611807}
review: Игра отличная, но или я хронический неудачник или AI читит (и в этом мнении я не одинок)

author: {'steamid': '76561198211298695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 26436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18278, 'last_played': 1693231682}
review:
The thinking man's football game.

A product of true passion, it's a genuinely original take on the football management theme.
If you like football but are not so much into the twitchy and fast-paced style of the FIFAs and PESs, give this one a shot.
Take all the time in the world setting up your moves and your wins will be hard-earned and satisfying, if you take the time to delve into the extensive "Footballpedia" to learn the mechanics along the way. This is truly an "easy to play, hard to master" kind of game.

While being a club management game, it's not a sim and some liberties are taken for the sake of gameplay (for example, hiring additional coaches and staff uses a currency called "Glory" and not money) but - especially if you get the Football Stars expansion - the teams feel like they have their own personalities and eventually you will feel a connection to your squad and favourite players.

Customisation is effectively endless. You can customise almost anything at any time even during a season, and the lack of licensed teams has already been addressed by mods.

Getting the DLC is highly recommended: the game is still in active development and the devs regularly update and listen to community feedback.

author: {'steamid': '76561198909019813', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15959, 'last_played': 1706969050}
review:
Non ho mai scritto una recensione ma credo proprio che i ragazzi dietro questo progetto se lo meritino. Gia prima del dlc,secondo me valeva, ora dopo manco un ora di gioco "nuovo" posso garantirvi che merita la spesa. MOLTO piu tattico di quanto possa sembrare puo regalare ore di svago a tutti. Fare goal di testa non era cosi soddisfacente da sensible ;)

Gioco semplice e longevo diventa molto piu profondo con il dlc.

Consigliatissimo ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197964908578', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 25070, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9043, 'last_played': 1696424219}
review:
This game is great.  I love XCOM and Football Manager.  The problem with Football Manager is I would make all the selections and then basically go on holidays for 6 months or a year.  This game allows you to simulate games, but actually playing the games is fun and rewards you for being strategic.  It doesn't feel like a waste of your time.  Too often I would play through a season or two of FM and it would take hours and I wouldn't feel like I'd really achieved much.  With FTG you get the short term achievement of winning a game that you've actually played and then the long term achievement of winning a season.

I have spent over 150 hours on this game.  The dev listens to the fans.  Give it a go!

author: {'steamid': '76561198261061783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 10796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3941, 'last_played': 1696421569}
review:
隨著更新，遊戲变得越來越有趣了
以前覺得操控單調又重复，但是打了工坊的聯賽MOD後發現樂趣無窮（推荐一个全中文并且集合所有知名球队的英超MOD）~
而且更令人意外的是捏臉系統做的有模有樣，你完全可以做出梅西、大罗任何你想要的球员，如果你没有这个水平，工坊也可以帮助你。
大佬們的指南有些複雜，其實遊戲的戰術虽然多種多樣，但是總結起來也可以非常簡單：
推薦使用無鋒陣，也就是培養前腰，因為前腰的特性是降低對方防守屬性，完全可以做到禁區外射門，並且不使用技能，單純的比拼屬性，最大程度的節省體力。盡可能提高前腰的射門，由于防守和控球相對會比較低，可以搭配學習抢断技能。当射门值达到100基本可以横扫乙级联赛，150甲级夺冠，200+超级联赛也挡不住你了。
此时就变成了养成游戏，无锋阵的另一个好处就是节省荣誉，你可以只升级中场和后卫的教练，做到资源最大化。
基本的阵容就是1个清道夫（神反应），3中后卫（空霸），1后腰（长传），2中场（直传），3前腰（抢断）。或者把一个前腰换成清道夫，看你自己喜欢，多养一个也得总得有替换的。尽量从5级以下开始自己培养，前期做不到无锋，因为训练并不能提升经验，你只能一个个放到场上去踢比赛来提高技能和等级，所以你需要先度过几个赛季，慢慢把系统给你的阵容替换掉。有条件就让新人上场。等教练的等级上来，培养就会很快，此时你也基本快要面对超级联赛了。
其实这套阵容最大的好处是，你完全不需要手操，可以全部交给电脑，看着就行了。毕竟每场都打确实也会无聊。
另外，切记无论你培养出什么妖人，一定记得33岁前把他卖掉，也就是32岁的转会窗。否则33岁身价减少25%，等到34岁想卖也卖不了了。
期待接下来的新DLC~

author: {'steamid': '76561198063274237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7517, 'last_played': 1696852501}
review:
사놓고 안하다가 한글패치 되서 다시 해보니 이런 선녀가 따로 없네
선수를 키워서 팔아먹는 경영과 체스와 흡사한 축구게임. 호불호가 갈릴듯하지만 매커니즘만 파악하면 정말 재미있다.
패치로 각 포지션 별로 스킬을 이용하는 방법을 넣어준 것은 정말 좋았다.
한글번역은 크게 불만이 없지만 한국어로 하면 남은 계약기간에 연도와 개월수(m/y)가 표시되지 않는게 아쉽다.

？？？？那我是玩还是不玩？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？

author: {'steamid': '76561197975210910', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1603317048}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197964166912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 805, 'last_played': 1616322630}
review: Si te gusta el fútbol. Pero estás cansado de lo mismo; de juegos con handicap o en los que tienes que poner tu monedero para tener un equipo competitivo. Este es tu juego, pura estrategia. A Guardiola le encantaría!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006765953', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 19002, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1746, 'last_played': 1696464065}
review:
Hallo ist meine 1 Rezension für ein Steam Spiel.

Ich bin eher zufällig  auf diese Spiel gestoßen, Dann habe ich mir ein paar Youtube Videos zum Spiel ansehen.
Ich war zwar ein bisschen skeptisch, dann habe ich mich entschlossen es zu kaufen.Ich habe schon mehr Geld für schlechter Spiele von großen Publischern versenkt.

Eins ist klar, es ist auf alle Falle ein anderes Spiel als der FM 20. Bei der  Taktik muss man doch öffters mal um die Ecke denken, Einiges ist dem Würfelglück überlassen. Aber dieses Spiel hat einen gewissen Charme.
So ein bisschen an die Anstossreihe angelehnt

Was mir sehr gut gefällt, das Spiel ist doch sehr schnell zu erlernen .  Man kann eine Saison schnell mal ein 2-3 stunden spielen. Alles ist editbar ( Wappen ,Clubnamen Spielernamen)) echt top.

Ich hoffe doch das dieses Spiel  durch DLC weiter entwickelt wird. Ich habe auf jeden Fall den Kauf nicht bereut.

So jetzt muss aber weiter meine Mannschaft weiterentwickeln.

author: {'steamid': '76561198438538202', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1973, 'last_played': 1619556930}
review:
É um jogo extremamente promissor. Se você curte estratégia em turnos e futebol, esse é um game pra você.

Existem algumas mecânicas no joguinho que é similar aos dados de um RPG , as ações (Defesa, Drible, Chute e possibilidade de interceptação) vão variar muito da sua tática dentro do game.

Se você começa de uma equipe desde o início, a sua evolução é lenta e pra chegar nas divisões principais vão demorar no mínimo umas 6-7 temporadas. Mas pode ficar tranquilo, porque as partidas são bem curtas ou você pode muito bem simulá-las.

Eu senti falta de uma maior complexidade no gerenciamento de recursos (financeiros) e também sugiro como melhoria futura a implantação de dilemas (assim como aqueles que existem no New Star Soccer) onde as suas decisões influenciem diretamente a sua relação como manager, tanto com jogadores quanto com a presidência.

No demais, eu tô no hype pela próxima atualização do game, inclusive já deixei um dinheiro separado aqui. Keep going Creoteam, you're doing a great job :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198028275583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1603299681}
review:
At the moment I´m writing, I´ve spent around 25 hours in this game aprox., and now, with my new team, I managed to win "Amateur League" (first position), but in 3rd Division it´s being impossible for me: 4 matches, 4 loss. It´s quite frustrating, because I´m loosing followers, money, etc. So, probably I´m coming back to "Amateur League" again  :-(  But it doesn´t matter: rest for a few days and coming back with new strength!
I´m watching videos and learning meanwhile reading guides, forum posts... I guess I´ve a lot to understand about this game yet (I love the idea: football + tactics + turn-based...), but some aspects of the game are still a little bit obscure to know how they work properly, and some strange maths (Specialization Tree, Upgrade options and when, tendence to confusion about Skills - Stats - Clases, etc.). Well, I suppose it´s a question of time to resolve the puzzle  ;-) 
Anyway, I think this game is good, but the level of 3rd Division is so high if we compare with "Amateur League". Maybe I have a very young team, I don´t know (I sold all my 33 years old players). In any case, IMHO, the game keeps my attention  over time, it´s challenging and, despite the fact that I leave it for a while, I always return to play it, so ... must be for a reason! In addition, developers are polite and listen to proposals and opinions of their followers in the forums. I hope they´re lucky enough, so this game keeps alive, polishing it, so with each update it´ll get better and better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066554657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 6472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6472, 'last_played': 1598089149}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992207223', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 19418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3, 'playtime_at_review': 6488, 'last_played': 1712309185}
review:
Se ha convertido en mi juego favorito de gestión de equipos de fútbol. Tiene el aroma de los PC Fútbol clásicos, con esa inmediatez en la parte económica, pero también una grandísima profundidad cuando aprendes las dinámicas y descubres que cada detalle marca la diferencia.

A cualquiera que le guste la estrategia y el fútbol, le recomiendo que le dedique el tiempo necesario para sacarle todo el jugo.

review:
Sometimes you buy a game and you are not sure that you will like it, but when you play it, it becomes your new favorite. That's the case here. If the developers don't give up on this game I can see it becoming as popular as the Football Manager. This game only lacks of depth but I hope, and I see from the upcoming DLC, that this game will keep deepening and becoming a 10/10!! 
Best played on your laptop on the couch, with TV playing a series that you've seen before.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005375957', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1601385124}
review:
Я не люблю футбол. Совсем. Я к нему абсолютно равнодушен. Поэтому все футбольные симуляторы и менеджеры спокойно проходили мимо меня.
Но я люблю пошаговые тактики и стратегии... И вот тут данная игрушка оказалась на высоте. Разработчикам удалось придумать прекрасную пошаговую механику для футбола! Огромное уважение автору :)
Ну а если вам нравятся и тактические игры и футбол... Тогда, возможно, это игра вашей мечты.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100983428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 9299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9294, 'last_played': 1629788489}
review:
fm老玩家，一直关注这个游戏，打折入了手，一不在意就150个小时了，如果你厌烦了fm被电脑玩的感觉，不妨试试这个简单直接的小游戏，球员数值直接反应能力的高低（FM里球员数据看似真实其实是玄学，比赛结果只是根据球队cp值和一些其他玄学因素的演算），射门150就是比100的进球几率大，你完全可以通过自己的指挥主宰一场比赛（别跟我说你能在FM里靠微调取胜，那都是自己骗自己）。下面是给新手的一些简单的攻略，游戏还是有点难度的。
开局俱乐部升级后卫先升满，其次是守门员。想赢球，想赢比你星多俱乐部就必须有防守，防守看的就是后卫防守数值高低，必须尽快练高防守，摆6个后卫在禁区里，如果对方有边锋，在摆一个后卫在角旗放内切，防守基本就稳了。进攻主要靠技能，看对方守门员怕什么技能就上什么技能的球员，这里介绍一个小套路，主动把球踢出边线，对方指手抛球时你把有得分技能的球员直接放到有利的得分位置，中场在放个长传技能高的，等对方进攻失败，直接打反击，很容易长传找到前锋，得分效率很高，一场比赛怎么也能弄1个进去。就这样很快就能升到超级

author: {'steamid': '76561198014432391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 643, 'last_played': 1599739701}
review: A very nice chess like approach to football game. I'm only on the first leaggue now and my players are quite lame but the game is fun nevertheless. If you like tactical turn based games (even chess and go) and you enjoy football this game is a good pick.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092381005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 7457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1695404592}
review: Soccer and rpg mechanics mixed in a tactical turns based game. 100% customizable. You can play a whole season in an afternoon. Simple to learn and very involving. Transfer market and youth team very simple to manage. Managerial are options are very limited but are not the core of the game. Looot of countries to select. You can start with a local team or with a big pro team. 5 divisions (Local to National). International tournaments are avalabile too. You can create your own teams and customize all the players to make your friends and family in the game. Twitch support integrated. Team names are not licensed. I would say 7/10. Super fun and game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198157035711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 24079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8470, 'last_played': 1671166790}

author: {'steamid': '76561198036883380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2018, 'last_played': 1606155546}
review:
[h1]Zusammenfassung[/h1] 

Kurzweiliger Fußball-Manager mit rundenstrategischen Elementen. Die Manageroptionen beschränken sich zwar auf den Ausbau des Stadions, der Förderung des Nachwuchses und dem Einstellen (Verbesserung) von "Trainern", was jedoch den wahnsinnigen Vorteil hat, dass man sich nicht in Statistiken, Eigenschaften, Tabellen und was auch immer verrennt.


[h1]Das sollte man nicht erwarten[/h1] 

Weder grafisch noch musikalisch ist das Spiel ein Highlight, vielmehr erinnert es an Fußballmanager, wie man sie auf Tablets spielt. Statisk- und Taktikfreaks sollten hier gleich die Finger weg lassen, aber denke, das ist auch nicht die Zielgruppe dieses Spiels.

[h1]das habe ich erwartet[/h1] 
Ich wollte einen einfachen Fußballmanager, bei dem man sich ohne viel Zeitaufwand und tausenden von Einstellungsmöglichkeiten um einen Verein kümmert - genau das bekommt man.

11 Mann zusammenstellen, aufstellen und im Sinne eines Rundenstrategiespiels Fußballspielen. Ja - Rundenstrategie. Pro Angriff stehen einige wenige Aktionen zur Verfügung, in denen man den Ball passen , einen Verteidiger tunneln oder ausdribbeln und letztendlich ein Tor schießen kann. Nur - so einfach ist es dann doch nicht. Die elf Individuen müssen dazu entsprechende Skills haben, die sich in mehreren Stufen trainieren lassen. Mir ist mein Team richtig an Herz gewachsen.

Ein umfangreiches Tutorial steht zu Verfügung, in der die wichtigsten Elemente des Spiels für Abwehr, Mittelfeld und Angriff veranschaulicht werden. Auf höherem Schwierigkeitsgrad ist es unerlässlich, sich intensiver mit den einzelnen Skills der Spieler vertraut zu machen.

Durch einen dummen Bug ist zwar nach knapp 30 Stunden Spielzeit meine Mannschaft futsch, aber gerade weil das Spiel recht einfach gehalten ist, bin ich ausreichend motiviert, es ein zweites Mal anzupacken, und besser zu machen.

Für mich persönlich kommt bei diesem Game das "nur-noch-eine-einzige-Runde-Feeling" auf.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131629272', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1540996879}
review: Ich mochte das Spielkonzept und die taktischen Features, die das Spiel mit sich bringt. Aber entgegen der Beschreibung habe ich als Fußball-Muffel keinen Zugang zu diesem Spiel gefunden. Ich würde es daher niemandem empfehlen, der sich nicht bereits mit Fußball beschäftigt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040896101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 6494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1675271360}
review: This is a very good game which has a very different take on football management. The actual games play like chess, but with realistic 3d figures on a grid. This may sound unrealistic but in fact each move is a little ballet  in which you can see runs and passes being made and the receiving player capturing the ball etc. Opposing players aren't entirely static while you move - depending on their skills they can attempt reactive stuff like intercepts and tackles and blocks.  So the tactics are quite deep.  The higher level game involves team management as you would expect,  but is more like a role playing game where the players gain experience and skills.  I found it very refreshing - a nice change from the endless spreadsheets and busy work of games like Football Manager.  I would certainly recommend anyone interested in football to give it a go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117931368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 15785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1580, 'last_played': 1711027641}
review:
这本来是一个极好的小品级游戏。但是昨天一个只有3MB大小的蠢到爆的更新彻底毁了这个傻哔游戏！更新之后居然自动把最新存档TM用空白文件覆盖了！更TM cao蛋的是，自动备份的存档居然也TM被覆盖了！我TM想恢复旧文件都办不到！我真TM想cnmb！没TM见过这么蠢的更新！差评nmb！！！！
补充：最近一次更新之后，扔出下限数值的概率大幅增加了！！如果有人玩过xcom，就是那种贴脸99%命中率然后一枪给你干飞的吃shi的感觉！！为什么最近这次更新这么傻哔？！cnmb！我居然又玩了几个小时，我也是傻哔！
我就想问一下，我60防守的守门员面对30精准的无技能前锋是怎么扔出个位数的防守值的？？不要跟我说什么随机性设置，我就要问你你的正态分布是左偏到0%的吧？？？？
再补充：建议脑残制作组在游戏内出一个概率统计菜单，游戏自己统计一下玩家和ai每场比赛摇出不同概率值的分布分别是多少，好不好？？我tm一度以为ai的数值是锁定上限值不变的好不好？？？？cnmb！！
再再补充：我很想知道一个传球只有8的ai下底传中每次都能传到位，而我50传球的在同样的位置经常传飞，这是什么jb概率？？？？
还有，电脑22的控球是怎样穿裆过我46的防守？而我15的控球连20的防守都穿裆不了？？小概率事件总是频繁出现，有意思吗？cnmb！
再补充：从背后把人铲伤4个月23天，然后连一张黄牌都没有？这是30年前的处罚标准吗？？？？傻哔！我tm玩xcom99%贴脸一枪干飞都没有这个游戏令人恶心！
刚才又从背后把我的人铲翻了2个月26天连个黄牌都没有。设计犯规规则的人还活在30年前吗？？？
得，这回是背后4个月15天，嗯，依然没掏牌。wcnmb！
再再补充：再次强烈建议大家不要入坑！这个游戏的随机系统是zhu！开发组让小概率事件在一场比赛中连续出现，然后告诉你说，嗯连着几场比赛看下来，累积概率是正常的！神逻辑。
developer_response: Send me the report file, and we will try to help.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033637330', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 13950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1699798085}

author: {'steamid': '76561198296411942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2541, 'last_played': 1637592792}
review: il gioco bara drasticamente, impossibile vincere una partita se non hai stats piu' alte del team avversario, dopo 42 ore di gioco ho disinstallato.
developer_response:
Mi dispiace che pensi che sia impossibile vincere avversari più forti. Penso che il gioco non sia riuscito a mostrarti come farlo.

Forse, inizia una nuova campagna e gioca con attenzione tutti i test della licenza di allenatore. Perché mostrano elementi tattici molto importanti che dovresti usare se vuoi vincere avversari più forti.

Le abilità sono molto importanti. Ad esempio, ti danno un'azione +1 se usati contro gli avversari. Quindi puoi correre con i tuoi attaccanti con Cannon Shot nella zona di rigore dell'avversario e dargli Passaggio lungo.

Inoltre, usa la conoscenza di classi diverse. Ad esempio, puoi usare le ali in avanti per correre nella zona di rigore dell'avversario senza spendere punti azione. È la loro abilità unica.

E una delle cose più importanti sono le croci. Non è facile imparare come eseguirli. Ma quando lo fai, sarai in grado di segnare molti colpi di testa.

Spero che darai al gioco un'altra possibilità.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198576782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1598844507}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004889773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 8903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3551, 'last_played': 1698432058}
review:
很新鮮的組合, 足球加戰棋策略, 總括而言,整體非常不錯, 也很耐玩
但還是有一些問題希望可以改善 ,例如 : 
1.去到後期收支平衡很難，有時需要靠賣主力來換錢。
2.明明我的球員控球值也很高, 但當對方有搶奪技的時候, 就算我控球值高對面防守值和控球值很多, 也很大機會被搶，
3.年輕球员的能力提升困難，因為他們能力值低，很多有機會給他們出場，希望可以增加選擇借出球員，提高他的出場機會，加快能力提升。
4.如果没有記錯的話，全部球員升級到達100級的時候，4個能力值的總和都是一樣，希望這個可以改變一下， 毎個球員的上限都不同。
最後期望下一隻會更加進步，謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561198072939821', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 6598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 593, 'playtime_at_review': 1899, 'last_played': 1711826012}
review:
Piacevole sorpresa nel panorama dei giochi a turni.

Avete letto bene, il gioco in sè parla di calcio, ma non lo definirei ne un manageriale ne una simulazione, anche se alcuni elementi dei due generi citati ci sono (la costruzione della squadra, i contratti, il calciomercato, anche se molto light).
Il cuore del gioco, infatti, sono le partite che si svolgono proprio a turni (anche la loro durata è sorprendentemente azzeccata).
Il mix è piacevole e funziona! Per semplificare lo paragonerei ad un misto di subbuteo e blood bowl. 
A pensarci bene ci sono anche degli elementi gdr, poichè potrete livellare i vostri calciatori ed assegnare delle capacità specifiche, fondamentali per la continuazione della vostra carriera.
Anche l'introduzione al gioco è stata molto piacevole, partirete con la vostra carriera dalla serie "eccellenza", almeno se scegliete l'Italia ed il vostro assistente vi guiderà nel capire le meccaniche del gioco proprio sul campo. 
E salendo di categoria aumenterà anche la difficoltà, poichè gli avversari saranno piu' forti. Personalmente l'ho trovato molto equilibrato, avendo vinto al primo colpo sia eccellenza che serie D, ma poi mi sono impantanato nella serie C, probabilmente non ho fatto salire a dovere la squadra...
Altro elemento di interesse è la gestione dei turni, nel senso che sceglierete le vostre opzioni in base alle possibilità, date dalle caratteristiche/abilità dei vostri calciatori, fondamentalmente l'incrocio di questi dati originerà un numero che dovrete confrontare con quello dell'avversario per capire la possibilità che la vostra mossa abbia successo.
Grafica carina e colorata per il tipo di gioco, piu' possibilità di personalizzare le divise della vostra squadra.
C'è anche il multiplayer e secondo me sarà molto intrigante, ma per il momento non ho ancora testato.
In conclusione se vi piacciono i giochi a turni e vi gara il calcio è un acquisto che consiglio!

author: {'steamid': '76561198097981210', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 792, 'last_played': 1652005748}
review:
Когда был мелким, и отдыхал с родителями на даче, это было одно из самых скучных времен года. Вроде лето, должно хлестать веселье через край, а вот и нет, через пару дней пребывания среди лопухов я быстро уставал. И тогда я используя обычный шестигранный кубик, листок бумаги и карандаш придумал настольный футбол, который использовал механики случайных чисел, моими противниками были 15 команд и его величество дайс. За игрой в такой футбол пролетали дни, и я не заметил, как закончилось лето и пришлось ехать домой.

Я не готов играть сутки напролет в FTG, но она определенно возвращает меня в те времена и дарит приятные эмоции.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002135938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1987, 'last_played': 1639438684}
review:
C'è una probabilità del 95% che questa recensione sia positiva.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211357228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2304, 'last_played': 1598542282}
review:
整体来看，这是一款足球主题的战棋类游戏，与“足球经理FM”差别还是很大的，游戏性还不错。
游戏集中在两类场景，一是基于回合制的比赛，画面风格偏向卡通，画面质量说得过去。二是球队经营，比如球员转会、训练、俱乐部升级等，比较简单。 
游戏难度上，我只玩了一支球队，选择的是默认难度。玩了大概8个赛季。游戏分为5个级别，从最低级打起。丁级和丙级都很简单，都是一个赛季就能晋级，对手弱于自己，而随机概率的判定上个人感觉也有利于玩家。到了乙级难度会有一次大幅提升，你会发现对手的能力比你强了，随机概率的判定也不是很爽了。特别是升上来的第一个赛季，非常艰难，最终我用了3个赛季晋级。甲级联赛的体验基本于此一致，最终我在第8年以两星半的球队实力夺冠冲超。
总结一下，这款小游戏的游戏性不错，但30个小时的游戏体验应该对大多数玩家就足够了。

review:
A fun game with unexpected depth. If you are not sure if it's worth it - try the demo.
Keep in mind though - it requires a lot of time before you feel your team has grown strong and according to your demand, you start with a lot of mediocre players (they are amateurs after all).
Requires a lot of thought, planning and digging into rules - fun,fun,fun!

review:
I dont know why or even how... But this game is so addictive, since i get the game i have been playing every day... Ok not every day, i may have missed a day or two.. But there is something in this game... Cant say why i love this game so much. Maybe is the combination of strategy and fooball and a interisting management style that feels like a RPG. I recommend this game... To anyone that likes football with a touch of a RPG... Maybe?

Update 1: After the first DLC, the game is more complete! Mainly with the transfer market. Now, if you have the resources, you can just try to buy any player!! That was something that was grinding my gears.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994273761', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1669478346}
review:
Having played this game for 14 hours in about 3 days, I feel like I've played it enough to make a good review. I have triple digit play times in every Football Manager game since 2014, though I started playing football management sims in the early 90s. I'm coming into this with a very football management sim oriented mindset. 

As a Football Management sim, it's a total failure. The good thing is, it doesn't advertise itself as such not is it trying to be a Football Management game. But the comparison has to be made, regardless. No shortlists, a joke of a transfer process, you can view hardly any data or info from any previous season, they have practically no data for the present season, either. Match strategy is setting the player positions on the field and that's it. You can't set a strategy beyond player placement. There are no promotion playoffs that I've yet encountered. You can't leave the team you start on. However, the game forces you to do LLM (sort of) if you don't pick Sandbox mode and I love LLM (as in, that's the only way I play anymore.) So that's a plus for me. Regardless of LLM, do not play this expecting a football management sim. You will be incredibly disappointed.

Rather, the whole point of this game is playing the actual matches. It's an interesting game that I described to a friend as chess with dice rolls. And that's how it works, it's all probability based. For instance: If you're going for a header, you kick a ball and roll a number. Any opponent near the ball rolls a number. Your teammate heading it in rolls against the goalie and anyone between him and the goalie. All these numbers flash on screen for a second so you know how it'll turn out in advance, if you can read them fast enough. You know the probability of things succeeding. It turns into a weird hybrid of football and chess.

The games feel like a football game, amazingly. There's an ebb and flow and I'm not entirely sure if you can get momentum and start getting better dice rolls, but it sure feels that way. I've had games where my strategy collapsed and I couldn't pull anything off, stuff that'd succeeded brilliantly in the previous game kept getting horrid dice rolls instead of fabulous ones. I feel like the game must have some kind of momentum calculation involved, and that's pretty cool.

The graphics are decent enough, even if the people in it look sort of strange and maybe a little scary. I can't say what's wrong with them exactly, but something is. Sound is decent, though the songs it has get kind of old after the first few hours and I usually turn them off now. I haven't played in a real big stadium yet (still working my way through league 2) so I don't know how that sounds, but I have played in smaller stadiums and the crowd noises there are fine.

About my actual game experience, my current (second) team started off in England. Aside from buying one ? player, I've really only bought one Striker after I got promoted out of Amateur and am a pretty dominant team. The ? Player turned into what appears to be a Premiership level Goalie, so I expect I'll be using him for as long as possible. He's the solid wall no one can get through. He allowed one goal his entire first full season with me and had an absurd number of saves. My sweeper can stop practically anyone, but the few he can't are stopped by my goalie. The rest of my defense could be incompetent and it wouldn't matter. I have a striker who can head it in from anywhere and his header has never been blocked. He missed the goal once, but no goalie has stopped one of his headers. I have another Striker whose accuracy went from 23 to 55 in about a year and a half along with other minor stat raises, turning him from a nobody to someone who would be more at home in the Championship at least, if not the Premiership.

The reason why I'm telling you this is because this game seems too easy. I created a team and started off with what appeared to be a very strong team, made virtually unstoppable with a few additional players. Everything is randomly generated, no two worlds are the same, so maybe I just got unbelievably lucky. Or maybe the game is a bit too easy. I did recently set the rolls to be slightly in favor of my opponent, so we'll see how that goes.

But, overall, I really like this game. It's fun to figure out the winning move. The management side leaves so much to be desired that it doesn't scratch that Football Manager itch but it serves as a very satisfying strategy game pretending to be a football management sim. It's a strange combination, but I like it. Recommended!

review:
Il gioco è bello e merita, non mi soffermo sulla parte del gameplay perche ho visto che ne parlano anche altri, ma piu sulla marte manageriale che trovo semplice quanto basta per chi non ha voglia di tutti quei mille pipponi alla football manager che sono piu stancanti che divertenti, detto questo però un paio di cose se fossero implementate non sarebbero male, si può saltare la parte di gioco sul campo e andare alla simulazione in cui i minuti passano velocissimi e vedi i goal e gli infortuni, però non puoi fare nulla, non sarebbe male poter gestire anche in quella modalità modifiche alle tattiche e sostituzioni.
Diciamo che qualche piccola aggiunta al lato manageriale non guasterebbe, non troppo eh, ma qualcosa che la renda piu interessante, sopratutto con i giovani che se non li fai giocare non crescono, cosa un po' noiosa perchè ti trovi a togliere giocatori affermati per far giocare giovanotti che saranno forti ma all'inizio ti fanno perdere, devo dire che questa cmq è una pecca presente in molti giochi purtroppo

author: {'steamid': '76561198191451075', 'num_games_owned': 513, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1704019317}
review:
创意很好，但平衡性太差，完全就是个比数值的游戏，对面数值比你高根本没法打，然而无论是数值成长还是资金增长都慢的要命，你很难做到比对面数值高
开了个简单难度新档，第二把我家门卫10点防守，对面家门卫80+防守？？？我最好的射门数值只有不到40，站在门将脸上面都踢不进去，对面隔着我两个人直接射门门将都守不住？练了一辈子的门将连80防都不到，简单难度开局被对面丙级联赛爆了？
developer_response:
我感到遗憾的是，这种平衡对您来说似乎太难了。但是，当您学习如何使用技巧和十字架时，您会发现游戏是完美平衡的。

技能是最重要的战术手段之一。例如，Cannon Shot和Long Pass。如果您开始使用它们，您会发现，不管对手的守门员的防守有多大，无论如何，得分都并不重要。

希望您能继续玩和学习游戏，并从中获得很多乐趣。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009335511', 'num_games_owned': 868, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 5715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1684613396}
review:
EDITED:
The developer informed me of the existance of an options menu that for some reason is skipped the first time you play. After setting the RNG to be more forgiving and turning off the obnoxious mandatory tutorial the game did improve. It is a fun experience to be had, if a tad bit janky. If the developer continues to fine tune the gameplay this could be something special. As mentioned in the original review the customization is great and really adds to the experience.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
Great customization. Absolutely fantastic customization. Managing a team is really fun. The randomness in this game is BS. When XCOM2 has better RNG, you know you screwed up somewhere. Also the forced tutorials suck about all the fun that remains out of the season.
developer_response:
I'm sorry the RNG and tutorial stayed on the way of the fun for you. 

However, the game is so deep that I'd like you to help to overcome these problems.

1) RNG
You can start a new campaign and choose what type of RNG to use. There are 3 ones:
 - Expected: skewed toward the players' team
 - Default: fair (but feels too harsh)
 - Decreased: fair but the lower roll is not 1 but 30% of the footballer's attribute. 

Example. If your forward's Accuracy is 30, then
 - Expected will rarely roll 1 and more often there will be numbers over 15
 - Default - every number between 1 and 30 has the same probability
 - Decreased: rolls will be between 10 and 30.

2) Tutorial
You can start a new campaign and disable tutorial. However, the game is very deep. If you don't use the whole game's tactical arsenal (skills, classes, crosses), you will have hard times in the higher leagues. There will be a lot of frustration because you expect that the mechanics is flat (pass there, shot here) but it is not. There is a very big combinatorics.

If it's hard to pass the tests, I have some suggestions:
  a) After 5 failed tries the question mark at the top of the screen highlights. Press on it, and you will see the button Help which will show where you should to click
  b) This youtube video shows how to pass the tests: https://youtu.be/OrEYpYam1to

Hope you will give the game another chance and will have a lot of fun of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084852277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1598165810}
review:
하스스톤 축구판 같은 게임이다 운빨 ㅈ망겜이란 소리다.
게임이 너무 불합리하다
원하는 플레이를 하는데 필요한 선수를 육성하는데 너무 오랜 시간이 걸린다.
그리고 플레이 방법은 이렇다.
1. 내선수 스텟 50  상대 선수 스텟 50
내가 드리블 하는 액션을 선택했을 때  내 선수 스탯이 50이니까 1~50 사이의 숫자가 나오고
상대 선수 스탯이 50이면 1~50 사이의 숫자가 나와 높은 쪽으로 액션이 행해진다.
만약 내 스탯이 100이고 상대 스탯이 10 인데
내껀 1 상대껀 10이 나와서 실패 할 수 있다.

코스트 비용도 굉장히 불합리 하다. 구단의 성장과정 디자인도 너무 노잼에 불합리하다 
결국 5천원짜리 폰게임과 다를바 없는 구성인데 축구와 방법의 신선함이 그걸 가렸다.
developer_response:
새 캠페인을 시작하고 사용할 RNG 유형을 선택할 수 있습니다. 세 가지가 있습니다.
-예상치 : 선수 팀쪽으로 치우침
-기본값 : 공정함 (하지만 너무 가혹함)
-감소 : 공평하지만 낮은 롤은 축구 선수 속성의 1이 아니라 30 %입니다.

예. 포워드의 정확도가 30이면
-예상치는 거의 1이 나오지 않으며 15가 넘는 숫자가 더 자주 나타납니다.
-기본값-1에서 30 사이의 모든 숫자는 동일한 확률을 갖습니다.
-감소 : 롤이 10에서 30 사이입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039826939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 10834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3722, 'last_played': 1699893132}
review: 比較像是西洋棋遊戲，到乙級以上難度就會變高......記得!  控球比射門重要!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021783128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 11170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7359, 'last_played': 1663123130}
review:
It's X-com Soccer (Futbol, I know).  Exactly what you think it is.  Great game.

A real gem of an indie, I'm not a big soccer fan and wound up looking up strategies online to better understand what I should be doing in this game.  I'm not very good, I spin up a new season every few months and play it until I hit a wall, then repeat it a few months later.  122 hours of enjoyment and counting.  WELL WORTH the price, looking forward to the expansion.  If you're tired of the Football Manager repetition and want to support creative individuals making well-executed niche games, spend the $15 and dive in.  You will not regret it - although you might get frustrated a few times.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005488263', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 7849, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7614, 'last_played': 1597180600}
review:
This game has definitely come on leaps and bounds since the initial design, but unfortunately I do not feel a lot of it is an improvement.

In a similar vein to other football management games their attempts to focus on 'realism' end up making it virtually impossible these days to keep a club running financially - something that is not conducive to fun.
developer_response:
Hi!

I regret the game look not wrongly balanced for you. But I really want to help every our player to have fun with FTG.

We run a lot of tests ourselves not counting working with the community and seeing how other players perform.

From our experience, I see that players might have difficulties in two cases:

1) when they didn't learn how to use all the game's mechanics (skills/classes/their combinations/crosses). So they developed their club based on the "raw power" ie footballers' levels.

However, the game is made in such a way that you can be an underdog - win most strong opponents by using only tactics. So when you understand the game's mechanics, you can keep low level team and at the same moment, win almost everyone.

2) Players don't want to sell their players.

However, from time to time, if you want to be accountable, you have to make hard decisions like selling your best footballer in order to be able to pay for contracts of your other footballers.

Actually, if you understand the tactics and use all the mechanics the game provides, you can avoid selling your footballers. 

Also, you can start playing in the Easy mode which just makes all the money-related spends to be much lower.

- - - - -
Also, hope this great guide might help you: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1849817698

Hope you will continue playing FTG and have a lot of fun!
Dev

author: {'steamid': '76561198031484594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 54222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26994, 'last_played': 1624070514}
review:
Simple enough to play for hours at a time, but complex enough to not get boring.

One suggestion for any new players: Don't start as a super low level team. None of your players will have skills or positions which takes away the fun strategic components.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005858671', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 15287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1472, 'last_played': 1659291472}
review:
Очень увлекся игрой. У игры огромный потенциал. Нравится простота, но в то же время думать приходится много. 
Сыграв 7 сезонов есть замечания:
1. Мало травм.
2. Вратари практически не травмируются. Достаточно одного вратаря в команде.
3. В режиме симуляции нет замен. Это плохо. Устают основные, а на лавке штаны протирают.
4. Дисквалификация за красную карточку в КУБКЕ, не должна распространяться на ЛИГУ. И наоборот.

Играем дальше, буду дополнять.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353596333', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 3742, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1705339674}
review:
Tutorial is over after ~7h. It's like chess. The football matches are the driving force here. Animations etc. are well done. But... is this all? Just a football chess? For 20+€? Not enough...

After another 11 hours of the same, I want to add:
 10 years ago, there were flashgames on kongregate.com for free with more action, depth and complexity. There is a chance here to become a good game. Looking at the announcement of the BIG addon coming, its at a snails pace and before its come to my vision for it, it will be dead. It's a good looking (for its frame) SCAM. Buy for 2$, not more.


I kept playing for a bit, and the weaknesses just keep getting more distinct. Not only that the training system is flawed, but there are basics that just don't fit.
Examples: If you have a defender against a crossing, (given the crosser doesn't mess up), the values are compared: heading defender (fine) vs. cross difficulty (???). Which in this case is fine gameplay- (chess) wise (since it rewards being able to hit harder crosses), but intuitively its nonsense.
On the other hand, after a corner, there is no gameplay counterplay to a tackling (skill) attacker. Just make it so that you lose the 'closer to the corner' control battle, pass there and tackle after. And tadaa you got a free shot from the closest distance with only the goalkeeper in the way. Those messy things combined with the mess that is the training/playing system (why deviate from well established systems? you want to invent the wheel anew, and yeah, one can see the result..) just makes the game a SCAM for 20+€.

I trained my squad with maximal speed for i think 6 seasons now, the skills are shaping up, but since i lost a lot, the experience is lackluster, which in turn slows skilltraining and makes the players with all their great skills have sucky attributes.

I'm not having fun losing a lot where i can do nothing about it. Either chesslike, or football managerlike, not this ugly mess in a nice dress.
developer_response:
It's far deeper than it looks at first.

The game is so deep that the tutorial even being so long can't cover everything. But when you learn how to use the lessons from the License tests, when you start using skills and crosses in every match, you will be able to see how tactically outsmart significantly stronger teams, you will feel how it is to build the great team.

It won't be an easy ride in the first place because you will have to actually learn how to use all the tactical arsenal. Many players learn new things even after 100 hours. Not saying about 10 hours.

Hope you will continue playing, won't surrender when it will be hard in Third league and finally feel the joy of building the great winner team.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029207915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 19920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1633209286}
review:
Stumbled onto this game and thought, "looks pretty shallow like a mobile game, I'll try the demo for 15 minutes before work". 2 hours later I'm having a blast and have been fired from my job.

It's simple enough to get right into it and have fun while being complicated enough that you'll be learning tactics hours later. My potato can run it without exploding, the graphics are cute and the music is pretty nice to listen to as well. I'm not sure how long it will keep being fun but at £20 its well worth the price for the hours of fun I've had.

This is a basic mobile level football manager game, so no complicated contracts or boards of directors. You buy or sell a player for his value or renew a contract based on it. You pick one of four attributes to train and can select a few skills to learn. Real basic and uncomplicated

The gameplay is like a game of chess, you move your players across the pitch to try and set up a goal, tackle other players and use skills to try and get past them to score. While trying to prevent your opponent from doing the same. You can employ a lot of tactics here. Only annoyance was the tutorial towards the end, it would be nice if you could skip or turn it off mid game, maybe you could and I just missed it.

Great game would get fired for again!

author: {'steamid': '76561198829167891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 337, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1711876776}
review: Отличная игра, нет миллиарда менюшек и параметров но есть самые важные из них. Ты не теряешься в хаосе цифр и имен но действительно чувствуешь себя менеджером команды и видишь, как твои действия влияют на успех команды. Это отличает эту игру от других менеджеров в которых все похоже на "действия игрока-?-какой-то результат". Здесь понятно что к чему приводит, и что надо менять. Не люблю футбол, но этот менеджер зацепил очень.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974896303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1594339500}
review: The game is a lot of fun. It has a ton of potential. I've sunk quite a few hours into it in a short period of time. It's a turn based football management sim; DnD meets footie. Your players make moves and the computer rolls for success. It's not very complicated but it is definitely enjoyable. I'm excited to see what it develops into.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069334048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 29144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13873, 'last_played': 1660886750}
review:
Ich möchte dem Spiel sehr gern einen Daumen nach oben geben, aber ich finde, dass gerade im Late - Game eine essentielle Spielmechanik (zumindest für mich) extrem störend und frustrierend ist. Ich muss dazu sagen, dass ich bei Games gerne eine Challenge suche und schwere Spiele besser finde als leichte... aber unfaire Spiele zählen dazu halt nicht.

Wenn man mit seinem Team ganz unten anfängt, hat man eigentlich keine Chance, innerhalb einer akzeptablen Spielzeit sein Team an die Spitze zuführen, auch wenn man die Mechanics ordentlich gemeistert hat. Ich meine die Tatsache, dass die gegnerischen Teams bereits nach wenigen Saisons haufenweise Spieler mit Talenten auf Stufe 2 und 3 haben, während meine Spieler gefühlt ewig brauchen, um diese zu erlernen. Es ist fast unmöglich gegen einen Gegner aus der Oberliga zu gewinnen, wenn dieser einen MF mit grottigen Werten, aber einem Grätsch- oder Lange Bälle Talent mit Stufe 3 hat (noch dazu habe ich das Gefühl, dass die "odds" im Fähigkeitenduell häufig gegen den menschlichen Spieler fallen, aber da kann ich mich auch irren). Zumal man sich diese Spieler als z.B. Regionalligist nicht leisten kann, da die Spezialfähigkeit über den Marktwert fast allein entscheidet (Bsp.: ich habe mal einen Spieler auf der Transferliste in der untersten Liga gesehen, der nicht einen fußballerischen Wert über 10 hatte, allerdings eine Spezialfähigkeit auf Stufe 3 und einen Marktwert von 1,5 Mio. - es muss ja nicht 100 % real sein, aber das ist absoluter Quatsch). Warum baut man nicht eine ligenbezogene Sperre ein? Als Spieler entwickelt man sich in der OL halt nicht weiter, wenn man dort ewig spielt. 

Somit konnte ich ab einer gewissen Spielzeit (selbst mit einem jungen Team mit für die Liga guten Gesamtstärke) Spiele, die ich selbst kontrolliert habe, nur mit viel Glück gewinnen oder wenn der Gegner nicht mit haufenweise Stufe 2 bis 3 Talenten auflief. Sobald ich das Spiel dann simuliert habe, konnte mein Team plötzlich mit 4:0 gewinnen (aber wenn ich die KI spielen lasse, stellet die sich meist sehr dumm an). Solche Diskrepanzen lassen mich glauben, dass nicht genügend getestet wurde. Ich finde die Präsentation und Machart des Spiels sehr gut und ich gebe dem Game noch eine Chance, aber bevor ich Statistiken einfüge oder anderen Kram, müssen die Mechaniken stimmen... und daran hapert es aktuell bei dem Game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991745750', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 65967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30634, 'last_played': 1694637654}
review:
This is one of my favorite games, as the tactical challenge this game poses is unique and very fun for me. Interestingly, I am not interested in soccer AT ALL, but that is not what drives this game, it is the hidden tactical depths that the gameplay provides. Sometimes i spend 15 minutes setting up my squad before a game, trying to counter all possible plays my opponent could make, while setting yourself up to score.
I would suggest you try the demo to see if you like it, but I can't stress this enough, YOU DONT NEED TO LIKE SOCCER TO PLAY THIS! It is a fantastic game that is very similar to a boardgame. 
In its current state, I played through the campaign on highest difficulty and there is nothing more for me to do, as there is 0 chance that any other team can beat mine at this point, but I hope DLCs will change that in the future. 
The developers are very helpful and actually work together with the community, which is a big plus in my book.

TLDR: Try the demo if you like puzzles or tactical games like FTL/XCOM/etc. Interest for soccer not necessary. Awesome game :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198006583541', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 15987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1140, 'last_played': 1686175234}
review:
Zaskakująco grywalna, gratka dla fanów każdej strategii turowej. Bardzo fajna mechanika rozgrywki, zasady są bardzo proste, ale kryje się pod nimi zaskakująco bogactwo możliwych rozwiązań i taktyk. Warto podkreślić świetną komunikację z twórcami. Małe studio rozwija swój produkt z pasją i zaangażowaniem oraz udziela pomocy graczom na forum społeczności.
Największe pozytywne zaskoczenie ostatnich miesięcy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085331501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1594161900}
review:
Just one more turn. (Repeat)

This little game has really grabbed me.  It is little in the sense that it doesn't have every option, top tier graphics, real world sponsorship, etc.  However it does what it does very well and captures the feel of football (soccer) with the fewest complexities possible.  It is still shockingly strategic and there is a learning curve, but the 'tutorial as you go' is very good.  I'm so glad to have this game in my life.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013698979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3016, 'last_played': 1593338030}
review: Забавная штука без лицензий на игроков и клубы. Очень напоминает премьер менеджер 99)) Пошаговая составляющая скучная. Симулировать игры и развивать игроков интереснее. Для разнообразия очень даже.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027574053', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5735, 'last_played': 1695412350}
review:
Ce jeu risque de vous paraître super au début. Vous allez vous dire rapidement : cool ça va être bon de monter les échelons avec une équipe. Puis vous allez comprendre que c'est hyper répétitif, mais vous allez vous accrocher, simuler les matches en attendant que vos jeunes s'améliorent plutôt que prendre rouste sur rouste en faisant du clic bouton.
Puis quand vous en aurez bien chié pour avoir une équipe décente, vous aurez quelques séries de lancer de dés malheureuses, et vous vous dire que vous avez bien perdu votre temps. Que tout cet investissement pour s'en remettre à du hasard, ça casse la couille.
Ce jeu, c'est comme si tu draguais la femme de tes rêves pendant des mois, que ça progressait doucement, et que le jour où tu penses conclure elle te dit : lance un dé, je coucherai avec toi sauf si tu fais 1. Bah sachez que on fait souvent 1 l'air de rien... Et même plusieurs fois de suite.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999261659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 6066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2651, 'last_played': 1703915743}
review: The game seems impossible to beat and repetitive at first. However, if you put in just a bit of investment to learn the scope of tactical and strategic possibilities, it turns into a mesmerizing  "just one more turn" simulation as you guide your team to the top of the Premier League.  In theory at least.  I still have not got there, but in just a few more turns, I'm sure I will.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139043741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 86348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73496, 'last_played': 1705945186}
review:
Witam, postanowiłem jednak napisać trochę obszerniejszy komentarz. Co mnie do tego skłania ? Chęć zachęcenia Was do zagrania w tę grę.

Czemu warto w nią zagrać ? Bo jest przede wszystkim do bólu logiczna. Jest to gra, w której jak sobie pościelesz, tak się wyśpisz. Jeśli myślisz, że w każdej grze tak jest, to się mylisz :) W jedne gry po prostu się gra, w innych buduje się własne światy. Ta gra należy właśnie do tych drugich (lepszy sort:P).

Cóż nas spotyka na początku ? Możemy wybrać grę spośród gotowych drużyn albo zbudować własną, wybrać też poziom trudności gry oraz to, czy gramy z samouczkiem, co polecam. Gra posiada bardzo proste zasady, co nie znaczy, że nie można się w niej zgubić.

Gramy 11 zawodnikami, z których każdy posiada dwa rodzaje umiejętności - te liczbowe, i te wyrażone za pomocą telentu. Umiejętności liczbowe wytłumaczę na prostym przykładzie - np. nasz zawodnik posiada 100 pkt accuracy, a bramkarz 150 obrony, mamy więc szanse 100 do 150 że uda się nam strzelić gola - jest to gra typu RNG (o czym szerzej można poczytać w sieci). Czyli tłumacząc na prostszy jeszcze rozum, z liczby 100 jest losowana jakiś numer, i z liczby 150 też jest losowany jakiś numer, i jeśli nasz będzie wyższy, strzelamy gola, jeśli niższy, może być co najwyżej róg.

Rodzajów strzałów są dwa - jeden, precyzyjny, który daje większą szansę zdobycia gola, ale też nie daje szansy, że piłka odbije się od zawodnika, i drugi rodzaj strzału - po którym odbije się od nóg zawodnika i poleci w dowolnie wylosowane pole wokół tego zawodnika.

Jeśli chodzi o talent, są jego trzy stopnie: Jeśli więc posiadamy np talent cannon ball 1 stopnia, oddamy jedną jego próbę strzału. Jakby to hm ująć, wartości liczbowe talentu wahają się od 10 do 1, i zależą od zmęczenia zawodnika. Zawodnik "atakowany" talentem zawsze posiada wartość obrony na poziomie 10. Atakujący zmęczony już grą ma obniżoną
wartość liczbową talentu nawet do 1. Jednak jest mały caczyk - możemy mieć talent na poziomie też 2 albo 3 stopnia i wtedy oddajemy odpowiednio dwie lub trzy próby. 

Talentów jest kilkanaście rodzajów, nie będę ich teraz wymieniał, dodam jednak że do wytrenowania talentów potrzeba czasu. Każdy zawodnik, zależnie od pozycji na jakiej gra, otrzymuje możliwość treningu jednego lub dwóch talentów spośród trzech losowych.
Pierwszy talent od góry jest zawsze najłatwiejszy do opanowania, ostatni trenuje się najdłużej.

Co jest bardzo ważne - talent nie wpływa na wyrażoną gwiazdkami siłę drużyny (!) wpływają na nią tylko wartości liczbowe umiejętności. Można mieć więc drużynę bez talentów z siła 5 gwiazdek i można mieć drużynę zawodników z których powiedzmy każdy ma dwa talenty 3 stopnia i mieć siłę drużyny powiedzmy 0 gwiazdek. Myk polega na tym, że wtedy realna siła drużyny, jeśli talenty są dobrze dobrane, jest olbrzymia. To mój ulubiony sposób gry, a czemu chcieć nie mieć wielu gwiazdek ?

Ponieważ w grze występuje gloria, za którą można kupować różne "rzeczy", przyśpieszać rozwój talentu, itd. Glorię zdobywa się wygrywając bądź remisując mecze z silniejszymi gwiazdkowo drużynami. Im my mamy mniej gwiazdek, a przeciwnik więcej, tym więcej glorii zdobywamy remisując bądź wygrywając.

Trochę się rozpisałem, dodam jeszcze że gra, poza tym że jest piękna, jest też na swój sposób i prosta, i trudna. Trudna na początku, co wiadomo, kiedy przytłacza nas nadmiar informacji. Ja np. zacząłem grać na pałę bez zainteresowania się mechaniką gry, i zagłębiałem się w nią dopiero z czasem. To błąd !! Jeśli dopiero zaczynasz grę, albo jeśli jesteś w jej środku, a dalej nie znasz zasad - poznaj, bo warto !:) Gra się odwdzięczy ! Warto jednak dodać że gra jest o niebo łatwiejsza i przystępniejsza niż niektóre kasowe managery, za którymi ja nie przepadam. Gra daje też wolność - nie musisz czytać maili, jeśli nie chcesz, nie musisz wszystkiego odhaczać. Gra przypomina o tym jednak, ale możesz to olać, najwyżej odejdą wszyscy zawodnicy jak nie przedłużysz im kontraktu :)

Doszedłem do miejsca w którym się zaplątałem, już nie wiem co więcej napisać, nie wiem czy tekst nie jest za długi, cóż, nie jest to poradnik, tylko zachęta, poradnik może postaram się kiedyś napisać :)

pozdrawiam !

author: {'steamid': '76561198057130420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 14625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8053, 'last_played': 1609993526}
review: A lot of fun.  The management and long-term development of your players is satisfying as well as the single-game tactics (and drama).

author: {'steamid': '76561198022110499', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 9042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5465, 'last_played': 1704427061}
review:
Esse p um jogo bastante interessante e se você procura realmente um futebol em turnos, esse é o jogo. Infelizmente, atualmente você está preso a um único clube, o que torna o jogo um pouco maçante - ao chegar ao topo não há muito mais o que fazer, e sinceramente já acabei parando no meio do caminho várias vezes.

Me parece que estão preparando uma expansão que foca em sua carreira, e não na carreira do clube - o que tornaria tudo mais interessante. De qualquer forma é um jogo bastante divertido e entrega facilmente o que promete, apesar de poder ser melhor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329012142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 143091, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 307, 'playtime_at_review': 131725, 'last_played': 1711863229}
review: 전략 시뮬 좋아하면 할만함. RNG 감소로 해야 운빨이 줄어들어서 더 전략적 요소가 강해지고 예측이 쉬워짐. 귀찮아도 처음 할땐 코치 노트(게임상 설명서)를 보면서 포지션별 특징을 분명히 숙지해야 함.
developer_response: Thanks for the review and have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198057856467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 27974, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6967, 'last_played': 1678135646}

la parte manageriale è molto basica ma sinceramente ormai i giochi manageriali di calcio sono diventati fin troppo esagerati e questo  è molto semplice e divertente da provare.
