author: {'steamid': '76561198143585209', 'num_games_owned': 223, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 17762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4749, 'last_played': 1702754997}
review:
Note liminaire : je n'y connais rien en football, mon avis n'est donc aucunement lié au réalisme de ce jeu - probablement assez limité. 

FTG vous permet de gérer un club de foot et de jouer les matchs sur le terrain. 

Les matchs se déroulent par défaut en 2 mi-temps de 24 actions par joueur, jouées par groupe de 3 actions. 
Il faut savoir maitriser le placement de ses joueurs sur le terrain et compte tenu du nombre restreint d'actions, il est aisé de voir ses formations (notamment en défense) partir en quenouille si l'on n'y prend garde. 

Le club va progresser à mesure de vos succès, pour se propulser si tout va bien de la division amateurs jusqu'en Ligue 1 (je n'y suis pas encore !!)

Pour marquer des buts, vous pouvez combiner plusieurs facteurs : 
- les caractéristiques brutes de vos joueurs (la précision par exemple pour celui qui tente le but, vs la défense des défenseurs, la défense de celui qui tente de prendre un ballon vs le controle de celui qui l'a au pied, la passe de celui... qui fait une passe ! etc.)
- leurs compétences, qui permettent parfois d'outrepasser ces caractéristiques en jouant la réussite d'une action sur un autre type de jets de dés. Et les compétences, tant actives que passives, offensives ou défensives, il y en a pas mal, entrainables sur 3 niveaux. 
- leur spécialisation : ailier gauche ou droit, milieu défensif, etc...qui leur ouvrent des actions ou des options spécifiques. La spécialisation s'acquiert progressivement, en plaçant un joueur à un poste donné et en lui faisant effectuer des actions sur le terrain, il acquiert des points de spécialisation.  Quand il en a suffisamment pour un poste donné, il gagne un niveau de spécialisation qui lui apporte des bonus (une spécialisation effective, de meilleurs entrainements, l'accès à un niveau supérieur de sa compétence, de la popularité etc)

Vos joueurs s'entrainent entre les matchs, il y a un marché des transferts pour en vendre ou en acheter (encore faut-il avoir l'argent pour ça) et vous devez améliorer votre staff et votre stade : 
- plus de places disponibles donc de meilleures recettes
- de meilleurs entraineurs (vous découvrez des joueurs meilleurs et plus jeunes, ce qui compte beaucoup puisque leur carrière s'arrête quand ils atteignent 34 ans)
- de meilleurs entrainements (vos joueurs gagnent plus de XP, et les XP servent à améliorer les caractéristiques)

Je ne vais pas entrer plus que ça dans les détails, il s'agit juste de donner ici une idée générale. 
En résumé, il s'agit d'un jeu relativement facile à prendre en main mais qui offre de belles possibilités tactiques. Les matchs sont courts et amusants. Vous pouvez jouer les parties en mode 'auto' si vous préférez et regarder le match en spectateur, ce qui permet d'étudier ce que fait l'IA et peut vous donner des idées si votre équipe est trop à la peine. Mais jouer le match soi-même, quitte à perdre,  est à mon sens nettement plus interessant. 

L'interface est très ergonomique, vous disposez d'une aide en ligne très bien faite, même pour un ignare en foot comme moi. Le développeur est actif et réactif, il continue d'apporter régulièrement des améliorations au jeu. 
Bref : que ce soit pour passer un moment de détente quand vous avez 20 minutes de libres, ou pour y passer l'après-midi si vous voulez aligner votre saison, FTG est votre ami. Que du +, pas de critiques à formuler (je rappelle que je ne juge pas le réalisme du jeu, je ne connais rien au foot et je me doute bien que ce n'est pas un remake de Football Manager 2018). Longue vie à FTG !

author: {'steamid': '76561198010012258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1547407439}
review:
Longtime football fan writing here.

There is an old saying - When you hear hoofbeats, look for horses, not zebras. This can be applied to videogames about football. When somebody mentions one, you will think about simulators like FIFA or PES, less likely managing games. But this game is a zebra - it's a turn based football game. Strange isn't it?

This bizarre concept has all the signs to fail. Football is fast-paced sport and all the tactical decisions are made in split seconds. But, if not for bizarre things, for what to live for?

If you are willing to accept this crazy idea, you are going to find very charming game. Most important thing here is, that this game loves football, I know it's a no brainer, but nonetheless important. Developers here are not going crazy about visuals, about engine, but simply, about football, and sometimes this love can be overlooked behind shiny graphics of AAA simulators, but here, in this cozy game, you feel it, you get it.

But, loving something is not enough. Just like in life, it's all about commitment. And the good news here is - developers commit. A lot.

Game looks simple, but do not let this fool you. Turn Based structure is just blueprint here, the game is all about numbers, and if you master this numbers, you master the game. In some sense, this game is visualization of a mathematical problem. We all dwelled on them in school, with their dry presentation as naked numbers and symbols, but here you get cool graphics, actual payoff to your work and it feels satisfying. You see the actions of your calculations and it is rewarding. Football covering of it all, is nice bonus. Even more if you love this sport.

It reminds of chess, the one in Harry Potter and come on, at some point we all wanted to play that. Animations are smooth, tactical elements deep and require actual thinking, UI can use some more tweaking, but it does not interfere with core experience.

One more great thing about this game is the comfort it provides. It is small, recourses required to run it allow you to do practically anything on PC. Turn based nature gives you room to browse web between turns, do other things. It is something that comes in handy. But game itself is not simple timekiller. It takes itself seriously and, in this case, it's good. Developers don't mess around with the word Tactics. Games with low level opponents are fun, but for a while, challenging ones with stronger teams, or against other players, won’t leave you willing to browse something else, concentration is the key here.

As a part of a small football fan-group, everyone I show this game gets charmed with it. The only thing we want at this point is a mobile version of it. Playing this game at work will be best thing to happen to work breaks since coffeemaker.
All in all, this bizarre concept works and it is testament to people who work on it, they commit to the idea to the maximum extent and it shows in their game. But personally, the feeling that they love this beautiful game, is the one I cherish the most.

P.S. guy from a train, gamescom 2018.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017792968', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 10213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2740, 'last_played': 1689544069}
review:
Cannot recommend this game highly enough - a truly immersive management game with a unique turn-based, skill-check system for the matches.

Off the pitch, there are many aspects. While each player has their natural style, you can influence them to develop in certain directions by choosing the attributes they should train and which special skills they learn. Contracts obviously expire, but if a player's going to retire you can spend influence to keep him at the club for a few more years (invaluable when you lack squad depth in certain areas). Hiring coaches improves the experience certain players gain (including the bench). There's much more too, like transfers and upgrades to the stadium.

On the pitch, there's just as much to consider. Something I love about this game is there is a true value to giving your youth players a run out, but this must be balanced with still having enough talent on the field to not suffer (and this can be unforgiving with the RNG skill-check system). Different weather conditions have different effects, which is another dimension to the game - hot weather means players fatigue easier, snow means skills are harder to use, rain means it's harder to pass but easier to commit a foul when challenging for the ball. Each turn you have three actions to spend, but every successful skill used on/through an opposing player is free, so you can end up executing a well-planned string of moves together and control the play. There's a sort of injury time system too in that certain events will reset the actions for the turn (a corner for example). Each player has a position and this comes with unique abilities, which grants even more depth and variety to the strategy. Much like real football, the formation you use will influence your match strategy more and more. Additionally, the more time a player spends in a position, the more profficient they become at it.

Only downside I found is that one or two of the mechanics aren't fully explained in detail, but that's rare and you will work them out as you play anyway. 

If you like football and turn-based games then there's no question that this game is an absolute bargain. Buy it, buy it now.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994050079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1568156843}
review:
EDIT: Joguei algumas horas após o grande patch lançado recentemente e os problemas continuam. É questão de conceito, só pra reforçar a analise abaixo e dizer que estou a desinstalar definitivamente o jogo:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sei que é só um jogo, mas ele falha miseravelmente em permitir que o jogador aplique qualquer tática minimamente realista. Você terá que aprender a jogar de um jeito que só existe na cabeça dos produtores... e que nem divertido é.

Não tive problemas para ganhar jogos, mas todas as minhas derrotas E VITÓRIAS pareceram ser totalmente artificiais... quando eu ganhei foi de goleada e quando perdi foi sem poder fazer nada para parar jogadores totalmente superiores.

Com esse jogo você experimentará momentos de tédio seguidos de frustração. Em momento algum me senti disputando uma partida, pois as táticas são totalmente irrelevantes, virando um bate-rebate padrão Série D da China.

PS: A parte de gerenciamento de clube é padrão jogos toscos para celular (alias, pra celular tem manager melhor... e tb jogo de futebol melhor).

author: {'steamid': '76561198028604140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 15899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2931, 'last_played': 1634324747}
review: Spiel sieht einfach aus, hat aber viel Tiefgang auf dem Platz. Wenn noch etwas fehlt, so könnte im Bereich Management etwas  mehr ggf. variabel Einstellbare Komplexität dazukommen. Auch wäre es schön das Ligensystem (wieviele Stufen mit jeweils wieviel Vereinen) selbst festlegen zu können. Das sind aber nur Kleinigkeiten, es ist ein super Spiel und verdient 95 von 100 Punkten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052635564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 10927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5083, 'last_played': 1640571412}
review: Not bad.
developer_response:
Hey! When you use all the available possibilities it's quite easy to score even to more powerful teams. Here are a few easy tactics which every tactician should use often:

- find or grow a RF/LF with high Control. Then - use Break in into the penalty zone from the corner tile. It's a very powerful weapon against the opponents who do not defend their flanks.

- learn how to score with Headers. After you learn how to do it and find a player with high Headers talent, you will use the crosses in every match. It's very powerful tactics.

- make sure you know how Cannon Shot works. Many opponents play with the opened wings. Layoff Pass + Cannon Shot allow for easy goals.

- usually, using skills makes a huge difference. There are many other tactical combinations which lead to the goals. 

Hope, you will learn these tactics and change your opinion on the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045607560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 7489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1279, 'last_played': 1540590238}
review:
Since the devs thought it would be a great idea to clutter the interface with a button to have players make a review, here is one such.

This is fundamentalle a very good game. It has no bugs that's I've noticed and the gameplay is great.

However, some of the skills are infuriating unbalanced. The worst is Rainbow Feint.
Get one good Forward with the Rainbow feint, and he's practically unstoppable. Since each new success allows for another action, these guys simply walk through 2 defenders AND the goalie. And with a level of 2 or 3 in this skill, they NEVER fail! 

I know there's a skill to counter the Rainbow Feint, but unless your goalie happen to get the chance to develop that skill, it's useless. Any moron, even the computer, will simply chose to someone else to use the skill on.

I'm completely dumbfounded as to how the dec could make such a fundamentally great gameplay, and screw it over royally with the skills.

Devs: Get a grip. Nerf!
How about not getting extra actions for this skill?
Or making it VERY exhausting, so a player can't really do it more than once.
At the very least, make goalies immune to it. 

All in all, a great game if the gameplay was balanced.
developer_response:
Thanks for the review! 

Actually, Rainbow Feint is not overpowered because there are CDs who automatically tackle the ball if someone moves near them. So if you (or AI) use CDs, the footballer with RF will probably lose the ball.

It's a pleasure to know that you like the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119809135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 28000, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10419, 'last_played': 1706911614}

author: {'steamid': '76561197968229441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1667158011}
review:
I have been playing Football Manager for decades now and I am really fed up that Sports Interactice (SIgames) and Sega as beeing the publisher of Football Manager (FM) do release a "new" version each year, BUT basically have no new features or ideas implemented but still charge a price way over the moon, where at max an upgrade price tag would be fair or at least should be offered to 1-2 versions backwards. 

Having said this, I red a comment about Football Tactics & Glory catching my interest in the game again, whereas it was on my ignore list at first. I played the demo now for a few hours and I am absolutely surprised by the content and approach. 

Whereas with FM you have the impression you get a lot of content and that you can change a lot of stuff and really do have an impact on your team, tactics, management side of the game etc. honestly I can tell you, FM lately seems to me beeing no more than a clickergame. Do a reload of your savegame and replay your match. No matter how bad your team is, sooner or later you will win the simulated match. And once you started testing this, you cannot stop doing it and end up with a run through the leagues and finally win the championship. Take a look at this review and the comments also and you will be confirmed, results in FM are more random and your decission on tactics or man management do not change this: https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2017/11/10/football-manager-2018-review/

So I would really like to asked you readers out there to invest your money in Football Tactics & Glory and not invest in a waaaaaay to expensive upgrade of your current FM2015-FM2018 installation, only to get some UI tweaks and coloring and a little change in the training for 50-60 Euros. This is stupid and money thrown at of the window. I would love to post something like this below FM Shopping page but I cannot. 

SO PLEEEEASE BUY THIS GAME, try the demo and I am sure many of you will like Football Tactics.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961012490', 'num_games_owned': 712, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 69226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 12737, 'last_played': 1711298239}
review:
Football, Tactics & Glory est un jeu de management d'une équipe de football. On doit gérer ses finances, ses entraineurs et son infractructure. En plus de cela les matches sont jouables au tour par tour.
Franchement derrière son air simple se cache une mécanique addictive soignée et pointue. La partie de management de son équipe est simple mais complète. Gérer les contrats, les entrainements, améliorer son stade, accéder aux listes de transferts etc... En plus de nombreuses statistiques existent pour ses joueurs ! C'est gratifiant de voir l'évolution de son joueurs et ses stats !
La partie match peut sembler grossière mais attention le système de tour par tour est très poussé ! Les postes des joueurs jouent un rôle primordial. Le schéma tactique est simple mais efficace. Les matches sont alors plaisant à jouer, regarder ou simuler (les trois modes disponibles).
Quel plaisir de mettre x saisons pour atteindre la ligue 1 et jouer les coupes continentales. Quel plaisir de faire progresser un joueurs et de le voir défendre comme un fou ou marquer des buts à la chaine.
J'ai apprecié l'option de garder une photo d'équipe, d'avoir une galerie des trophées...
Bravo aux développeurs !
Tester la démo pour vous convaincre que ce petit jeu est grand !

author: {'steamid': '76561197963813429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1701702562}
review:
Seems very promising. It's has a great blend of randomness that feels less punishing than bloodbowl and also more exciting when it succeeds. The players have names, skills, (are human), and they improve, and when Johansson Mangus ver Awesomesson does a slide tackle triple rainbow cross power cannon on the last play of the game, it's like I personally love him and want to extend his contract and look forward to coaching him next game.

There's a decent level of management at the meta level, but I haven't played any of the true manager games to really say that, but at least in comparison to oldies like NHL'95.

The only possible con so far is -- will it run out of awesomeness?

P.S. Thanks to devs for making a demo.

review: I don't have any deep observations but I had a lot of fun with this one. The individual matches are short so it's easy to play in bite sized chunks. Your players gain experience so you always feel like your making progress even when things go poorly. It can be very satisfying to look at the opposing teams line-up and formation before a match, think of a strategy, setup your line-up and postions, and then have your strategy work.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022447112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3658, 'last_played': 1539605442}
review:
Avec 70 heures de jeu mais 18 saisons à mon actif, 2 coupes de france, 3 titres de champion de France et LA coupe d'Europe, voici mon avis après avoir donc atteind le Graal sur cette dernière saison.
J'ai téléchargé l'excellent workshop "LFP" qui permet d'avoir les équipes de notre beau Pays, ça aide à l'immersion. 
Ensuite et bien, vous êtes dans un club amateur (super sympa de créer sa petite ville de campagne avec son logo et son maillot), donc faut pas s'attendre dès la première année à tout casser. Il faut construire une histoire et se projeter sur quelques saisons pour voir les fruits de son travail. Vendre les joueurs de 30 ans et plus, investir sur des jeunes, gérer le stade sans se ruiner, les jeunes, les entraineurs, les recruteurs... Vous aurez des décisions à prendre et des compromis à faire, voir des saisons "blanches" pour mieux rebondir la suivante.
Mon conseil, regarder les premiers match en spectateur pour comprendre l'utilisation des compétences et l'impact des postes - stratégies de placement, puis jouer mais après 1 ou 2 saisons, très vite en faite, vous basculerez en mode "simulation" et seul le résultat comptera et là, tout s'enchaine...
Le jeu est très adictif même si parait simple. Il n'est pas simpliste, et vous allez rager après les cartons rouges, les blessures, les fins de contrats, le coût des joueurs, les défaites, mais vibrer sur les victoires, les montés en divisions supérieures et la montée en puissance de votre équipe.
Au final donc un bon jeu, pas une claque non, mais il fait le job et vous tien au siège en solo. Maintenant après "seulement" 70h, et bien le but ultime est attein et plus trop d'intérêt à continuer. Le mode multi hélas est vide, on est pas c'est vrai sur une population à la PES MY CLUB, donc dommage car il y aurait certaiement des choses sympas de ce côté avec le mode spectateur et encouragements. A suivre, en tout cas je recommande au moins de l'essayer en démo, ça ne mange pas de pain...

author: {'steamid': '76561198007413460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 4171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1352, 'last_played': 1603464318}
review:
Altamente recomendable para los amantes de los juegos de táctica y estrategia. (en especial si les gusta el futbol)
Puedes comprar y vender jugadores, editar la vestimenta, tu escudo, alinear a tus mejores hombres o hacer que suban de nivel los mas inexpertos.
Tiene un potente editor de con el que podras poner la cara de tus amigos o jugadores favoritos a los miembros de tu equipo.
Iras subiendo la experiencia de tu equipo poco a poco, lo que hace que sientas que realmente son compañeros tuyos, ya que puede ser que tengas jugadores que han subido desde la categoria amateur a 1ª división (no sin esfuerzo)
Los desarrolladores estan en constante comunicación con la comunidad y van actualizandolo a menudo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025864100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1265, 'last_played': 1584826649}
review:
Simplesmente excelente!
É exatamente o tipo de game de futebol que eu procurava.
Queria algo em que eu pudesse focar em estratégia e evolução, sem me preocupar com jogabilidade e com interferências sem nexo do sistema no desempenho do time (quem jogou Fifa sabe do que estou falando), ainda com uma pitada RPG como a cereja do bolo.
Superou completamente minhas expectativas, que já eram boas com o DEMO.

Recomendo muito!

author: {'steamid': '76561197972562199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11508, 'last_played': 1554605971}
review:
J'avais envie d'un jeu de stratégie sur lequel passer de bons et longs moments.
Pour diverses raisons, je me suis détourné de NBA 2k (le dernier opus est... loupé, et toujours aussi cher un an après), de Jurrassic World Evolution (durée de vie trop courte détectable sans même y jouer, manque de contenu) et de pro cycling manager (j'ai le 2013, où les bugs et les crash ne sont pas fixés, et où il suffit de lire les évaluations des plus récents pour comprendre que la politique du studio n'a pas changé... Merci pour les corruptions de sauvegardes de plusieurs centaines d'heures Cyanide !).
Bref, je décide de jeter un coup d'oeil aux suggestions steam, et je tombe sur ce jeu. Après une brève hésitation, je me lance...
Installation, puis lancement du jeu....
Et là, apparition des symptômes :
 - perte de la notion du temps
 - humeur variant régulièrement et sans transition entre frustration extrême et triomphalisme non contenu
 - invasion de mon bureau de diverses fiches contenant statistiques, plans de jeu, caractéristiques de joueurs etc...

Cette liste (non-exhaustive) de symptômes ne laisse pas de place au doute : on a affaire à un très bon jeu de stratégie.

L'immersion est remarquable pour un tel moteur graphique. Les menus sont intuitifs (essentiel à mon goût pour de la stratégie, n'est-ce pas 2k ?), la personnalisation des équipes et des joueurs est incroyablement libre (un jour Nankatsu voir l'équipe du Japon d'un célèbre manga verra le jour, c'est sûr). La jouabilité est très correcte, et les tutos sont précis et clairs, sans être intrusifs ni à outrance.
Le reproduction d'une trentaine de championnat de différentes nations (européennes pour l'instant), est très satisfaisante, de même que la simulation des processus équivalent à l'indice UEFA qui déterminent les participants aux coupes d'Europe par pays.

Alors attention, il y a évidement quelque manques, comme les stats des saisons précédentes pour votre équipe (buts marqués, joueurs clés...), ou encore une sorte de "hall of fame" des joueurs passés par chez vous (ou pas, d'ailleurs). Par exemple un attaquant a porté  mon club jusqu'en ligue 1 à coup de trentaines de buts chaque saison, et une fois à la retraite, plus aucune trace de lui. Son nom, ses buts... Si vous n'avez pas "screenshot" sa page carrière avant sa retraite, tout sera perdu ^^
De même, distinguer les buts marqués (dans la fiche des joueurs) en coupe de ceux marqués en championnat serait une bonne idée.
Mais tout cela n'altère en rien le plaisir pris à manager votre équipe, à faire évoluer vos jeunes, à gérer votre budget et développer vos infrastructures !

En bref, si vous aimez les jeux de stratégie, foncez !
Faites juste bien attention à la RNG (Random Number Generation), réglable en début de partie, et dont tout dépendra.

review:
Меня давно уже ни одна игра так не цепляла! Хочется играть и играть и начать все с начала когда ты уже на вершине! 
Игра для тех кто любит стратегии и пошаговые стратегии. 
Лично я не люблю быстрых нажиманий кнопок - мне бы подумать над ходом, взвесить все за и против... Эта игра именно эти возможности и дает! 
Больше мне такого футбола не встречалось. Настоятельно рекомендую попробовать!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030217387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1689855101}
review:
Lascio qui sotto la mia vecchia recensione per segnalare che dopo più di un anno tutti i problemi che avevo segnalato nel gioco sono stati risolti: a inizio di ogni partita sarà possibile scegliere sia la componente di randomicità (normale, limitata o assente) sia il numero di turni fino ad un massimo di 94. Inoltre, le musiche del gioco sono parzialmente cambiate rendendo l'esperienza molto più "felice" il gioco quindi ora, è davvero ben fatto e lo consiglierei agli amanti del genere!


Ho avuto questo gioco nella lista dei desideri per più di un anno. Amando il calcio ed i giochi di strategia, pensavo che avrei trovato tutto questo in un unico titolo.
Onestamente sono rimasto fortemente deluso.

Gameplay: Il gameplay è esattamente come si presenta. Si schiera una formazione di 11 giocatori posizionabili a proprio piacimento in campo con l'obbiettivo (ovviamente) di fare goal senza subirlo. Per fare questo, i vari giocatori hanno dei parametri che segnano il loro valore massimo raggiungibile nel lancio di un dado, che si scontra contro quello avversario.
ESEMPIO: Il mio attaccante esegue un tiro per fare gol. Il suo valore di precisione è 50. Davanti a lui ci sono un difensore ed il portiere. Il loro valore di riferimento è DIFESA che è rispettivamente di 30 nel caso del difensore, e 35 nel caso del portiere.
Tutti e 3 lanciano un dado che potrà rilasciare un valore tra 1 e 50 nel caso del mio attaccante, tra 1 e 30 nel caso del difensore e tra 1 e 35 nel caso del portiere.

Già qui si nota il primo problema: per quanto possa essere forte il vostro attaccante rispetto alla difesa, non è detto che il suo tiro vada a buon fine. Questo perché il suo difensore potrebbe lanciare un 25 e il mio attaccante lanciare in 3.

Questo vale per tutte le azioni (passaggi-intercetto, contrasto andato a buon fine o no ecc..)

La prima cosa che dovete capire è questa: vi piace questa componente così terribilmente randomica? Ovviamente potete ovviare prentendo giocatori molto più forti rispetto all'avversario in modo che le probabilità di successo aumentino sulla carta, ma ad alti livelli questa cosa diventerà sempre più difficile in quanto i giocatori avranno dei parametri tutti molto alti ma tutti molto simili. Sta a voi capire se può piacervi questa cosa oppure no.

L'altro grosso difetto a mio avviso è il numero di turni. Se battere il calcio di inizio, avrete a dispozione 3 mosse da fare prima che il turno passi all'avversario. Però le mosse disponibili per ogni tempo sono davvero limitatissime. Di base potrete compiere un massimo di 2 manovre d'attacco nel primo tempo e 2 nella ripresa.

Questo vi porterà a tendere ad avere una strategia molto aggressiva, per evitare di incorrere in degli scialbi 0-0, pane quotidiano di questo gioco sopratutto inizialmente.
Questo fa sì che la vostra tattica e le vostre mosse siano sempre finalizzate all'agressione per segnare un gol, il che rende le partite alla lunga, molto monotone e uguali tra loro piuttosto che tattiche.

GRAFICA: Un'altro aspetto un po' mortificante è la grafica. Non parlo tanto della grafica del gioco ma piuttosto del contorno. Sembra di aprire un gioco degli anni 90', con pessime scelte di design, tipografia e colori. Alla lunga questa cosa risulterà un po' pesante

SOUND DESIGN: un aspetto che personalmente mi ha dato molto fastidio è il sound design. Le musiche del gioco sono fortemente malinconiche, scelta che onestamente non riesco a capire. Lato campo da gioco le esultanze dei tifosi saranno sempre uguali per qualsiasi tipo di gol, cosa che nuovamente, alla lunga stanca.

Io ho chiesto e ottenuto il rimborso per questo gioco, trovo che aveva tutte le potenzialità per essere davvero divertente, la qualità è lì e si può quasi toccarla. ma per quanto mi riguarda, non è riuscito a farmi innamorare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073717527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1002, 'last_played': 1536112294}

author: {'steamid': '76561197988011502', 'num_games_owned': 628, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1056, 'last_played': 1536486343}
review:
As a newcomer to the management sims I think this is a really solid little game. 
There are so many things I love about it that I'd recommend it as a fun way to enjoy turn-based tactics which are rarely done well in any genre and *especially* with soccer, so 2 of my favourite things together is a treat! I don't think there's a real barrier for people who don't play soccer/football except for the offside rule which hasn't come up in my games. 
This is like most manager games: about balancing stats in the right positions so your players can do the job you need them to. I've found the starting game hard since you keep moving up leagues without getting much more money or top players on my budget. It means you have to work hard getting my average players to do very specific plays for a chance against the 2nd league and above, with players that double your stats. 
There's a lot of satisfaction beating teams with higher star ratings than you and SLOWLY ending up on top of the league, learning from losses and discovering new moves by letting the computer play for you with the "watch" option.
That being said there are things I'd like to see improved. It would be great if the developers are able to add clearer tutorialising and explanations of moves and tactics to make matches and your manager's objectives less confusing (like the cannon shot which will always have a defender in the way if you try to do it how the tute explains). 
*EDIT* I previously said match turns couldn't be edited because I had done the tutorial and continued that game without seeing customisation at a new game screen. Often the default turn limit means that a row of 4+ defenders stop your forwards from moving since you'll have low "Control" stat to dribble past them and no time to play around before the game ends so consider putting it higher. Often because you're outclassed/outstatted, you just have to lose the ball if you still have it at the end of the turn, or get near the goal. 
The skills are a gamble but computers seem to win skill test RNG a weirdly high % of time (though you can make it in your favour if you want from a new game). Another critique is that diagonals are really hard to cover even with 3-4 defenders and it's not clear when opponents have a clear line to your goal if shooting diagonally between defenders. Most of the time your defensive line gets caught out because you can't move them to respond to a side step unless they're specialised in a certain way, so you have to overcommit to defenders or trust your keeper. 
As you can see there's a few things I don't think are perfect, but the game keeps being pretty deep and fun regardless, and it's one of the few games I've paid more than $20 AUD as a student and I don't regret a second.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092669392', 'num_games_owned': 3585, 'num_reviews': 345, 'playtime_forever': 3154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2675, 'last_played': 1623271099}
review:
[h1] Football, Tactics & Glory – тактический футбол во всей красе [/h1]

Football, Tactics & Glory была разработана украинскими ребятами из студии Creoteam во Львове. Вышла игра под названием Football Tactics, но позже была изменена на то название, которые мы видим сейчас. В релиз игра вышла 1-ого июля 2018-ого года.

[list]

[*] Игра начинается со сцены, где мы играем очень важный матч. Но в очередной атаке под нас делают подкат и нас «ломают». После этого проходит несколько лет и нас приглашает президент какого-то клуба из четвёртого дивизиона на место главного тренера. Выбора у нас нету – мы в деле. 
Вы можете выбрать абсолютно любой футбольный клуб, то ли это «Спартак», то ли «Челси», даже «Реал Мадрид» - всё равно вы начнёте со дна, с четвёртого дивизиона и ваш состав будет рандомно создан. Нашей главной целью будет поднятие команды из дна к олимпу и победе в междуконтинентальных кубках. Теперь же разберём некоторые возможности по порядку.

Прокачка футболистов. Прокачка осуществляется автоматически после сыгранного матча. Выбирать же специализацию и прокачиваемую статистику выбирать вы можете сами. Хотите защитника? Пусть играет на защитной позиции и прокачивает «Защита», нападающий может прокачивать «Точность», полузащитник «Точность» и так далее. 

Прокачка команды в общем. Вы можете нанять скаутов, тренеров и расширить стадион. Скауты будут искать вам лучших игроков мирового класса, тренеры будут давать бонус к прокачиваемому параметру футболиста, а расширение стадиона даст больший прирост фанатов и увеличит прибыль с домашних матчей. Менеджмент вашей команды очень важен, так как без этого всего продвинуться будет уж очень сложно. 

Игровые симуляции и игра. Игра справедливо расчитывает ваши шансы на победу и выдает результат, который очень близок к тому результату, если бы вы играли сами. Но вот перезапуск игры в конце игры иногда помогает и после таких нескольких перезагрузок вы сможете выбить себе победу в матче. Игра же, представляет пошаговые сражения, где нам нужно владеть мячом, высчитывать наши шансы и забивать/защищаться. Всё зависит от прокачанных навыков наших футболистов, а также от их статистики. 

Немного случайности. В игре изменяется погода, что влияет на игру ваших подопечных. В снежную погоду пас будет менее точным и травмоопасность также возрастёт. Это вносит разнообразие и в так ситуативный геймплей.

Кастомизация. Кастомизировать в Football, Tactics & Glory можно всё: домашние и выездные формы, название и логотип клуба, всех футболистов, подписывать разных спонсоров, которые будут отображаться на ваших джерси и это всё делает игру невероятно реалистичной. Я лично тратил по пол часа, чтобы сделать хорошие формы на каждый сезон. Наверное, лишь на это я потратил 5 часов своей жизни, но я об этом ни капли не жалею, так как когда у меня ещё может появится способность стать главным тренером топовой команды, хоть и в компьютерной игре? 

[*] Выглядит всё очень приятно. Игра сильно изменилась с моего первого входа в неё. Были проработаны лица, добавлен редактор игроков, добавлены празднования игроков и всё в этом духе. Выглядит пусть и не очень реалистично, но для инди-игры это зачастую недостижимая планка качества. 

[/list]

Вердикт:[i] великолепный футбольный менеджмент-симулятор. Может быть это не Football Manager 2018, но это точно лучший футбольный инди-менеджер. Возможно он лучший, потому что таких больше нету, но это уже не так важно. Важно то, что игра стоит своих денег и отдаёт взамен незабываемые ощущения.[/i]

Оценка:[b] 9.7/10.[/b] Великолепный менеджер, особенно для любителей футбола.

Обзор был составлен Ci8, главным куратором в [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/bigbadwhl] BigBadWhale Games[/url], куратором в [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Obzzor4ik]«Обзоры онлайн»[/url] в сотрудничестве с [url=http://welovebundles.ru/]BELONGPLAY[/url] 

[b]P.S.[/b] Это мой 200-ый обзор. Спасибо всем, кто читает и комментирует мои обзоры. Это очень приятно.

Оценка редакции:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1276824468

review: Que buen juego, alguna vez cuando era niño jugaba en un tablero con unas fichas y simulaba algo parecido solo que con dados, en fin este me hace recordar a esas epocas y creo que eso me ha hecho unir mas a este juego, de hecho justo mis dos modos de juego favoritos en uno, estrategia y futbol. Solo pienso que le cambiaria algunas cosas del juego como mejorar el talento saque de banda que casi no se usa y me parece menos util que otros talentos. y por el contrario el de pase largo es muy fuerte en mi opiniion, aun asi se puede frenar relativamente si se tienen solo jugadores que intercepten lo cual no siempre se puede. en fin, muy buen juego

author: {'steamid': '76561198853730703', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2280, 'last_played': 1627136149}
review:
Futbol'a yeni  tarz katmış bir oyun.
-Stratejik olarak iyi bir oyun olsa da oyun daha çok başlangıç kadronuza göre şekilleniyor.Oyunun zorluğu iyi bir düzeyde çok akıcı bir oyun olmasına rağmen bir yerden sonra oyun kendini çok tekrar ediyor.
-Tur tur ilerleyen oyunda her turda 3 hamle hakkımız oluyor.
-Oyuncuların seviyesi oluyor seviyesine göre hücüm,defans,kontrol ve pas yetenekleri artıyor.Kadro arayüzünden 
oyuncunun hangi özelliğini geliştirmesini ayarlayabiliyoruz.)
-Bir oyuncu maç içinde yaptığı hareketlerle puan kazandıkça(maça çıkma,pas atma,müdahalede bulunma,gol atma,asist yapma,maçın adamı olma gibi olaylar ile) beceri puanı kazanıyoruz bu puanları istersek oyuncunun mevkisini geliştirmede istersek sponsorluk tekliflerinden daha yüksek para alma,ve özel yeteneğinde kullanabiliyoruz.
-Özel yetenek oyunun ilk turu kullanılamasa da çok önemli bir silah.
-Altyapı kısmına değinecek olursak 6 ayda bir oyuncu çıkıyor ve oyuncunun bir seviyesi oluyor.Oyuncuyu oynattıkça(maça çıkma,pas atma,müdahalede bulunma,gol atma,asist yapma gibi olaylar ile) oyuncunun seviyesi artıyor.Bu oyunları her maç oynattığınız takdirde yaklaşık 3-4 sezonda çok iyi bir paraya satıp kadronuzu geliştirebiliyorsunuz.
-Kulübün maddi dengesini sağlamak adına zor bir oyun sponsorluklardan çok oyuncu geliştirip satmanız gerekiyor.Geliştirmeler kısmından transfer listenizi geliştirebiliyorsunuz.
-Eğer oyunda çok ilerlerseniz şampiyonlar ligi ve avrupa ligine gitme şansınzı var fakat lisanssız.
-Oyunda onlarca lig ve binlerce kulüp var fakat kulüp adları lisansız.Not: Kendi takımınızı,logonuzu ve  formanızı  kendiniz yapabiliyorsunuz.Eğer fotoğraf png ise logonuzu internetten yükleyebilirsiniz.
-Oyunun twitch modu var bir işinize yarar mı çok sanmıyorum ama yayıncı iseniz gayet keyifli olabiliyor.İzleyicelerin tezahüratlarına göre oyuncularınız moral kazanabiliyor vs.
-Gayet detaylı bir oyun.Ülke puanı gibi olaylar var.
-Oyuncu isimlerini ve yüzlerini değiştirebiliyorsunuz.
-Oyunda hiç bug olduğunu düşünmüyorum.
-Yakında gelecek yeni dlc ile detaylar çok daha artacak.Oyun gelişmeye devam ederse büyük bir potansiyele sahip.
Özet:Fiyatına değeceğini sanmıyorum.Futbola ve stratejiye karşı büyük bir ilginiz yoksa tavsiye etmem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141247859', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1560905477}
review: El sucesor de International Super Star Soccer, campeonato brasileriro noventa y ouuucho. Bueno, exagere un poco. El juego zafa y entretiene. Tiene cierto toque de originalidad, al tener que planificar y no freneticamente, que vamos a necesitar para futuros partidos. Mediocampistas, nos jugamos por la defensa, o que caracteristicas de jugadores tenemos. Fultbol, turnos, estadios a desarrollar y miles de insultos ante unas probabilidades que no siempre nos favorecen. Me caaaggg$#$%""%". En fin, dejo un video con mis experiencias personales. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rwhRuAN0DY ¿Recomiendo el juego? Si, pero principalmente si esta de oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198402077707', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2936, 'last_played': 1558446065}
review:
이 게임 재밌음. 본인은 축구에 대해서 잘모르고 FM도 안해본 축구누비임
턴제게임을좋아해서 일단시작해봤는데 첨에는 그냥 스텟 주사위 운빨겜이네 싶다가 
전략과 전술을 알게되고 더 집중하면서 게임하다보면 이게 그냥 관전하면서 기도하는 운빨게임이아니란걸 알수있음.

대표적으로 공격수의 스킬 레인보우페인트와 수비수와 골키퍼의 스킬 리액션이 있음. 
시스템상 리액션 >레인보우페인트이고 압도적으로  수비수가 유리한 상황에서 
포메이션과 선수풀로 상쇄할수있음. 

주사위를굴린다는 점에서 이게왜운빨겜이아니야 !?? 싶겠지만

높은스텟을 가진애가 무조건 이긴다면 그건 린저씨와 다를바없지않는가?

축구 관해서 잘모르던 여자친구한테도 압도적 따봉을받은게임임. 

강력 추천

author: {'steamid': '76561198131745621', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 9029, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3234, 'last_played': 1675546463}
review:
Jeu très addictif donc faites attention, à l'instar d'un FM, il y a un fort risque de rupture avec votre compagne. 

Le jeu parait simpliste au premier abord mais ses mécaniques sont assez complexes, et prennent du temps à être assimilées.

Cependant, et là attention je vais rager sec.

-Il est dommage d'avoir la sensation que les autres clubs sont morts... aucune intéraction avec, ni avec leurs joueurs.
-Les saisons passent et on a pas la sensation que les clubs adverses évoluent. Les nuls sont toujours nuls et les bons sont toujours bons.
-Pas de compétences "morales" pour les joueurs, ils ne ressentent rien, à contrario d'un FM.

Les points noirs:

Pas la possibilité de faire un contrat avec un joueur de plus de trois ans... c'est assez bête.
Du coup on fait éclore des jeunes pousses, on peut pas leur signer de nouveaux contrats de trois ans car ils ont appris des skills et deviennent très cher en contrat, ils  vieillissent (fin de carrière à 34-35 ans c'est le endgame des joueurs) et si on décide de les vendre pour récupérer de l'argent... ON LES VEND A NOS ADVERSAIRES DE NOTRE PROPRE LIGUE (95% du temps) C EST RIDICULE !

On ne peut pas, ne pas vendre un joueur à un club d'une autre ligue, c'est rageant quand celui-ci vient te mettre un but quand tu le recroises en championnat. (D AILLEURS LES AUTRES CLUBS CDES QATARIS PAS DE SOUCIS D'ARGENT POUR EUX ! 

 Les prolongations de contrats vous pompent un fric énorme si vous voulez conserver vos meilleurs joueurs... qui le sont vers 31-32 ans au début.... et puis paf ! Ils arrivent à 34-35 et c'est la fin de carrière, il vous faut de nouveaux joueurs pour les remplacer... mais qui ont des stat' très basse... donc vous perdez vos matchs contre vos anciens joueurs qui jouent dans les autres clubs....ZAVEZ COMPRIS LE CERCLE VICIEUX QUOI ! 

DONC MISEZ SUR LE CENTRE DE FORMATION !

Je rage aussi sur la difficulté du jeu, je suis en L4 depuis... 9 saisons. Je n'y arrive vraiment pas. Il faut absolument jouer sur les skills de ses joueurs pour regagner des tours d'action.. ET MEME QUAND LE LANCé DE DéS EST FAVORABLE çA RATE  MON ACTION, MAIS JAMAIS QUAND CEST à L IA DE JOUER !!!! ARGHHH !!!!! ET MEME PIRE LE LANCé DE DéS EST EN DéFAVEUR DE l'IA, ET çA PASSE... 

C'est carrément punitif !

Mais sinon il est super cool comme jeu, ça rend zen, vraiment !

A prendre en promo steam !

EDIT 21/08   →  Je mets une évaluation négative, car le systeme financier du jeu fait que lorsque on grimpe dans une ligue supérieure (ENFIN !) on ne gagne pas d'argent si on a pas le bon sponsor....Le sentiment de progression est compliquée quand même...

En match quand on fait des changements il faut que le ballon sorte en touche... ET CEST VOUS QUI DEVEZ LE METTRE EN TOUCHE, du coup vous perdez votre tour, où alors c'est à la mi-temps... C'est pénible, ça brise la dimension tactique quand on veut changer des joueurs ou corriger sa stratégie.

Autre chose, une fois qu'on a trouvé le chemin pour marquer... et bien il suffit de le refaire pour marquer un second but, l'idéal est de miser à fond sur les compétences spéciales de vos joueurs...ça rend le jeu là encore moins interessant car l'adversaire (IA) ne s'adapte pas à vous.


C'est quand même un jeu sympa, surtout au début.... mais y'a des ajouts à faire avant de vraiment s'éclater et de sentir qu'on progresse et de sentir que l'univers du jeu est riche et complet..

author: {'steamid': '76561198068101743', 'num_games_owned': 390, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1029, 'last_played': 1592123272}
review:
Game 'asked' me to give it a review so here it is. Football, T&G is a must play for people thinking Dark Souls games are imbalanced. Sadly, a waste of time and money. Buy only if you ever dreamt of playing a spreadsheet game with a ridiculous RNG , lack of fun and tedious progress.

EDIT:
The real fun begins after you move up to the next division. Opposing teams have 80% of the time better players and the 'random' roll favors their players more often than yours. All the hope in your bright players, whose contract costs rise exponentialy. And if you get relegated to amateur season you can as well start the game from scratch. Every fun aspect of the game is mirred with broken core mechanics. Not recommended in this state.
developer_response:
I know that we might not teach players properly in the game, but when you learn how to use skills/classes/crosses, you will see that you can beat much stronger opponents. 

RNG is fair because of the main goal if the game is to create a living football world where your decisions matter. Players remember when RNG played badly for them but do not pay attention when RNG was bad for the opponent. Don't simulate matches, learn to use skills and crosses. It will pay off hugely.

Also, you can subscribe to the modifications and start directly in Premier league if you choose the option "Sandbox". There, you will have already great players, so you shouldn't wait while they will become better - they are already great.

Hope, you will give the game another chance. It is very balanced for those who mastered the game's mechanics. When you start using Cannon Shot/Rainbow Feint/Crosses etc, when you prepare tactically for every match - you will see yourself how strategical and deep the game is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003265831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2483, 'last_played': 1585370705}
review:
It is a soccer/futbol form of Final Fantasy Tactics.

Very deep game for what it is.  Lots of factors go into every match.  

Do not worry if your first team takes a while to succeed.  I was able to get to 3rd league by season 2 but i was not able to consistently stay in 2nd league until season 6.  Thereafter I did not reach 1st league until season 14.  

Read the Footballpedia (?) Icon and look up what you can!

author: {'steamid': '76561198162095671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3045, 'last_played': 1563837574}
review: the demo doesn't do the game justice. the game shines if you take a long-term approach. it's pretty well though out and balanced both on a strategic (club development) and tactics level. rng is frustrating at times, but usually with good tactics you can counter that. the rules are simple but complicated enough. though you will find your preferred way of scoring and defending it's impossible to win every match playing the same way and some adjustments are necessary before each game. olympic kick seems a bit op, though, but it's not always possible to get a corner kick... it's quite challenging to balance the books, invest in club and keep a competitive team, and i like the challenge - i'm in my 14th season and im still in the second league, but i have a quite good youth academy now, and should get promoted this season. you have to sell your best players from time to time in order to prolong contracts with others. the world seems to be simulated well enough, other teams also sell players and you can see that sometimes they suffer because of it. overall, it's a nice, simple but at the same time deep game. if you like football, or if you like turn based strategy games you should like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030391458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 3607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2360, 'last_played': 1639341778}
review: Leicht zu erlernen, schwierig zu meistern. Mit integrierter Cheat-Möglichkeit. Stinkreich aus der vierten Liga das Projekt Europapokal angehen - das macht noch mehr Laune als ständig jeden Spielgeldschein zweimal umzudrehen. Zum Spiel selber muss ich wohl nicht viel sagen - einfach nur klasse. Ich habe schon viele Stunden investiert und ständig lerne ich neue Spielzüge und Tricks (wenn die Spieler erfahrener werden und spezielle Fähigkeiten entwickeln). Wem die 20 Öre zu viel sind: Das Spiel taugt mehr als viele Vollpreisspiele. Außerdem gibt es hier eine Demo. Unbedingt ausprobieren!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011165338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 7023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6824, 'last_played': 1533905488}
review:
Ez a játék fantasztikus volt korai fejlesztésben. És igen, sikertült, sikerült kegyetlenül elszarni a végleges formára. Nagy gratula érte a fejlesztőknek!!! 

Én az elejétől fogva a hard módot preferáltam, de az "újításoknak" köszönhetően már nem nehéz a mód hanem kínszenvedés. Eddig csak lvl 1-es játékosokkal kezdett az ember, semmi skillel, de most már a specializationok is nagy hátrányt jelentenek az elején. Kell pár szezon, hogy az ember felszárkózzon. De akkor még minding sokkal több 2-3 . szintű skillel rendelkező  játékosai vannak a gépnek. Ez sem gond. De erre még rátették, hogy a gép gyorsabban, mi lassabban fejlődünk. Plusz rájön, hogy a gép 6 védővel játszik szinte minden meccsen. Ehez jönnek a skillek, specializációk, és ott van egy áthatolhatatlan fal. És ráadásként a dobásoknál kegyetlenül a gép felé húz a játék. A dobási értékeknél ha körülbelül 30-as értékek vannak 80%-ban 10 alatti a dobás, míg a gépé 20+. 

Vannak könnyebb módok, de ott már nem a 0-ról építkezik az ember. Számomra ez a része volt az ideálís amit játszhatatlanná tettek. 

Nagyon nagy ötlet volt, de szerintem sok benne maradt, és én nem vagyok a specialization rendszerrel kibékülve. Ez a része tönkretette a végleges játékot.
developer_response:
Hallo! Sie können die ältere Version ohne Probleme spielen:

1) Drücken Sie in Ihrer Steam-Bibliothek die rechte Maustaste auf Football, Tactics & Glory
2) Klicken Sie auf Eigenschaften
3) Beta-Versionen
4) Wählen Sie 'default9'

Es ist die Version des Spiels, bevor wir dem Spiel Klassen hinzugefügt haben.

Ich glaube jedoch, dass Sie in den letzten Versionen des Spiels viel Spaß haben werden, wenn Sie lernen, wie man die Klassen benutzt. Wie auch immer, hoffe, dass die Fähigkeit, die Version zu spielen, die du magst, deine Meinung über das Spiel ändern wird.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024469649', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 5664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5633, 'last_played': 1533917514}
review:
I spent many hours on the game since I bought it and a storm is reigning in the skies.

The conclusion : a very good indie game.
After spending so many hours refining a team (and save scumming), I can tell you :

- the mechanics are great and propose a working football urn based experience that scales with the level.
- you can play turn based matches, or watch your team in a match controled by the computer (both teams), or just have a simulation and the final score.
- technical aspect of the game is solid and well done, it is also limited without any extra whatsoever (no splash screen for anything as an example, winning a cup is underwhelming in terms of feedback), the game kinda reminds me of evolving your team through Speedball 2, and it's a good thing.
- good music to go with the game, good sound design generally speaking.
- The game proposes the hiring/selling of players, making your infrastructure better (stadium size for tickets $, more experience for players in the 4 positions (GK, D, M, F) and bench, and scouting new or available players.

From the second point, the technical limitations, the turn based animation and graphics are well made, the only glitch is it takes sometimes a bit of time for the engine to take a decision, then play animation etc. A bit more fluidity in all actions and some bit of refinement on the User interface are the 2 points that could have been made better.

Important note : there is an option to turn the game speed x1/x1.5/x2, use that.

Then, there is the limitations of scope for an indie title. I compare the game to Battle Brothers which also lacked a bit of scope / depth. For example, international transfers and some star system, maybe a bit more individualisation in the training.

Also there are a few crashes, which are not a big deal but still happen sometimes.

All and all, this is a very well made indie game which rightfully deserves its high very positive rating on Steam, I highly recommend  it.
If you are tempted, there is a demo available on the store page..

author: {'steamid': '76561198116490436', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1537390688}
review:
[quote][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/8049466/]Folgt unserer Kuratorseite:[b] GGC-Curations[/b] wenn ihr mehr Reviews wie diese lesen wollt.[/url][/quote]

[h1] Fußball... in anders! [/h1]

Football, Tactics & Glory ist ein Fußballspiel, in dem du deinen Verein zum Erfolg führen musst! Dabei ist das Spiel kein klassischer Fußballmanager, aber auch kein 08/15-FIFA-Klon.
Während des Fußballspiels musst du die Mannschaft steuern – das ganze passiert allerdings rundenbasiert und auf einem 10x7 Quadrate großen Spielfeld. Ähnelt vom Gameplay her also eher Strategiereihen wie X-COM oder Might and Magic. Außerdem ist die Wahrscheinlichkeitsrechnung wichtig, ist der Mittelfeldspieler gut im Passen ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass ein weiter Pass ankommt, höher als bei einem schlechten Passspieler. Die Spieler kann man durch ein gutes Talentsystem nach eigenen Belieben verbessern.
Tatsächlich ist es anfangs wirklich ungewohnt, rundenbasierten Fußball zu spielen. Nach wenigen Spielen gewöhnt man sich allerdings daran und es macht wirklich viel Spaß und fühlt sich stimmig an.

[h1] Abseits des Rasens... [/h1]

… hat FTG auch etwas zu bieten. Man kann Verträge mit Sponsoren abschließen, Mannschaftsverbesserungen wie ein größeres Stadion kaufen und natürlich in den Transferperioden mit Spielern handeln und das Team verstärken. Außerdem gibt es regelmäßig neue Jugendspieler des Vereins, die es zu verbessern gilt. Leider fällt der Wirtschaftsteil des Spiels etwas mager aus, es fehlt an Optionen wie Eintrittspreisen, Merchandise etc. Wer einen komplexen Manager sucht, ist hier fehl am Platz.

[h1] Das Äußere [/h1]

Grafisch sieht FTG gut aus. Natürlich kann man so ein Indiespiel nicht mit großen AAA-Titeln wie FIFA vergleichen, trotzdem sehen die Menüs aufgeräumt und die Spieler ebenfalls gut aus. Es fehlen allerdings Dinge wie Zuschaueranimationen, welche für noch bessere Stimmung sorgen würden. Soundeffekte sind gut, allerdings könnten ein paar mehr vorhanden sein. Bugs oder Abstürze hatte ich während des Spielens nicht. Der Preis von 19,99€ ist zwar relativ hoch, Fußballfans können für den Preis allerdings mit gutem Gewissen zuschlagen.

[h1] [u] Pro & Contra[/u] [/h1]

+Tolles Konzept
+Gute Grafik
+Spannende Spiele
+Keine technischen Probleme

-Wenig Managementmöglichkeiten
-Zu wenig Soundeffekte

[h1] [u] Wertung [/u] [/h1]

[u] Spielspaß: 45/50 [/u]
Durch das interessante rundenbasierte Konzept macht das Spiel wirklich viel Spaß und Spiele bleiben spannend.

[u] Grafik & Design: 15/20 [/u]
Grafik und Design sind gut, allerdings recht wenig Animationen.

[u] Sound & Musik: 5/10 [/u]
Etwas wenig Sounds, Musik in Ordnung.

[u] Technik: 5/5 [/u]
Keine Abstürze oder Bugs, gute Performance

[u] Preis/Leistung: 4/5 [/u]
Fußballfans können zuschlagen

[u] Support: 5/5 [/u]
Entwickler antworten im Forum und veröffentlichen Updates nach dem Early Access. Modsupport und Workshop vorhanden

[u] Spieleinstieg: 5/5 [/u]
Simples Konzept – allerdings hart zu meistern. :)

[h1] 84/100 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198076830437', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 8045, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7711, 'last_played': 1534275132}
review:
I have never played a sports related game (even the big ones such as FIFA, FM, NBA, etc), so I didn't know what to expect when I bought this game even though I had a glimpse of gameplay thanks to the Korean streamer hanryang1125 on Twitch.

The first few hours were tough and very frustrating since there was a lot of knowledge to absorb from the get go, but once I figured out the skills and roles of the different positions, the game became quickly fun and addictive. This took me around 2-3 days, which was around 12 hours play time iirc. It might feel easier for people who played Football Manager before, but since I have never touched FM before I have no idea how the two games compare.

In the game there's a clear goal that you can strive for, but personally there isn't much more to do after achieving the highest goal besides maybe figuring out and testing new tactics. I won a treble with two clubs I created, once with default options and the other with more actions per game, but still on normal difficulty. Once you had a working tactic, the game became quickly very easy, but I believe you can get more challenges by playing on increased difficulty and with the worst RNG option.

I don't think I'll touch the game again unless there's a huge content update, but I got my fun out of it (look at my play time!!) and I hope everyone enjoys it as much as I did!

author: {'steamid': '76561197990450376', 'num_games_owned': 1558, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1147, 'last_played': 1710926064}
review:
I just reached the third league, and I'm hooked on this game. The management is not as deep as in other football manager games like "On the ball" (German title: "Anstoss" (IMO one of the best football manager)), but it is fun. The turn-based matches are also really nice. It's like Xcom meets football.

Maybe the beginning isn't easy - so don't enforce to leave the amateur league in the first season. And place your young players as soon as possible. The youngster will thank you.

Edit: I voted it for the Game of the Year Award.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083896544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2964, 'last_played': 1576343500}

author: {'steamid': '76561198010989155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 37686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5447, 'last_played': 1709951714}
review:
177 hours in this and I am not remotely bored. It's outstanding.

It's football (the soccer variety) rendered as a turn-based, tactical boardgame, a bit like Blood Bowl does with American football. But gridiron is already a game of discrete 'plays'. Soccer isn't, and turning it into one has produced a game simultaneously tight and fluid as you seek to identify and exploit weak points. The interplay of positional abilities, skills and attributes makes for endless combinations and intense depth. Cheap plays are possible - as in the real sport - but so are pitch-sweeping, end-to-end moves, galactico skills, diligent pressing and thuggish recklessness. Getting a result against a superior opponent is as satisfying as it should be; there are dice rolls a-plenty, but you always know why you won and lost.

The tactical excellence is wrapped in a simple but thoroughly functional strategic shell that involves trying to build up your club, rise through the divisions and excel in continental competition. A bit like a very stripped down Football Manager, but it is just as detailed as it needs to be.  Visually the game is a delight, the players endearingly cartoonish particularly in the post-goal animations (this is why I'd really love to see female footballers should that become feasible), and when they are assembled for squad photographs.

If that doesn't convince you, there is an excellent demo that shows off the game very effectively. Play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037148900', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5486, 'last_played': 1632766637}
review: This is will be my first full review of a great game for those that are fans of football, rpgs, turn based, micromanagement, complex decisions path making. For those looking to buy the game but have not made a decision on if its worth the money. The truth is that the game is WORTH every penny and why you still reading this and not buying it!!!! Graphic are positive and elegant in its simplicity. (the devs continue to improve this with each update) Game play is amazing! The complex learning curve is what can lead you away however if you stick to it, the game is more satisfying then watching 3d models of characters attempting to follow your tactics only to fail in the 90 min... Here you win or lose depending on many factors but ultimately your decisions is how far into glory you will go. Think of it as a game of chess, its not the 3 moves you currently have that will lead you to victory but maybe the 3 moves on the following turn that will determine the outcome. I think the beauty of this game is the complex system of different systems working together to drive the mechanics of the game. Broken down in Specializations (aka Talent Tree), Glory (aka pvp points or raid/dungeon tokens), Money (aka Money), Player management (who to bring to the raid/dungeon), and Skills (aka skills). there is a factor of randomness from rolls that can happen however this is a feature included by the devs to simulate the truth of football, ANYTHING CAN HAPPEN, the best players in the world miss the easiest shots in the world sometimes. Just like the least likely player can score a majestic goal from anywhere in the field. Hands down one of the best games I have ever played and will continue to play it for years to come.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971035314', 'num_games_owned': 911, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 11925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5186, 'last_played': 1635435127}
review:
Mini Eng: Supper addictive turn based strategy tactical game with football/soccer setting. You will want to play one another more match to see your team and players progress. [A little RPG element for player stat and skill]

สรุป: เกมส์วางแผนผลัดตา ออก Tactical ที่โคตรสนุกติดหนึบบ แบบ ขออีกเกมส์หน่ะๆ เพื่อที่จะดูทีมและผู้เล่นของคุณก้าวหน้าขึ้นไปๆ (มันมีความเป็น RPG เล็กๆ แบบผู้เล่นในทีมเวลอัพ เก่งขึ้นได้)

---------------------------------
ยาว อธิบาย ระบบเกมส์ด้วยนะ 

เป้าหมายของเกมส์ก็แล้วแต่นะ แต่หลักๆก็น่าจะคือ เริ่มจากทีมสมัครเล่น ไต่เต้าผ่านลีคสมัครเล่น ไป Division3, 2, 1 จนถึงปลายทางแชมป์ Premier League หรือ เอา 3ถ้วยใหญ่ในปีเดียวกันให้ได้ 

จะไปถึงจุดนั้นเกมส์ประกอบไปด้วยสองส่วน
1. ส่วนจัดการทีม ระหว่าง match มองซะว่าเป็นเกมส์ แนวว FM ที่ฟีเจอร์น้อยกว่าเยอะ สิ่งที่ต้องทำ 
- ก็แค่คอยบริหารผู้เล่นของคุณให้ดี เพราะ ผู้เล่นมีสัญญา ถ้าหมดก็ต้องต่อ 
- การต่อต้องใช้ตัง ตังหาได้จากการตัดสินใจเลือก Sponsor ตอนเริ่มลีค 
--- หรือ การขายตัวผู้เล่นออกไป 
--- หรือได้จากนัดที่แข่งในบ้าน  
- เมื่อทีมมีชื่อเสียงจะสามารถจ้างโคชที่จะให้โบนัสประสปการณ์แก่ผู้เล่นในตำแหน่ง 
--- หรือความสารถของหน่วยหาตัวผู้เล่นเพิ่ม 
- เราสามารถเสียตังเพื่ออัพเกรดสนามจะได้เก็บค่าตั๋วได้เยอะขึ้น 
--- หรือจะสร้าง Youth Academy ที่จะทำให้ดาวรุ่งเข้ารวมทีม(2คนต่อ1 season)เก่งขึ้น
- แล้วก็มีส่วนที่ต้องเลือกการฝึก skill ให้กับผู้เล่นต่างๆ

2. ส่วนของ การแข่งในนัด คือ Tactic เกมส์อย่างแท้เลย
- ใน 1 turn แต่ละฝ่ายจะได้ 3 move 
--- เกือบทุก action ในเกมส์ การเลี้ยงบอล การส่งบอล การยิง การเข้าสกัด ใช้ 1 move [ยกเว้นบางตำแหน่งอาจจะใช้บาง action โดยไม่เสีย move เช่น Center Midfield สามารถ pressing ฟรีถ้าอยู่ในเขตตัวเอง]
- ฟังดูอาจจะน้อย แต่เมื่อเล่นไปผู้เล่นเราจะได้ skill พิเศษที่นอกเหนือจากตำแหน่ง skill พวกนี้ (เช่นส่งไกล) หากใช้ผ่านคู่ต่อสู้และสำเร็จ จะถือว่าไม่เสีย move 
--- ทำให้การวางตำแหน่งตัวที่มี skill ดีๆ อาจจะทำให้ เราพลิกเกมส์ได้ใน turn เดียว

- เกมส์ใช้ค่า Stat กับ RNG ในการตัดสินความสำเร็จของบาง action โดย การดวลคือ การที่ ระบบจะสุ่มตัวเลขตั้งแต่ 0 - ค่าพลังที่ใช้ ดวลกับ การสุ่มตัวเลข 0-ค่าพลังของอีกฝั่ง ใครได้ตัวเลขมากกว่าก็ชนะ
--- เช่น การยิงประตู คือการเอา Stat ACC ของผู้ยิง สมมุติ 100 เอาไปดวลกับ Stat DEF ของผู้รักษาประตู สมมุติ 200  ระบบจะสุ่ม 0-100 ดวล กับ การสุ่ม 0-200 
--- ผลลัพธ์ของมันอาจจะเป็นไปได้ตั้งแต่ 100vs0 = เรายิงเข้า  2vs2 = เสมอกันให้ถือว่าคนออกคำสั่งชนะ = เรายิงเข้า 100 vs 101 = ผู้รักษาประตูรับได้ 
--- แปลว่ายิ่ง Stat เยอะ ก็มีโอกาสจะชนะได้เยอะกว่า แต่ไม่ได้การันตีว่าจะเป็นแบบนั้นเสมอไป  (เขาให้ถือว่า เหมือนวันนั้นทีมยอดเยี่ยมดวงไม่ดัอะไรแบบนั้น ฮ่าๆ)
** แต่ถ้าไม่ชอบการสุ่มบ้าบอ 0-XXX ตอนเริ่มเกมส์มันเลือกการสุ่มแบบความน่าจะเป็นได้นะ  คือระบบDefault นี้ตัวแกเก่ง stat200 ก็มีโอกาสแพ้ตัว stat 20 ได้ ถ้าดวงบ้าบอ การเปลี่ยน option จะทำให้โอกาสแบบนี้เกิดขึ้นน้อยลง

- ที่ว่าไปนั้นคือการดวลตัวต่อตัว แต่ในความเป็นจริง มีอะไรที่ซับซ้อนกว่านั้นอีกเยอะ แต่เกมส์จะโชให้เราเห็นแล้วเข้าใจได้ไม่ยาก
--- เช่นการยิงประตูจริงๆ อาจจะมีกองหลังต่ำแหน่ง DF ที่สามารถช่วยตัดบอลได้ แปลว่า จะเป็นการดวล ว่าเรายิงประตู 0-100 vs ค่าป้องกันของกองหลัง 0-100 ถ้าชนะ ก็ยังต้องไปดวลกับ 0-200 ของโกลอีก อะไรแบบนั้น หรือถ้าเรายิ่งห่างโกล จะโดนลด% ความแม่น เหลือแค่ 0-60 อะไรแบบนี้
--- การดวลอื่นๆก็มีแบบว่า ถ้าส่งลูกเลียด โอกาสผ่าน 100% แต่ส่งได้แค่ไม่กี่ช่อง ถ้าจะส่งไกลๆ จะเป็นการโยนบอล ใช้ stat PAS ดวลกับ ค่าความยาก เช่นห่างไม่มาก ก็60 ห่างมากๆ ก็110  ก็เวล 0-PAS กับ 0-60 หรือ 0-110 อะไรแบบนี้ 
--- การเลี้ยงผ่านกองหลัง ใช้ stat CTR ดวล กับ DEF หรือบางทีในศึกกลางอากาศก็จะเป็น CTR ดวลกับ CTR

- เพราะงั้นจะเห็นว่า Stat ของผู้เล่นมีผล ยิ่งไปลีคใหญ่ขึ้นผู้เล่นจะยิ่งแกร่งขึ้น ก็เป็นความท้าทายในการบริหารทีม 

- แต่ทว่าอาจจะรู้สึกว่า เห้ยถ้าไปเจอทีมบอส Stat 100++ เราจะไปสู้ได้ไง ผู้เล่นเราเริ่มมาได้ 20 เอง กว่าจะเก็บเวลอัพได้เพิ่มอีกเวลละ 2-3 
- เกมส์เลยมีอีก step ที่เน้นการใช้ skill (อันเดียวกับที่บอกว่าใช้ผ่านศัตรู แล้ว จะได้ move free) 
- การดวลของ skill จะไม่ขึ้นอยุ่กับ stat แต่ขึ้นอยู่กับเลเวล skill 1-3 โดย การดวล skill จะเป็นการดวล แบบ 10vs10 เท่านั้น โดยเลเวล skill ที่มากกว่าคือโอกาสในการ สุ่มผลลัพธ์ใหม่ ได้หลายรอบขึ้น
--- เช่นการส่งบอลยาว จะไม่สน stat ต่อให้ตัวเรา PAS แค่ 5 กองหลังศัตรู DEF 200 ระบบจะจับมาดวลกันด้วย 0-10 vs 0-10 โดยถ้าเรามี skill เวล 2 เราจะทอยได้สองที เช่น ทีแรกได้ 1vs5 แพ้ จะทอยได้อีกที 2vs2 = เท่ากัน = เราชนะ  การส่งจะสำเร็จและเราไม่เสีย move ด้วย 
--- ทำให้การมี skill สำคัญ อาจจะยิ่งกว่า Stat ด้วยซ้ำ
- แต่ skill ก็มี skill ที่ counter กันได้ เช่นการส่งยาวที่ว่า จะมีskill intercept ที่ เมื่อเทียบ จะเอาเลเวล skill มาลบกัน เช่น ถ้าเรามีส่งยาว เวล 2 เจอกับ skill intercept lv 1 ผลคือเหมือนเรามี skill ส่งยาวแค่ lv1  ถ้าศัตรูมีskill lv เท่าเรา = เราจะใช้ไม่ได้

ทั้งหมดนี้จะเห็นได้ว่ามีกฎพอสมควร แต่กฎนั้นเข้าใจไม่ยาก มี in game guide ให้อ่าน เล่นไปซักพักเริ่มเป็น จะสนุกมากๆ

เพราะเมื่อแข่งเสร็จ เราจะได้เลเวล ไว้อัพ stat ตามที่เลือกไว้ รวมทั้งจะได้คะแนนความเชี่ยวชาญตำแหน่งที่เล่น ทำให้เปลี่ยน class เป็นตำแหน่งนั้นๆ ได้ความสามารถพิเศษของตำแหน่งนั้นๆได้  ก็เล่นกันมันนั่งปั้มเวลตัวนั้นตัวนี้ ขออีกแมช อีกตัวจะอัพแล้ว วนไปเรื่อยๆ ติดหนึบสนุกมาก แนะนำให้เล่น

ลองโหลด demo มาเล่นก่อนก็ได้ว่าชอบไหม แต่ demo skill อาจจะยังไม่เยอะ หลังๆมันจะบ้ามากยากมากอยู่ สงสัยก็ถามได้ครับผม

author: {'steamid': '76561198041176170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 7517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5664, 'last_played': 1587630556}
review:
Un juego mezcla de futbol y combate por turnos. Si te gustan los juegos de futbol y los de turnos tipo Battle Brothers, este juego te gustará.

Además, la inteligencia artificial es bastante buena, cosa difícil de ver en muchos juegos. La AI aprovecha las habilidades de los jugadores rivales para meterte un gol.

Football tactics and glory ha sido para mi una agradable sorpresa. No pensaba que fuera a enganchar tanto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988687436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1600387142}
review:
Was soll ich sagen. Einfach großartig. Habe es schon überall im Bekanntenkreis weiterempfohlen. Eine unglaublich gut umgesetzte kleine Fussballsim-Perle. Der Management-Part hat gerade genug Tiefgang, dass es nicht langweilig wird, ohne den Spieler mit Möglichkeiten zu erschlagen. Man sollte einige Werte seiner Spieler im Auge behalten und muss ab und zu ein Talent auswählen - es macht viel Spaß, die Trainigserfolge der Mannschaft zu verfolgen! Das Kernstück ist aber natürlich der Rundentaktik-Fußballpart: Grandios. Ohne Worte. Auf den Punkt die beste taktische Fußball-Umsetzung, von der ich nicht einmal ahnte, dass sie möglich ist. Spielfluss, Spannung, Taktik, Präsentation: Ein unglaublich stimmiges Gesamtbild. Das Können jedes Spielers ist sehr gut zu spüren, die technischen Unterschiede toll umgesetzt, das Gefühl, gegen eine technisch deutlich überlegene Mannschaft zu spielen, aber durch eine gute Taktik das Augleichstor mit der allerlezten Aktion zu schaffen, unbeschreiblich.  
Fazit: Football, Tactics & Glory ist ein herausragendes Fußballspiel zwischen Manager und Rundentaktik, das für viele viele Stunden unheimlichen Spaß macht und immer etwas neues bereithält. Eine unbedingte Spiel- und Kaufempfehlung!

author: {'steamid': '76561198386386718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2441, 'last_played': 1537690674}
review: 이 게임은 어렵지 않고 쉽게 할 수 있음.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324386023', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 151951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4593, 'last_played': 1709948045}
review:
This is a great game--my all-time favorite game on Steam, as you can probably tell by my hours played, well over 2000 hours now, in the 2 years (whoops, now 5+ years in mid 2023) since I first bought the original version in 2018, after trying the demo. There have been 2 DLCs and countless free upgrades to the game since then (not just patches).

TL;DR: Fantastic, turn-based game with tons of depth. Get it and the 2 DLC altogether. :-)

===

The game is sometimes described as "soccer/football meets X-Com", which is sort of right, in terms of the turn-based play, but it's really MUCH more than that. It's a must-have if you like turn-based games.

The 2 excellent DLCs, have pretty much made it into a whole new game. The free upgrades have been great as well.

I am not even a big sports fan in general, but it still has me hooked. I'm amazed at the depth & detail the developers have put into this game, and continue to do so with regular updates, improving the game (not just bug fixes--bugs are rare anyway, in my personal experience).

Two new DLCs (really, updates reworking and adding a LOT of mechanics to the base game) have been issued at very reasonable prices in the last year or so. I'd recommend getting everything (the base game & both DLCs) all at once, as they change a lot of things, making it the way to go.

Free user mods are available on Steam Workshop, which provide real-life team/league logos & uniforms for many, many countries/leagues.

The devs are *very* responsive on the discussion board, and post frequently, answering gamer's questions & providing lots of info.

If you're a fan of turn-based strategy & tactics, and are the least bit interested in soccer/football, you'll love this game. It's well worth the full price. Heck, it's worth more than the full price! Download the free demo and give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974466003', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 14694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6723, 'last_played': 1657577220}
review:
Kurzes Resümee nach über 100 Spielstunden, 7 Saisons und kurz vor dem Aufstieg in die 1.Bundesliga:

Eine Art X-COM für Fußball-Fans, ohne große Präsentation und Firlefanz, mit einer recht einfachen Spielmechanik, die aber erstmal durchschaut und richtig angewandt werden muss.
Das Ganze hat einen Hauch von Schach. Bei jedem Gegner musst du vor dem Spiel erstmal erfolgreich seine Stärken und Schwächen erkennen und mit den Stärken und Schwächen deiner eigenen Mannschaft kontern können. Das klappt mal mehr, mal weniger. Manchmal hilft der Zufall, mal nicht, genau wie im echten Fußball.
Das kleine, feine Spiel macht einfach nur unglaublich Spaß - und süchtig! Auf die spezielle Art, wie es eben nur ein neues Spielprinzip machen kann.

Geeignet für Spieler,
die mehr Wert auf Taktik und Nachdenken legen als auf Reaktionsschnelligkeit und Fingerfertigkeit am Gamepad.
die gerne ihre Jugendspieler und ihren "Dorfclub" Stück für Stück aufleveln und sich später über deren überlegene Fähigkeiten und jeden Aufstieg in die nächsthöhere Liga freuen.
die auch gerne handeln und Spieler günstig kaufen, weiter entwickeln und später teuer verkaufen wollen.

Eher nicht für Spieler,
die an den früheren Fußballmanagerspielen besonders die detaillierten Taktiken, Daten und Statistiken geliebt haben.
die an FIFA das Selberspielen und die schnelle Action mögen.
die den Zufallsgenerator (Würfelglück) bei X-COM und Konsorten hassen. 

Wobei ich meine, dass dieses Spiel das Thema Zufallsgenerator besser löst. Ein gewisser Zufallsfaktor spielt im echten Fußball ja tatsächlich eine Rolle. Das Ganze würde sonst auch langweilig werden, oder?

Das Beste: Es gibt eine Demo! Also probiert das Spiel einfach aus! 

Nichts gegen Lets Plays, aber eine Demo ist schon besser, um ein Spiel wirklich selbst einschätzen zu können. Daher einen großen Dank an die Entwickler für die Demo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198184405598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1979, 'last_played': 1664170376}
