Подписывайтесь на [/i][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/32707647/]куратора[/url][/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197966913375', 'num_games_owned': 1010, 'num_reviews': 192, 'playtime_forever': 931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 927, 'last_played': 1528809344}
review:
The game features a single player campaign mode where you lead a team from the amateurs to the premier league, signing new players and upgrading facilities along the way. There is also hotseat and online multiplayer, but no single games against the AI. There is good mod support with Steam Workshop integration. Players have four stats (accuracy, passing, defense, and control) that determine how high their random dice rolls go; skills are also available to use during games in special situations. Players gain experience during matches that can be used to unlock new classes (sweeper, full back) with additional game attributes. Each match is turn-based: a team gets three moves before control is passed to the opponent. Players can move, dribble, pass, shoot, hold the ball (which increases control), tackle, press (to make it easier for a second player to tackle), swap positions, cross, or break in. Free kicks, corner kicks, and penalty kicks allow for limited player positioning before the play starts. A lot of the game’s strategy involves initial placement of players on the field, and then using their abilities to move the ball into the net. This results in a lot of formation changes and counters to those changes during the course of a game, at least when humans are involved: while the AI is good at the game, it never alters its formation during a match, causing a successful plan to be able to be repeated. Two things prevent Football, Tactics & Glory from being a great game: the lack of single games against the AI, and the static formation usage by the computer opponent.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pkHbWaN6bes

author: {'steamid': '76561198170347127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 4098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2645, 'last_played': 1695450294}
review: Перепиливаю свой обзор. Я дал игре шанс. Но она этого шанса не заслуживает. В описании указана что это футбольные герои меча и магии, так вот - ЭТО ОХРЕНЕТЬ КАКОЕ ВРАНЬЁ! Игра дисбаланасна настолько насколько это возможно. Идея бесспорно интересная, но реализована крайне криво! Большая часть игры отдана на откуп рандому и если со скилами ещё можно худо бедно настроить чтобы комп подкручивал счётчик в вашу пользу (а на деле играл на равных) то с навыками полная беда. Если у компа есть игрок  с навыком обводной финт хотябы еденичка он обведёт всю вашу защиту. даже если он копец как устал (если у неё нет навыка реакция), а вот если у вас есть игрок с обводным финтом уровня 3 а у самого захудалого  защитника соперника реакции нет - то будьте уверены он остановит вашего напа при любом раскладе. И так практически с любыми навыками(а игра строится исключительно на них). И как бы печально это не звучала эта игра гринд игроков, причём при таких условиях гринд идёт через 50% поражений что на третий сезон надоедает невообразимо. И да, не ведитесь на демку этой игры и коментарии автора о том что игре надо дать ещё шанс. Я повёлся и ещё 20 часов в топку. повторюсь - идея была хороша, и чисто в теории могла бы быть лёгкой альтернотивой уже приевшемуся ФМ-у, а так...дно из дна этой игре.
developer_response:
Мне жаль, что вам не понравилась игра. Я понимаю, если бы что-то было плохо сделано или жанр вам не нравился. Но в вашем случае, похоже, вы не до конца разобрались в игровой механике.

Когда вы выстраиваете игру, учитывая не только базовые действия, такие как отбор/контроль/удар, а и *навыки* и *классы* футболистов, то игра все меньше зависит от рандома, все больше от вашей тактики. Да, неудачные броски происходят, как и в реальной жизни, но при грамотной тактике они нивелируются позиционированием и правильными решениями. Т.е. на длинной дистанции успех вашего клуба зависит только от силы вашей команды и ваших тактических построений.

Для примера, выберите режим рандома Ожидаемый, и просто играйте в режиме просмотра матча. ИИ знает, как использовать классы и навыки футболистов. Скорее всего, вы увидите, что ИИ управляет вашей командой не так, как это делаете вы. И если вы поймете, почему ИИ принял то или иное решение, если примете это на вооружение, то ваша игра будет значительно лучше. И в итоге вы сможете играть лучше, чем ИИ.

Если посмотрите скриншоты в коммюнити нашей игры, то увидите, что многие игроки выигрывают своей слабой командой (2-3 звезды) значительно более сильные команды (4-5 звезд). Это возможно именно потому, что в FTG главную роль играет тактика. Но пока не знаешь механики, то кажется, что всем управляет рандом.

Надеюсь, вы дадите игре еще шанс, научитесь использовать навыки, и сможете вывести свою команду в высшие лиги.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014872948', 'num_games_owned': 1507, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1644932959}
review:
Marvellous tactics with rather unusual (turn-based sports-game) setting; the only similar thing I could recall is Blood Bowl, but, obviously, Football, Tactics & Glory is different in many ways compared to it, mostly conercing realism (yes, you cannot bash heads of goalkeeper, at least not intentionally). 
Eloquent graphic design and enticing gameplay encaptivated me, and I am more than happy with my purchase. Creoteam made a very unique product, which I most certainly recommend to both football and turn-based tactics fans; detailed in-game encyclopedia, in-deth tutorial and smooth gaming process makes it easy to learn, but hard to maste~ HARD TO SCORE A GOAL WITH YOUR LOCAL SOCCER TEAM AGAINST REAL MADRID VETERANS. 
... And so big is the joy when you do so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071860461', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1529701747}
review: 本质上是随机数比大小。钱太少，买不了球员，升不了各种设施，只靠踢比赛涨经验得7，8年才能涨到最高属性100，然而乙级联赛对手已经有射门101的大神了。足球里速度可以说是最关键的属性，然而本游戏并没有速度这个属性（这种回合制也不好体现）。适合做成手游，端游我为啥不去玩FM。

author: {'steamid': '76561198250573562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 6231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 999, 'last_played': 1653788687}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996450068', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1666517547}
review:
First off, reminds me of back in the day as a youngster, playing Subbuteo (a football/soccer board game) and brings back wonderful memories.

Turnbased Soccer/Football.... I wasn't sure either but so far I have been having a blast. Who would have thought taking RPG/Strategy turnbased combat (Xcom2, Divinity Original Sin, Final Fantasy Tactics, etc..), Elements of Tycoon games and mixing it with sports would be so fun. If you like turn based rpgs or if you enjoy sports games check this out (Or if you enjoy both like me that is another reason to get the game). Turnbased, Tycoon style soccer/football, check it out!

Football, Tactics & Glory >>>> The last few years of Fifa games

author: {'steamid': '76561198068635757', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1532924574}
review: The action you can take is so less. The match is way to short, Most likely you will get 0-0 or 1-0 everymatch. Usually you win because you are lucky on shoots and not because you are skillful. Terrible experience for me personally.
developer_response:
Hi! 

Please, learn using skills, you will be able to win opponents easily. When the president gives you the task to use Rainbow Feint - he wants to show that it is easy to score if you use the right tactics. Also, there are explanations of how to use every skill.

Skills are your most important scoring tool. The game's depth goes from combining the skills and football classes. Shooting from the long distance is the worst tactics. You should learn hot to use every game's possibility to get closer to the opponent's goal. If you read every old coach's letter and use everything he suggests, you will be able to score much more.

You can start a new campaign with the Tutorial option and bigger amount of matches.

Hope, you will give the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198290188920', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 1317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1315, 'last_played': 1560895722}
review:
Lo que más me gustaba del PES en la PS2 era el elemento RPG de subir a los jugadores de nivel, aquí han cogido eso y lo han mejorado. Me gustaba poder personalizar los equipos y jugadores, aquí eso también está mejor. No tiene licencias, pero en el Workshop están todas al alcance de un click.

Cuando el PES se fue al garete, probé con los FM... Creo que hace falta mucho coco, mucho conocimiento, demasiado serio, parece un trabajo más que un juego. Aquí lo han simplificado todo y es más divertido, dinámico, vistoso.

A todo esto súmale que puedas jugar los partidos de forma estratégica, a lo X-COM, Heroes of Might & Magic, Captain Tsubasa de la SNES...

Eso sí, es difícil de coj***s, para llegar a 2ªB pueden pasar años y años.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027855869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 13159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8251, 'last_played': 1685392194}
review:
Eine klare Empfehlung,

hier stimmt das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis auf jeden Fall. Es macht Spaß, hat taktische Tiefe und sollte alle glücklich machen, die sich für Fußball-Management-Simulationen begeistern können. Für alle unentschlossenen gibt es ne Demo zum Download.

+ "Nur noch ein Zug"-Syndrom
+ Gute Tutorials, da sollte man genau aufpassen
+ Steam-Workshop Support gleicht die fehlenden Lizensen aus
+ Das Spiel hat eine gute Twitch-Unterstützung (Die Fans in-game geben Sprechblasen mit den Twitch-Chat Kommentaren von sich; es gibt Abstimmungen für Zuschauer, Follower werden zu Spielern im Spiel des Streamers etc.)
+ Anspruchsvoll, aber Schwierigkeitsgrad lässt sich nach oben oder unten korrigieren, je nach Bedarf
- Musik wird manchmal abrupt unterbrochen, aber man kann sie auch einfach abschalten

author: {'steamid': '76561198038662768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1528407718}
review:
Interessante Spielidee nicht zu einfach.

Die ersten Eindrücke des Spiels sind doch sehr interessant. Thematiken mit rundenbasierender Strategie kennt man bisher nur aus Civilization (Strategie Spiel, rundenbasiert) und Omerta (Gangster Strategie Spiel, rundenbasiert) und das Management aus den üblichen Fussball Managern. Hier werden beide Aspekte miteinander vermischt. Das auf eine sehr inspirativen Art und Weise. Man kann in 3 Schritten die Spieler befehligenund somit Tore erziehlen, Freistöße abwehren oder selbst ausüben usw.. Das Vormanegement läuft wie in jedem vereinfachten Fussballmanger. Man plant seine Aufstellung, kauft Spieler, baut Gebäude / Stadion aus und verbessert die einzelnen Mitarbeiter-Fähigkeiten.

Es gibt zwar noch einzelne Schwachstellen die man anderen Bewertungen entnehmen kann. Die Spielidee an sich sollte man aber im Auge behalten. Diese ermöglicht eine neue Art des Fussballmanagers.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991027182', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 670, 'last_played': 1578699039}
review:
Zajímavá gameska co spolehlivě zažene nudu :) Jde o fotbal manager který lze hrát i s práteli, pokud jste streamer je zde propojení se službou twitch, takže diváci ti můzou povzbuzovat hráče, radit ti :)

Vybereš si team, sleduješ trh, obchoduješ, vylepšuješ, zdokonaluješ hráče a pak se pustíš do hry. 
Styl hraní je na tahy kde má každý tři tahy. Porovnávání šancí, potenciálu a dovedností. Je to fakt zajímavé. Po grafické stránce průměr, ale díky tomu zvládne i slabši PC. Hra je v češtině i když má své mouchy v podobě překlepů a semtam chybí písmenka. V menu fajnová hudba :)

Hru doporučuji, chvilku sem si to sám pro sebe streamoval abych ozkoušel propojení - https://www.twitch.tv/videos/269038691

author: {'steamid': '76561198261822609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1582476353}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999384308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1046, 'last_played': 1618674479}
review:
An original take on the football manager sim genre.
The game is simple yet challenging: starting with an amateur team, don't expect to breeze through the lower leagues. Things get spicy after the first season.
Everything about it is well thought, from the club management part that goes to the essential, to the player development with RPG-like elements. The tactics-like games are fun (straightforward at first, but it gets deeper when your players learn new skills and get decent at the game), and it feels really rewarding to get a win or a draw against a better team by having a solid gameplan.
I'm enjoying it more than the recent FM editions. Worth giving a shot!

author: {'steamid': '76561197985369375', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1560705431}
review: Innovativo, fresco e divertente, davvero una bella trovata, ho seguito per tanto tempo lo sviluppo e adesso sono felice di aver fatto questo acquisto, ci sono anche le mod che si possono scaricare da Steam se volete i campionati ufficiali fatti dagli utenti, consigliatissimo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007471169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 22093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3553, 'last_played': 1580018745}
review:
Love this game. Training is straight forward. Playing the games are a bit like chess, except that you can alter the way your pieces move by the way you train them, helping the players learn new moves.

Make sure you complete the Crossing challenge before you promote, do not be like me, hehe. We promoted into the Third Division, where most of the teams have much better defenders and I was forced to play every game due to the Crossing challenge not being completed. Other teams defenders didn't give my wingers much room to operate so crosses were few. I was training a player as Center Forward and also he was best at learning Heading ability, though he didn't have much accuracy, I pictured him as a big holdup player. Our first 21 matches we went 1-16-4, with one goal scored and 5 given up. Yes, we forced 16 0-0 draws, and were still close to saving ourselves from relegation.

 Finally, in the last match of the season it all came together, my player was officially a CF and had his Heading ability. The other team's defense played narrower and my best passer was finally able to get out in crossing position. Boom, Bullied (yes, that's his name) headed the ball in. The next time down the field, Boom, same play. Finally, right at the end of the match the ball comes to Bullied's feet and he scores again for the hattrick. Finally, the $30,000 was in the bank and we gained 15 fans to push us back up to 31 fans, yes, all that drawing with no goals took its toll as we dropped from 125 fans to 16. Of course, then we relegated and lost 16 fans so went back down to the Amateur ranks with only 15 fans, hehe.

In the meantime, all the training we'd been putting the players through was paying off, as I was able to sell a couple players in the offseason and raise my Youth Academy two levels.

Anyways, I highly recommend this game, though it felt like it was torturing me making me play all those 0-0 matches. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198091231987', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3007, 'last_played': 1571298844}
review: Un gioco completamente affidato al caso. Inutile sotto tutti i punti di vista come inutile allenare i giocatori visto che i criteri del gioco sono completamente a caso. L attaccante per segnare deve avere precisione alta il portiere difesa. Un attaccante con precisione 12 puo'benissimo e piu'volte fare un gol ad un portiere con difesa 70 perche', ripeto per l ennesima volta, il gioco e'affidato al caso visto che si calcola ogni azione con un valore che va da 1 al valore attuale dell abilita'quindi se l attaccante ha 12 di precisione il gioco calcola un valore da 1 a 12 e se il portiere ha 70 il gioco calcola sempre un valore da 1 a 70 percio' all attaccante puo'venire un 12 e al portiere un 1 ed e'gol. NON HA SENSO. Evitate sto gioco anche gratis.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198047563881', 'num_games_owned': 842, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 1058, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1605536395}
review:
This is such a amazing turn based tactics and management game!

As many other already said, it's recommended even if you are not that much into soccer/football.

Great customization, great game mechanics and amazing little details, like the sponsors that you choose appearing on the team jerseys. The graphics are simple, but very well done, specially the animations.

Great fun and very easy to understand, specially because there's a very well explained encyclopedia inside the game. (No internet browser based, like some games have!)

I highly recommend it for anyone that enjoys a good turn-based tactic game. If you're on the fence, try out the free demo and you will surely enjoy it!

author: {'steamid': '76561197986496544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 52284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13317, 'last_played': 1707556932}
review:
Einer der besten Fußballmanager überhaupt, seit Anstoss.  Man spielt hier selbst und ist dementsprechend selbst verantwortlich, was passiert. Glück braucht man trotzdem. Hat man einen guten Spieler, würfelt man beispielsweise von 1-100, hat man einen schlechten Spieler, würfelt der nur bis maximal 60. Das Würfelergebnis ist entscheidend, ob ein Spielzug gelingt oder nicht. Darüber hinaus, gibt es Zusatzeigenschaften, von denen man nach Möglichkeit Gebrauch machen sollte, weil es u.a.  Extra-Züge bringt. Diese Zusatzeigenschaften gibt es in den Leveln 1-3. Da gibt es z.B. den "Grätscher".  Der kommt an den Ball, trotz eines spielstarken Gegners, dem sonst unter Berücksichtigung der normalen Spielwerte nur schwer den Ball abzunehmen wäre.  Zu erwähnen wäre noch Eigenschaften wie Hackentrick, Tunneln, Kanonenschuß oder aber entgegengesetzte  Eigenschaften wie "Reaktion" (macht Hackentrick unwirksam) oder Abfangen (der Pässe).

Die Spieler haben natürlich auch unterschiedliche Rollen, Stürmer gibt es z.B. in den Varianten S, LS, RS, MS oder ST. Jede Variante hat bestimmte Vorteile und einen bestimmten Einsatzbereich auf dem Feld. Mittelfeldspieler und Verteidiger gibt es in ebenso unterschiedlichen Varianten, ein Buchstabe bedeutet noch "Amateur", ein Fragezeichen bedeutet Spieler ist noch Anfänger und hat keine bestimmte Ausrichtung (und keine Ahnung vom Spiel).

Alles kostet in dem Spiel Geld und/oder Ruhmpunkte. Geld und Ruhm erhält man wiederum durch sportliche Erfolge.

Ich spiele derzeit in der 2.Liga und habe ein Stadion mit 5.000 Sitzplätzen. Hat über 1 Mio. gekostet. Dafür musste ich meinen alten Stürmer verkaufen, welcher allerdings ein Jahr später sowieso in Rente gegangen wäre.

Schön gemacht ist der Stadionausbau, immer ein kleine (schönere) Abstufung zum vorherigen Modell.

Tja, Spieler gehen ab 34 in Rente, dann sind sie auch unverkäuflich. Das bedeutet, mit 33 entweder gleich verkaufen oder rechtzeitig noch einen 3-Jahresvertrag abschließen, dann bleiben sie bis 36, es gibt aber danach kein Geld. Einen Spieler habe ich mit 200 Ruhmpunkten bis 40 verpflichtet, das geht auch. Die alten Knacker sind allerdings ziemlich schnell erschöpft...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025103043', 'num_games_owned': 992, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1540305838}
review: I'm a casual football fan and my experience with footie games extends only to Fifa and Football Manager. Both great games, both scratch a different itch. However, with Football Tactics and Glory, I found a DIFFERENT itch to scratch! I had no idea a turn based football game can be done and I have to say - it works! And in this game, it works pretty well. The game is fast to get into, it's informative, doesn't get bogged down in the details, and there's also plenty of action to be had. I bought this game just because I was curious, and I'm pleasantly surprised on how good it is. Highly recommended for casual and hardcore fans of football alike!

author: {'steamid': '76561198237866538', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1528193718}

author: {'steamid': '76561198052610260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1348, 'last_played': 1533758343}
review:
I'm a casual player who doesn't like to be bothered with too much information in a game. That said, in my opinion, FT&G is right down the middle - a game that has a depth but not so much of it that you get lost. and I think it's potential is huge.

For those who don't know, it's a turn based strategy. Meaning that, when the game starts, you have 3 moves and then opponent has 3 moves. They can be moving player on the pitch, passing, shooting and so on.

The first season with your new club is getting to know the game. It's fairly easy. But the problems begin in the second season, after you've (if you're don't suck much) qualified for the higher league. That's when you'll have to work hard to stay up. That's where I'm at right now. 

There's a bunch of options you'd expect of the football game and we can hope there'll be more. You can, of course, transfer players, send scouts to find players (if you've got enought money), play whichever formation you want (there's no predefined formations). You can upgrade your stadium, hire coaches. You can set up a training for each player and every one of them can develop a certain skill - layoff pass, slide tackle, cannon shot, heading... Skills are a major factor in the games and also makes player a lot more expensive on a transfer market. 

You have a constant communication with you assistant and your president, while football consultant will offer valuable advice in the 1st season. 

I haven't experienced any major bugs so far. The interface is simple and intuitive. Visuals are very cute and fun. 

I hope I'm not wrong when saying this could develop into a new great football series, to replace FM and PES for casual players. I suggest you buy the game and support the developers to make it even better.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994111138', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1528010058}
review:
Hallo, es ist ein richtig gutes Spiel, auch wenn man jetzt keine Lust hat selber zu spielen, kann man auch nur als Manager fungieren und seiner Mannschaft dabei zuschauen. Hier ist es nicht wie bei Anstoß das man mit Featuren überschüttet wird sondern sich aktuell aufs wesentliche konzentriert wird. 
Ich hoffe sehr, dass aber hier und da noch das ein oder andere Feature den Weg ins Spiel findet. Es macht auf jeden Fall eine Menge Spaß. Gerade die Manager sind dünn besetzt in der heutigen Zeit und es wäre schön wenn dieser den Weg findet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006621982', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3281, 'last_played': 1696598062}
review: Neat little game that reminds me of Nintendo Pocket Football Club and Motorsport Manager. The basics are quite easy to graps and the sense of slow progression towards great success is what really shines through. The art style may be a bit offputting in the screenshots, but it does have its charms. The game can become a little grindy at points and I'm hoping the developer will slowly expand the management side of the game further. That being said, I've enjoyed myself immensly up until this point. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197980320749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2209, 'last_played': 1609662496}
review:
Великолепный пошаговый симулятор футбола. В общем то игра была абсолютно играбельна ещё пару лет назад, но за это время разработчики умудрились дополнить кучей функций игру, которая и так выглядела полноценной. Доработали графику, добавили статистику, улучшили трансферы.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967070325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1521981958}
review: Hace tres años que juego a este juego, pese a lo que digan mis horas jugadas. Es un ejemplo de Early Access bien hecho. Empezó con algo tan básico como 3 pantallas y 5 o 6 iconos, y ahora es un football managare + tactic rpg. Soberbio es decir poco, todos los aficionados a los tactics, al fútbol y a los managers deberían hacerse con este juego. Simplemente perfecto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030806053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 36287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8395, 'last_played': 1668540557}
review:
When I got FTG in early access it was just known as Football Tactics, back then it was a fun game with more depth than I expected. It has only improved, the positions are well-defined with their own tactical niches(personally I don't know how one can play without a sweeper or defensive midfielder, but to each their own) There are infuriating moments, but mostly because any game with a RNG has infuriating moments, the club management side will never be as deep as Football Manager, but it is exceptionally balanced. A good human player will regularly beat the AI assuming similar quality teams, but there are also times the other team just has that one combination of skills to negate what your strikers are best at or you can work your skills perfectly to beat an objectively superior team. Times when FTG feels almost like a well-crafted puzzle game as much as it is a football game and that is something I don't see a lot of with sports games. 

When you get those tactics right, the football does feel quite glorious. When you don't, or the RNG betrays you, well you'll come back because you'll know that you can get it right.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019891299', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 112039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13542, 'last_played': 1702833464}
review:
[h1]Зачин[/h1]

Купил игру ещё на самом старте раннего доступа и вот наконец-то спустя 3 года можно написать свой занудный обзор :)

В своё время переиграл во множество браузерных и клиентских футбольных менеджеров. Если у первых была проблема с медленным течением игрового времени, когда в неделю игралось два-три матча, или же наличие доната, то у вторых - в том, что ты никогда не будешь знать причины своих удач или поражений, в них абсолютно непрозрачная система навыков игроков и тактики, морали и прочего. Есть миллион факторов, но ни для одного не знаешь точно, как он работает.


[h1]Всех этих минусов лишена Football, Tactics & Glory[/h1]
[list]
[*]Можно играть в любое время и столько, сколько пожелаешь, как в типичном оффлайн-менеджере.
[*]Нет доната.
[*]Для каждого действия известны формулы и всегда заранее можно прикинуть шанс на успех, остается только выбрать наиболее подходящее действие для имеющейся ситуации. Да, есть рандом, но всегда известно, в каких пределах могут выпасть значения как у своих игроков, так и у игроков соперника.
[*]Нет системы настроения футболистов.
[*]Игроки имеют не 20-30 параметров вроде умения шевелить ушами и принимать мяч задницей, а всего 4.
[/list]

[h1]Что ещё интересного присутствует в игре на данный момент[/h1]
[list]
[*]Прокачка игроков.
[*]Помимо основных показателей (защита, контроль, пас, точность) имеются как универсальные позиции (вратарь, защитник, полузащитник, нападающий), так и уникальные (свободный защитник, центральный защитник, опорный полузащитник и т.д.), причем для каждой из этих позиций есть свои особенности.
[*]Игроки могут прокачивать спецумения (подкат, пушечный удар, кленовый лист и т.д.), которые в свою очередь имеют три уровня прокачки. Под многие из этих спецумений имеются контрумения, хотя подкат я бы ограничил 2 уровнем, слишком он имбовый и не контрится.
[*]Поддержка модификаций.
[*]Трансферы (не совсем в привычном виде).
[*]Развитие инфраструктуры и тренеров, пусть и довольно упрощенное.
[*]Возможность переименовывать игроков.
[*]Нет жесткой привязки к позициям, при желании или необходимости можно и вратаря поставить в нападение.
[*]Еврокубки и рейтинговая система стран.
[*]Возможность играть самому, смотреть игру ИИ или же сразу симулировать матч без наблюдения.
[*]Генератор внешности.
[*]Статистика клуба и игроков.
[*]Топ-10 игроков в различных категориях для каждого турнира (бомбардиры, защитники, вратари и т.д.).
[*]Погода, оказывающая влияние на матч. Например, во время жары есть небольшой шанс, что игрок снимет с себя футболку, попросит замену и отправится загорать на трибуны. Не очень приятно, если любителем принимать солнечные ванны окажется лидер команды. А во время снежной погоды есть вероятность, что при крупном счете болельщики команды забросают самого ненавистного игрока снежками, и тут тоже без замены не обойтись :( [spoiler]Хаха, шутка же[/spoiler]
[/list]


[h1]Минусы[/h1]
[list]
[*]Вызывает привыкание.
[*]Довольно скучное начало игры, пока у футболистов ещё нет спецумений.
[*]Лично для меня не минус, но на мультиплеер особо не рассчитывайте, игра заточена под одиночное прохождение.
[*]Не оптимизирована нагрузка на процессор, грузится одно ядро по полной.
[/list]

Если вердикт так и не ясен, могу поставить числом - 10/10, это же не какой-то Football Manager :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031008932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 4965, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4117, 'last_played': 1709144486}
review:
Das Spiel macht einfach Laune. Rundenstrategie und Fussball in perfekter Kombination.

Was ich dem Entwicklerteam hoch anrechne. Sie verbessern das Spiel auch noch nach Jahren. Da hat sich eine Menge getan und mit "Tactics & Glory" wurde genau das hinzugefügt, was der Titel verspricht.

Bravo Creoteam! Ganz gross!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030360062', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 6627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3996, 'last_played': 1629120456}
review:
Truly impressive creative effort. This game is extremely good when it comes to actually innovating something new. The gameplay is very tactical, making the best out of your players individual skills is the key to victory.

If you like tactics games and games about managing probabilities, this is your game. I can't stress enough how unique the approach is. The game that comes closest gameplay wise is Blood Bowl (although Blood Bowl doesn't have an AI, so it's MP only).

The management part is well fleshed out and motivating, featuring a transfer market and various team upgrades. Making enough money to upgrade the various facilities will take time and successful play.

It's also worth mentioning that training young players to acquire certain skills adds yet another layer of gameplay. 

In short, Football, Tactics & Glory is a game about finding your best tactic and fine tuning the team to execute that tactic to perfection. It's probably the best football management game on the market currently, and I am not kidding.

I'd recommend playing two seasons to learn the game, and you will quickly realize how much depth this title has to offer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071074290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1582128588}
review:
I'd recommend this game if it didn't crash and ruin a save file I spent 5 hours on. 

Good strategy based football game but...

I have got to my third season and I can't use my save because it CRASHES every time. I can do everything except hit next match. I can check my team, look at my messages, but I can't advance time. I have tried it so many times and it keeps crashing. So, I spent 5 hours on a save and now I can't use it because it crashes. Before this, I was really enjoying the game. 

Has anyone experienced a similar problem? Do you know what the solution is?
developer_response: Hey, as I wrote in the forum - send us, please, the report file. We always try to help our players.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022108970', 'num_games_owned': 1773, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1583988761}
review:
Way too simplistic in every aspect. Maybe next game will have more options, player progression has potential, but again  too few paths for upgrades. Things that annoyed me: matches are too short!!!; power shots leading to corner, you can have half of the match just playing corners; lack of zone of control if your player doesn't have the special ability; 66% chance to score penalty; too unrealistic match tactics, I understand it can't be sim, but i find best tactic to be 8-1-1(with 3 sweepers), there is no point to have more than 1 midfielder and 1 striker.

The game has potential in future instalments, but this version is not good enough for me. 18 euro is too high for what is there, with 50% off will be worth it for a check.
developer_response:
I regret you didn't like the game. However I can assure you that you won't win Premier league with 8-1-1 tactics. Or it might take too much time to do it. In the lower leagues there aren't any tactics because all teams are amateur. But later, when you learn skills and classes - every match is unique because you will try to change your tactics to outsmart your opponent. 

Many who mastered the game, win much more stronger teams playing with only 2-2,5 star teams because they use different tactics. Hope, you will give the game another chance. Try at least win First league. You will that if you want to do it, you should think ahead and use some advanced formations/combinations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029328810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 16408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1492, 'last_played': 1642697302}
review:
Used to sink thousands of hours into the football manager series. Work, family, kids and other hobbies make it impossible to play it now - enter Football, Tactics&Glory!

I love turn-based strategies and having football integrated into it is a godsend. It scratches the football itch and offers a lot of intereting decisions tactic-wise. 

There is not much to do between matches, just a few options to train your players, do a couple of transfers per season, familiarize yourself with your opponent and you are basically ready to go. 

Then there is the match - a roller-coaster of dice rolling and tactical decisions. Quick, yet satisfyingly deep, deep enough not to be taken lightly, yet not too deep to make the player overthink too much. 

Watching your players develop is a joy to behold, it does feel like an rpg. The cartoony style with insane face editor fits the game perfectly well. 

Fast-paced, cute, very stylish and tactical, capturing the football feel. Would recommend to anyone into turn-based strategies and sports. Nothing sweeter than and scoring against all odds!

Great job, guys! Played 10+ hours in  demo version and very happy to pick it up on release day.

UPDATED after the latest Expansion and 200+ hours in.

Well, what can I say, the expansion add a crucial Giftedness mechanic that adds a ton of variety to the early game. Now your player performances on the pitch (special abilites, namely) and how fast and how well a footballer can evolve depends, in part, on how gifted he is. Logical, if you ask me.

Another crucial addition is a ton of data that makes you immerse in the world even more. You look at how your former footballers are doing, which spots you score from the most and who the big ballers are in every league in the world. 

Can't stop playing it, again!

author: {'steamid': '76561198040465633', 'num_games_owned': 1242, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1521, 'last_played': 1607242340}
review:
Diversão garantida!

Eu definitivamente não sou um fã de futebol, mas estou conseguindo tomar decisões importantes sobre a formação da equipe, contratos e até sobre improvisar um jogador em uma posição alternativa. Joguei para testar e me apaixonei.

É possível fazer melhorias em diversos aspectos do clube como: olheiros, categoria de base, treinador de goleiros, estádio maior, etc..

Um dos raros jogos que vale pagar o preço cheio.

A integração com a Twitch é algo genial.
Além da conversa aparecer na torcida, os espectadores conseguem influenciar diretamente a moral dos jogadores. Isso significa que aquele jogador pé de foice poderá marcar o gol da vitória com o apoio da torcida.
Estamos participando da Copa do Mundo dos streamers e está sendo a experiência mais intensa que já tivemos em um jogo.

O desenvolvedor é gente boa, atencioso e está dando o sangue por esse jogo.

Pimba na gorduchinha! Vamos XV de Bracubi! Partiu primeira divisão!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994065383', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4092, 'last_played': 1607205496}
review:
TL, DR: It's an excellent game for people that like turn-based-games and/or football, quickly developing the "only one more turn/match" affliction a la Civilization. If you are not sure, try the free demo. 

A football/soccer game with turn-based matches? Sounds weird.
But it isn't. It works extremely well!
This game is an innovative version of the classical football manager games mixed with the flavor of turn-based tactical games. It builds a real nice and addictive flow between the managing of your club and developing your team and the league and cup matches itself, which are played in a certain amount of turns where players of both teams can perform actions based on their skills.
The management aspect of the game (like expanding your stadium, managing contracts, buying/selling players etc.) is focused on the essential activities, so you don't have to micromanage. As a result, your decisions really matter and you will need to make tough decisions.  Do I sell my star player so that I have the funds to extend the contracts of some other players? Do I invest my scarce money in the youth academy, upgrade the stadium or hire better coaches and scouts?

The concept for the development of the individual players of your team is very well done, Depending on their position, attributes and skills that they can learn they develop in rather unique individuals, and you will notice their distinctive strengths and weaknesses on the field.
The style of play and tactics in the matches is heavily influenced on the players that you have in your team, and if your star striker is out injured and you might have to replace him with a different player you really need to figure out a different approach in your a game.
This might sound very complex, but it isn't. The game is rather intuitive with an excellent in-game documentation which explains what every possible action in your turn means.
Also, when you start out freshly with your new team, you don't have many players with extra skills, so the learning curve is shallow. That also means that you will only get to experience the full tactical options in the turn-based matches once your team develops a little bit. Before that, it might seem that there are not that many options for you, but that will change over time.

This game also ha a Steam Workshop integration, so you easily can download bundles containing real team and player names, team logos and jerseys, etc.

Overall, this game is highly recommended. It was already very polished in the Early Access phase and only improved going forward. The tactical turn-based matches are innovative and challenging, while the manager part is focused on the essential and not excessively complex like in some hardcore football manager games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069863777', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 14104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1660564098}
review:
Amazingly fun! I could have never imagined that a turn-based football game could be so addictive and enjoyable, but FT&G sure proved me wrong. It's too bad Steam only shows the 22 hours I've played while connected to the internet, as it's been hundreds of hours since I got the game a year ago in Early Access. You don't even need to like football to like this game, as my partner has very well proven!


Pros:
+The RPG elements: customising and levelling up players, learning skills
+Easy to learn, relatively hard to master. Different difficulty levels available.
+Possibility to find winning tactics for teams with very different players
+Smooth animations
+Possibility to download the real teams from the Community


Cons:
-Uniform league system between different countries: Premier, First, Second, Third, Amateur every time. 


Future wishes:
-Possibility to play in women's leagues
-Different or customisable league structures for different countries

author: {'steamid': '76561197965355730', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 83778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55491, 'last_played': 1684159536}
review:
TL;DR: If you like one of the two main aspect of this title ( football or turn based-games ), you'll love it. If you are sceptical over the concept, do as I did 3 months ago : try the demo, and you'll love and buy it. It's a pure gem. 11/10 in every aspects.

-------------------

After multiple tries over the last two decades, I wouldn't have thought a game about football would be the most important "one more turn" - here translated into "one more match" - impact I would have since civilization 1 & 2.

I bought it 3 months ago and I'm already close to reach the 1 000 hours of gameplay. It's a pure gem Creoteam is delivering here. ( And I don't even follow football sport events IRL )
First of all a big up to the devs. They are over reactive in all good possible ways : fixing bug in 1-3 days after being discovered, analyzing suggestions to implement in the game, and adding more and more stuff with every patch. In fact, most games I played, once out of Early Access, never reached the level of completion and polish of Football, Tactics & Glory.

But now to the game itself :

You're a young football player who get a manager job for an amateur football club, after having being badly injured, stopping your player career. The goal of the game is to climb the national leagues in the country of your choice ( 37 are actually in the game ). As an indie, they actually don't have the licensing for real club names, but the steam workshop is filled with mods that actually fix this point. You can also create your own club from scratch ( name, logo, jersey... ).
Each country is divided into 5 leagues: Amateur, 3rd to 1st, and Premier league. You'll have also 3 different kind of championships to fight for, depending the league you are in. So every season will be full of action, and you'll have to manage the mercato to find the players you need, while growing those you already have.

The game mechanisms are very smart and somehow intuitive to get your hands on, even if you'll need to experiment some moves if you want to master it. Every aspect is included in this game. Attributes, skills, age, level, contract renewing price, market price... Oh yes... Because the game has skills... Well it's turn based, and RPG, so it has to have skills ! And those are probably your most important tools to achieve victory in a match. You'll have to develop your team with an array of players and substitutes capable to face most of the situations, and you'll have to adapt your team to the opponent you're facing.

But then, you'll also have all the financial management of your team, and also a secondary resource, "glory", that can be spend in many useful ways. Some could say the management is a simplified version of football manager franchise, I honestly don't know, I don't recall which version of football manager I tried some time ago, but the million of mostly useless information the game throw at you and the unfriendly GUI always drove me away. Here, the management is perfectly balanced; by that I mean, you'll have to think twice, and a bit more, about key decisions of a living football club, but everything will be crystal clear, so you will surely enjoy it at the same level you enjoy playing the matches.

It's really a nice formula, depending on the lenght you chose in your campaign for the duration of the matches ( 3 different lenghts, for games that can take around 10-15 mins to 30-45 ), you'll have a nice alternation of field gameplay and manager gameplay.

And the challenge is real. Even if you can adapt to your prefered difficulty setting ( 3 different ones ) if you want an easier or an harder gaming experience.

Technically, the game is nicely optimised. I actually play on a notebook with Intel HD 4000 series and it goes very smoothly while being beautiful. The sound effects do their job, and the menu musics are over the top ( I recommend to go in the credits once in a while, it'll launch an original song composed for the game, the singer voice is just amazing ).

The game is so deep and complete, I'm pretty sure I'm forgetting some key points. In any case I would recommend you to try the demo, that's what I did and it totally convinced me I should buy the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029859373', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3734, 'last_played': 1637321813}

author: {'steamid': '76561198200975587', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 47027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15596, 'last_played': 1698130423}
review:
Mir hat das Spiel so gut gefallen, dass ich bei der Übersetzung ins Deutsche mitgeholfen habe.

[b]Kurz:[/b]
- Ein Spiel, das auch einfach mal zwischendurch gespielt werden kann
- Süchtigmachende Rundenstrategie im Spiel selbst
- Außerhalb davon nicht so viel zu tun, aber zweckmäßig



[b]Lang:[/b]

Am meisten Spaß macht es, in der Amateurliga (5. Ligastufe) zu starten und zu versuchen, sich bis in die 1. Liga und dann in die der Europa und Champions League nachempfundenen Europapokale vorzuarbeiten.

Der Schwerpunkt bei Football, Tactics & Glory liegt auf dem Platz.
Im rundenbasierten Spielablauf gilt es, das Runde ins Eckige zu bringen.
Dazu hat jeder Spieler 4 Grundfähigkeiten, die je nach Spielsituation zur Geltung kommen und als Würfel fungieren. Kontrolliert mein Spieler beispielsweise den Ball und seine Stärke bei ‚Kontrolle‘ ist 30, dann hat er beim Zweikampfversuch eines Gegenspielers den Würfel 30. Dieser wiederum hat einen Würfel, der seinem ‚Verteidigung‘-Wert entspricht.
Wer nun die höhere Zahl würfelt, gewinnt das Duell.

Diese Werte können sich aber im Spiel auch anpassen. Z.B. erhöht sich der Wert ‚Kontrolle‘, wenn ich dem Spieler anweise, den Ball zu halten. Auch Ermüdung, Pressing des Gegners, Wetter, Entfernung zum Kasten bei einem Torschuss und andere Sachen nehmen im Spiel direkt Einfluss auf den tatsächlichen Wert des Würfels (Tipp: Strg-Taste gedrückt halten und über Spieler fahren, um Grund für Anpassung der Fähigkeit zu sehen).

Daneben gibt es noch wichtige Sonderfertigkeiten wie ‚Langer Pass‘ oder ‚Grätsche‘, aber auch Talente, die manche von diesen kontern können.
Diese Fertigkeiten sind nicht zuletzt deshalb wertvoll, da sie bei erfolgreicher Anwendung gegen einen Gegenspieler einen Extra-Zug geben (normalerweise hat man pro Runde 3 Züge, ehe der Gegner wieder dran ist). Kosten dafür dem Spieler mehr Frische. Und gerade alte Spieler erholen sich unter der Woche recht schlecht, was sich besonders in englischen Wochen bemerkbar macht.

Von großer Bedeutung sind noch die Positionen eines Spielers. So gibt es z.B. universelle Mittelfeldspieler, aber auch LM, RM, OM, ZM, DM. Alle haben ihre Besonderheiten und sind für unterschiedliche Situationen nützlich.
Führt ein Spieler im Spiel eine Aktion aus, bekommt er dafür Spezialisierungspunkte für die entsprechende Position. Hat er davon genug gesammelt, kann man sich dafür eine Spezialisierung aussuchen. Z.B. er erlernt eben diese neue Position, er trainiert schneller Grundfähigkeiten, kann eine Spezialfertigkeit zusätzlich erlernen, gibt einen Bonus beim Sponsor oder dem Fanzuwachs etc.


Abseits des grünen Rasens gibt es nicht so viel zu tun. Aber dadurch wird man eben auch nicht unnötig aufgrund irgendeines Firlefanz aufgehalten. Im Wesentlichen schaut man anhand des Gegners, wie man seine Mannschaft für das nächste Spiel aufstellt.

Für Geld baut man Stadion und Jugendeinrichtungen aus (man bekommt einfach alle halbes Jahr einen aus der Jugend, Stärke hängt von der Einrichtung ab), verlängert Verträge oder kauft Spieler.

Für Ruhmpunkte (sozusagen die zweite Währung des Spiels) holt man sich diverse Assistenztrainer, damit die Jungs in den Spielen mehr Erfahrungspunkte gewinnen und so schneller stärker werden.
Für Ruhmpunkte können aber auch Langzeitverträge mit Spielern abgeschlossen werden oder Fertigkeiten/Talente schneller trainiert werden.


[b]Grafik:[/b]
Seht ihr ja anhand der Screens. Das Userinterface wurde zuletzt deutlich aufgehübscht.
Das Aussehen der Spieler ist sehr detailreich.
Die Animationen im Spiel (Dribbling, Torschuss, Tackling bis hin zum seltenen Fallrückzieher) wissen zu gefallen.

[b]Sound:[/b]
Hintergrundmusik ist generell nicht meins und stelle ich aus.
Soundeffekte im Spiel sind nichts Besonderes. 


[b]Fazit:[/b]
Die Entwickler haben die 3 Jahre Early Access wirklich genutzt, um ihr Spiel kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Ein echt tolles kleines Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984211717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 3563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 860, 'last_played': 1604676331}
review:
โดยปกติแล้วคงจะไม่มีใครคิดที่จะหยิบเอาเกมแนว Tactical Turn-based มาตีรวมเข้ากับเกมฟุตบอล เพราะทั้ง 2 สิ่งนั้นฟังแลดูไม่น่าจะตีปนเข้ากันได้ ทว่า Football, Tactics & Glory สามารถที่จะทำได้และดันสนุกเสียด้วยสิ

ผู้ที่ไม่ใช่คอบอลอาจจะเหลือบมาเห็นและแทบจะมองข้ามเพราะคิดว่าเกมนี้เป็นเกมกีฬา แต่ถ้าว่ากันตามตรง คุณแทบจะไม่จำเป็นจะต้องมีพื้นฐานความรู้ด้านฟุตบอลเลยสักนิดเพื่อที่จะเล่นตัวเกมให้สนุก รายละเอียดในภาพรวมของเกมนั้นออกจะเรียบง่าย เพียงแค่นั่งจิ้มอยู่สักครู่เดียวก็คงจะสามารถเข้าใจได้ไม่ยาก หรือถ้าคุณไม่เข้าใจในจุดใด ตัวเกมนั้นก็มักจะมีตัวช่วยหรือคำอธิบายประกอบเอาไว้เพื่อช่วยเหลือคุณ

ในส่วนของ Single Player นั้นก็มีทั้งโหมดปกติและ Sandbox ซึ่งในโหมดแรกนั้นคุณจะได้มีโอกาสปลุกปั้นสโมสรของคุณจากลีกล่างสุดของประเทศจนกระทั่งกลายเป็นทีมแชมป์บนลีกสูงสุดหรือแม้แต่แชมป์ในระดับทวีป ทว่าในโหมด Sandbox นั้นคุณไม่จำเป็นที่จะต้องเริ่มใหม่จากศูนย์ แต่จุดเริ่มต้นนั้นก็ขึ้นอยู่กับทีมที่คุณเลือก คุณอาจจะเริ่มต้นจากลีกสูงสุดเลยหรือทีมในลีกสมัครเล่นก็ยังได้ จริงละที่ว่าตัวเกมนั้นไม่ได้รับลิขสิทธิ์จากสโมสรต่าง ๆ แต่คุณก็สามารถที่จะลง Mods จาก Workshop เพื่อที่จะปลดล็อกตราสโมสรและรายชื่อผู้เล่นได้ หรือถ้าคุณไม่พอใจในองค์ประกอบที่ Download มา คุณจะ Edit ลีกเองก็ยังได้

และแน่นอนว่าจุดเด่นทีี่สุดของเกมก็คือการแข่งขัน โดยผู้เล่นจะมีโอกาสผลัดกันออกคำสั่งผู้เล่น (ตัวหมาก) ของคุณได้ Turn ละ 3 ครั้ง จุดที่น่าสนใจก็คือผู้เล่นแต่ละคนนั้นจะมี Attritubes และ Skills ไม่เหมือนกัน ซึ่งพวกเขาสามารถที่จะเก็บค่าประสบการณ์หลังแข่งเพื่อพัฒนาตัวเอง อีกทั้งคุณยังสามารถที่จะฝึกซ้อมให้พวกเขาพัฒนาทักษะที่เหมาะสมขึ้นมาใช้งานได้ ตำแหน่งที่ถนัดของผู้เล่นก็นับได้เป็นองค์ประกอบสำคัญเอาเรื่อง เพราะแต่ละตำแหน่งนั้นจะมีลูกเล่นเฉพาะและได้รับ Bonus ที่ไม่เหมือนกัน คุณจึงจำเป็นที่จะต้องคิดวางแผนให้ดีก่อนที่จะจับพวกเขาลงสู่สนาม การใช้คนให้ถูกกับงานเป็นสิ่งที่สำคัญมากภายในเกมนี้

แม้ตัวเกมจะยังคงอยู่ในช่วง Early Access กระนั้นทีมพัฒนาก็ทำเกมออกมาได้น่าประทับใจอยู่ไม่น้อยทีเดียว และถ้าคุณชอบเกมแนว Turn-based นี่ก็คืออีกหนึ่งเกมที่คุณควรจะลอง

++ Football + Turn-based
+ ตัวเกมเข้าถึงง่ายและสนุก
+ Steam Workshop
+/- แม้คุณจะมีมันสมองอันยอดเยี่ยม แต่บางครั้งมันก็ไม่ช่วยอะไรถ้าเจอทีมที่ต่างชั้นกันมากจนเกินไป

author: {'steamid': '76561198004525782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4479, 'last_played': 1577569889}
review:
Great management and tactics game for everyone who likes football/soccer. It's surprising, how every decision seems to matter in this game as opposed to other football management titles. But the tactics part on the field is where "Football, Tactics & Glory" really shines! 
Give it a try, it's worth every cent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354420448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1583108971}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013690093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 20274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14616, 'last_played': 1676999261}
review:
Hab das Spiel erst sehr unterschätzt. Dachte es wäre ein billiges Amateur Game und hatte es anhespielt und schnell wieder aufgehört zu spielen. Es ist aber wirklich ein anspruchsvolles Taktik-Spiel. Die Grafik finde ich ausgesprochen stimmig.

Aber Vorsicht: das hier ist kein Fußballmanagerspiel. Es ist ein Grübel-Rätsel-Taktik-Spiel, bei dem man Fußballspieler agieren sieht. Erst nach einer Weile merkt man, dass das ganze tolle Hochleveln der eigenen Spieler überhaupt nichts bringt, wenn du dir nicht in jedem Spiel den Kopf zermarterst. Locker und leicht spielt sich das nur die ersten 2 Stunden.

Auch die Design-Entscheidung, die dazu führt, dass Guides empfehlen, alles auf Defensive zu setzen und mit 5 bis 7 Abwehrspielern zu spielen - was die KI dann auch macht - empfinde ich als Stimmungskiller. 

Insgesamt aber dennoch ein sehr interessantes und auf seine Weise gutes Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088455125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 56279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40761, 'last_played': 1685556014}
review:
Getting old is not much fun. Your reactions slow down and your fingers can get a bit fumbly. And quite soon, you can't keep up with all the modern fast-paced RTS sport sims that are out there.

All of a sudden, a game like this appears. 

"Turn-based soccer, yeah right" I hear you scoff. 

Pretty much what I thought initially as well. But I had some spare cash and thought, why not give it a try.
Over 500 hours later and the bug that bit me is still going strong. I bought this game not long after it came out, and as the time went by and the game picked up support, so the devs started adding and adding. In fact they haven't stopped adding. They are extremely passionate about their game and very attentive to everything put on forum, be it a bug report or suggestions. 

Now for the game itself.

When you start the game you can play in 2 modes. Either normal start ( 3 difficulty modes ) where you get given a team in the lowest division or you can go into sandbox mode where you if you wish, you can create a team of 16 yr old Lvl 1 players or any other combination. ( Sandbox disables achievements for obvious reasons ). You can even create your own name, logo and strip in both modes.There is a comprehensive guide accessed from the main screen, which explains every move and ability available to the players.

As for gameplay, there is a setting for RNG in the startup menu which ranges from 
"No way that should have happened."    to
"Just as I planned."

The action is smooth and the animations are pretty good, as the players get on with the business of trying to get you promoted. There's nothing more satisfying than watching 1 of your players deliver that long pass, through a couple of the opposition players, right to the feet of your brilliantly positioned forward, who has to score. Right?  
The UI is intuitive and very easy to navigate, and the game has quite a bit of depth to it.

All in all this really is a gem of a game and if you're still not sure, there is a demo you can download to get a taste of it.
Anyone who likes sports and/or TBS games will have an absolute blast with this one.
I could go on and on about this game, but I'm currently in a promotion race in the 1st division and I want to go and finish it off. 

And I also need to mention that this game is NOT just for old gits like me, it's great fun for young and old alike.

P.S. There are workshop mods which can replace the base leagues with any other thats in there or you can mod any league yourself in game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015448891', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 39892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1442, 'playtime_at_review': 10167, 'last_played': 1712231082}
review:
Wer das alte BMH kennt, wird dieses Spiel lieben. Mir sind Fussball Manager & Co. zu komplex und überladen mit unnötigem Kram. Hier wird der Fokus wieder auf das wesentliche gelegt und das "rundenbasierte Spiel" mach nach kurzer Eingewöhnung wirklich Spaß! Final gab es zum Release noch eine schöne UI... Kann das Spiel nur empfehlen.

Completely new UI released with the latest updates. Game makes a lot of fun. If you are a football fan, this is really a good alternative compared to Football Manager, which I think is too overloaded with useless features.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030715744', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 47645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24913, 'last_played': 1705446532}
review: Such an addicting game. I've never played a turn-based sports game like it. The game walks a wondeful line between realistic football tactics/gameplay and a wonderful RPG team building simulator. I have spent the last few months only simulating through season after season, building my club from the Ameuter leauge (5th division) to Premier Leauge Champions. The game offers a really fun take on futbol, and has a great managment simulation element to the game as well. Players have packaged most major leauges and teams from around the world so you can play as Real Madrid, or Manchester United etc.  The game has wonderful DEVS who have constantly been adding content since I bought the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014239944', 'num_games_owned': 568, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 9850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7267, 'last_played': 1637190270}
review:
Tinha tudo para ser um otimo jogo porém tem alguns detalhes que acabam com o jogo como:

- a evoluçao de jogadores é lentissima
- voçê so pode comprar jogadores de uma lista que contém apenas 5 jogadores e para que novos jogadores apareçam vc é obrigado a comprar um jogador que vc nao quer para dar lugar a um novo.
- com o tempo perde a graça em controlar os jogadores e vc fica simulando a partida e transformando o jogo em um "manage" muito limitado
- enfim o jogo so é interessante no começo depois perde a graça.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141803542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 895, 'last_played': 1671387369}
review:
这个游戏怎么说呢，，还是推荐吧

首先、我玩这个游戏是它刚推出的时候、感觉是好久以前了、那个时候是想找一个经营模拟游戏的、选了这个、因为当时价格真心低、入了之后、3个小时从业余打到顶级联赛、直接没有动力继续玩了、后来、前几天才发现这个游戏是试玩版、发现更新了很多东西、重新入坑、还是按照经营模拟游戏玩的、讲道理如果你和我的心态一样、这个游戏还是不错的

我玩这个游戏全程模拟比赛、主要就是经营这个球队、从业余变成顶级球队

如果你喜欢的战棋类游戏、这个游戏还是平庸的推荐、因为经营内容有点多了、初期每个赛季短的有点令人发指2333333


如果你也是经营模拟类游戏玩家、我可以负责任的告诉你这个游戏可以玩一辈子


前方剧透慎入

[spoiler]首先我是全程模拟、完全没有任何人为干预比赛的行为、初期比较难、因为球员都是大岁数的无能弱智23333、前期有钱就升级青年球员选拔、每个赛季能收2个年轻球员、这些球员才是这个游戏的核心、培育好了之后能卖出很高的价格、有钱了才能继续升级设施、除非点出出售价格提高的技能、要不然绝不卖、当然除非年龄超过32-34岁、年轻球员首要升级专注第一排的2个技能、然后全功天赋、然后补充专注、然后点出球迷最爱、如果玩英国、这种打法等你到乙级-丙级就基本能把青年设施升级完成了、只需要看脸是否能让青年球员拼成一个队伍、如果可以、那么恭喜你、你可以顺利升入顶级联赛通关了...     球队设施升级优先青训、然后后卫和前锋训练、其次中场训练、最后其他 看爱好了[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198061459151', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1591, 'last_played': 1696542186}

author: {'steamid': '76561198008164654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 37140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11766, 'last_played': 1709672022}
review:
Eine tolle Alternative zum rundenbasierten "Ballern" oder Fantasy Szenario.

Das Spiel ist fordernd und macht Spaß, die Grafik ist nett und zweckmäßig.

Langzeitmotivation ist gut, aber sobald man 3-4 Jahre in der ersten Liga ist, wird man einfach zu stark.
Spätestens nach der dritten Saison in der man das Tripel schafft ist die Luft raus, das passiert ca. nach Saison 25 im schwierigen Modus, entsprechend schneller auf normal.
Das ist schade, denn dadurch verliert das Spiel einiges.
Mit dem letzten Patch wurden zwar die groben Fehler der Gegner behoben ( keinen Torwart, Mittelfeldspieler in der Abwehr, drei TW auf dem Feld oder ä.), aber im Grunde müssten wenigstens die int. Topvereine einfach besser sein.
Leider ist es auf schwierig möglich nach 3-4 Jahren 1. Liga ohne Probleme ein Final der CL mit 6:0 zu gewinnen...

Der Multiplayer ist im Moment nicht zu gebrauchen, da nur ein Miniturnier mit anonymen Nationalmannschaften gespielt werden kann. 
Super wäre mittelfristig ein echter Multiplayer mit einer Liga.

Insgesamt aber spannend und gut zu spielen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000216722', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3030, 'last_played': 1584456138}
review:
Let me preface this by saying that I bought this game when it was first released, a long time ago.
While it laid the foundations of the gameplay, it was very limited and not polished at all. So after playing a bit, I just dropped it and waited for the updates to come.

Well with the last big patch, I decided to give it a try again and boy it improved A LOT. We now have a great career mode, a fleshed out UI and an improved match engine.

There are two important sides of this game : the management aspect and the match gameplay itself.
Regarding the management, it's pretty simple to get into it. You have to make choices on where to spend your money/tickets to improve different aspects of your team. IMO some upgrades are just way better than others, so it could use some balancing. 
You also have to pick your tactics for the games, and most of the time you can't get away with using the same formation over and over again. It adds a bit more depth and it's fun to find and be able to exploit your opponent weaknesses.

The match gameplay is XCOM lite. While I enjoy it, I found the players progression way too slow when playing all games.
If you want to see significant improvements from your players, you need to simulate most matches. This is a bit annoying because I really enjoy the gameplay, but it's just no fun to spend 10min getting wrecked when I just want to give game time to my youngsters.

Ironically, I found out that the best way for me to enjoy the game is to simulate 90% of it. I enjoy more improving my youngsters, setting my tactic up for the matches and getting the results quickly.

Anyway, you can find pleasure in the game whether you like tactical RPG or just managing stuff. Now I'm just waiting for a multiplayer career mode to play with my friends !

author: {'steamid': '76561197981727167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 27729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25123, 'last_played': 1528130779}
review:
Ici, le jeu est basé sur la gestion d'un club de foot (5 niveaux de divisions par pays), notamment les infrastructures et les footballeurs sous contrat. Vos joueurs ont des stats et des perks qui augmentent avec le temps de jeu en match et leurs actions. Les matchs se jouent sous la forme de stratégie au tour par tour, avec votre tactique pour positionner vos joueurs sur le terrain.
Une fois que vous avez compris ce qu'offre ce jeu, et si l'idée vous tente, alors en toute franchise n'hésitez plus... Achetez ! Je suis parfois exigeant pour donner une évaluation positive, mais là rien à redire.
Le jeu est extrêment soigné, particulièrement pour un early access. Un plantage et deux bugs mineurs rencontrés en 400+ heures de jeu en EA.
On sent derrière un développeur qui bichonne son jeu, s'interesse aux retours de la communauté, cherche à améliorer et à augmenter le contenu.
De fait le jeu a ce bon goût du pain frais sortant du four d'un artisan boulanger amoureux de son métier. L'interface ultra intuitive, les rubriques d'aides étoffées, la progression addictive, tout est bien polished. Un jeu de gamer pour les gamers, en tout cas c'est l'impression qu'il donne.
Une preuve que les développeurs sont des êtres humains, et bien souvent leur application, leur implication dans le projet, leur ouverture aux retours, leur degré de perfectionnisme sont déterminants dans la qualité du produit final.
Merci donc à  _K_o_S_  pour ce jeu au concept inédit livré dans un magnifique écrin qui le met en valeur, en espérant que le produit final sera encore amélioré.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023231134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1224, 'last_played': 1600695855}
review: When I purchased this game I thought it would be something I played when I wanted a break from serious soccer games like FM. I wasn't wrong. It had a fun and almost cute appeal to it. I played a couple of hours before my old PC died. I started the game back up just to kill some time after getting my new PC and the updates have really improved the game. It isn't easy, despite the simple look. It takes a lot of time to build up your low level club and you will suffer through a lot of bad results in the early going. There is enough here for fans of soccer or strategy games, with some tycoon elements thrown in. Eventually I'd love to see some sort of international mode with national teams, but this is a solid game as is and should only continue to get better as it gets closer to full release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059362817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2420, 'last_played': 1656854416}

Kommunikation mit den Spielern. Ansonsten zu empfehlen

author: {'steamid': '76561198024989419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 31188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10484, 'last_played': 1617684623}
review:
I love this game. the gameplay is rich with strategy. keep in mind that in single player this is probably not the best football simulator, but it's one of the best turn-based strategy games that i've played. i think the core gameplay is in some ways better than even xcom or civ. what follows is a long list of small greivances with the game.

having said that, the game has some issues. the single-player career management mode has what appears to be a hastily thrown together upgrade system that seems to incentivize getting the best coach for one position before hiring any coaches for another. the transfer system is a little too uncompetitive and easy to profit from. the player upgrade trees are a little boring and repetitive. the AI doesn't seem to use AM's false kick ever. the AI too frequently plays players out of position and opposing teams will often have little-to-no depth.

there are some small but annoying bugs. for example, sometimes in multi-player during a kick off, my friend would be unable to de-select his goalie (he couldn't kick off).

author: {'steamid': '76561197974510294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 40475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 842, 'playtime_at_review': 1565, 'last_played': 1712438424}
review:
I really like this game. It's nowhere as deep as FM game nut plays out much quicker. As the title says, the emphasis is on strategy, both on and off the field. To play the strategy well here a lot of rules to learn, but there is an initial tutorial league that's pretty easy to get started with. As you progress up through the leagues the challenge gets harder. Off the pitch your key resources are money, and glory (a but like reputation),. On the pitch, as well as moving player sround to gain an advantage you train your players in skills and talents. As well as giving you an advantage in game training these increases your player value on the transfer market. The game then becomes one of winning games, and thus building money and glory, then using these to imprve facilities and buy players to improve your team on the pitch. If you want be more hands off you can watch or simulate matches.
Overall a refreshing change from playing 100's of hours of FM.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165217155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1012, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 795, 'last_played': 1604871594}
review: I am not a big football fan, but I like turn based tactics games and I really like this one. On default settings the turns each mach might feel not enough to do anything but this gives the feeling that every turn matters and you need to make the most out of it. The RNG (on default settings) plays a big role but a lot of unexpected things happen in reall matches too. You will feel disappointed when you miss a penalty shot and give a clap to your players(at least I do that :D) when they score a goal against all odds. The game manages to get you invested in every match and you feel like something real is at stake. The progression however is a bit janky. At the beginning your players are so weak and most of them have no special abilities. You don't have much options and just pass/shoot hoping the RNG is on your side. This drags for a bit. Then they learn special abilities and the matches get more dynamic and fun. However then your skilled players retire and once again you are left with newbies. The good players you can buy are too expensive and the ones that you can afford are not that great. Not to mention that money is scarce. The sponsor's objectives are tough(win a cup, be first in your league etc.) and you need skilled players to reach them but you need money for that and the vicious circle continues. The issue might very well be with my tactic skills not being up for the task but at least that's my experience till now. Despite this the core gameplay is solid and given that the game is not overpriced it's worth giving it a shot. Giving it a shot, got it? Okay, I'll see myself out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057651280', 'num_games_owned': 313, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1523586254}
review: Probably one of the most boring and simple games i have ever played on steam. I legit got bored of the mechanics after 30 min of play. And then it just feels and looks like a mobile game, like how is this 20 euro? it should be like 2-3 maybe 5 euro MAX
developer_response:
I regret you didn't play more to find out the game is not what you think it is.

In the lowest league (where you start your campaign), the opponents are quite easy. We want players to learn the basics of the game, so carefully send the messages with explanations.

If you don't read them and don't try the tactical elements which we give step by step, you still can win the Amateur league. It is very easy. You can play without any tactics and think that the game is shallow.

But when you promote to the next league, you will have to use the knowledge of the skills, classes etc. If you win easily - it's fine - because you are playing in Amateur league. Later, you will have to use skills, classes and talents to win the stronger opponents. Your ability to combine different players with different abilities will make the difference between wins and loses. 

You will see that the game is not supposed to be an easy winning experience like casual games (and like you see playing in Amateur league). It's a strategy where you should think, use your knowledge to overcome the obstacles on your way to the top. 

If you give the game another chance, I'd propose to learn how skills work. You have the footballers with Rainbow Feint, Long Pass, Layoff Pass, Sliding Tackle. When they are used successfully _against an opponent_ you will earn +1 bonus action. Learn it while your opponents are easy. You will be able to use this knowledge later when your opponents will be much stronger.

I saw so many situations in which players initially thought that the game is shallow, but when they learned how skills work, they started to love FTG.

So, I hope, you will give the game another chance.
