author: {'steamid': '76561197988451804', 'num_games_owned': 186, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1174, 'last_played': 1584814183}
review: Muy buen juego sencillo en conceptos y en aprendizaje…pero difícil de dominar, es un gestor de manager ficharas renovaras contratos etc etc e iras llevando a tu equipo a la gloria empezando desde regional hasta que en 10 años puedas llegar a ganar la copa de europa. Donde más se enfoca el juego y tiene la gracia es en un sus partidos ya que tienen un sistema por turnos y toques de rpg realmente entretenido en el que tendrás que plantear buenas tácticas y podrás ganar a equipos mejores que el tuyo si lo planteas bien. Muy bueno de estos juegos que son interminables y aportan muchas horas y sobre todo innovador y con otras ideas distintas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011359364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 32018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1668369586}
review: Very rare to review anything but as this is still an early access game it deserves support. It is very deceptively simple to play but as soon as you scratch the surface it soon becomes much more complex. Player development and tactical development go hand in hand. Updates seem to be regular enough. It is fun but also tricky to play well. A very small grumble would be that the length of each match is possibly a few moves too short, you get many chances toproduce a goal. That aside this is a little cracker and with it currently on sale it is well worth the money.

review: Super tahovka. Nechybí přestupy, výběr sponzora, výběr týmů z opravdu hodně států, možnost přejmenování čehokoliv (tým,hráč,atp.), tím pádem ale nereální hráči. Každopádně zabavit umí, hlavně díky povedeným animacím.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055963635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3274, 'last_played': 1518378868}
review:
Very rarely will I review anything.  That being said - thoroughly enjoyed Football Tactics.  If you appreciate good strategy and/or football/soccer then this is pretty much your game.

Dev feedback: A nice touch for future updates is have a season stats option - i.e: Who are my top scorers, top assists, tackles etc.  I don't think the game needs to go too much deeper down the stats/football manager rabbit hole, it has a great balance already.
developer_response: Thanks for the review! Just wanted to say that Interesting stats are in our plans ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198115616482', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1493503799}
review: gg

author: {'steamid': '76561197971127867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 4240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1691431170}
review:
"Football Tactics" ist ein sehr schönes und feines Computerspiel. Es ist, im Vergleich zu Managerspielen, sehr einfach gehalten und bietet die Option einen Verein "in nuce" zu führen. Man sollte sich am Anfang durch die Menüs klicken, um die Funktionen des Spiels kennenzulernen. Damit man mich nicht falsch versteht: "Football Tactics" ist nicht primitiv, sondern hat seine eigene Tiefe. Man kann seine Mannschaft steuern, oder dies weitgehend dem Computer überlassen. Die Grafik des Spiels ist einfach und spartanisch. Wer andere Managerspiele kennt, wird sich schnell in den Menüpunkten zurecht finden. Der Sound ist genrespezifisch. Das Spiel motiviert sehr, da man nicht nur wie gewisse Fußballmannschaften am Transfermarkt tätig sein kann, sondern auch die eigene Jugend fördern sollte. Jeder Einsatz verschafft den eigenen Spielern XP: der Output läßt sich durch die Anstellung von diversen Trainern steigern. Die taktische Steuerung der Mannschaft macht am Anfang Spaß. Ich bin dazu übergegangen mein Team durch die KI steuern zu lassen und nur noch die Auswechslungen manuell zu erledigen.
Insgesamt lohnt sich die Anschaffung dieses Spiels da es einen neuen und frischen Ansatz zeigt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101460697', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1708650819}

author: {'steamid': '76561197974973642', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3383, 'last_played': 1661370794}
review:
Rasenschach trifft Fussballmanager.
Sehr schönes Spiel für Fussballbegeisterte. Das gameplay ist etwas gewönungsbedürftig, wenn man Fussballspiele wie FIFA gewohnt ist. Denn hier geht ein Spiel nicht 90min. Ein Match dauert hier eine bestimmte anzahl von Spielzügen. 
Das gibt dem Spiel seinen taktischen Reiz.
Man merkt auch, dass man sich durch die Aufstellung das leben sehr Leicht machen kann. Ich hatte mich für ein 5-2-3 entschieden und hatte überhaupt keine Probleme mehr.
Zudem erstellt man auch eine eigene Mannschaft mit der man sich erst einmal in den unteren Liegen durchsetzen muss bevor man an den Nationalen und Internationalen Wettbewerben Teilnehmen kann. Dabei trainiert man seine Spieler, kauft und verkauft Spieler und bringt den Verein auf simple art und weise auf vordermann. 
Leider gibt es von hause aus keine original Lizensen. Allerdings hat die Moddingszene da schon für abhilfe gesorgt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022556915', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1570914930}
review:
I've had this game a while now and I've dipped in and out of it occasionally with the updates. It's been great to see a game constantly updated, tweaked and maintained so kudos to the devs for that. However despite their efforts and intentions I can't recommend the game.

For starters, Football, Tactics & Glory (formerly Football Tactics) isn't a football game, and it shows. The updates since i heavily played it have given it more of a tycoon/club management feel but it fails to really capture a sense of a club. Facilities are just buttons to upgrade with Money or Fame. There's no training bar setting an attribute that improves quicker than the others as the players gain experience. The RPG elements are just choosing what abilities to give your players and when, where if I'm honest I'd prefer it random. Will your youth prospect hit the heights his potential suggests or fizzle out? Does your midfielder become a tricky winger or a passing maestro? 

The core gameplay itself too doesn't really feel like anything close to a football match. Having turns of three actions might make the game very strategic and tactical, where each move is vital but to have matches where many players don't need to move seems ridiculous. I played one match where a goal was scored on every kick off bar one. For me three actions a turn and sequential turns just doesn't seem to fit with the game its based on. Instead why not simultaneous turns? Or pre planned moves(or tactics), like a one two to put a winger in space for a cross. Whilst the defender then gets to decide to bring his midfield back to help or leave them up for a quick counter. Does a defender come out to press the winger or stay and try to head the ball clear. Just 3 actions split across 10 outfield players means many look uninvolved and makes it feel more like chess than football.

NB: Most of the time ive spent playing the game is at a very low level and it has been in fits and spurts so please take what I say with a pinch of salt.

That said, for a game about football to miss the mark so completely is pretty disappointing. If you like strategy games sure this might be your thing but if you're in it for the football it's best to steer clear.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064226375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 82788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4796, 'last_played': 1692636766}
review: Well, of course it's a matter of tastes, but if you like turn based games and you like soccer and you like to personalize teams, logos, faces, uniforms and so on then this is certainly the game for you. Of course it's not the unique one but I think it's the best in price / quality comparison, I mean it's low price and high quality. The developers team is working continuously to improve and add new features, based on the players feedback too and this is another plus in my opinion. Maybe I'm a player who "likes to win easily" but when I can make my team win championships and cups I'm too happy to quibble about imperfections. I experimented also the kindness of the developers team in resolving a little bug that I encountered in my installation after a little update, I contacted them by Steam and later by mail and they were very helpful and fixed my bug in a couple of days. I'm sure that they will keep on making this game better and better and, who knows, maybe we will see some other teams sport game with the same philosophy, I would be really glad if it will be !

author: {'steamid': '76561197966320871', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1537894938}
review:
Je suis super décu.
Sans rentrer dans les détails du jeu :
- Pour moi c'est clairement un jeu qui devrait tourner sur Android et qu'on devrait payer 2 Euros!
Je n'aurais pas ce gout amer d'arnaque car beacoup trop cher.

D'ailleurs sous android pour jouer 10 minutes dans bus le je lui aurais mit 4 étoiles :-)
Mais sur Steam Messieurs reveillez-vous... Il y a de bien meilleurs moyen de dépenser cette somme.

Pour moi il rentre dans la même gamme de prix d'un blood bowl, qui à des graphismes
vraiment sympa , des commentaires et qui est drôle et qui utilise aussi la tactique tour par tour.

Pour être très bref question contenu je me suis ennuyé comme jamais c'est répétitif vide et plat.
Et ceci malgré tous les commentaires positif que j'avais lu.
developer_response: Je suis désolé d'apprendre que vous avez eu une mauvaise expérience avec notre jeu. Mais d'après ce que je vois, vous devez apprendre comment les compétences de travail pour comprendre la profondeur du jeu. Les joueurs qui jouent plus de 40 heures dans Football Tactics et écrivent des critiques positives, le font parce qu'ils ont maîtrisé les compétences d'utilisation. Cela fait une énorme différence. Espoir, vous donnerez au jeu une autre chance

author: {'steamid': '76561197984559942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 915, 'last_played': 1482082789}

author: {'steamid': '76561198001732720', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1631641860}
review: Jeux vraiment difficile, bon courage pour avoir de l'argent ... tactique defensive zéro.
developer_response:
Nous savons que si certains joueurs n'apprennent pas à utiliser les compétences, le jeu devient ennuyeux et difficile pour eux. S'il vous plaît, passer du temps à comprendre comment utiliser les compétences et comment construire les tactiques en utilisant des compétences. Cela fera une énorme différence pour votre équipe. En ce qui concerne la défense, vous pouvez lire un guide de la façon dont vous pouvez utiliser vos défenseurs tactiquement: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=526764180 

C'est en anglais, mais vous pouvez utiliser Google translate. En outre, il ya des images qui montrent comment la défense dépend de la configuration des défenseurs. Espoir, vous donnerez à notre jeu une autre chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042672834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1500792504}
review:
Needs more Tactics and less Football!

This game plays far too much like an ordinary sports game, just turn-based.  The skills your players can learn are pathetically bland.  The player customization is lackluster.  The management level is very shallow.  All you can do is buy a few upgrades that are very expensive and only marginally help you.  There are "classes" in this game.  Guess what they are.  Forward, Midfielder, Defender, Goalkeeper.  That's it.  I wasn't expecting wizards and robots and zombies, but come on.  This is just turn-based soccer.  Sure, it's fun for a bit, but after a few hours you will have experienced everything the game has to offer.
developer_response: Thanks for writing what your expectations were. However, I should mention that it seems you haven't mastered using skills. The skills are the game changer. When you understand how to use them tactically, you will see the game's depth. Building your squad which is able to use stronger opponents' weak spots gives very special feelings. That's where positive with 100+ playing hours reviews are coming from. We fail to learn everyone to use skills. But when you learn it, you will most probably have fun. Hope, you will give one more chance to our game

author: {'steamid': '76561198097388227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1148, 'last_played': 1600892363}
review: Nečekaně návyková hra. Přestupy, tabulky i statistiky hráčů jsou tady vedeny velmi jednoduše, avšak přehledně a hru to poměrně urychluje. Zápasy nejsou ani zdaleka snadné a tak se musíte naučit pár triků jak nezdolnou obranu překonat. Hra se zatím jeví výborně.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032740683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6669, 'last_played': 1617127750}
review:
Футбол! Да еще в пошаговом режиме! Интересно, не правда ли?)) Очень любопытная игра, такой пошаговый менеджер футбола, с элементами рпг ( прокачка игроков, парвда пока минимальная). Приятная графика и анимация. Игра не большая , но уже имеются ( игра в стадии обновлений) строительство стадиона, трансферы, погодные явления( влияющие на игру), развитие игроков. Порадовали моды на клубы, без них не так интересно.
К минусам отнесу трансферы - сделаны не так как привык, нельзя купить конкретного игрока из др команды, а даются только рандомные на выбор и немного маловато поле и действий игроков. ( возможно что-то будет менятся с обновлениями). А так же, пока что малый онлайн, но это , понятное дело, решаемо. 
Хорошая игра с возможным улучшением в будущем;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197987346841', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11991, 'last_played': 1583074476}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022247922', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 904, 'last_played': 1618174964}
review:
Kombinace strategické hry a fotbalu funguje velice dobře. Doporučuji všem, co mají rádi fotbal, nebo Taktické hry. Jednoduchá a chytlavá, to je Football Tactics.
Navíc po novém updatu je komplexnější než kdy dřív.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970800975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 13078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4920, 'last_played': 1703941826}
review:
Ein sehr einfaches "Runden-Manager-Fußball" Spiel, was trotz der einfachheit sehr süchtig macht. Da die Anzahl an Fußball Manager Spielen hier zu Lande nicht all so groß ist, eine schöne alternative für alle die gerne mit Statistiken, Zahlen, "Aufbauen" und ein wenig Glück zu tun haben möchten.
Für alle die Stundenlang spielen möchten oder nur 10 Minuten, ein schöner Zeitvertreib wo man schnell das Spieleprinzip verstanden hat, ohne groß Stundenlang sich damit zu beschäftigen!

Update: Nach nun vielen neuen Updates die uns die Entwickler hier regelmäßig geben, wird das Spiel immer umfangreicher und steigert auch das Langzeit-Spielevergnügen. Man kann eine klare Entwicklung in eine sehr positive Richtung ausmachen. Klar, Football Tactics ist kein monster Fußball Manager Spiel aber für sportbegeisterte und Spieler mit zug zu Manager Aufgaben haben hier einen tolle Freizeitbeschäftigung, vor allem wenn das Wetter draußen zum selber aktiv werden nicht so einladen ist. Auch für jemanden geeignet der nicht so regelmäßig Zeit dum daddeln hat.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994630821', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3062, 'last_played': 1687387264}
review:
[h1]Good Mix of Strategy and Soccer [h1] 
The game is a nice mix of strategy game elements and soccer, with the first taking a prevaling role.
Its mechanics are quite simple to understand but hard to master.

developer_response: It's unfair to write such reviews. If you dislike the game, write please why. At least, we will see what we can improve. If you have problems with the game, write on the forum. In this way, we or other players will explain how to play better. But writing "no" just doesn't help neither other players nor us. We work hard to make Football Tactics - a unique game which gives new interesting experience. Negative reviews without actual reviews make it harder for us

author: {'steamid': '76561198283052590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8034, 'last_played': 1478808453}
review: Très bon jeu, qui ne demande qu'à évoluer. Ca manque de statistiques, il n'y a plus aucune trace des matchs passés ou actions passées, faire en sorte que l'IA ne placent plus obligatoirement les meilleurs joueurs adverse en partant de la droite, et du coups les points faibles sont quasi toujours au meme endroit à gauche,  mais en contre partie un systeme d'attaque avec 2 façons possible de gérer vos coups très agréable à jouer ...encore beaucoup de travail mais l'idée est très bonne ! En multijoueurs, ce serait une tuerie mais difficile à mettre en place je suppose.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970773776', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1027, 'last_played': 1476345278}
review: Wie bei den meisten Managerspielen ist es auch hier so, das dieses Spiel am Anfang unglaublich Spass macht und man auch schnell hinter das Spielprinzip kommt. Man freut sich über Siege und Aufstiege, Meisterschaften usw. Aber leider ist die Kreuzung aus Blood Bowl und Fussballmanager irgendwann nervend. Entweder man gewinnt die Spiele relativ klar, weil die KI des Gegners in Urlaub ist, oder umgekehrt bekommt man aus nicht wirklich erkennbaren Gründen eine Niederlage reingewürgt, die nicht nachvollziehbar ist. Alles in allem ist es trotzdem eine Empfehlung, da man eine gewisse Zeit einen netten Zeitvertreib hat und die brauchbaren Alternativen rar gesät sind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151140943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1680897688}
review: Вперше зіграв у демо минулого року, ідея гри сподобалася, додав у бажане. Сьогодні згадав про неї, вирішив пограти і бачу що грою дісйно займаються. І грати цікаво, хоча вона найменш схожа саме на футбольний менеджер. Скоріше просто крута тактична покрокова гра. Якщо Ви фанат настільних та/або тактичних ігор - ця гра для вас

author: {'steamid': '76561198017560798', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 41604, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2067, 'last_played': 1639412539}
review: I like this game its FUN!!!  Definately a really nice change from the seriousness of THAT OTHER FOOTIE GAME?  Only thing is after getting promoted into the Football League I am suddenly totally out of my depth.  While I appreciate the divide at each level in the League I suddenly have players whizzing past my team including the goalie??  Sad Days!!!  All I can do is pass and shoot my team is old and I can't develop it quickly enough?  The only thing I would add is that while I can understand the increased cost of a coach at each level, I couldn't work out why all of the levels changed for all categories?  Surely the increased cost should only be added to each level?  Also the cost for ground improvements jump massively even at at Level 2!!!?  A trickly little game that seems well thought out I am intrigued.  The team play looks solid but the aunxillary elements of the game need to be tweaked in order to increase (albeit slim) of surviving even from the amateurs to the Football League, Burton, Fleetwood or early Cheltenam for example.  Keep up the good work - I think that you are on to a cheeky little winner!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198051355326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 27802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 572, 'last_played': 1685633069}
review: Körökre osztott focis stratégiai játék, mely egyszerű megjelenése ellenére meglepően szórakoztató. Habár az ára kicsit húzós, egy leárazás alkalmával érdemes begyűjteni azoknak akik szeretnék kibontakoztatni taktikai/stratégiai érzéküket egy foci menedzser bőrébe bújva. A demo letöltésével egy mini liga erejéig (14 bajnoki meccs) a játék ki is próbálható bárki számára.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024150612', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2821, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2283, 'last_played': 1597241352}
review:
Give this game a chance. I had Football Tactics on my wishlist for a year as I was very unsure about this game. 
Something about the screenshots and videos kept me away, the game looks so simple and childish (coming from a hard-boiled office excel, sorry, Football Manager veteran) my first thought was actually that this is just some poor tablet/mobile game ported to PC. 

How wrong was I.

When I finally did buy this masterpiece (under heavy influence of alcohol and pressure from mates 1ft taller than me) I fell in love during the tutorial. After the first pass I made, I knew that this game was something extraordinary and it's safe to say that I'm indeed addicted. Even Football Manager doesn't give me as strong "one more match" feelings as this game.

It may not really be a FOOTBALL game, how I see it football is just a way to justify the story (who would be interested in a game about rising through ranks of Chess League) as the game mechanics don't have too much in common with real-life football. 
Thus, when considering your next moves you shouldn't be listening your inner Guardiola telling you how each situation would round up in football.

And that's exactly why playing Football Tactics is so refreshing, so rewarding and so addicting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147804635', 'num_games_owned': 521, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 3476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2810, 'last_played': 1660576141}
review: A fun and addictive gem. It's challenging, sure.. but hugely rewarding. It took me 50 hours to climb my way up from the lowest division to become first division champion, and I'll soon be starting a new playthrough on the harder difficulty. For someone who often plays a game once through and moves on, this is a true testament to the fun that can be had with this game. A definite recommendation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008329700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14054, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2829, 'last_played': 1613399384}
review: Zuerst habe ich gedacht, dass das Spiel ganz schön einfach aufgebaut ist und dadurch langweilig wird. Doch nun hat sich gezeigt, dass je mehr ich mich mit dem Spiel beschäftige, desto interessanter wird es. Wenn man einfach nur ein bisschen rumklickt, kommt man nicht weit. Es bedarf effektiv Anpassungen in der Aufstellung, Ueberlegungen ob man nun einen Topspieler der in die Jahre gekommen ist gut verkaufen soll  um dafür einen Jüngeren zu nehmen, wie genau investiere ich in die Entwicklung, denn die wird immer teurer, soll ich wirklich schon aufsteigen, oder lieber mit Siegen meine Mannschaft verbessern und dann gestärkt in die nächste Liga gehen usw. Es macht einfach nur Spass. Great work!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084382428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 649, 'last_played': 1572626687}
review:
[...] i ragazzi di Creoteam hanno trovato una formula originale, ispirandosi ai tactical Rpg e agli strategici come XCOM. Football Tactics, gioco attualmente in early access su Steam, presenta così questo sport da una diversa angolazione, che potrebbe incuriosire anche chi non lo apprezza particolarmente.
[...] Il gioco, comunque, è già assolutamente godibile nella sua forma attuale e i futuri aggiornamenti non potranno che migliorarlo, se verrà prestata attenzione a non minare l’equilibrio di statistiche e abilità speciali.

Continua a leggere su: http://www.marzianiconilpad.it/football-tactics-recensione/

author: {'steamid': '76561198097027591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 4175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2354, 'last_played': 1531079801}
review: Zuerst mal hat dieses Spiel ein sehr gutes Preisleistungsverhältnis. Es wird sowohl Fans von Taktik-, Fußball- und Managerspielen gerecht. Am Besten ist natürlich, wenn man alles drei sehr gerne mag. Wenn das der Fall ist, wird man mit diesem Spiel für viele Stunden Spaß haben. Es ist einfach eine ganz neue Idee von einem Fußballspiel. Es ist eine sehr gute umsetzung eines rundenbasierten Fußballspiels. Außerdem lassen sich viele Objekte aus dem Community - Hub hherunterladen. So habe ich mir z.B. die originalen Wappen und Trikots der verschiedenen deutschen Bundesligen und weiterer deutscher Vereine heruntergeladen. Vielen Dank dafür an den Macher. So erhält das Spiel sehr viel Authentizität. Zuletzt sollte noch erwähnt werden, dass das Spiel eine passende Schwierigkeit bietet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021468669', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1474237565}
review:
Слабовато при игре в долгосрочной перспективе.
Интересно играть только с топ-командами, т.к. аутсайдеры все выигрываются в автоматическом режиме. Потому становится однообразно.
А в топ-командах очень-очень часто игроки, которые много лучше твоих просто потому, что это не сбалансировано.
Так случилось со мной при переходе из любительской лиги в первую. Дальше играть не захотелось по причине слишком сильного дисбаланса навыков у футболистов между моей командой и командой АИ, не в мою пользу.
Скажем, у моих атака 30-38 максмум, а у АИ с какого-то перепугу 70. А какого художника это случилось, если я в предыдущей лиге только что всех порвал? Откуда такой дисбаланс?  Возникает слишком сильное чувство несправедливости, что отбивает желание играть.  Я забросил.
Пока сыровато с балансом.
developer_response:
Спасибо за обзор. Из него видно, что из нашего туториала не всем очевидно, как пользоваться навыками. Но вся тактичность матчей начинает проявляться именно тогда, когда вы научитесь использовать навыки своих футболистов. Ведь каждый успешно выполненный навык против оппонента дает вам +1 бонусное действие. 

И именно за счет тактического использования навыков и построения команды с подходящими навыками и талантами вы можете побеждать более сильных соперников. В этом и заключается особенность игры - вы можете побеждать более сильных соперников. Для этого нужно использовать весь тактический арсенал, а не только базовые умения типа отборов, пасов/навесов и ударов.

Например, на форуме, многие опытные англоговорящие игроки чуть ли не соревнуются, кто насколько слабой командой побеждает значительно более сильных соперников.

Надеюсь, вы найдете время и терпение разобраться с тем, как работают навыки. Тогда, уверен, вам игра очень понравится. К слову, можете для экспериментов с навыками, начать новую кампанию с включенной опцией "Легкие деньги". Это позволит вам мгновенно изучить всем вашим футболистам навыки до максимального уровня и посмотреть, как они используются в матче. Также можно использовать опцию "Смотреть матч", чтобы видеть, как ИИ их использует (он это хорошо умеет).

author: {'steamid': '76561197960287042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 736, 'last_played': 1476548501}
review: Ok game but not without its annoyances. For example progression through the leagues has a disproportionate increase in difficulty. Gameplay is fun for a while but some of the player stats are so random if feels as though they may as well not be there at all and 1st level skills are almost pointless at times. For example 1st level slide tackle almost always fails and players able to fend off multiple tackles with very low control stats. It feels as though one very good opposition player is enough to kill your team whilst your best players are easliy stopped. A defender can play in goal to the same level as he can in defence with no penalty. Plenty of room for improvement.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994805147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 9663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1220, 'last_played': 1668797950}
review:
Es handelt sich um ein einfach gestricktes Fussballmanager-Spiel, in denen die Spiele in schön durchdachten Rundenstragie durchgeführt werden.
Es scheint noch relativ unbekannt zu sein, wenn man die Anzahl der Bewertungen sich bei Steam anschaut, Für mich ist es momentan eine kleine Perle, die mehr Aufmerksamkeit verdient.
Die deutsche Übersetzung ist gelungen und es befindet sich noch im early access. Mann kann aber seinen kleinen Amateur-Verein bis in die obersten Ligen steuern. Ich habe mich noch nicht informiert was alles noch dazukommen soll, aber man kann seine eigene Karriere starten.
Die Amateur-Liga kann man als Tutorial betrachten, indem die Rundentaktik noch sehr seicht rüber kommt. In den höheren Ligen wird es dann komplexer, da die Spieler dann Fertigkeiten und Talente besitzen, die die Rundtaktik zu einer schönen komplexen Sache machen kann.
Das Tutorial gestalltet sich durch dynamische Hilfstexte, was mich positiv beeindruckt hat. Wenn z.B. bestimmte Feature nicht genutzt werden, dann wird man darauf hingewiesen und sie werden näher erläutert.
Wie anfangs erwähnt ist das Management nur auf das wesentliche beschränkt, das Hauptaugenmerk liegt auf der Rundentaktik. Man muss also kein Fussballnerd sein, um sich zu recht zu finden.
Ein wirklich gut durchdachtes Spielkonzept.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080123570', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 9115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8156, 'last_played': 1709806072}
review:
Loving the game!
Great turn-based system and management side.
Invest in your youth center or expand your scout network for more available recruits during transfer windows.
Assign training individualy to maximize your players potential and sell them when the time is right!

On the pitch, the animations and the whole system are really entertaining, a lot of different playstyles are available.

There is really a long career mode and the gameplay gets more complex as your team climb the ladder (5 divisions and continetal cups) and your players learn skills that one could describe has game changers...
Won't spoil, see you on the pitch!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044051080', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1322, 'last_played': 1553275302}
review:
Hra na které jsem měl možnost se osobně podílet překladem do našeho českého jazyka, zasazením se o přidání naší ligy a obsažením několika dat z hlediska jmen, názvů a podobně. Tým vývojářů je sice malý, avšak nadmíru snaživý. Pracuje usilovně na novinkách a vylepšeních, kterými chtějí hru dotáhnout do finálního výsledku. Přestože se Football Tactics zdá jako kompletní hra, stále jsou zde drobnosti k vyladění, které ale navenek pomalu nestojí za řeč. Ve výsledku je to skvělá, originální a návyková fotbalová tahovka. Nadchne i ty jedince, kteří třeba fotbal uplně rádi nemají, protože fotbalovost není to hlavní v čem hra vyniká, je to právě její gameplay a rozhraní. Všemu ještě přidává obsažení editoru na úpravu a tvorbu vlastních lig, kde můžete editovat spoustu věcí. A tato vymoženost se projeví převážně nyní po nové aktualizaci, kdy se do hry přidává kompletně nová grafika a vyobrazení modelů a textur hráčů. Propracovanější a detailnější dresy Vám dovolí více variability při tvorbě a nových modifikacích. Ty si mimojiné můžete také stáhnout od jiných hráčů přímo z workshopu a do své hry vložit. Hra funguje na bázi generování náhodných jmen a hráčů do vašich celků, přestupových tabulek atd, což z jedné strany pomáhá dodat hře určitou novost, avšak například mně právě hra za reálná jména celkem chybí. Za sebe určitě hru doporučuji protože něco podobného zde není a vývojáří jí zcela jistě dotáhnou do stoprocentního a dokonalého výsledku. Z toho důvodu jsem se také zasadil o to pomoci hře s překladem a obsahem.

+Novinka v žánru, originální nápad kombinace fotbalu a tahové strategie
+Velice návykové i pokud nejste fotbalový fanoušek
+Čeština, Česká liga
+Editor a obsáhlé modifikace
+Nová grafika hráčů a možnost jejich editace
+Aktivita vývojářů a dolaďování obsahu navzdory jejich malému týmu

-Náhodná jména, absence reálných hráčů
-Licence na kluby, názvy, dresy a loga
-Pomalejší gameplay, což může odradit vášnivější a akčnější hráče

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197990047960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 12310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4095, 'last_played': 1707486533}
review:
Watch out highly addictive!

When i first saw the game i had my doubts, it looked to simple. Comming from CM and FM i wanted something else, less complex in the sense of info. I found my game, Football tactics is a very very rewarding game. You start as low as you can and crawl your way up, slowly. 

The way you have control over the players both in game and how they develop gives a very personal touch. I love the way how you have to prioritise your clubs growth. Do you invest in youth, coaches, transfers, players, stadium etc etc. 

The flow of the game goes relatively fast, i am in my 3th season after 7.5 hours. I notice that there is alot more depth to it then meets the eye at first glance. Ones your players get a few skills all sort of tactical options open up and the good thing is they seem to work.

Since you want to improve your club, a fast promotion to the highest league isn't the way to succes. This is the first football game where not promoting or even relagation doesn't make me go berserk :-)

A lovely and very addictive game :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198080849961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 51052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15387, 'last_played': 1570545305}
review:
Mein erstes Early Access - Spiel das ich mir gekauft habe. Warum?
Die Idee der Macher ist klasse und einfach genial umgesetzt. Obwohl ich einiges noch nicht richtig durchblicke, fasziniert mich das Spiel ungemein. Demo runtergeladen, bei Youtube angeschaut und voll infiziert. Die Entwickler gehören unterstützt, vielleicht entwickeln sie mal einen  Footballmanager mit deutscher Sprachausgabe!

Nach über 200  weiteren Spielstunden hat sich mein erster Eindruck bestätigt, bzw. meine Erwartungen wurden bei weitem übertroffen. Das Spiel ist genial und bestimmt auch für "Nichtußballer" interessant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333739544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 123673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1626, 'last_played': 1702280397}
review: It's been long time now since I started to play this game. I now have over 1300 hours played. What is was in the beginning a simple game now became with the last DLCs more complex and deep. Its a management game focusing on macro-management, meaning the game focus is on simplicity. Simple contract options with a simpler sale/buy system. The animations are smooth and the game mechanics are challenging. You can spend hours trying to form a competitive team to reach the top and even at that moment the game is still challenging, especially on hard mode, so its potential is endless. Do not expect to win everything even with the best possible team. The devs are very quick in response, probably one of the best support teams on steam. If you are into management games and looking for something more relaxed and fun, while olso enjoying turn based games its a must buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073702420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 18334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3528, 'last_played': 1692129275}

author: {'steamid': '76561198006717383', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1571153381}
review:
Carino nelle prime 10 ore di gioco, poi, le azioni che si compiono sempre le stesse.
Tutto l'aspetto gestionale è ridotto all'osso, hai 5-6 upgrade, i contratti sono gestiti in modo elementare e tutto ridotto in modo molto basilare..troppo.

Per un gioco che viene presentato come il "CIV5" dei gestionali sportivi mi aspettavo qualcosa di più.

Per adesso la mia recensione è negativa ma magari più avanti ritornerò sui miei passi: non vale 15 euro.

A breve dovrebbe uscire un aggiornamento importante. Vedremo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995651515', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 989, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1535803604}
review:
highly addictive game if you are fan of manager games/modes.
For me the way that you edit you starting team focusing on the skills and atributes of your players its perfect you really see on your screen your counterattack working,
your "control attribute" player protecting the ball opening spots for your forwards or the layout pass that totaly "destroy" the defence of the opponent.

You have to work with your players to reach the point that you want,you will win games you will lose games but you will not get the feeling that you dont get nothing even in games that you lost.
the game rewards your focus on your team,your strategy in game and the way that you have planed your upgrades.
 
It is in early access atm but i dint had eny problem it runs perfect without errors or crashes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087144756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 982, 'last_played': 1573347904}
review:
There is little to no tactics in this game, the field is way too small for that.
Basicly it's just a dice roll game with some "cute" visuals with a football background
It will probably make a decent mobile game once it hits release. 

I would not recommend buying this if you're looking for any kind of turn by turn tactic game. Your end up simulating all your games and all you do is spamming buttons to spend the money and fame you get by winning matches.
developer_response: Sorry if I'm wrong, but usually, when players say that the pitch is too short, it means that they haven't mastered using footballers' skills. But the skills make all the difference in tactics and in the game's depth. When you understand how to use them, every skill you have changes the overall tactics and the way you use your footballers in every position.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008867222', 'num_games_owned': 336, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1472560379}
review: Первый сезон затянул, лиги выше оказались не по зубам,но это пока что. Раздражает заставка розыгрыша мяча в центре поля. Хотелось бы видеть в 3д прокачку (либо свою тренировочную базу,либо свою команду), а не тупо строчки прокачки - главный тренер,главный скаут и т.д. Игра сыровата пока еще,но надежда на то что мы еще много чего в неи увидем есть. Помимо тактического геимплея, игра сильно похожа на мобильное приложение. Пока ставлю 2.5 из 5

author: {'steamid': '76561198217170231', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1472317540}
review:
Не могу поверить - я играю в футбол. За всю жизнь проявил к этой теме интерес один раз, и то по принуждению - колеги затащили в спортбар. Нет, бегать в школе бегал, но болеть и вникать в правила...

В общем отличный выбор для тех, кому по душе тайкуны.

Игра не только доставит, но и пригодится - хоть какое то понимание самой народной темы появится.

author: {'steamid': '76561198309804005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1971, 'last_played': 1667269494}
review:
A relatively simple sports strategy game in line with Bloodbowl. Im not a huge fan of games that partially rely on "random number generator" based luck, but this game manages to make it work by not overloading every move with several different chances to fail, and even if you do fail the game isnt too punishing. 

You can adjust the length of games, but for the most part the games are ideal length, long enough to have competitive games without being monotonus. A great game to drop in and play for a couple minutes yet addictive enough to occassionaly binge for a few hours. 

Its not a game that does things differently, its just a solid fun game made by a small studio that ive sunk a lot of time into.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993521099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 354, 'last_played': 1481403035}

author: {'steamid': '76561198245435230', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 982, 'last_played': 1703882814}
review: ADD A MINIMUM NUMBER TO STATS! I'll have a player holding the ball gaining a boost of 20 to his control bringing the total to 45 and an opposing will player try to tackle to ball from me, and I'll roll a 1 or a 2 or some kind of bogus like that and that drastically less skilled player takes the ball. They should impliment some sort of minimum number either to training or uprades or even just have it initially so a forward with an accuracy of 53 can't roll a 1. Otherwise, fun game, neat idea, could see myself getting lost in a complete version for weeks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004360403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1486, 'last_played': 1685860932}
review:
To be clear, this game is fun. And it is possible to beat stronger teams with good tactics. I like the fact that if you study your opposition, look at their players and abilities, you can formulate a strategy to neutralize and even win, even against good teams. If you like strategy games, and football, you will probably enjoy this. Real life concepts, like using players to pull the defensive shape apart and then following on with players moving into the vacated space, work well. 

But I also feel that the RNG in terms of special abilities favors the AI. My players special skills fail routinely, even at full energy and against weak opposition, while the AI players seem to somehow manage to beat my rolls consistently, even when they have no business doing so. I'm not opposed to challenge, and I understand that it's not supposed to be a walk in the park in the higher divisions. But I do feel like even with perfect tactics, the AI sometimes decides their abilities are going to work, and mine will fail. 

Matches take between 10 and 20 minutes, which is great for just popping in and out. The tactics setup can be tedious, with lots of clicking through menus to line up your squad properly, but it's not a crippling feature. 

After a couple seasons, the difficulty ramps up considerably, and you will probably need to grind a couple campaigns just to bring the overall quality of your squad up to par. If you are enjoying the game, this probably won't bother you. But it can be frustrating to consistently run up against teams you simply cannot match up with, no matter your tactical brilliance. Like most games, the more time you put into it, the better you (and your squad) will get. 

All in all, I definitely recommend this game to football fans, or anyone who likes a simple (yet deeply challenging) strategy game. It's easy to learn, but there is a decent amount of depth in terms of lining up your squad to match up and defeat the oppostion. The devs seem to still be engaged, so perhaps the true 1.0 will be even better. Considering the price (I got it on sale for 11.99 US), this is a good investment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198202757069', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3798, 'last_played': 1499035557}
review:
В общем-то ранее я был в восторге от игры, но теперь в ней появились жуткие баги. Например, в меню команды может исчезнуть весь текст. Имена игроков, параметры внешности и т. п.. Как говорится, спасибо за перемены.
Когда возникнет желание затестить игру вновь, - хз. Думал поиграть спустя несколько месяцев с последнего раза, а тут облом. Сами понимаете, - игра хоть и в раннем доступе (Хотя, сколько уже можно, ведь некоторое время назад все выглядело вполне завершенным? ), но втыкать в критические баги - это не совсем то, чего хотелось бы.
Теперь у Football Tactics и X-Com гораздо больше общего. В процессе, эти игры, и та, и другая могут просто взять и слететь к хуям. Правда, какое преимущество у Football Tactics, - это все еще продукт раннего доступа. Довольно затяжного раннего доступа. Так что, хер его знает, плюс ли все-таки это...
Сегодня эта игра у вас пойдет хорошо, а завтра она станет не тем, за что вы заплатили и слетит. Правда ведь, это разумно, - радикально менять параметры игры после того, как большиство игроков уже не смогут сдать товар в стиме?

author: {'steamid': '76561198131926054', 'num_games_owned': 1003, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 15915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1853, 'last_played': 1674238893}
review:
Recensione completa: [url]https://www.tanadelcobra.com/football-tactics-glory/[/url]

Le oltre 200 ore all’attivo che ho su Football Tactics & Glory dovrebbero dirla lunga; tenete conto che la modalita’ carriera e’ solo single player e il multiplayer e’ confinato a piccole leghe custom senza progressione e a scontri diretti. Ma e’ proprio il single player dove il gioco splende, e di tanto.

Football Glory & Tactics e’ una piccola gemma nascosta che meriterebbe molta piu’ attenzione.

Rivedibili i costi dei DLC, qualcosa doveva essere presente nel gioco base.

Voto: 8.5

author: {'steamid': '76561198050214745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1047, 'last_played': 1690150764}
review:
The game is very fun!
If you do single player and not change anything in the options , you might find it extremely easy
but if you do select "hard start" then it has a nice level of difficulty and will be a slow growing team
I tried in in hotseat quite some times too and thats a total blast , despite you still got no options for that mode (as in how many turns game lasts etc)
8/10 can easilly achieve a 10 with some polishing, and can achieve that 10 for being a one of a kind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048427886', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 884, 'last_played': 1636616826}
review:
Turn-based tactical and light manager game.  Feels like chess in a way.  Gets much more difficult in the second season, but I guess it depends on your team's skill and your own knowledge of the AI.  Definitely a fun game if you like management games but feel they go a bit too in depth.

The actual gameplay feels complete, but the menus could use a bit of work.  I find myself clicking all over the place when making decisions about contracts.  Maybe a sort by feature for many of the player sheets, a "hide" or grey out for players on the transfer market that you KNOW you have no interest in.  There's also a lot more room for stats.  A percentage of successes on passes, tackles, shots, shots against etc would probably be beneficial.

As is, learning the basics and first season takes a couple hours, second season gets a bit more advanced and interesting takes 2-3 hours.  I'm about 7 hours in (counting season i did not continue from the demo) and the game is still great, my team still sucks, and I have at least another 10 hours in this game before I say fuck it and start over or make a breakthrough.

I've heard a lot of people lately saying $1/hr having fun is a good game.  I could see myself playing this game off and on to make that logic more than worth it.  It's easy enough to pick up for 15-20 minutes and play one match, or get embedded and knock out a few seasons in one day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047359721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 761, 'last_played': 1550975555}
review:
This appears to be a simple game, yet is full of depth that makes playing very enjoyable.

Chose your team, or if you don't like the teams on offer, visit the workshop area to download teams from a comeptition you like.

The game mixed management and actual matches, but not in a way that is too indepth.  Great for filling in short periods of time by playing one game, or for realising you just spent hours playing instead of doing things you should have been doing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052734537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 16941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9491, 'last_played': 1695657062}
review:
As so many have said, fun and addictive.  I have played Football Manager for years, but starting a new team in that game always felt like such a chore: setting up all your scouts, poring over numbers on your youth team players, scouring the transfer market. In Football Tactics, these options are there to a certain extent, but you get into game and into your season so much more quickly. 

The integration with Steam Workshop is huge to allow for real logos and players to be in game and updated.

I'm very excited to see how the developers take these great reviews during EA and add new features in the future. 

UPDATE: Since my initial review, the devs have continued to make outstanding improvements to the game, with improved animations, an incredible face design engine, and more to come. Nothing but good things to say about this game and its very-involved creators. 

Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198032228347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 13397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3164, 'last_played': 1697214103}
review:
Великолепная игра! 
В прошлом фанат футбола, несколько лет назад отошёл от большой игры, стала неинтересна. Решил всё же глянуть последний ЧЕ, не понравился. Совсем разочаровался. Не думал уже ,что к футболу меня можно вернуть)))
В списках рекомендаций увидел эту игру. И пропал)
Даже для раннего доступа игра уже шедевр. тактика-стратегия-футбол в одном наборе. Отлично сделано! Так держать!
10 пасов на ход из 10!

Пожелания-предложения:
1. Возможность выбора навыка для своих воспитанников(либо для всех)
2. Возможность переключения режимов симуляция матча- просмотр матча-игра и обратно
3. При подготовке к матчу неплохо было видеть схемку противника.
4. Усталость игроков в матче маловата, нет большого смысла делать замены

Игра обязательна к приобретению!

author: {'steamid': '76561198134186860', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1533651488}
review:
Football Tactics no es el típico juego de fútbol en el que te corres medio campo con el estrella y marcas un gol. No es el típico FIFA o PES. Es diferente.

La temática es la misma de los demás juegos de fútbol: ganas partidos, compras mejoras, extiendes contratos pero con una condición:
[h3] ES POR TURNOS [/h3]

Tienes 3 movimientos por turno que debes de usar sabiamente, porque en el turno del rival no podrás mover A NINGÚN JUGADOR. No puedes mover a un defensa a la portería porque están atacando, no puedes bloquear, no puedes hacer NADA en el turno del rival. Tiene una buena curva de dificultad, pues en todas las ligas hay unos equipos mejores.

Las acciones se representan en números: tiene que salir uno mayor para que la acción se complete, o si no el rival interceptará, la pelota se irá a la banda (muy eficaz si la toca el portero antes) o harás falta.

La verdad es que no puedo destripar mucho más, pues este es uno de esos juegos en los que descubres sorpresas con gran regularidad (Stardew Valley, Undertale...). Puedo decir que tiene 11 cromos (la mitad desbloqueables), tiene modo Twitch, hay online (aunque nadie juega, una pena) y ESTÁ EN ESPAÑOL. Tienes que jugarlo. Hay un rumor que dice que esta en Early Acces, pero te juro que he visto muchos juegos 1.0 con muchas menos cosas. Merece cada centavo.

CONCLUSIÓN: 8.8/10. Aunque tiene cosas por pulir, cuando llegue la versión final será uno de los mejores juegos de fútbol.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987731882', 'num_games_owned': 596, 'num_reviews': 517, 'playtime_forever': 95628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44068, 'last_played': 1604771962}
review:
Enjoys the pace and tactical gameplay of the game.
Simple yet complex 'Board of Soccer'.
Dedicted Dev always around to answer to queries and provide to the community.

The actions and motions of those little men on the field, 
looks incredibly lifelike.
Their postures, movement with the ball and jumping with joy, hype and breakdowns when they scores or gets denied are a joy to watch.

Having a great time with playing Hard mode, one or two matches each day.
Had more fun playing in the lower leagues, dominating it, slowly building up the club status, 
accumulating young talents before moving up the league ladders.

Technical analysis and some luck are needed in most crucial club changing decision.
Always think twice before using the hard earned fames and capital.
Building a good foundation for the club status is key, acquiring and cultivating young talents periodically over the seasons to build up a youthful team, can lower the cost and a better foundation.
Unless you like to just run thru the game quickly finishing it, can simply simulate decades of seasons in a less than a day, acquire the achievements and forget the game.


*Newly added character customizations is very detail and precised 

A slow Hard mode playthrough of XAS youth team in the English Leagues.
http://steamcommunity.com/app/375530/discussions/0/350544272221967526/


Edited. 
More contents after a year in review, there are more specializations, managerial options and techniques to master the game.

http://steamcommunity.com/app/375530/discussions/0/1486613649678904883/


Looking forward to more improvements and updates in the future,
and thanks to those modder players putting up the mod logos for teams in workshop.



Money well spent.

Highly Recommended  to try the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186497274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 46407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22128, 'last_played': 1690147374}
review:
The amazing love child between association football, an RPG, and chess, FTG combines 22 guys running after a ball with a whole hat full of trick plays and strategies. Even more than a sports game, this is a strategy game about combining the right players and their skills and talents in a way that lets you overcome the opposing team. 

Wonderful game for everybody sick of certain football managers were you are busied more by helping your whiny players blow their nose than actually managing. Choices are meaningful and a player's value can increase tremendously if you can make him learn the right skills. The AI is competitive and sometimes combative and is by no means just there for decoration. They want to be beaten in the first place. 

Several settings options, too, for longer games, different dice rules etc.;

Definitely recommended. Buy it. Now.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978742688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 2719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1835, 'last_played': 1689808701}
review:
Zuerst wirkt das Spiel etwas simpel, später merkt man dann, dass dem nicht so ist.

Kurzzusammenfassung:

Man hat jeweils drei Züge, um ein Tor zu schießen. Danach ist die andere Mannschaft dran. Mit Hilfe von Spezialtricks (die allerdings den Spieler langfristig schwächen) kann man diese Anzahl etwas erweitern. Wo sich welcher Spieler auf dem Platz befindet, spielt ebenso eine Rolle. Beispiel: Der Kanonenschuss funktioniert nur, wenn kein Feld zwischen Tor und Spieler besetzt ist. Mit der Fähigkeit "Pass in den Raum" kann ich eineen Spieler bewegen, ohne einen Zug zu verbrauchen. So kann ich einen Spieler freispielen, bewegen und danach frei abziehen.  "Deckung" wiederum kontert diese Fähigkeit. Usw.
So taktiere ich mich langsam die Ligen hoch, baue mein Stadion aus, kaufe neue Spieler, trainiere sie...
Das ganze Drumherum ist recht simpel gehalten, so dass man sich voll aufs Spiel konzentrieren kann. Die Entwickler schieben weiter neue Inhalte nach, so sind eine bessere Grafik, Nationalmannschaften etx. versprochen worden. Im Augenblick gibt es die meisten Ligen (Europäische, Brasilien, Asien, USA), nationale Pokale und die Championsleague. 
Der Workshop versorgt sie mit Originalwappen und Namen.

Kleines, feines Spiel, gut umgesetzt, das durchaus süchtig macht. Guter Kauf für Fußball und Taktikfreunde.

Edit: Inzwischen ist so eine Masse an Features hinzugekommen, neue Animationen, Kopfbälle,  neue Spielerrollen, neues Aufstiegssystem, neue Grafik etc., aber der oben beschriebene  Kern bleibt erhalten. Trotzdem einfach super, wie immer weiter von Entwicklerseite nachgeliefert wird. Aber mehr als den früheren Daumen hoch geht ja leider nicht. Ist aber nochmal ein halbes Spiel in der Zwischenzeit dazugekommen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044125367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2258, 'last_played': 1561721842}
review:
Hi guys,

Pressing needs to be fixed IMO - at the moment it doesn't really do anything. Perhaps when used it could cut off a greater angle of passing, to the point where the defence stat actually comes into play (maybe with a stat boost). Just simply too easy to bypass at the moment. Also Olympic Kick should NOT be able to go out for a corner, it's far too overpowered. I was playing a team who had 3 in a row and at some point one is going to go in. Corners are far too common for continual 80-90% chances.

It should also be a little easier to sign good players. You start with most of a team which retires within a couple years, and all the decent replacements are like $200,000 each. That's far too much for a player in the first few seasons. Perhaps there should be more players from the get go in the transfer list.

The fan accumulation needs tweaking too I think. I am in 2nd division im at 400 fans and falling. In 3rd division I was killing it and came into Div 2 and had nearly 800 fans. I'm now playing my 3rd season in Div 2 and my fans are halved from where I started. Surely by being in a better league you should gain followers rather than haemorrhage them. It makes it very difficult to progress when your cash stagnates.

Other than that I love the game. Much more than I expected. However, maybe expand the youth system? Like you could have upgrades for more players per year coming in, and perhaps a pool of 3 or 5 etc players of which to choose one to promote. That could be fun and more control for the player. Maybe even the ability to do a training drill with them to boost stats???

Anyway, just my thoughts.

Cheers,

A fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976173811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 2913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 712, 'last_played': 1703853680}
review:
Addictive

This is definitely one of the best soccer games ever made. It's neither a full manager experience nor direct action like Fifa or PES. Instead the game lays its focus on tactics, making smart decisions and a bit of luck because of the random events. 

I highly recommend  buying this game - its worth every cent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264014381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1661810727}
review: Buona idea ma il gioco è ancora troppo limitato. Gli aspetti gestionali della squadra (mercato, accademia, formazione) sono poco sviluppati. Le partite non permettono una profondità tattica da renderlo divertente a lungo. Migliorerà visto che è ancora in fase di sviluppo.
developer_response:
Da vostri successi, vedo che non hai vinto nessun campionati. Penso che sia perché non hai padronanza utilizzando le competenze. Tuttavia, la capacità aggiungere un sacco di tattiche e profondità.
Quando si esegue una abilità attraverso un avversario, si guadagna +1 bonus di movimento. Quando si capisce come usarlo. si sarà in grado di vincere gli avversari ancora più forti.

Si prega, cerca di capire come funzionano, e credo che si cambierà la tua opinione.

review:
What if Blood Bowl was about soccer? And what if it didn't have any dwarves or elves or whatever, but instead had Belgians and Costa Ricans, and instead of fighting maybe they could do special kicks or whatever, you know? And what if the systems weren't explained very well, and if the stats were not explained anywhere at all? 

It would be a lot like this game, I guess. And I'd be headed back to Blood Bowl for my games about made-up sports.
developer_response: Try please playing more. As the system is quite deep, and there are many mechanics, we explain them bit by bit after every match. By the end of Amateur league, you will get all Coach's notes which explain the basics

author: {'steamid': '76561198020451303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 26605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9888, 'last_played': 1666083733}
review:
Хочешь понять, брать игру или нет, смотри, сколько часов в неё в среднем играл тот, кто написал обзор. Прикинь среднее по всем, кто написал обзоры и поймешь - брать ее или нет. Ты в игру проиграешь столько-же примерно, сколько и остальные.

Нy что можно сказать по самой игре?
Проект сродни кик-стартеровским.
Задyмка интересна. Реализация - на yровне.
из +:
+ очень оригинально, здорово передает дyх фyтбола, где досадная слyчайность, излишняя самоyверенность, недооценка противника или переоценка собственных сил запросто приведyт к проигрышy, или наоборот, немного yдачи - и вы победили соперника на головy выше вас. Нy а если сидеть и заморачиваться, вырабатывать тактики, дyмать над каждым ходом (как в любой пошаговой стратегии), нy и не ленится иногда переигрывать матчи раз за разом :) То и вовсе можно такие победы сделать системой и быть той-же Портyгалией, которyю все рyгают за низкий класс, но которая чемпион :)
+ обещают сделать космос, есть мнение, что не обманyт.
++ самое главное, что все мы ждем от игр - эмоции. Гарантирyю - игра подарит вам набор всей гаммы эмоцией, на которые вы способны от любви до ненависти и обратно :)
из -: 
- высоковата цена. С дрyгой стороны не поддержать отечественных разработчиков - грех (всем идиотам, кто считает рядовых yкраинцев недрyжественной нам нацией - в сад)

Разрабам желаю yспеха от всей дyши :)

UPD: спyстя 30+ часов игры хочy сказать, что лет так через 10 в неё еще бyдyт играть. И бyдет эта игра чем-то вроде героев 3 в yмах игроков. Трyдно придyмать более yдачное сочетание жанров. Этот эксперимент yже yдался. А игра даже еще не вышла из раннего достyпа. Не жлобитесь. Покyпайте.

UPD2: Бyдьте внимательны, достижения даются ТОЛЬКО если на момент полyчения достижения вы он-лайн в стиме. Иначе пролетите. И ещё - прежде чем начать игрy - зайдите в мастерскyю - подключите реальные команды, играть станет намного интереснее :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198029967256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2090, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1561, 'last_played': 1469637145}
review:
Vraiment sympa :)
pas de prise de tête mais avec de la technique tout de même !
bien moins compliqué que d'autres "sim manager" connus.

les +....
j'ai aimé pouvoir créer mon équipe avec mes couleurs
on démarre vraiment en bas lol
les parties sont rapides
le jeu est mignon

author: {'steamid': '76561198197182214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1562660849}
review:
This is a game which i had second thoughts about when buying the game wasnt my type it looked quite confusing but once you enter the environment of Football Tactics it makes you use your brain, teaches you a few things about football and teaches you to take every oppertunities you have and after the first/second season if your good you will be rolling through the divisions collecting achivements after everygame and if you want to auto play you can either select simulate.
Overall the game is awesome and easy to complete depending on the difficulty but do consider its early acces surely more contents are coming.

review:
Addictive. 

I picked up the game because I am a huge fan of XCOM and other tactics games. This game mixes in with that the manager type games and Futball. 

Graphics - weak, who needs them
Gameplay - simple to learn, will seem too easy at first but quickly picks up in difficulty
User Friendly - with in game messages being fed to you as you go, it works well to integrate you in the game.

Check it out, you won't be disappointed!

review:
Просто офигенная идея пошагового футбола! :)
Надеюсь игру будут развивать и не забросят. Простор для творчества просто огромный.
Любителям футбола и пошаговых игр - РЕКОМЕНДУЮ. Вроде бы и простая, но есть чем занятся и над чем задуматся даже вне футбольного поля.
Единственное, чего не хватает вот прям с первого взгляда - игра в любой лиге, а не только старт из самых низов ( возможно я просто тупенький и не нашёл как).

author: {'steamid': '76561198014501212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 14573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5533, 'last_played': 1683666205}
review:
Updated over 1 year later.  

WOW  I am completely impressed by all the updates, improvements, and additions the developer continues to build into the game.  Deeper, more strategies, more realistic.  Absolutely my favorite sports manager simulation.

I wish all game developers were as dedicated,

If you like soccer and sports sims, do yourself a favor and buy Football Tactics!!

----------

I gave up on Football Manager because of complexity and it seemed too much like work.

So I tried this game and it is FUN!

First it does a simplified job of putting you in the Manager's seat using mainly two currencies, cash and fame.  Using these wisely goes a long way to having a successful team.

Besides the enjoyment of managing your players, the tactical game for each match is easy to learn and yet seems to do a great job of duplicating what actually happens in real soccer games.   Plus turn based.

And don't let your first game limit you.  When you decide to start a second game with a new team there are options to increase difficulty and make the actual games have more actions.  When I do take control of an actual game, it is very enjoyable.  Skills and talents become very important and result from good training and transfers.

My first game, I have already completed nine seasons, and have grown attached to my players and feel the need to take charge in key games and tournaments.

Summing up, FUN, easy to learn with good replayability, and time flys by.  Cannot stop playing!

author: {'steamid': '76561198171096818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1464893353}
review: Did not enjoy this game as much as I expected to. The randomizer also seems broken.
developer_response:
Sorry to hear that you do not like the game. I must inform that random is not broken. However, if you do not like it, you can start a new campaign and select Less random option. It makes the game feel very differently. 

Also, I'd want to say that Football Tactics is made for a long play. So we have a long tutorial, you will understand the role of skills in the Third or Second league, and the new emotions start appear later in the game, when your team grows and you see the results of your decisions made early on in the game.

Hope you will give the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029334828', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 678, 'last_played': 1561828377}
