author: {'steamid': '76561198041681580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 23903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7736, 'last_played': 1637881021}
review:
This soccer/football game is a very fun and addictive management simulation. Already mod friendly, the teams/players/uniforms etc. are easily changed in game. I highly recommend this game to anyone that likes being the Big Cheese, El heffe, Big Boss Man of a management/sports sim.

Changed player's name to Wayne Rooney in first 5 mins

10/10 would become Wayne's boss and mentor again!

Edit: So many great changes have been made to the game that I can not begin to describe. Absolutely the best EA purchase I have made. Why are you just sitting there, buy it!  Do it now, then get to da choppa!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018460125', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1052, 'last_played': 1635358265}
review:
Прекрасная убивалка времени! Но есть два недостатка:
1. Цена! Это игра все таки казуальная, больше подошла бы на игру для планшета. Слишком много денег просят разработчики, за относительно немного контента
2. Как раз таки касаемо планшета. У меня есть планшет на windows 10, так вот на нем она запустилась, все с тач рабоатет. Кроме кнопок! На кнопки внутри игры надо делать два быстрых тача, только тогда они срабатывают.

Это игра все же еще в стадии разработки... Вот если бы сделали правильную обработку нажатия на кнопки для тач устройств, я бы вообще был счастлив! (Куда им писать для баг репортов?)

author: {'steamid': '76561198043833276', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1071, 'last_played': 1699954344}
review:
Schaut am Anfang komisch aus und ist absolut was anderes....ABER!
wer das unübersichtliche FIFA Manager usw. satt hat und einfach nur ein SPIEL wie in den guten alten Zeiten sucht (Anstoss 3 usw.) kann hier echt glücklich werden!

Die Steuerung bzw. das Spiel ist taktischer und schwieriger als es anfangs aussieht, da man auf kompletter Linie alles durchdenken muss. Die Spieler sind zwar nur in TW, VER, MIT, STU eingeteilt aber man muss jedes Spiel die Schwächen des Gegners finden und ausnutzen, ich weis es klingt wie jedes andere Manager Spiel aber man könnte noch so viele andere Differenzen mit anfügen dass ich sag "kauft es euch es ist das Geld wirklich wert"

author: {'steamid': '76561198100439359', 'num_games_owned': 171, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 63301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 786, 'playtime_at_review': 15244, 'last_played': 1711920009}
review:
[h1]Jeu de stratégie au tour par tour[/h1]

Football tactics est un jeu de stratégie au tour par tour et de gestion sur un fond de football. Il n'y a pas de comparaison avec Football Manager à avoir.

[h1]Gameplay simple mais profond[/h1]

Le gameplay est simple mais pas simpliste. Vous avez trois actions à faire pendant votre tour (passer la balle, tirer etc). Vous êtes totalement maitre de la situation, ce ne sont pas vos joueurs qui jouent pour vous. Le jeu est plus complexe qu'il en a l'air grace aux competence special des joueurs qui permettent par exemple de faire des petits ponts, tacle glissé etc dont certains vous font gagné un action pendant votre tour donc plus complexe que ca en a l'air.

[h1]Présence d’infrastructures et du staff[/h1]

Vous pouvez améliorer votre centre de formation, votre stade, entraineur pour faire progresser vos joueurs plus vite etc avec votre argent. 

[h1]Pas de licence mais un workshop[/h1]

Aucune licence bien sur. Y a un Workshop pour mettre les vrais noms d'équipe, les joueurs etc. Ca rajoute du réalisme mais les stats sont aléatoire donc vous pouvez avoir un Ibrahimovic moins fort qu'un  Bahebeck. Mais de toute les joueurs de base ne seront pas les meilleurs donc c'est juste pour faire joli.

[h1]Démo gratuite jouable[/h1]

Il y a une démo sur Steam pour tester le jeu: [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/375890/] Football Tactics Demo[/url]. Je ne l'ai pas testé donc je ne connais pas son contenu mais bon à savoir.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

En conclusion, je conseille fortement le jeu mais ne vous attendez pas à un FM. Ici vous gérez vos joueurs en match sur un système de tour par tour. Les matchs sont courts tout comme les saisons mais rend très accroc !

author: {'steamid': '76561198058622434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1594217948}
review:
Оригинальный футбольный менеджер. Матч проходит в режиме походовой стратегии - чем-то напоминает Blood Bowl, но попроще (это как минус - присутствует определенная шаблоность, так и плюс - матч занимает на порядок меньше времени).
Плюсы:
1. "Ясный", не перегруженный интерфейс.
2. Наличие дилеммы при выборе состава - прокачивать неопытную молодежь или задействовать опытных игроков (здесь у меня аналогии с онлайн-менеджером fa13 хотя там это критичнее).
3. Выбор решений в ходе матче заставляет подумать - но без фанатизма : )
4. Очень важен выбор расстановки игроков, в некотором смысле получается пазл, так как растановка игроков соперника известна до матча.

Пожелания (минусы):
1. Ввиду пункта 4 при подготовке свой расстановки хотелось бы видеть на том же экране расстановку соперника.
2. Не нашел календаря игр, что мешает точно распланировать стамину ключевых игроков, да и это один из ключевых моментов футбольного менеджера.
3. Не нашел как в произвольный момент времени (не перед матчем) можно посмотреть состав команд-соперников.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030748310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1528171347}
review:
Un buen juego. Bueno el abordaje, una mezcla de FM, el viejo PC Futbol y estrategia por turnos tipo XCOM. Ojalá los desarrolladores lo potencien de acá al futuro. Es un juego que me gustaría volver a jugar de acá a 3 años encontrandole mayor profundidad. Lo jugué intensamente dos días, y ya había llegado de la última división argentina a casi ganar la primera. Estaría bueno que mejoren los slots para que los mods puedan reflejar las verdaderas copas, jugadores, etc. 

Como conclusión, decir que es una experiencia distinta, y que tiene mucho potencial. Habrá que ver de aquí a una segunda versión si logran darle mayor profundidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198309680371', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 10968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3723, 'last_played': 1581975832}
review:
Игра крутая, затягивающая, по сути это тактическая стратегия, от футбола тут только антураж. 
Сомневающимся советую просто скачать беспатную демку - все поймете. От себя скажу, что это первая игра, за которую я решился отдать свои кровные, со времен, когда игры продавались на CD-дисках. 

Конечно, игре еще есть куда расти, и дальше мой отзыв для разработчиков:

Первейший вопрос, котрый возникает в игре, почему я не могу начать игру с другой лиги? Я начинал карьеру пару раз, сейчас дошел до премьер лиги и могу точно сказать, что мне не хочется проходить весь путь заново. Любительская лига проходится вообще симуляцией матчей, третья вряд ли вызовет у кого-то проблемы, когда у тебя полный состав с навыками, а у соперников нет (это тоже кстати бросается в глаза, соперники не развиваются параллельно с тобой). Сложности могут начаться во второй, почти все команды сильнее по скиллам, голы можно забивать почти исключительно с навыками, а не пропускать позволяет только удержание мяча в обороне, схема с 7-6 защитниками практически безальтернативна. Что меня несколько разочаровало: игровой процесс не меняется начиная со второй лиги - ты всегда аутсайдер и это не оставляет тебе много вариантов, с повышением лиги только повышается цена ошибки, но действия все те же: длинный пас, пас на ход, финт/пушечный удар.
В общем, вывод из этого пассажа: 1)надо больше разных навыков, может быть даже разветвленное техническое древо. 2) начиная со второй лиги приходится удерживать мяч, надо подкрутить баланс, чтобы надо было делать это по минимуму, потому что это не весело  (можно даже запретить расставлять игроков так, чтобы они полностью перекрывали проход к мячу)
3) сделать другой режим игры, когда можно выбрать с самого начала клуб определенной силы в определенной лиге (соответсвенно стартовое развитие по уровню лиги/клуба, или опционально начинать без развития), и важно чтобы соперники в лигах тоже развивались на тех же условиях, что и игрок, ИИ  и без того не поражает воображение.
4) ну и, самое сложное, понятно, сделать ИИ менее предсказуемым

По интерфейсу: понимаю, игра заточена под мобильные приложения, что вводит ограничения, но самое самое неудобное в интерфэйсе - переключаться между составами перед игрой. В идеале на экране состава сделать в один клик переключение на состав ближайшего соперника. Ну или на худой конец просто переверните расстановку соперника вверх ногами, потому что приходится каждый раз мысленно переворачивать составы, чтобы понять кто напротив кого будет стоять, лично мне бы это помогло.
Для кнопки календарь есть место на главном экране, сейчас надо каждый раз тыкать в таблицу. Сделать доступным просмотр всех команд в календаре. 
Сделать возможность автодоигровки матча.
Я не сразу догадался, что в борьбе за позицию на угловых определяющий скилл - это контроль, по-моему об этом нигде не написано.
В игре сообщается, какие игроки не тренируются, кроме тех, у кого уже есть навык, первое время я думал, что один раз выбрав навык, он уже тренируется до следующего уровня автоматически.
Вроде ничего не забыл :)
Успехов!

author: {'steamid': '76561197984697312', 'num_games_owned': 1297, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1623867315}
review:
"Football Tactics" bietet nicht die gleichen möglichkeiten wie ein Fussballmanager. Jedoch ist der Name auf jedenfall Programm. Abgesehen von einem Editor womit man Mannschaften, Wappen, Ligen, Spieler, Trikots editieren kann, hat man folgende möglichkeiten:

- Verschiedene Trainer einstellen
- Stadion ausbauen
- Sponsorenvertrag
- Training
- Aufstellungen

Jeder Spieler besitzt 4 Verschiedene Werte. (Kontrolle, Pass, Schnelligkeit, Verteidigung) Je nachdem auf welcher Position der Spieler spielt ist der eine Wert wichtiger als der andere. Um einen Schuss Erfolgreich ins Tor zu versenken, wird nun ein zufälliger Wert durch Würfeln ermittelt. Ermittelt wird nun der "Kontroll" Wert des Schützen, sowie der "Verteidigung" Wert des Tormannes. Ist nun der Verteidigungswert, höher als der Kontrollwert des Schützen, wird der Schuss gehalten. Das gleiche gilt auch für sämtliche andere Aktionen im Spiel. Somit bringt ein Spieler mit hohen Werten noch nicht viel, weil noch zusätzlich, dass Würfelglück entscheidet.
In jeder Halbzeit können beide Mannschaften zusammen, insgesamt 24 Aktionen ausführen. Dabei hat die Heimmannschaft zu Beginn den Ballbesitz. Nun besitzt die Mannschaft die ersten 3 Aktionen die sie ausführen kann. Danach kann die Gegnermannschaft ihre 3 Aktionen ausführen. Alle aufgestellten Spieler erhalten pro Match Erfahrungspunkte und steigen im Rang und Können auf. Zusätzlich kann ab einem bestimmten Rang des Spielers, Spezialskills antrainiert werden. (z.b.: Pass in freien Raum oder Dribbeln).
Wie schon erwähnt sollte man keinen FIFA Fussballmanager erwarten, macht aber aufjedenfall viel Spaß und hat aufjedenfall Suchtpotenzial. Für diejenigen die solche Spiele mögen, oder einen nicht zu ganz Komplizierten Manager suchen, kann ich dieses Spiel empfehlen. Das Spiel befindet sich noch im "Early Access", macht aber einen Vollständigen Eindruck. Bin gespannt ob noch weitere Features hinzukommen. Wer noch Unentschlossen ist, kann sich die kostenlose Demo hier auf Steam ansehen!

author: {'steamid': '76561197992900775', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2370, 'last_played': 1468079676}
review:
Some games are down to fast choices and split second moves. This is not Football Tactics. The level of skill to do well in this game in normal mode is pretty low. Why? Since your team improves by time more than the other NPC teams due to skill boosters... and then... "everbody" eventually will win it all... but thats part of the fun for most manager games?? Watching your own team win everything feels really good!

Also the attacking and defending part is a bit "strange". Don't expect any offside calls in this game...

But still!! This game was really entertaining for me. The hours I used on the game was a nice experience! I recommend this game to other users.

Personally I would enjoy the game even more if I had the feeling my gaming skills would be the major impact to win... This is why I would give this game a score 4 of 6.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054667609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 30847, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2594, 'last_played': 1664677544}
review:
This game is immense fun. Being a fan of strategy and of football, this game is perfect. So perfect in fact, that I've been playing it for 3 days and I still feel the same joy and drive to continue playing. 

For the Developers: The gameplay is great and i have no qualms about it. I just wish there were a bit more features in terms of the franchise details. I think adding some more in depth statistics would be pretty cool. I'd like to see my club's all time scorers or best goalkeepers. Stuff like that would be very welcome. Also, possibly naming the stadium would be cool. Nicknames for the players might be fun, too. And while i'm thinking about it, if there was an offseason bonus training thing where the player could manually add points to players, it would make specializing players easier. 
 The quarter and semifinal system is a little awkward. Having to play two games against the same team is a bit confusing. Making it a one game knockout would make winning vital rather than being able to lose a game. 
It would also be interesting if there was a world cup and national teams. Obviously, its not so much of a franchise type thing in that case. But, it's something to think about.
All in all, I love the game. I wouldn't think of the above suggestions if i didn't. I look forward to new features, and to many more days of battling for position in the various leagues. Great job. Keep up the good work.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009146262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1690370655}
review: It's a great game, amd the Steam Workshop was a very good decision forum the dev.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080047974', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1610142138}
review:
Einfach nur GEIL! 
Ich kann dazu nichts weiter sagen, außer, dass es wieder mal Sinn macht ein Fussballspiel zu spielen.
Klar, man kann es nich mit dem Fussball Manager von EA, von damals (R.I.P.), vergleichen und ebenfalls auch nicht mit FIFA .... ABER es ist echt mal eine Abwechslung, welche ich so noch nich kenne.

Ebenfalls dass der Workshop mit eingebunden ist, und somit auch die Möglichkeit besteht, dass man sich alles "Original" holen bzw. integrieren kann, ist einfach Wunderbar, die Community ist Sau fleißig, was ein Spiel nunmal am Leben erhält.

Mein Fazit ist 8/10.
Es könnten VIELLEICHT noch ein paar mehr Elemente eingebaut werden (klar es ist Early Access...), ich hoffe einfach darauf, dass dies kein Titel á la DayZ wird und einfach nichts mehr passiert, sobald gut Geld reinkam!

author: {'steamid': '76561198047018852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2320, 'last_played': 1688830157}
review: If you're looking for an extremely good tactics game with a football theme, this is the game for you. It's not perfect obviously, I think it needs to be more dynamic in terms of transfers and training, other clubs should be able to make offers to our players and you should be able to train players in more than one stats. I hope the developers polish these aspects of the game, but overall it is fantastic!

author: {'steamid': '76561198036480732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 611, 'last_played': 1529703442}
review: Usually I stay away from Early access games, but I kept seeing this game, so I figured what the heck. Fan of soccer and big fan of strategy/rpg style games, this game is great. Mods are already going for real-life teams and people, great community for involved play. Can't wait to see what else they can do with this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004343616', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 1579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1576, 'last_played': 1466198086}
review:
Kk, I deleted my old review, since I felt it might have been harsh, so here I go again. The verdict is still the same (not recommended, at least at the moment), but I feel I now understand the game well enough to explain my reasons better.
All in all, this game shows a lot of potential, and is fun to play, even now. The graphics and music are pretty much "meh!", as in pretty bad, but don't matter anyway, and don't really influence my opinion of the game. What does influence it, is the gameplay mechanics.

Basically, this is a stripped-down / casual football manager. It really tries to be and look simple, but here is where I was starting to have problems. 

The first problem, and perhaps the major one, is that it doesn't really succeed in being simple, at least when it comes being intuitive and understandable. I've clocked countless hours of gameplay on plenty of versions of both football manager games and action soccer games, such as FIFA and Pro Evolution Soccer in the past, so I dare claim to be able to learn such games quick and easy. Not with Football Tactics, though. For a game that presumes to be simple, there sure are quite a lot of reading materials. While some of the skills and moves are easy enough to figure out while playing, others aren't, so don't plan on just jumping in and figuring out as you go.

The second problem regarding the game's presumed simple design, is that in some aspects, it is too simple. Soon enough, many things become tedious and tiresome, as the game becomes repetetive and dull. Some would choose the word 'boring'.

My last issue with the game is its core gameplay component - how it deals with every action within the soccer games. While I can't provide any proof of any of this, as I don't have access to the game code, I feel very strongly that sometimes, in specific situations, the results don't make sense. I took quite a few games as test cases and explained this in much detail in the forums. I got some answers from the developers, but I still feel that while there's no bias to either side (I'm pretty sure the AI doesn't "cheat"), some results don't make sense. As this game is still on "Early Acess" at the time of writing this review, I dare say that at least in my humble opinion, the AI needs work just as much as any other aspect of the game, if not more.

Also, some interactive tutorials would be helpful as well. 

TL;DR - A promising game, but I suggest waiting for improvements, especially with the AI.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029665859', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 73029, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1341, 'playtime_at_review': 5662, 'last_played': 1712409687}
review: I like turn based games, this is amazing as well. With rule "30+ % of skill" it makes game more real: you can't win/draw with low-skilled team anyway (if don't use "infinite pass" on your own part of the field).

author: {'steamid': '76561197992196526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1631635185}
review: I was very surprised at how fun this game is. While it's still in Beta and there are a few things that I would like to have changed, it's current state is still fantastic. I have found myself with one-more-turn-itis too many times for me to feel comfortable telling you. Matches last about 20 minutes, which is well timed as it's short enough that you can squeeze in a match before going to work, or you can follow my example and spend all of your Saturday playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029746634', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2997, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2058, 'last_played': 1558266828}
review:
Приветствую тебя, уважаемый читатель и по совместительству любитель пошаговых и футбольных игр!

В этой игре тебе выпадает роль управленца и тренера клуба с возможностью непосредственного управления футболистами твоей команды на футбольном поле во время матчей.

Игровой процесс делиться на два больших пласта: 
1) время между матчами, которое ты будешь тратить на улучшение как инфраструктуры клуба в целом, так и повышения уровня твоей команды в игровом плане. Здесь присутствуют такие возможности как увеличение размера стадиона в зависимости от количества болельщиков твоей команды, которое также динамично и меняется в зависимости от успехов клуба (побеждаешь - болельщиков больше, проигрываешь или играешь в ничью - меньше); возможность развития молодежной академии, которая раз в пол года (то бишь дважды за сезон) поставляет тебе молодых талантов (и не очень талантов) в зависимости от развитости этой структуры; возможность нанимать более опытных тренеров вратарей / защитников / полузащитников / нападающих, что позволяет им получать больше опыта за сыгранные матчи; возможность развивать скаутский отдел и получать в трансферном списке больше футболистов и более молодого возраста; выстраивать тренировочный процесс каждого из футболистов с указанием акцентов тренировок и изучения специальных навыков; ну и конечно же покупать и продавать футболистов, а также менять расстановку игроков на поле в зависимости от своих предпочтений и имеющихся футболистов. 

2) непосредственно сам матч, проходящий в пошаговом режиме, в котором как тебе, так и твоему сопернику даются 3 хода (очка действия), которые могут быть как успешными (обводка, удачный пас, удар и пр.) так и неудачными. Вероятность успеха зависит от уровня футболистов. Ключевым фактором для победы является умение грамотного использование именно специальных навыков футболистов, таких как "пас в разрез", "обводной финт" и прочее. Дело в том, что если навык проходит удачно, то команде дается еще одно дополнительное очко действие, таким образом, давая преимущество перед соперником. 

В целом концепцию игры можно охарактеризовать заезженным тезисом: "легкая для освоения и новичков, и сложная для опытных игроков". В целом игровой процесс динамичный, матчи проходят довольно быстро и с интересом даже после большого количества игр, а в голове постоянно появляются идеи как же еще оптимизировать свой состав и схему  игры, чтобы выстроить команду мечты.

Также интересным является путь карьеры, так, какой бы клуб вы не выбрали или создали сами, начинаете вы именно с низшей любительской лиги и двигаетесь через тернии к звездам (Премьер лиги и еврокубкам). Причем если вы выбираете сильный клуб, руководство говорит вам о том, что прошлый тренер был бездарностью и поэтому мы здесь. А если создаете клуб с нуля, то вам сообщают о том, что вы только начинаете свой долгий путь к профессиональному футболу. 

Игровой процесс конечно же более упрощенный и быстрый по сравнению с серией ФМ, но игра нисколько хуже от этого не становится и напрямую их сравнивать не корректно, учитывая, что в этой игре именно вы управляете футболистами. 

Успехов!

author: {'steamid': '76561198301513339', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1433, 'last_played': 1552686404}

author: {'steamid': '76561198019448970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 505, 'last_played': 1669880644}
review:
Fussballschach mit Suchtfaktor!

Das Spiel macht auf jedenfall abhängig und Laune. Zwar sind die Regeln, das genaue Spiel nicht immer komplett schlüssig und ab einem gewissen Ligenwechsel wird es extrem schwer und es kann gut sein dass man mehrere Saisons erfolgreich spielt aber plötzlich feststeckt oder pleite geht aber die Spielidee an sich macht sehr viel Spaß.

Mit allen Workshopinhalten auch super erweiterbar.

Für kleines Geld ein schönes Spiel für zwischendurch

author: {'steamid': '76561198080700567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 22465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1703, 'last_played': 1677894264}
review:
Daumen hoch!

Ein gutes, kurzweiliges Game. Eigentlich ideal für zwischendurch...aber eigentlich will man gar nicht aufhören. Ein Match...noch...und ein weiteres...jetzt aber wirklich das letzte...

author: {'steamid': '76561198064263576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1509003945}
review: Sympathique petit jeu de foot qui change des habitudes. Mais on se lasse vite, même si les matchs sont courts. Il y a aussi quelques incohérences comme les tournois où vous affrontez des adversaires qui ont 80 de niveau quand vous êtes à peine à 20... Pourquoi proposer de tels challanges si tôt dans une carrière ? Personnellement, j'ai vite tourné en rond dans ce jeu. Peut-être faut-il attendre des améliorations, mais je ne vois pas lesquelles...

author: {'steamid': '76561198016836912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1491495544}
review:
I am not a follower or really a fan of sports games.  I normally preferring military sims, city management and other sims, but this one looked just that bit different and I took the risk and bought it.

I also don't normally post reviews, but the game asked me nicely and as I've had such a good time playing it, I thought I'd put fingers to the keyboard and let the Steam community know what I think.

This is the best sports game I have played.  There is so much in it, ranging from training plans, transfers, upgrading facilities, sponsorship, team selection, customing the team strip and player names and of course even playing out each match, it's a game that it has been very hard to step away from.

It is very easy to learn with helpful advice along the way.  I recommend it to anyone who is into sports games and for those from my non-sports gaming background who feels like a change of pace.

Before long, you'll be wondering where the time has gone and be hearing four words in your head.

"Just one more match"

author: {'steamid': '76561198022575420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1117, 'last_played': 1467235884}
review: It's a really interesting game at first. As soon as you understand the rules, you can start to come up with several great tactics, but all of those allways come crumbling down because the cpu gets lucky shots all. the. time. Seriously, this is a tactics game that is lucky based and the dice seems to be loaded. If you ever play it, choose the option that restricts randomness. You'll lose to every team that's stronger than yours, but at least you'll have a shot agains the weaker ones.
developer_response: Thanks for the review. I regret it is "not recommended", but I hope you will play more and find out that the good part of Football Tactics is that when you master using skills, you will beat much stronger opponents. There are skills which can help you against different opponents' formations. Also, skills allow extending your turn to 4 or 5 moves. When you have footballers with lv2 or lv3 skills - you can vary your tactics. Maybe something in the game mechanics is not clear for you, ask in the steam community. We would be glad to help

author: {'steamid': '76561198001148097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1534150044}
review: It is a fun game, which I will not recommend, since it is more of a mobile game than a PC game, it would have been better if the game was more advanced: instead of only 12 moves per match make it 80 moves per match: instead of a field of 8*12 make it a field of 30*50; instead of 3 possible action make it 9 possible action; instead of 4 stats per player make it 12 stats per player; instead of basic calculation with 2 variables make it a caluclation with 10 variables.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195918109', 'num_games_owned': 728, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 2295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1682192005}
review:
THE FIRST IMPRESSIONS - EARLY ACCESS REVIEW, done Anno Domini 11/06/16

Gents, you are aware that I bring justice with every review I make. If game sucks, I will bring the word that it sucks...


This game I played half an hour and I can tell you already this is absolute gold nugget.
 I never buy things on Early Access, but this one made me change my mind. If you like turn based strategy and football this will be something to go for. So, it is not Fifa or other action minded games. This is for the smart part of the population, who can still play Fifa but can play something serious as well. 

Players have abilities, there is a statistics behind evey move, you have to think and plan your movement tactically. Plus, there is a steam workshop and people are bringing optimizations for free. Plus, this is being developed. The potential of the game is huge. I cannot believe I am actually praising game on Steam...
Graphics is not top notch, it is hard to expect top notch graphics, however the game has decent graphics.

Guys and girls, ladies and gents, the game is currently sold for 12 CHF (so 10 $ more or less). You should purchase it. It is worth more than 70% of all Steam games which are sold for that price.

I do not know how deep the devs will take the game, but this has a huge potential. The time will tell.

---------
For Christ and glory!

author: {'steamid': '76561198051623990', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 5628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 964, 'last_played': 1607576918}
review:
o jogo fica muito facil depois de um tempo.para ganhar os jogos é simplismente ter um jogador com 3° nivel da habilidade chapeu que  você dibla o campo inteiro,e ter um meio campo com carrinho x3 para recuperar a bola e pronto,o jogo esta completo,prejudica muito o chapeu principalmente pelo campo ser muito pequeno,o chapeu ainda dar uma zona de movimento e os zagueiros estarem quase sempre juntos e perto de outros zagueiro posibilitando chegar ao gol com açoes infinitas.e são alguns jogadores que tem habilidade para barrar o zagueiro do chapeu,e quando tiver é simplismente tentar evitar eles

eu esperava um jogo um pouco mais puchado para o FM(me desculpe mais tenho mais de mil horas nesse jogo)aqui ja é opinião propria,mais acho que devem tentar introduzir um sistema de tranferencia um pouco melhor,tipo tentar colocar uma variação de algum atributo(exemplo: def 55-78),e tambem com os custos e negociação de salario,por exemplo: Neymar ganha entre 33k-67k por Ano(por ano ou por mes tanto faz),e não um valor fixo para renovar que nem o atual do jogo.
Tambem o valor de tranferencias deveria contar sem o salario,deveriam ser preços a partes,o passe do jogador e o salario do jogador.

Outra coisa é a camas jovens e os jogadores com 30 anos ficando melhor(???)a base deveria ser melhor explorada,não só um unico jogador a cada 6 meses,e tambem poderia ter o esquema da camada jovem ficar pior com o tempo,fazendo o jogador gastar dinheiro constante,e não so comprar as 5 estrelas e foda-se.tambem não faz menor sentido jogadores de 33 anos ganharem niveis e ficarem melhores,sendo que a realidade é totalmente diferente.

Bem eu sei que muitas criticas que eu fiz são porque o jogo não é o football manager,mais pelomenos a habilidade chapeu OP, e so ter 4 setores de jogo(goleiro,zagueiro,meia e atacante)(sdds volante)resolvam ta dboas

Bem espero que pelomenos nerfem o chapeu,eu sei que o jogo esta em "beta",por isso tirei um pouco do meu tempo para escrever isso.
Bem,boa sorte ai com o projeto,flw

author: {'steamid': '76561197990744169', 'num_games_owned': 649, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1517748093}
review:
É um jogo manager, tem aspectos parecidos com o Football Manager (óbvio, não chega ao absurdo de imersão).
É um jogo que parece de "tabuleiro", você mexe as peças, escolhe skills e etc.
É um jogo que você contrata, vende, tem auxiliares, jogadores tem idade, nivel e habilidades.
É um jogo offline E online.
É um jogo simples OU detalhado, depende do que você quer, óbvio, para ser o melhor precisa dedicar mais tempo às táticas, treinos e transferencias.

Parei de jogar FM16 pra jogar Football Tactics.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967680889', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 5432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1547650580}
review: I've only dabbled with this so far but I'm impressed by what I see. The game might look a little plain visually but I get the feeling I've barely scratched the surface of the mechanics. The blurb is right that this is very much a football themed game as opposed to a straight football centric game. It has a decent slew of customization options for team, players and kit along with an RPG element as the players earn XP and level up their stats as you play. I get the feeling I'm gonna be spending a lot more time on this gem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022963645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 2176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2127, 'last_played': 1533075785}
review:
It's a decent simulation of short turn based soccer games.

What makes it suck (to me at least, a big fan of 'boring' simulation/strategy games) is that you can't chose to stay in a league and farm your guys up. The jump in competition between Amateur league and the next one up is a little rediculous. I'm not sure if I'm missing something with training my players or earning money to get better players, but after amateurs Ijust lose every game. The opposing players have double of the main position stats. It's just not fun.

The game would be a whole lot funner if you could chose what league you're in year to year. Instead it's just "You did good in this league, here's the next one, go lose a lot". It's a casual game. Let it be casual.

If you like games with a really depressing grind, give it a go I guess. I'll honestly probably play it more...but only because it took me over 2 hours to find out the progression system.


MONTHS LATER EDIT:

It seems like they smoothed out the stat curve a bit. It's in early access and seems to be getting better. I played the update 10 beta for awhile today and enjoyed it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988305368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1543158262}
review:
one of the worst games i have ever played, beware of the poor exacution of this nice idea, this game is as boring as watching paint dry, no real tactical depth, no hard decisions, in fact, almost no dicisions what so ever, its all a luck game with the rolls.

no real teams or players, no real tables or cups, just nothing, very slow paced even for a turn based game and the fact this was aimed to be a pay per win smartphone game does not make it better but the opposite, this game is bad in every department, stay away or waste your money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258920401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2627, 'last_played': 1671145193}
review: It's an outstanding game.  I love the turn based concept applied to football, and the mechanics are easy to learn but have a good amount of depth.  The only negative is the RNG can sometimes be frustrating when you roll a low number with your star player against a scrub.  Still, that allows like real football, to have the occasional (but not often) huge upset even using good tactics.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992082934', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 1452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1260, 'last_played': 1570888889}
review: Turn based football sounds like a strange concept, but it's good fun. At first I played all of the games, taking my beloved Liverpool FC out of the Amateur leagues and into the first division. But then I realised that I didn't need to grind all of those games, I could simulate my way into the Premier League and beyond. I've found that the positioning isn't greatly important, but the skills definitely are. I just completed yet another season (2041/42!) where I finally won the treble: Premier League, Domestic Cup and Champions League. The only games I actually played were the two finals, and it isn't hard when you have Level 100 Attackers with 170+ Attack skill. This is a great little game that I've gotten a lot of enjoyment out of (23 hours and counting). One thing that is ridiculously imbalanced though is the way that you can pay 200 fame to buy your footballer until age 40 or 41. That could be 20 years away...and you'll soon max out your guys by their early to mid thirties, meaning that you've got a team full of David Beckhams, except that they're all actually as good as Luis Suarez. I think this needs a nerf!

author: {'steamid': '76561198036081180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2963, 'last_played': 1581523304}
review:
Играл в неё ещё на iOS, с тех пор она сильно изменилась, и, что самое главное, в лучшую сторону.
При возникновении каких либо неисправностей в кратчашие сроки они исправляются.
Постоянно развивается.

Только нащупываешь какую то тактику, она начинает приносить успех - как ты повышаешься в уровне дивизиона и она перестаёт работать. Думать приходится постоянно.

Отличная игра для любителей как футбола, так и тактики. Для тех же, кто любит и то и то - игра обязательна к скачиванию!
Всем удачной игры)

author: {'steamid': '76561198055423264', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1631, 'last_played': 1616266349}
review:
Un jeu qui est plus complexe et plus amusant qu'il n'y parait au premier abord. L'aspect tactique pur fonctionne plutôt bien (et il devient de plus en plus intérésant au fur et a mesure que les joueurs gagnent des "spécialités"), et les adversaires sont loin d'être des faire-valoirs. Mais ce qui m'a tant plus, c'est de pouvoir faire avancer son club saison après saison, et d'avoir à faire des choix stratégiques pour assurer la pérénité du club, tant au niveau des infrastructures que des jeunes pousses qui progressent saisons après saisons. Cependant, cette partie stratégique n'est pas compliqué à gérer, et gagnerai surement encore à se complexifier un peu. 
Au final, on se prend au jeu et mener notre petit club au sommet de l'europe devient une mission semée d'embuches mais passionante !

author: {'steamid': '76561198035450863', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3930, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1247, 'last_played': 1664299209}
review:
Great game, like a hidden gem among all the other games.

What you get is a super-fun sized game, where you get to "play" football as a tactical game, with turns, moves, specials etc. You might not like the simple graphis at first, but for me, it's exactly wht's it's suppoed to be, no extra fireworks just so you see what's the sutiation on the filed. Also, be wary it may be a bit random, so you may use the "less random" option for your games.

The game is activly developed and the developers check the discussions here all the time implemnting ideas from the comunity and really leasting the feedback. 

Really, try the demo at least.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043570888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1101, 'last_played': 1577934858}
review:
If you are looking at this game's page and you see the ratio of likes to dislikes, you might be under the impression that this is a hidden gem of a game. While the game is solid in a lot of respects, it just doesn't have the depth to make it remarkable.

While the gameplay hooked me initially, it became a slog later on and I quickly lost interest. Progression in the game is slow and it feels like it was originally intended to be a free to play game that switched revenue models part of the way through development. 

There are some solid mechanics and I give credit to what is probably a small development team for their efforts, but I can't say I enjoyed the game overall.

Also, as you can see by the developer response from years ago, the development team is incredibly defensive about their product. Thankfully steam allows us to turn off comments now. Hence why I'm putting this review back up.
developer_response:
I regret you more dislike than like our game, but I hope you'll play more and maybe change your mind. Anyway, thanks for the feedback! Let me answer to it.

1) It's in our plans to give the players the possibility to start in any league

2) Abilities make footballers unique. Also, the fun of the game lies in building the team in the situation when there are different obstacles. Sometimes you can't get a footballer with needed skill, so you as a manager should find a way to overcome this obstacle by changing tactics.

3) From many campaigns I saw different players playing, I can say that Power Shot is very balanced now. There are more to it than you described. It gives not only corners but also it can make it harder to counterattack. Or it can bounce back to you and give you another chance. It's very important tactically

4) From our prototyping, we noticed that when players saw the actual probabilities, they were afraid to risk and so they lose matches more often than those who played riskier (seeing 20 vs 35).

5) Every campaign is different. Sometimes you can have the strong leaders who beat any team in the league, sometimes the clubs are more average. Moreover, between seasons, the clubs get new footballers and lost some old footballers. So the clubs may become stronger or weaker.

- - - -
Additionally, I want to say, that from your and few other feedbacks I understood that our tutorial system is not clear enough for everyone. We left many things for players to explore themselves. That's where the depth of the mechanics lies. But maybe we have to better show how to use skills and how to prepare your team to the opponents. 

Maybe if you start some experimental campaign with the option Easy Money, spend Fame on the skills and play with these skills (or watch how AI uses them in the Watch mode), you would better understand how to use them to win even the teams with higher numbers. Because it's possible. And the players who mastered the game often write that the beat 5stars teams with their 3,5 stars teams. The main factor - using skills and fitting your tactics to the every opponent individually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282708001', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3379, 'last_played': 1637955299}
review:
Football Tactics- эта игра от украинских разработчиков Creoteam. 
Этот проект набирает популярность среди игр раннего доступа и не даром 93% людей, написавших обзор про эту игру, оставили положительный отзыв, ведь если ты зайдешь сыграть в эту игру один раз, то ты не сможешь оставновиться.
Отличные звуки, которые предают игре незабываемую атмосферу!

Поехали...
1) В игру можно играть на таких языках как : Английский, Украинский, Португальский, Немецкий, Чешский, Французский, Турецкий, Испанский и конечно же Русский.
2) В игре так же можно изменять масштаб экрана игры.
- "Оконный режим"
Максимальный
Обычный
- "Во весь экран" 
Вы можете менять размер экрана игры, на любой масштаб под свой компьютер.
Идем дальше: 
3) В игре есть 3(три) режима игры: "Одиночная игра", "Сетевая игра" и "Игра вдвоём".
Обо всем по порядку:
- Одиночная игра
Этот режим предназначен для одиночной игры, здесь вы будете развивать свой клуб, выигрывать различные трофеи и продвигать свой клуб на новые высоты.Также можно создать всего 3 клуба, а от не нужных избавляться, удаляя их. В этом режиме есть несколько лиг, а именно 5(пять).
• Любительская лига - лига новичков, где вам предстоит знакомство с игрой.
• Третья лига - здесь команды будут серьёзнее, но пройти дальше не составит тяжелого труда.
• Вторая лига - уровень этой лиги выше и естественно команды будут сильнее, тут вы и будете играть не как попало, а применять различне тактики и ротации в составе!
• Первая лига - эта лига для проффесионалов в своём деле, она последняя ступень в элиту игры!
• Премьер лига - ну а в этой лиге Вам предстоит бой не на жизнь, а на смерть, ведь напор соперников очень высок, но я верю в то, что Вы сможете покорить всех!
Если Вы подумали, что это все, что можно выиграть, то Вы глубоко ошибались, ведь есть еще такие кубки как:
• Кубок Престижа
• Национальный кубок
• Кубок ЕФА
• Кубок Европы
Теперь поговорим о следующем режиме.
- Сетевая игра:
В сетевой игре , как ,наверное, многие догодались можно играть с другими реальными игроками, которые как и Вы сидят и играют в эту замечательную игру! Однако не всегда можно найти соперника, так как онлайн очень мал и никто попросту не заходит в Сетевую игру. Но это не беда,ведь  если у вас есть хорошие друзья, которые готовы с Вами поиграть, Вы можете просто создать лобби и пригласить любого друга, у которого есть эта игра и сражаться в неё и померяться силами, чей клуб сильнее! Также Вы можете собрать шумную компанию и поиграть турнир со своими друзьями и это действительно радует!)
На очереди у нас другой режим:
- Игра вдвоём:
К Вам пришли в гости, допустим всё те же друзья, и Вы не знаете, чем его занять?
Тогда заходите в FT, а именно в этот режим, там вы можете выбирать различные национальные клубы и играть друг против друга, сидя в одной комнате.
Итак мы поговрили о режимах, трофеях, которые есть в игре, а значит можно продолжать обзор.
4) В игру можно играть как с реальными клубами, так и с придуманными разработчиками. 
При создании клуба надо выбрать лигу, чтобы играть против реальных клубов.
5) В игре есть множество видов поля, начиная от обычного поля, заканичвая большими стадионами!
А еще на игру игроков влияют климатические условия, то идет дождь, то снег, то вообще жара ужасная и твои игроки быстро устают.

Остальные детали Вы можете посмотреть и оценить сами, поиграв в эту замечатльную игру!
Я не умею писать обзоры, поэтому этот обзор для любителей поиграть в хорошие игры и надеюсь Вы не будете судить строго и Вам понравится) 

Я ставлю этому проекту 9/10 баллов.

[b][i][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/]Больше обзоров в нашей кураторской группе: Dreams of Genesis [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198000213089', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5065, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 778, 'last_played': 1614299776}
review: If you like football, you must have this game. It combines a bit of strategy, choices and dice rolls with all things football related, like transfers, skills and training (all streamlined, don't expect Football Manager here) into one addictive game. It is easy to learn how to play (the game explains the basics to you very clearly), but not so easy to fully master this, that only comes with (a lot of) practice. Very user-frendly, and while it isn't that great to look at, graphics here aren't exactly anywhere near the top of this game's priorities list, nor should it. But this is just so beautifully put together, even the weather is a game-changer, literally, as playing in the rain afects your players (and opponents too) in a diferent way that playing in a very hot day. Get this game, it's only going to get better, since the devs are really nice and community-frendly. I repeat, get this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031160055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 181538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7309, 'last_played': 1672061881}
review:
I've been in love with football management sims since the days of [url=www.myabandonware.com/game/one-nil-soccer-manager-1ka]One-Nil[/url]. That's 1992, my friends.
I've never enjoyed one as much as this one.

This game is simple enough to play that you can jump right in and start playing. And if you want a casual experience, you can play this game like that. Don't think too much about your decisions, just pick what feels right. You can do that and have fun.

Or, if you want a more analytical experience, you can take your time over each decision. 
You can put your roster into a spreadsheet, plan out which players you will develop and which ones you will sell, and when.
You can crunch the numbers over the tactical decisions in the match. Do I take a shot from long range with my ACC 52 midfielder against his DEF 67 keeper, or is it better if I try a layoff pass through his center back to my forward, who can then try to score with a rainbow feint? You can do the math and figure out which one has a better chance at a goal--and also think about what position you leave the opponent with if you do not get a goal.

In other words, you can play this game hardcore, and try to make the best decisions all the time (even though many of the decisions will defy exhaustive analysis), or you can play by the seat of your pants, and try to win by instincts. It is a remarkable acheivement to have created a game that can satisfy both types of play styles.

[b]You will like this game if you like:[/b]
[list]
[*]Turn-based tactics and strategy. (Even if you aren't a football fan, you will like this aspect, if you like turn-based squad tactics at all.)
[*]Roster management--balancing the need to win matches now with the need to develop your next generation of players.
[*]Elegant game design--something simple to learn, but deceptively complex beneath the surface. Every decision that confronts you offers enough options to be interesting, but not so many to be overwhelming.
[*]The challenge of taking the worst club in the lowest league and slowly building it into a continental champion.
[*]Replayability--start over with a new club and try a different strategy.
[*]Real club names and logos. It takes only a couple minutes to download the user mods with real names and logos for all of the clubs in all of the leagues. After all, isn't it more fun to take over West Bromwich Albion, with the throstle-on-a-hawthorn-branch logo, than some club named West Bromwich FC represented by a generic green eagle silhoutted atop a soccer ball?
[/list]

[b]Things this game does not do:[/b]
[list]
[*]Pretty graphics. If you want eye candy, look elsewhere.
[*]"Realistic" simulation. Players have four attributes, there are 10 different special abilities they can learn, and the pitch is a 10x7 grid. It certainly "feels" like football, but it is not a "realistic" simulation.
[*]Complex player relations. Players do their best, all the time, no matter what. You don't have to figure out how to motivate them, whom they like to play with, etc.
[*]Player contract negotiations. When you acquire a player he has a 1-year contract. When a contract is due to expire you can sign a new contract (1-3 years), let the player go, or sell him. The cost of the new contract depends on the footballer's level at the time of signing and the length of the contract. There's no negotiation.
[*]Media interactions. No press conferences, interviews, etc.
[*]The threat of getting sacked. It's your team. You make all the decisions, and you never lose your job.
[/list]

As of the date of this writing (April 29 2016), the game still has the Early Access tag, but it is really a complete game.
The developers are adding additional features, but there isn't anything missing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126911183', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 26684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16899, 'last_played': 1711022781}
review:
I bought this game more than four years ago when it was still very early access. At the time it was a simpler, and I thought to myself: huh nice game hope it keeps up the development. And oh boy did they!
Is this a game that I play non stop? No. Is this a game that scratches an itch once in a while? Yes, and it sucks me in for a few days sometimes weeks. 
Over the years the UI and graphics stayed mostly the same, and if they changed they did it for the better. It looks simple, clean and clear. It does the job well and doesn't try things it shoudn't. 
On the tactical side of the game, they have added layers upon layers for more depht. Every so often I saw a blogpost from the developers about something new and I would think: there goes my free time, time to play it again. 

Think Football Manager is too complex and has too much micro managment? This game smoothes it out to the bare minimum. you still get those moments where you will be thinking about what would be the best option for the future. Can I play some young players this game for better development? Is this good but old player getting to expensive? Should I sell and start the young guys? Keep him around?  

Think X-COM is cool but too high stakes and complex? This game lets you make mistakes without killing your best players off. But still gives you the moments where you cross your fingers and hope your keeper gets the miracle 10% chance to save a shot in the last minute while being 1-0 up. 

I have played both games (FM since 2007, X-COM since 2014) and I can honestly say that this game is a crossover that succeeds in mixing two complex games, keeping it intresting while also making it simpler and streamlined.

Four years ago I gave this game a thumbs up. I just deleted that comment to tell everybody again that this game is worth it. There's a DLC coming up the flesh the game out even more. I will buy it the moment it comes out. Once I paid around €5.- for this game. Now after all these years and hours of fun, I'm happy to spend more money on this game. Because I felt like I robbed the developers.

To the developers. Thank you for making this game and making it better every. single. update! Curious to see where you guys take this game in the future!

author: {'steamid': '76561198132582842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 674, 'last_played': 1564944625}
review:
Ich mach's kurz und knapp.
Das Spiel an sich macht Spass.

ABER:

Man bekommt viel zu wenig Fähnchen/Geld um sich zu verbessern.
Bis Liga 4 echt leicht, aber bisdahin hat man kein Geld, (bzw. die Spieler da sind schweineteuer) um sich besser Spieler zu kaufen -> man verliert nahezu jedes Spiel ab Liga 3.
Ergo man verdient auch kein Geld mehr also wieder zurück in Liga 4.
Ein Paar mehr Aktionen wären nicht schlecht. z.B. wenn man nahe an einem Gegner vorbei rennt sollte er dazwischen grätschen oder so.
Bisher nicht die Langzeiterfüllung.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994647729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1558636542}
review:
Skvělá hra s jednoduchým mechanismem a neskutečnou výzvou. Nelze nastavit velikost kapesníků, kterými si trenér utírá pot z čela, ani množství toalet na stadionu. Přesto drobný managment je k dispozici a hlavně ne pro okrasu. Drobné RPG prvky vytváří z fotbalu tvrdou tahovou strategii, která neodpustí ukliknutí natož lidskou hloupost. 
Vzhledem k tomu, že je k dispozici demo, doporučuji zkusit. Pokud to bude váš šálek kávy, poznáte to velice brzy ... po té, co odbije půlnoc a vy stále řešíte, zda zvolit přesnou střelu či pořádnou ránu, je jasno.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991601788', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1525166930}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005632571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1461533472}
review:
Let's start by comparing this game to a "lightweight Bloodbowl with better AI" and say I don't usually play heavy simulation games like Football Manager. So far, the gameplay is fun but lacks in depth for a strategy title. I would normally give a positive review for this game in early access, but I want to counter balance the very positive reviews it has so far, since I believe this game to be worth 80% positive votes instead of 94% (at time of this writing) with its current "depth". It does the job well as a soccer team simulation, my review focuses more on the "strategy" aspect of its categorization. If you like simulating games and managing a team, then I would bet this game is perfect for you. If you like levelling up your goons and playing deeply strategic games, especially turn based ones then keep reading.

I enjoy playing it casually so far and after 7 hours I can say the difficulty curve increases with advancement. But not in a "strategies become more important" kind of way. It's all about my forward's accuracy vs the defenders defense. Wish me luck ! To be honest, I still have to fully realize the depth of strategical option, since I did about 4 seasons (with 3 different teams), so I haven't tried all the skills yet ... but right now I can only say, strategy in this game is very streamlined and the one best option is easy to identify with no reason I would stop spamming it in hopes of getting more goals. Basically, there's no real "setting up for the goal" since it comes down to getting the ball to the forward, get him as close as possible to the goal and shoot: from there, it's a skill throw for the shot and it's always boiled down to probabilities. I can score through 3 defenders on the other team if they are amateurs ... or it is impossible to score in season 2 against 3rd league teams until I have taken enough losses that my players have leveled up (which isn't the problem for me but a reality in this game).

By changing a few mecanics, this title could become a very, very good turn based strategy title with light RPGs elements. But then it would become a lot more time consuming I guess, since they would have to give more actions, make actions harder, passes shorter, having other adjacent allies provide support automatically while having adjacent opposing players provide pressure automatically making actions harder, provide appropirate skills for all new concepts, etc. which would make games longer through the system AND mking you think about each move, to set the best probabilities for your actions.

Conclusion: a negative review due to lack of depth in actual match gameplay. A good simulation title. Will play it casually and adjust review to a positive one if more depth is added to playing the game vs simulating it and making it more about team development.
developer_response:
Hi! Thanks for the review. It shows us that Football Tactics doesn't demonstrate the importance of the skills clearly.

The development of the team is not only about increasing numbers. You should figure out what skills you need for every opponent because even a weaker (in numbers) team with right skills and tactics can win the stronger opponents. 

Tackle-Pass-Kick works only with the weaker teams. To succeed in the higher leagues you have to use skills and tactics, and build a team that can perform different tactics.

I hope you will play the game more and will see how your short- and long-term decisions shape your team.

Ideal für ein paar Matches zwischendurch, aber dennoch mit Tiefgang. Klar. nicht zu vergleichen mit den oben genannten Klassikern. author: {'steamid': '76561198117688482', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1036, 'last_played': 1566395472}
review:
This is a very good game but with room to improvement.

Pros:
Addictive gameplay
It looks deceptively simple but it has a lot of strategy involved. 
Good presentation(both on UI and game)

Cons:
Huge jump on difficulty between league levels.
You need to grind for a couple of seasons(or more) to gain experience points.
For the above reason, you need a huge amount of seasons to increase skills.

Fix those issues and it’s a 10/10 game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056733181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1038, 'last_played': 1520648841}
review:
Combining RPG elements with tactical grid-based football is something I'd never have thought of as being good, but after playing 6 hours just since last night, It definitely works well. Alot of clubs seem to have a variation of the Arsenal logo, which I'm not sure if it was intentional or not, just something I noticed. 

The one major downside comes with the aforementioned RPG elements. There doesn't seem to be any set rules in regards to the statistics, and how they determine the success of a particular action. The dice rolls are WAY too random, which I imagine is to simulate the randomness of real life football, but when your striker with almost 100 accuracy gets his shot blocked by a defender with 20 defense becasue his stat randomly plummets to 5 there's something inherently wrong. 

To summarize, great idea, but the dice rolls are frustratingly random which makes it feel more like a luck simulator than a football game. Still can't stop playing so the devs must have done something right.

Also, no Bohemians for Irish league, whats up with that?

Edit: I should have known to check the options before posting. And the community change to Irish league adds to the awesomeness. Now I can fully recommend this game. Thanks for the addictive football, developers. Hope there's more to come =D

author: {'steamid': '76561198009876819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1605601026}
review:
Football Tactics is quite a decent casual game that you can pick up anytime and/or get addicted to. 

The game mechanics work on a simple duelling premise between two players across 4 player stats (Accuracy, Passing, Defence, Control), with the addition of several skills/abilities which can turn the game in your favour. 

Being an indie title, obviously there is no licencing for official team/player names, which isn't an issue for me or likely anybody that spent their childhood playing Pro Evolution Soccer. There are a number of things you can upgrade for your club (stadium, scouts, coaches, etc.) to help improve the players you have and club finances. However, it becomes a bit of a grind and there is a lack of variety to the gameplay beyond this. 

Overall, it's likely to keep you entertained for a little while, or a bit longer if you multi-task like me and play the game sporadically in addition to doing other things. There's a lot of potential with this title and I would expect "Football Tactics 2" at some point, with development of the current gameplay and a load of additional features.

Score: 3/5

review: This game is wonderful. It is a remider to the older editions of EA Sports' manageer series while at the  same time exploring a Blood Bowl-style tactical scheme. The idea is simply brilliant. author: {'steamid': '76561197991374546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 14867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2513, 'last_played': 1639681529}
review:
This game is GREAT!... It's turn Based Football and it's fantastic. The game machinates are very simple to learn and pic up, so you'll be playing and stargazing with in minutes. You can play with any of the pre-made teams, or make your own custom teams, player names, give them what ever logo you like, it's so cool. This is a very well made game, it's a gem for any game library.

Now, 2 things the game doesn't have that I feel it should. It should have play by e-mail and connection by IP, that would make it even more awesome.

The game is early access, but it feels like a completed game. You owe it to yourself to get this if you love turn based stratagy games and football.

Just wanted to update my review again to say, this game has gotten even better with the newest update. Your players now have skill tress so you can train them how you want and much more. The look has been updated too. The Dev's are working hard to make this game a challenge an d fun. I highly recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982084258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1459977492}
review:
[h1] Тактика без тактики	[/h1]

[i]Я не имею в общем ничего против этой игры, каждому свое. Долгие годы я являлся поклонником серии Football Manager, однако в этом году решил пропустить FM2016 из-за нелестных отзывов. [/i]

Случайно наткнулся на Football Tactics, идея показалась интересной. Однако реализация...

Это игра не про думать. Ее формат - free to play в какой-нибудь соц. сети "Вконтакте". 
Механика настолько элементарная, что ее кажется даже освоил мой кот.
Развитие клуба, развитие навыков, трансферы... Все делается одной большой кнопкой. Накопил ресурс, развил дальше. Что-то вроде веселого фермера, или как там его.

По поводу тактической составляющей. То она... Ух. Если вы делаете пошаговую игру, то это не значит, что автоматом она получает некий глубокий геймплей и интересную тактическую составляющую. Football Tactics не про это. Здесь нет сложной синергии скиллов. Точность вашего нападающего против навыка защиты защитника, простите за тавтологию, бросок костей и итоговый результат. Вот и весь матч. Интересно? Первые два раза возможно. Когда понимаешь в чем соль, накатывает тоска.

[b]Почему я бы не советовал покупать игру[/b]
[olist]
[*] Цена - для такой поделки 499 рублей это верх наглости.
[*] Скучный, простейший геймплей, который вряд ли затянет на долго
[*] Система развития просто для галочки. Она также проста, как геймплей.
[/olist]
developer_response:
Спасибо за обзор. Он нам показывает, что некоторые игроки считают, будто игровой процесс в "обучающей" Любительской лиге такой же, как и во всей остальной игре. 

На самом деле, мы сделали Любительскую лигу простой для того, чтобы игроки поняли основы механики и освоились с интерфейсами игры. А далее - вы не выйдете из Третьей, и тем более Второй лиги, если не поймете, как работают навыки, как выстраивать тактику под разных противников. Во второй лиге уже не получится бить с любой точки поля и забивать. А ваши решения на ранних этапах игры начнут сильно сказываться на команде. Развиваете ли молодежь, изучаете ли навыки (и какие навыки?) и т.д.

Попробуйте, пожалуйста, выйти хотя бы в Первую лигу. Возможно, ваше мнение об игре поменяется.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083551288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 87, 'playtime_at_review': 634, 'last_played': 1712274192}
review:
Игра - интересная, оригинальная, захватывающая. На вид простая, но затягивает и увлекает. Я уверен, что она придется по вкусу, как любителям футбольних симуляторов, так и тем, кто с ними не знаком.
Ничего "не нужного", лишнего, в этой игре я не нашел.
Игра очень понравилась в целом, но попробую выделить основные положительные моменты:
- идея!
- механика игры
- приятная графика
- движения игроков на поле
Разработчикам - большая благодарность и творческих успехов (не останавливайтесь на достигнутом!), а всем остальным - Приятной Игры!

author: {'steamid': '76561198137095943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3940, 'last_played': 1637260884}
review:
******************************1. REVIEW nach ca. 4 Std***************************************************

Football Tactics verspricht viel, kann es aber nicht halten!

Taktiken kann man hier nicht nutzen. Es gibt nur eine begrenzte Zahl an Feldern, auf denen die Spieler aufgestellt werden können. Im Mittelfeld gibt es sogar nur Felder entlang der Mittellinie. Defensive- oder offensive Mittelfeldspieler gibt es hier nicht. Moderne Fußballtaktiken kann man  leider gar nicht umsetzen. Es kommt allerdings auch gar nicht auf Taktik an, die Spiele gewinnt man durch die besseren Spieler und deren Skills. 

Zudem ist es buggy. Als ich ein Spiel neustarten wollte, bekam ich nur einen grünen Bildschirm angezeigt. 

Die Zahl der Züge pro Halbzeit ist sehr kurz und das Feld ist zu klein um wirklich taktisch spielen zu können!

Das Spiel ist viel zu teuer! Für 2-3€ wäre es ok, aber 13€ ist total unverschämt.

************************************************************************************************************************************************* 2. Review nach ca. 40 Std*************************************************
Am Anfang mochte ich das Spiel nicht (s.o.). Mittlerweile muss ich zugeben, dass mich das Spiel total fesselt. Nach den ersten 4-5 Std. erkannte ich, dass ich tatsächlich stärkere Teams schlagen kann, indem ich die richtige Aufstellung wähle und Spieler mit den passenden Talenten auf die richtigen Positionen setze.

Ich möchte deshalb meine erste Bewertung korigieren:

DAUMEN HOCH

author: {'steamid': '76561198288414005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 20085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3, 'last_played': 1571169318}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062232099', 'num_games_owned': 5821, 'num_reviews': 291, 'playtime_forever': 706, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 394, 'last_played': 1459310508}
review:
I’m such a big fan of Sports Interactive‘s Football Manager that when Creoteam approached me to cover their Football Tactics game rather than another game that I was hoping to feature developed by them that I was more than a little skeptical. Nothing is as in depth, serious and addictive in regards to football management games as good old FM. I’ve played many hours in a number of other management games that attempt to push FM off of its porch but nothing has ever come close. I feared that Creoteam’s game was just going to end up being just another game that tried its best but fell woefully short. Thankfully I was quickly alleviated of my fears when I realized that that wasn’t what they were attempting to do at all. What their intention to create was a football management game that was much more accessible to all gamers – not just football super fans – as well as a game that was much more casual and nature and just an overall fun gaming experience.

In many ways Football Tactics reminded me of a few of the older shareware football management games that I played in my teenage years. These were games that were nowhere close to the uber tight management games that FM and Out of the Park Baseball are producing today but they were games that I vividly remember sinking tens or even hundreds of hours into.  For a gamer and a sports nut this game has the potential, and already is for its stage of early access, to be a lot of fun. You don’t need everything to uber serious all of the time so the game is going to fit a very nice niche.

The game plays out similarly to turn based combat games do on a grid with the obvious difference being that its football rather than an action-strategy game. Players have various different skills that are what you would expect from a football player with special skills such as shot cannon, lob passes, etc. giving the game some spice and flavor. Games are relatively quick affairs with some players feeling that they’re a little too short so perhaps an option to extend the game’s length – which many sports titles currently allow – perhaps being a nice option to appease them. I’d also like to see some more options within the game – a few more moves added. However, I’ve just been promoted out of the first league so more advanced techniques and skill may start becoming available as I progress during the game.

I like the amount of options that have been developed outside of matches themselves. The full gamut of options for a football fan are present. You can play the transfer market – buying better players and selling those that have been made redundant. You can also upgrade your club in a number of different ways. You can increase your seating capacity which will in turn increase the amount of money that you take at the gate. Improving your youth academy allows you to get better young footballers into the club. The first scout assistant decreases the age of players on the transfer list while the second scout assistant increases the number of players on the transfer list. Improving your major assistant enables substitutes to get experience after a match and finally positional coaches increase the amount of experience players get following matches.

The game is already heavily Steamified with 51 achievements giving hunters something to aim for and there are eleven trading cards to get to collect a full set. Steam Workshop integration has already been added to the game so that players can create mods, leagues and other things to improve the game. Finally, leagues can be played by both a single player or multi player to add a more competitive spirit to the game. In all, I’m very impressed with the amount of work that has already been completed on the game. The game is feature complete as Creoteam promise but they want to add even more features and tools to the game to make it the best game that it can possibly be and that makes me excited.

Although it probably wont replace Football Manager as my go to football management game it is a game that I return to time and again to experience its casual, smart and very well designed and develop footballing experience. A great game.

For our epic giveaways and similar reviews head to [url=http://www.steamified.com/]Steamified.com[/url]

To join in our fantastic community join our [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Steamified]Steam group[/url]

review: Reminiscient of Fire Emblem or Final Fantasy Tactics but soccer, great turn based strategy with decent amount of depth. Level up your players by gaining experience in matches and teach your footballers skills to help change the tide of the game! Train your players and raise their attributes (stats), dependent on what position you are using them. The game uses hidden dice rolls to determine what happens, Would definitely recommend to any TBS fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068023280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2301, 'last_played': 1700083094}
review:
Hallo Entwickler! 

Ein Spiel mit SUCHTFAKTOR 1000! leider... ;-)  ein echter Zeitfresser und total entspannt spielbar, weil RUNDENBASIERT und deshalb absolut stressfrei, sozusagen für ältere Leute... ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198129299024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 892, 'last_played': 1587136844}
review:
A mes yeux il y a deux sortes de bons jeux de foot, pourtant très differentes... Les simulations comme football manager qui vous plonge dans la complexe gestion d'un club dans tous ces détails ou les jeux orientés arcades comme PES par exemple, ou le plaisir du foot réside dans la gameplay.

Football Tactic est un jeu original parce qu'il propose de jouer au foot dans une version tour par tour. Les graphismes sont un peu cartoon et franchement sympa pour un petit jeu. 

La musique entrainante ne vous lassera pas. La ou sa coince un peu c'est que football tactic j'y joue uniquement en simulation pas en réel puisque le game play qui est pourtant l'atout ou le défaut majeur du jeu ne me plait pas.

Système de transfert limité. 

On note pourtant de très bonnes idées comme les capacités des joueurs qui permettent a force d'entrainement de débloquer des actions spéciales ou encore un tutoriel complet sous forme de mail.

Le gameplay personellement j'ai pas accroché, au bout de deux ou trois matches je suis passé en simulation, c'est dire... Après je pense que c'est le point original du jeu alors si vous voulez découvrir une nouvelle façon de jouer au foot, pourquoi pas.
developer_response: Hi! The game is launched from Early Access, so take a look, please. Maybe your opinion will change. However, I advice to master turn-based mechanics first. If you do, you will understand the logic behind Simulation mode. Actually, Simulation = Watch mode but without animations.
